   15: %% See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
   16: %% limitations under the License.
   17: %% 
   18: %% %CopyrightEnd%
   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %% There are some environment variables that can be used to "manipulate"
   22: %% the test suite: 
   23: %%
   24: %% Variable that controls which 'groups' are to run (with default values)
   25: %%
   26: %%         ESOCK_TEST_API_MISC     include
   27: %%         ESOCK_TEST_API_BASIC    include
   28: %%         ESOCK_TEST_API_SENDFILE include
   29: %%         ESOCK_TEST_API_FROM_FD  include
   30: %%         ESOCK_TEST_API_OPTS     include
   31: %%         ESOCK_TEST_API_OPWTO    include
   32: %%
   33: %% Variable that controls "verbosity" of the test case(s):
   34: %%
   35: %%         ESOCK_TEST_QUIET: true (default) | false
   36: %%
   37: 
   38: %% Run the entire test suite: 
   39: %% ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, [batch]).
   40: %%
   41: %% Run a specific group:
   42: %% ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, {group, foo}, [batch]).
   43: %%
   44: %% Run a specific test case:
   45: %% ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, foo, [batch]).
   46: %%
   47: %% (cd /mnt/c/$LOCAL_TESTS/26/kernel_test/ && $ERL_TOP/bin/win32/erl.exe -sname kernel-26-tester -pa c:$LOCAL_TESTS/26/test_server)
   48: %% application:set_env(kernel, test_inet_backends, true).
   49: %% S = fun() -> ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, [batch]) end.
   50: %% S = fun(SUITE) -> ts:run(kernel, SUITE, [batch]) end.
   51: %% S = fun() -> ct:run_test([{suite, socket_SUITE}]) end.
   52: %% S = fun(SUITE) -> ct:run_test([{suite, SUITE}]) end.
   53: %% G = fun(GROUP) -> ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, {group, GROUP}, [batch]) end.
   54: %% G = fun(SUITE, GROUP) -> ts:run(kernel, SUITE, {group, GROUP}, [batch]) end.
   55: %% G = fun(GROUP) -> ct:run_test([{suite, socket_SUITE}, {group, GROUP}]) end.
   56: %% G = fun(SUITE, GROUP) -> ct:run_test([{suite, SUITE}, {group, GROUP}]) end.
   57: %% T = fun(TC) -> ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, TC, [batch]) end.
   58: %% T = fun(TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, socket_SUITE}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   59: %% T = fun(S, TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, S}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   60: %% T = fun(S, G, TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, S}, {group, G}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   61: %%
   62: %% Some official info about AF_UNIX
   63: %% https://devblogs.microsoft.com/commandline/windowswsl-interop-with-af_unix/
   64: 
   65: 
   66: 
   67: -module(socket_api_SUITE).
   68: 
   69: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   70: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   71: -include("socket_test_evaluator.hrl").
   72: -include("kernel_test_lib.hrl").
   73: 
   74: %% Suite exports
   75: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0]).
   76: -export([init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1,
   77:          init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2,
   78:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   79: 
   80: %% Test cases
   81: -export([
   82:          %% *** API Misc ***
   83:          api_m_info/1,
   84:          api_m_debug/1,
   85:          api_m_error_open/1,
   86:          api_m_error_bind/1,
   87: 
   88:          %% *** API Basic ***
   89:          api_b_simple_open_and_close_udp4/1,
   90:          api_b_simple_open_and_close_udp6/1,
   91:          api_b_simple_open_and_close_tcp4/1,
   92:          api_b_simple_open_and_close_tcp6/1,
   93:          api_b_open_and_info_udp4/1,
   94:          api_b_open_and_info_udp6/1,
   95:          api_b_open_and_info_tcp4/1,
   96:          api_b_open_and_info_tcp6/1,
   97:          api_b_open_and_close_udp4/1,
   98:          api_b_open_and_close_udp6/1,
   99:          api_b_open_and_close_tcp4/1,
  100:          api_b_open_and_close_tcp6/1,
  101:          api_b_open_and_close_udpL/1,
  102:          api_b_open_and_close_tcpL/1,
  103:          api_b_open_and_close_seqpL/1,
  104: 	 api_b_open_and_close_seqp_sctp4/1,
  105: 	 api_b_open_and_close_seqp_sctp6/1,
  106: 	 api_b_open_and_close_stream_sctp4/1,
  107: 	 api_b_open_and_close_stream_sctp6/1,
  108:          api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw/1,
  109:          api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4/1,
  110:          api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udpL/1,
  111:          api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4/1,
  112:          api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udpL/1,
  113:          api_b_send_and_recv_tcp4/1,
  114:          api_b_send_and_recv_stream_sctp4/1,
  115:          api_b_sendv_and_recv_tcp4/1,
  116:          api_b_send_and_recv_tcpL/1,
  117:          api_b_send_and_recv_seqpL/1,
  118:          api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4/1,
  119:          api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL/1,
  120:          api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_seqpL/1,
  121:          api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream_sctp4/1,
  122:          api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_inet/1,
  123:          api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_inet6/1,
  124:          api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_local/1,
  125:          api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_inet/1,
  126:          api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_inet6/1,
  127:          api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_local/1,
  128:          api_b_dgram_connect_udp4/1,
  129:          api_b_dgram_connect_udp6/1,
  130:          api_b_sendv_tcp4/1,
  131:          api_b_sendv_tcp6/1,
  132: 
  133:          %% *** API sendfile ***
  134:          api_sendfile_inet/1,
  135:          api_sendfile_inet6/1,
  136:          api_sendfile_local/1,
  137:          api_sendfile_loop_inet/1,
  138:          api_sendfile_loop_inet6/1,
  139:          api_sendfile_loop_local/1,
  140: 
  141:          %% *** API socket from FD ***
  142:          api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp4/1,
  143:          api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp6/1,

  147:          api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_udp6/1,
  148:          api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp4/1,
  149:          api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp6/1,
  150:          api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp4/1,
  151:          api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp6/1,
  152:          api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp4/1,
  153:          api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp6/1,
  154:          api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp4/1,
  155:          api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp6/1,
  156:          api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp4/1,
  157:          api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp6/1,
  158: 
  159: 
  160:          %% *** API async ***
  161:          api_a_connect_tcp4/1,
  162:          api_a_connect_tcp6/1,
  163:          api_a_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4/1,
  164:          api_a_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp6/1,
  165:          api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4/1,
  166:          api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp6/1,
  167:          api_a_send_and_recv_tcp4/1,
  168:          api_a_send_and_recv_tcp6/1,
  169:          api_a_send_and_recv_sctp4/1,
  170:          api_a_send_and_recv_sctp6/1,
  171:          api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4/1,
  172:          api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp6/1,
  173:          api_a_recvfrom_cancel_udp4/1,
  174:          api_a_recvfrom_cancel_udp6/1,
  175:          api_a_recvmsg_cancel_udp4/1,
  176:          api_a_recvmsg_cancel_udp6/1,
  177:          api_a_accept_cancel_tcp4/1,
  178:          api_a_accept_cancel_tcp6/1,
  179:          api_a_recv_cancel_tcp4/1,
  180:          api_a_recv_cancel_tcp6/1,
  181:          api_a_recvmsg_cancel_tcp4/1,
  182:          api_a_recvmsg_cancel_tcp6/1,
  183:          api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp4/1,
  184:          api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp6/1,
  185:          api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp4/1,
  186:          api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp6/1,
  187:          api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp4/1,
  188:          api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp6/1,
  189:          api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp4/1,
  190:          api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp6/1,
  191:          api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_tcp4/1,
  192:          api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_tcp6/1,
  193: 
  194: 
  195:          %% *** API Options ***
  196:          api_opt_simple_otp_options/1,
  197:          api_opt_simple_otp_meta_option/1,
  198:          api_opt_simple_otp_rcvbuf_option/1,
  199:          api_opt_simple_otp_controlling_process/1,
  200:          api_opt_sock_acceptconn_udp/1,
  201:          api_opt_sock_acceptconn_tcp/1,
  202:          api_opt_sock_acceptfilter/1,
  203:          api_opt_sock_bindtodevice/1,
  204:          api_opt_sock_broadcast/1,
  205:          api_opt_sock_debug/1,
  206:          api_opt_sock_domain/1,
  207:          api_opt_sock_dontroute/1,
  208:          api_opt_sock_error/1,
  209:          api_opt_sock_keepalive/1,
  210:          api_opt_sock_linger/1,
  211:          api_opt_sock_mark/1,
  212:          api_opt_sock_maxdg/1,
  213:          api_opt_sock_max_msg_size/1,
  214:          api_opt_sock_oobinline/1,
  215:          api_opt_sock_passcred_tcp4/1,
  216:          api_opt_sock_peek_off_tcpL/1,
  217:          api_opt_sock_peercred_tcpL/1,
  218:          api_opt_sock_priority_udp4/1,
  219:          api_opt_sock_priority_tcp4/1,
  220:          api_opt_sock_rcvbuf_udp4/1,
  221:          api_opt_sock_rcvlowat_udp4/1,
  222:          api_opt_sock_rcvtimeo_udp4/1,
  223:          api_opt_sock_reuseaddr/1,
  224:          api_opt_sock_exclusiveaddruse/1,
  225:          api_opt_sock_bsp_state/1,
  226:          api_opt_sock_sndbuf_udp4/1,
  227:          api_opt_sock_sndlowat_udp4/1,
  228:          api_opt_sock_sndtimeo_udp4/1,
  229:          api_opt_sock_timestamp_udp4/1,
  230:          api_opt_sock_timestamp_tcp4/1,
  231:          api_opt_ip_add_drop_membership/0, api_opt_ip_add_drop_membership/1,
  232:          api_opt_ip_pktinfo_udp4/1,
  233:          api_opt_ip_recvopts_udp4/1,
  234:          api_opt_ip_recvorigdstaddr_udp4/1,
  235:          api_opt_ip_recvtos_udp4/1,
  236:          api_opt_ip_recvttl_udp4/1,
  237:          api_opt_ip_tos_udp4/1,
  238:          api_opt_ip_recverr_udp4/1,
  239:          api_opt_ip_mopts_udp4/1,
  240:          api_opt_ipv6_recvpktinfo_udp6/1,
  241: 	 api_opt_ipv6_flowinfo_udp6/1,
  242: 	 api_opt_ipv6_hoplimit_udp6/1,
  243: 	 api_opt_ipv6_tclass_udp6/1,
  244:          api_opt_ipv6_recverr_udp6/1,
  245: 	 api_opt_ipv6_mopts_udp6/1,
  246:          api_opt_tcp_congestion_tcp4/1,
  247:          api_opt_tcp_cork_tcp4/1,
  248:          api_opt_tcp_maxseg_tcp4/1,
  249:          api_opt_tcp_nodelay_tcp4/1,
  250:          api_opt_tcp_keepcnt_tcp4/1,
  251:          api_opt_tcp_keepidle_tcp4/1,
  252:          api_opt_tcp_keepintvl_tcp4/1,
  253:          api_opt_udp_cork_udp4/1,
  254: 
  255:          %% *** API Operation Timeout ***
  256:          api_to_connect_tcp4/1,
  257:          api_to_connect_tcp6/1,
  258:          api_to_accept_tcp4/1,
  259:          api_to_accept_tcp6/1,
  260:          api_to_maccept_tcp4/1,
  261:          api_to_maccept_tcp6/1,
  262:          api_to_send_tcp4/1,
  263:          api_to_send_tcp6/1,
  264:          api_to_sendto_udp4/1,
  265:          api_to_sendto_udp6/1,
  266:          api_to_sendmsg_tcp4/1,
  267:          api_to_sendmsg_tcp6/1,
  268:          api_to_recv_udp4/1,
  269:          api_to_recv_udp6/1,
  270:          api_to_recv_tcp4/1,
  271:          api_to_recv_tcp6/1,
  272:          api_to_recvfrom_udp4/1,
  273:          api_to_recvfrom_udp6/1,
  274:          api_to_recvmsg_udp4/1,
  275:          api_to_recvmsg_udp6/1,
  276:          api_to_recvmsg_tcp4/1,
  277:          api_to_recvmsg_tcp6/1
  278:         ]).
  279: 
  280: 
  281: 
  282: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  283: 
  284: -define(SLIB,       socket_test_lib).
  285: -define(KLIB,       kernel_test_lib).
  286: -define(LOGGER,     socket_test_logger).
  287: 
  288: -define(BASIC_REQ,  <<"hejsan">>).
  289: -define(BASIC_REP,  <<"hoppsan">>).
  290: 
  291: %% -define(DATA,       <<"HOPPSAN">>). % Temporary
  292: -define(FAIL(R),    exit(R)).
  293: 
  294: %% -define(SLEEP(T),   receive after T -> ok end).
  295: 
  296: %% -define(MINS(M),    timer:minutes(M)).
  297: %% -define(SECS(S),    timer:seconds(S)).
  298: 
  299: %% -define(TT(T),      ct:timetrap(T)).
  300: 
  301: %% -define(F(F, A),    ?SLIB:f(F, A)).
  302: %% -define(P(F),       ?SLIB:print(F)).
  303: %% -define(P(F, A),    ?SLIB:print(F, A)).
  304: 
  305: %% -define(WINDOWS, {win32,nt}).
  306: 
  307: %% -define(START_NODE(NamePre),
  308: %%         ?START_NODE(NamePre, 5000)).
  309: %% -define(START_NODE(NamePre, Timeout),
  310: %%         start_node(?CT_PEER_NAME(NamePre), Timeout)).
  311: 
  312: 
  313: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  314: 
  315: suite() ->
  316:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]},
  317:      {timetrap, {minutes,1}}].
  318: 
  319: all() -> 
  320:     Groups = [
  321:               {misc,                   "ESOCK_TEST_API_MISC",     include},
  322:               {basic,                  "ESOCK_TEST_API_BASIC",    include},
  323:               {sendfile,               "ESOCK_TEST_API_SENDFILE", include},
  324:               {from_fd,                "ESOCK_TEST_API_FROM_FD",  include},
  325:               {options,                "ESOCK_TEST_API_OPTS",     include},
  326:               {operation_with_timeout, "ESOCK_TEST_API_OPWTO",    include}
  327:              ],
  328:     [use_group(Group, Env, Default) || {Group, Env, Default} <- Groups].
  329: 
  330: use_group(_Group, undefined, exclude) ->
  331:     [];
  332: use_group(Group, undefined, _Default) ->
  333:     [{group, Group}];
  334: use_group(Group, Env, Default) ->
  335: 	case os:getenv(Env) of
  336: 	    false when (Default =:= include) ->
  337: 		[{group, Group}];
  338: 	    false ->
  339: 		[];
  340: 	    Val ->
  341: 		case list_to_atom(string:to_lower(Val)) of
  342: 		    Use when (Use =:= include) orelse 
  343: 			     (Use =:= enable) orelse 
  344: 			     (Use =:= true) ->
  345: 			[{group, Group}];
  346: 		    _ ->
  347: 			[]
  348: 		end
  349: 	end.
  350:     
  351: 
  352: groups() -> 
  353:     [{misc,                    [], api_misc_cases()},
  354:      {basic,                   [], api_basic_cases()},
  355:      {sendfile,                [], api_sendfile_cases()},
  356:      {from_fd,                 [], api_from_fd_cases()},
  357:      {async,                   [], api_async_cases()},
  358:      {async_ref,               [], api_async_cases()},
  359:      {options,                 [], api_options_cases()},
  360:      {options_otp,             [], api_options_otp_cases()},
  361:      {options_socket,          [], api_options_socket_cases()},
  362:      {option_sock_acceptconn,  [], api_option_sock_acceptconn_cases()},
  363:      {option_sock_passcred,    [], api_option_sock_passcred_cases()},
  364:      {option_sock_priority,    [], api_option_sock_priority_cases()},
  365:      {option_sock_buf,         [], api_option_sock_buf_cases()},
  366:      {option_sock_lowat,       [], api_option_sock_lowat_cases()},
  367:      {option_sock_timeo,       [], api_option_sock_timeo_cases()},
  368:      {option_sock_timestamp,   [], api_option_sock_timestamp_cases()},
  369:      {options_ip,              [], api_options_ip_cases()},
  370:      {options_ipv6,            [], api_options_ipv6_cases()},
  371:      {options_tcp,             [], api_options_tcp_cases()},
  372:      {options_udp,             [], api_options_udp_cases()},
  373:      %% {options_sctp,            [], api_options_sctp_cases()},
  374:      {operation_with_timeout,  [], api_op_with_timeout_cases()}
  375:     ].
  376:      
  377: api_misc_cases() ->
  378:     [
  379:      api_m_info,
  380:      api_m_debug,
  381:      api_m_error_open,
  382:      api_m_error_bind
  383:     ].
  384: 
  385: api_basic_cases() ->
  386:     [
  387:      api_b_simple_open_and_close_udp4,
  388:      api_b_simple_open_and_close_udp6,
  389:      api_b_simple_open_and_close_tcp4,
  390:      api_b_simple_open_and_close_tcp6,
  391:      api_b_open_and_info_udp4,
  392:      api_b_open_and_info_udp6,
  393:      api_b_open_and_info_tcp4,
  394:      api_b_open_and_info_tcp6,
  395:      api_b_open_and_close_udp4,
  396:      api_b_open_and_close_udp6,
  397:      api_b_open_and_close_tcp4,
  398:      api_b_open_and_close_tcp6,
  399:      api_b_open_and_close_udpL,
  400:      api_b_open_and_close_tcpL,
  401:      api_b_open_and_close_seqpL,
  402:      api_b_open_and_close_seqp_sctp4,
  403:      api_b_open_and_close_seqp_sctp6,
  404:      api_b_open_and_close_stream_sctp4,
  405:      api_b_open_and_close_stream_sctp6,
  406:      api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw,
  407:      api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4,
  408:      api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udpL,
  409:      api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4,
  410:      api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udpL,
  411:      api_b_send_and_recv_tcp4,
  412:      api_b_send_and_recv_stream_sctp4,
  413:      api_b_sendv_and_recv_tcp4,
  414:      api_b_send_and_recv_tcpL,
  415:      api_b_send_and_recv_seqpL,
  416:      api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4,
  417:      api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL,
  418:      api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_seqpL,
  419:      api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream_sctp4,
  420:      api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_inet,
  421:      api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_inet6,
  422:      api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_local,
  423:      api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_inet,
  424:      api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_inet6,
  425:      api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_local,
  426:      api_b_dgram_connect_udp4,
  427:      api_b_dgram_connect_udp6,
  428:      api_b_sendv_tcp4,
  429:      api_b_sendv_tcp6
  430:     ].
  431: 
  432: api_sendfile_cases() ->
  433:     [
  434:      api_sendfile_inet,
  435:      api_sendfile_inet6,
  436:      api_sendfile_local,
  437:      api_sendfile_loop_inet,
  438:      api_sendfile_loop_inet6,
  439:      api_sendfile_loop_local
  440:     ].
  441: 
  442: api_from_fd_cases() ->
  443:     [
  444:      api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp4,
  445:      api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp6,
  446:      api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp4,
  447:      api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp6,
  448:      api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_udp4,
  449:      api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_udp6,
  450:      api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp4,
  451:      api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp6,
  452:      api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp4,
  453:      api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp6,
  454:      api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp4,
  455:      api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp6,
  456:      api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp4,
  457:      api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp6,
  458:      api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp4,
  459:      api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp6
  460:     ].
  461: 
  462: api_async_cases() ->
  463:     [
  464:      api_a_connect_tcp4,
  465:      api_a_connect_tcp6,
  466:      api_a_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4,
  467:      api_a_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp6,
  468:      api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4,
  469:      api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp6,
  470:      api_a_send_and_recv_tcp4,
  471:      api_a_send_and_recv_tcp6,
  472:      api_a_send_and_recv_sctp4,
  473:      api_a_send_and_recv_sctp6,
  474:      api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4,
  475:      api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp6,
  476:      api_a_recvfrom_cancel_udp4,
  477:      api_a_recvfrom_cancel_udp6,
  478:      api_a_recvmsg_cancel_udp4,
  479:      api_a_recvmsg_cancel_udp6,
  480:      api_a_accept_cancel_tcp4,
  481:      api_a_accept_cancel_tcp6,
  482:      api_a_recv_cancel_tcp4,
  483:      api_a_recv_cancel_tcp6,
  484:      api_a_recvmsg_cancel_tcp4,
  485:      api_a_recvmsg_cancel_tcp6,
  486:      api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp4,
  487:      api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp6,
  488:      api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp4,
  489:      api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp6,
  490:      api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp4,
  491:      api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp6,
  492:      api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp4,
  493:      api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp6,
  494:      api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_tcp4,
  495:      api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_tcp6
  496:     ].
  497:

  654:      api_to_recv_udp6,
  655:      api_to_recv_tcp4,
  656:      api_to_recv_tcp6,
  657:      api_to_recvfrom_udp4,
  658:      api_to_recvfrom_udp6,
  659:      api_to_recvmsg_udp4,
  660:      api_to_recvmsg_udp6,
  661:      api_to_recvmsg_tcp4,
  662:      api_to_recvmsg_tcp6
  663:     ].
  664: 
  665: 
  666: 
  667: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  668: 
  669: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  670:     ?P("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  671:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  672:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  673:     
  674:     try socket:info() of
  675:         #{} ->
  676:             case ?KLIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  677:                 {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  678:                     SKIP;
  679: 
  680:                 Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  681: 
  682:                     ?P("init_per_suite -> end when "
  683:                        "~n      Config: ~p", [Config1]),
  684: 
  685:                     %% We need a monitor on this node also
  686:                     kernel_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  687: 
  688:                     socket:use_registry(false),
  689:                     case quiet_mode(Config1) of
  690:                         default ->
  691:                             case ?LOGGER:start() of
  692:                                 ok ->
  693:                                     Config1;
  694:                                 {error, Reason} ->
  695:                                     ?P("init_per_suite -> "
  696:                                        "Failed starting logger"
  697:                                        "~n   Reason: ~p"
  698:                                        "~n", [Reason]),
  699:                                     {skip, "Failed starting logger"}
  700:                             end;
  701:                         Quiet ->
  702:                             case ?LOGGER:start(Quiet) of
  703:                                 ok ->
  704:                                     [{esock_test_quiet, Quiet} | Config1];
  705:                                 {error, Reason} ->
  706:                                     ?P("init_per_suite -> "
  707:                                        "Failed starting logger"
  708:                                        "~n   Reason: ~p"
  709:                                        "~n", [Reason]),
  710:                                     {skip, "Failed starting logger"}
  711:                             end
  712:                     end
  713:             end
  714:     catch
  715:         error : notsup ->
  716:             {skip, "esock not supported"};
  717:         error : undef ->
  718:             {skip, "esock not configured"}
  719:     end.
  720: 
  721: end_per_suite(Config0) ->
  722: 
  723:     ?P("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  724:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  725:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  726: 
  727:     %% Stop the local monitor
  728:     kernel_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  729: 
  730:     (catch ?LOGGER:stop()),
  731: 
  732:     Config1 = ?KLIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  733: 
  734:     ?P("end_per_suite -> "
  735:        "~n      Nodes: ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  736: 
  737:     Config1.
  738: 
  739: 
  740: init_per_group(sendfile = GroupName, Config) ->
  741:     io:format("init_per_group(~w) -> entry with"
  742:               "~n   Config: ~p"
  743:               "~n", [GroupName, Config]),
  744:     case socket:is_supported(sendfile) of
  745:         true ->
  746:             Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  747:             HeaderSize = 1021, % I like prime numbers
  748:             DataSize = 1031,  Pow2 = 16, % About 64 MB
  749:             Header = rand:bytes(HeaderSize),
  750:             Filler = rand:bytes(DataSize),
  751:             Trailer = rand:bytes(HeaderSize),
  752:             FileName = filename:join(Dir, "sendfile.bin"),
  753:             file:write_file(
  754:               FileName,
  755:               [Header, double_data(Pow2, Filler), Trailer]),
  756:             N = 1 bsl Pow2,
  757:             [{sendfile_file,
  758:               {FileName,
  759:                HeaderSize + (N * DataSize) + HeaderSize,
  760:                [Header, {N, Filler}, Trailer]}}
  761:              | Config];
  762:         false ->
  763:             Config
  764:     end;
  765: init_per_group(from_fd = _GroupName, Config) ->
  766:     has_multi_scheds(),
  767:     Config;
  768: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  769:     Config.
  770: 
  771: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  772:     Config.
  773: 
  774: 
  775: init_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
  776:     io:format("init_per_testcase(~w) -> entry with"
  777:               "~n   Config: ~p"
  778:               "~n", [_TC, Config]),
  779:     Config.
  780: 
  781: end_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
  782:     Config.
  783: 
  784: 
  785: quiet_mode(Config) ->
  786:     case lists:keysearch(esock_test_quiet, 1, Config) of
  787:         {value, {esock_test_quiet, Quiet}} ->
  788:             Quiet;
  789:         false ->
  790:             case os:getenv("ESOCK_TEST_QUIET") of
  791:                 "true"  -> true;
  792:                 "false" -> false;
  793:                 _       -> default
  794:             end
  795:     end.
  796: 
  797: double_data(0, Data) ->
  798:     Data;
  799: double_data(N, Data) ->
  800:     double_data(N - 1, [Data, Data]).
  801: 
  802: 
  803: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  804: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  805: %%                                                                     %%
  806: %%                           API MISC                                  %%
  807: %%                                                                     %%
  808: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  809: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  810: 
  811: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  812: 
  813: %% This is an extremely rudimentary test case, that just tests
  814: %% that we can call the "global" info function and that it returns
  815: %% a non-empty map...
  816: 
  817: api_m_info(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  818:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  819:     tc_try(api_m_info,
  820:            fun() ->
  821:                    ok = api_m_info()
  822:            end).
  823: 
  824: api_m_info() ->
  825:     case socket:info() of
  826:         Info when is_map(Info) ->
  827:             Sz = maps:size(Info),
  828:             if
  829:                 (Sz > 0) ->
  830:                     ok;
  831:                 true ->
  832:                     ?FAIL(no_info)
  833:             end;
  834:         Info ->
  835:             ?FAIL({invalid_info, Info})
  836:     end.
  837: 
  838: 
  839: 
  840: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  841: 
  842: %% A simple test case that tests that the global debug can be changed.
  843: %% At the same time, it will test the info function (since it uses it
  844: %% for verification).
  845: 
  846: api_m_debug(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  847:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
  848:     tc_try(api_m_debug,
  849:            fun() -> has_bugfree_gcc() end,
  850:            fun() ->
  851:                    ok = api_m_debug()
  852:            end).
  853: 
  854: %% For some reason this test case triggers a gcc bug, which causes
  855: %% a segfault, on an ancient Fedora 16 VM. So, check the version of gcc...
  856: %% Not pretty, but the simplest way to skip (without actually testing
  857: %% for the host).
  858: has_bugfree_gcc() ->
  859:     has_bugfree_gcc(os:type()).
  860: 
  861: %% Make sure we are on linux
  862: has_bugfree_gcc({unix, linux}) ->
  863:     has_bugfree_gcc2(string:trim(os:cmd("cat /etc/issue")));
  864: has_bugfree_gcc(_) ->
  865:     ok.
  866: 
  867: %% Make sure we are on Fedora 16
  868: has_bugfree_gcc2("Fedora release 16 " ++ _) ->
  869:     has_bugfree_gcc3(os:cmd("gcc --version"));
  870: has_bugfree_gcc2("Welcome to SUSE Linux " ++ _) ->
  871:     has_bugfree_gcc4(os:cmd("gcc --version"));
  872: has_bugfree_gcc2(_) ->
  873:     ok.
  874: 
  875: has_bugfree_gcc3("gcc (GCC) 4.6.3 20120306 (Red Hat 4.6.3-2" ++ _) ->
  876:     skip("Buggy GCC");
  877: has_bugfree_gcc3(_) ->
  878:     ok.
  879: 
  880: has_bugfree_gcc4("gcc (SUSE Linux) 4.3.2" ++ _) ->
  881:     skip("Buggy GCC");
  882: has_bugfree_gcc4(_) ->
  883:     ok.
  884: 
  885: api_m_debug() ->
  886:     i("get initial info"),
  887:     #{debug := D0} = socket:info(),
  888:     D1 = not D0,
  889:     i("set new debug (~w => ~w)", [D0, D1]),
  890:     ok = socket:debug(D1),
  891:     i("get updated info (~w)", [D1]),
  892:     #{debug := D1} = socket:info(),
  893:     D2 = not D1,
  894:     i("set new debug (~w => ~w)", [D1, D2]),
  895:     ok = socket:debug(D2),
  896:     i("get updated info (~w)", [D2]),
  897:     #{debug := D2} = socket:info(),
  898:     i("ok"),
  899:     ok.
  900:     
  901: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  902: 
  903: %% Some tests for API misuses
  904: 
  905: -define(
  906:    EXCEPTION(Code),
  907:    exception(fun () -> begin Code end end)).
  908: 
  909: exception(Fun) ->
  910:     try Fun() of
  911:         Result ->
  912:             error({unexpected_return, Result})
  913:     catch
  914:         Class : Reason ->
  915:             {Class, Reason}
  916:     end.
  917: 
  918: 
  919: api_m_error_open(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  920:     %%
  921:     %% open/1
  922:     {error, badarg} =
  923:         ?EXCEPTION(
  924:            socket:open(should_be_fd) ),
  925:     %%
  926:     %% open/2
  927:     {error, badarg} =
  928:         ?EXCEPTION(
  929:            socket:open(should_be_fd, #{}) ),
  930:     %%
  931:     %% A non-atom, non-integer protocol causes an exception
  932:     %% in prim_socket, whilst a non-atom, non-integer type
  933:     %% or domain causes an error return tuple from the NIF
  934:     %% code.  This is a bit inconsistent.  Should we change
  935:     %% that, if so - how, and consolidate in tests?
  936:     %%
  937:     {error,{invalid,{domain,should_be_domain}}} =
  938:         socket:open(should_be_domain, dgram),
  939:     {error,{invalid,{type,should_be_type}}} =
  940:         socket:open(inet, should_be_type),
  941:     %%
  942:     %% open/3
  943:     {error,{invalid,{domain,should_be_domain}}} =
  944:         socket:open(should_be_domain, dgram, #{}),
  945:     {error,{invalid,{type,should_be_type}}} =
  946:         socket:open(inet, should_be_type, #{}),
  947:     {error,{invalid,{protocol,should_be_protocol}}} =
  948:         socket:open(inet, dgram, should_be_protocol),
  949:     %%
  950:     %% open/4
  951:     {error,{invalid,{domain,should_be_domain}}} =
  952:         socket:open(should_be_domain, dgram, default, #{}),
  953:     {error,{invalid,{type,should_be_type}}} =
  954:         socket:open(inet, should_be_type, default, #{}),
  955:     {error,{invalid,{protocol,should_be_protocol}}} =
  956:         socket:open(inet, dgram, should_be_protocol, #{}),
  957:     {error, badarg} =
  958:         ?EXCEPTION(
  959:            socket:open(inet, dgram, default, should_be_options) ).
  960: 
  961: 
  962: api_m_error_bind(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  963:     {ok, S} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
  964:     try
  965:         %%
  966:         %% bind/2
  967:         {error, badarg} =
  968:             ?EXCEPTION(
  969:                socket:bind(should_be_socket, any) ),
  970:         {error, badarg} =
  971:             ?EXCEPTION(
  972:                socket:bind(make_ref(), any) ),
  973:         %%
  974:         %% A non-map, non-atom Addr causes an {invalid,_}
  975:         %% exception.  Should that instead be an error
  976:         %% return?
  977:         %%
  978:         {error,{invalid,{sockaddr,should_be_sockaddr}}} =
  979:             socket:bind(S, should_be_sockaddr),
  980:         EmptyMap = #{},
  981:         {error,{invalid,{sockaddr,family,EmptyMap}}} =
  982:             socket:bind(S, EmptyMap),
  983:         InvalidKey = #{family => inet, invalid_key => []},
  984:         {error,{invalid,{sockaddr,{keys,[invalid_key]},InvalidKey}}} =
  985:             socket:bind(S, InvalidKey),
  986:         InvalidFamily = #{family => invalid_family},
  987:         {error,{invalid,{sockaddr,InvalidFamily}}} =
  988:             socket:bind(S, InvalidFamily)
  989:     after
  990:         _ = socket:close(S)
  991:     end,
  992:     ok.
  993: 
  994: 
  995: %% XXX Lots of missing error tests here, for all other API functions...
  996: 
  997: 
  998: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  999: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1000: %%                                                                     %%
 1001: %%                           API BASIC                                 %%
 1002: %%                                                                     %%
 1003: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1004: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1005: 
 1006: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1007: 
 1008: %% Basically open (create) and then close.
 1009: api_b_simple_open_and_close_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1010:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1011:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1012:            fun() ->
 1013:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1014:                                  type     => dgram,
 1015:                                  protocol => udp},
 1016:                    ok = api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState)
 1017:            end).
 1018: 
 1019: 
 1020: 
 1021: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1022: 
 1023: %% Basically open (create) and then close.
 1024: api_b_simple_open_and_close_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1025:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1026:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1027:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 1028:            fun() ->
 1029:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 1030:                                  type     => dgram,
 1031:                                  protocol => udp},
 1032:                    ok = api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState)
 1033:            end).
 1034: 
 1035: 
 1036: 
 1037: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1038: 
 1039: %% Basically open (create) and then close.
 1040: api_b_simple_open_and_close_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1041:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1042:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1043:            fun() ->
 1044:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1045:                                  type     => stream,
 1046:                                  protocol => tcp},
 1047:                    ok = api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState)
 1048:            end).
 1049: 
 1050: 
 1051: 
 1052: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1053: 
 1054: %% Basically open (create) and then close.
 1055: api_b_simple_open_and_close_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1056:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1057:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1058:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 1059:            fun() ->
 1060:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 1061:                                  type     => stream,
 1062:                                  protocol => tcp},
 1063:                    ok = api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState)
 1064:            end).
 1065: 
 1066: 
 1067: 
 1068: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1069: 
 1070: api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState) ->
 1071:     Seq = 
 1072:         [
 1073:          #{desc => "open",
 1074:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 1075:                          type     := Type,
 1076:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) -> 
 1077:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 1078:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 1079:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 1080:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 1081:                                    ERROR
 1082:                            end
 1083:                    end},
 1084: 
 1085:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 1086: 
 1087:          #{desc => "close socket",
 1088:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 1089:                            socket:close(Sock)
 1090:                    end},
 1091: 
 1092:          %% *** We are done ***
 1093:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 1094:         ],
 1095:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 1096:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 1097: 
 1098: 
 1099: 
 1100: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1101: 
 1102: %% Basically open (create) and info of an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 1103: %% With some extra checks...
 1104: api_b_open_and_info_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1105:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1106:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_info_udp4,
 1107:            fun() ->
 1108:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1109:                                  type     => dgram,
 1110:                                  protocol => udp},
 1111:                    ok = api_b_open_and_info(InitState)
 1112:            end).
 1113: 
 1114: 
 1115: 
 1116: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1117: 
 1118: %% Basically open (create) and info of an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 1119: %% With some extra checks...
 1120: api_b_open_and_info_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1121:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1122:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_info_udp6,
 1123:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 1124:            fun() ->
 1125:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 1126:                                  type     => dgram,
 1127:                                  protocol => udp},
 1128:                    ok = api_b_open_and_info(InitState)
 1129:            end).
 1130: 
 1131: 
 1132: 
 1133: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1134: 
 1135: %% Basically open (create) and info of an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 1136: %% With some extra checks...
 1137: api_b_open_and_info_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1138:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1139:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_info_tcp4,
 1140:            fun() ->
 1141:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1142:                                  type     => stream,
 1143:                                  protocol => tcp},
 1144:                    ok = api_b_open_and_info(InitState)
 1145:            end).
 1146: 
 1147: 
 1148: 
 1149: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1150: 
 1151: %% Basically open (create) and info of an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 1152: %% With some extra checks...
 1153: api_b_open_and_info_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1154:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1155:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_info_tcp6,
 1156:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 1157:            fun() ->
 1158:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 1159:                                  type     => stream,
 1160:                                  protocol => tcp},
 1161:                    ok = api_b_open_and_info(InitState)
 1162:            end).
 1163: 
 1164: 
 1165: 
 1166: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1167: 
 1168: api_b_open_and_info(InitState) ->
 1169:     Seq = 
 1170:         [
 1171:          #{desc => "open",
 1172:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 1173:                          type     := Type,
 1174:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) -> 
 1175:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 1176:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 1177:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 1178:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 1179:                                    ERROR
 1180:                            end
 1181:                    end},
 1182:          #{desc => "get socket info",
 1183:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 1184:                            Info = socket:info(Sock),
 1185:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Got (some) Info: "
 1186:                                        "~n   ~p", [Info]),
 1187:                            {ok, State#{info => Info}}
 1188:                    end},
 1189:          #{desc => "validate socket info",
 1190:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 1191:                          type     := Type,
 1192:                          protocol := Protocol,
 1193:                          info     := #{domain        := Domain,
 1194:                                        type          := Type,
 1195:                                        protocol      := Protocol,
 1196:                                        counters      := _,
 1197:                                        num_readers   := 0,
 1198:                                        num_writers   := 0,
 1199:                                        num_acceptors := 0}}) ->
 1200:                            ok;
 1201:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 1202:                          type     := Type,
 1203:                          protocol := Protocol,
 1204:                          info     := Info}) ->
 1205:                            ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Info: "
 1206:                                        "~n   (expected) Domain:   ~p"
 1207:                                        "~n   (expected) Type:     ~p"
 1208:                                        "~n   (expected) Protocol: ~p"
 1209:                                        "~n   ~p",
 1210:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol, Info]),
 1211:                            {error, unexpected_infio}
 1212:                    end},
 1213:          #{desc => "close socket",
 1214:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 1215:                            socket:close(Sock)
 1216:                    end},
 1217: 
 1218:          %% *** We are done ***
 1219:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 1220:         ],
 1221:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 1222:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 1223: 
 1224: 
 1225: 
 1226: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1227: 
 1228: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 1229: %% With some extra checks...
 1230: api_b_open_and_close_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1231:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1232:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_udp4,
 1233:            fun() ->
 1234:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1235:                                  type     => dgram,
 1236:                                  protocol => udp},
 1237:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1238:            end).
 1239: 
 1240: 
 1241: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1242: 
 1243: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 1244: %% With some extra checks...
 1245: api_b_open_and_close_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1246:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1247:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_udp6,
 1248:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 1249:            fun() ->
 1250:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 1251:                                  type     => dgram,
 1252:                                  protocol => udp},
 1253:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1254:            end).
 1255: 
 1256: 
 1257: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1258: 
 1259: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 1260: %% With some extra checks...
 1261: api_b_open_and_close_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1262:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1263:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_tcp4,
 1264:            fun() ->
 1265:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1266:                                  type     => stream,
 1267:                                  protocol => tcp},
 1268:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1269:            end).
 1270: 
 1271: 
 1272: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1273: 
 1274: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 1275: %% With some extra checks...
 1276: api_b_open_and_close_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1277:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1278:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_tcp6,
 1279:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 1280:            fun() ->
 1281:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1282:                                  type     => stream,
 1283:                                  protocol => tcp},
 1284:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1285:            end).
 1286: 
 1287: 
 1288: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1289: 
 1290: %% Basically open (create) and close an Unix Domain dgram (UDP) socket.
 1291: %% With some extra checks...
 1292: api_b_open_and_close_udpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1293:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1294:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_udpL,
 1295:            fun() ->
 1296: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 1297: 		   is_not_windows()
 1298: 	   end,
 1299:            fun() ->
 1300:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
 1301:                                  type     => dgram,
 1302:                                  protocol => default},
 1303:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1304:            end).
 1305: 
 1306: 
 1307: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1308: 
 1309: %% Basically open (create) and close an Unix Domain stream (TCP) socket.
 1310: %% With some extra checks...
 1311: api_b_open_and_close_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1312:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1313:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_tcpL,
 1314:            fun() -> has_support_unix_domain_socket() end,
 1315:            fun() ->
 1316:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
 1317:                                  type     => stream,
 1318:                                  protocol => default},
 1319:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1320:            end).
 1321: 
 1322: 
 1323: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1324: 
 1325: %% Basically open (create) and close an Unix Domain dgram (UDP) socket.
 1326: %% With some extra checks...
 1327: api_b_open_and_close_seqpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1328:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1329:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1330:            fun() ->
 1331: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 1332:                    is_not_windows()
 1333: 	   end,
 1334:            fun() ->
 1335:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
 1336:                                  type     => seqpacket,
 1337:                                  protocol => default},
 1338:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1339:            end).
 1340: 
 1341: 
 1342: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1343: 
 1344: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv4 SCTP (seqpacket) socket.
 1345: %% With some extra checks...
 1346: api_b_open_and_close_seqp_sctp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1347:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1348:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1349:            fun() -> has_support_sctp() end,
 1350:            fun() ->
 1351:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1352:                                  type     => seqpacket,
 1353:                                  protocol => sctp},
 1354:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1355:            end).
 1356: 
 1357: 
 1358: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1359: 
 1360: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv6 SCTP (seqpacket) socket.
 1361: %% With some extra checks...
 1362: api_b_open_and_close_seqp_sctp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1363:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1364:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1365:            fun() ->
 1366:                    has_support_sctp(),
 1367:                    has_support_ipv6()
 1368:            end,
 1369:            fun() ->
 1370:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 1371:                                  type     => seqpacket,
 1372:                                  protocol => sctp},
 1373:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1374:            end).
 1375: 
 1376: 
 1377: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1378: 
 1379: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket.
 1380: %% With some extra checks...
 1381: api_b_open_and_close_stream_sctp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1382:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1383:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1384:            fun() -> has_support_sctp() end,
 1385:            fun() ->
 1386:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1387:                                  type     => stream,
 1388:                                  protocol => sctp},
 1389:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1390:            end).
 1391: 
 1392: 
 1393: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1394: 
 1395: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv6 SCTP (stream) socket.
 1396: %% With some extra checks...
 1397: api_b_open_and_close_stream_sctp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1398:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1399:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1400:            fun() ->
 1401:                    has_support_sctp(),
 1402:                    has_support_ipv6()
 1403:            end,
 1404:            fun() ->
 1405:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 1406:                                  type     => stream,
 1407:                                  protocol => sctp},
 1408:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 1409:            end).
 1410: 
 1411: 
 1412: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1413: 
 1414: api_b_open_and_close(InitState) ->
 1415:     Seq = 
 1416:         [
 1417:          #{desc => "open",
 1418:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 1419:                          type     := Type,
 1420:                          protocol := Protocol} = S) -> 
 1421:                            Res = socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol), 
 1422:                            {ok, {S, Res}} 
 1423:                    end},
 1424:          #{desc => "validate open",
 1425:            cmd  => fun({S, {ok, Sock}}) -> 
 1426:                            NewS = S#{socket => Sock},
 1427:                            {ok, NewS};
 1428:                       ({_, {error, epfnosupport = Reason}}) ->
 1429:                            {skip, Reason};
 1430:                       ({_, {error, eprotonosupport = Reason}}) ->
 1431:                            {skip, Reason};
 1432:                       ({_, {error, esocktnosupport = Reason}}) ->
 1433:                            {skip, Reason};
 1434:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 1435:                            ERROR
 1436:                    end},
 1437:          #{desc => "get domain (maybe)",
 1438:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = S) ->
 1439:                            Res = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, domain),
 1440:                            {ok, {S, Res}}
 1441:                    end},
 1442:          #{desc => "validate domain (maybe)",
 1443:            cmd  => fun({#{domain := Domain} = S, {ok, Domain}}) -> 
 1444:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("expected domain: ~p", [Domain]),
 1445:                            {ok, S};
 1446:                       ({#{domain := ExpDomain}, {ok, Domain}}) ->
 1447:                            {error, {unexpected_domain, ExpDomain, Domain}};
 1448:                       %% Some platforms do not support this option
 1449:                       ({S, {error, {invalid, _}} = ERROR}) ->
 1450:                            case
 1451:                                socket:is_supported(options, socket, domain)
 1452:                            of
 1453:                                true ->
 1454:                                    ERROR;
 1455:                                false ->
 1456:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket option 'domain' "
 1457:                                                "not supported"),
 1458:                                    {ok, S}
 1459:                            end;
 1460:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 1461:                            ERROR
 1462:                    end},
 1463:          #{desc => "get type",
 1464:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 1465:                            Res = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, type), 
 1466:                            {ok, {State, Res}}
 1467:                    end},
 1468:          #{desc => "validate type",
 1469:            cmd  => fun({#{type := Type} = State, {ok, Type}}) ->
 1470:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("expected type: ~p", [Type]),
 1471:                            {ok, State};
 1472:                       ({#{type := ExpType}, {ok, Type}}) ->
 1473:                            {error, {unexpected_type, ExpType, Type}};
 1474:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 1475:                            ERROR
 1476:                    end},
 1477:          #{desc => "get protocol (maybe)",
 1478:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 1479:                            Res = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, protocol),
 1480:                            {ok, {State, Res}}
 1481:                    end},
 1482:          #{desc => "validate protocol",
 1483:            cmd  => fun({#{protocol := Protocol} = State, {ok, Protocol}}) ->
 1484:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("expected protocol: ~p", [Protocol]),
 1485:                            {ok, State};
 1486:                       ({#{domain   := Domain,
 1487: 			  protocol := ExpProtocol}, {ok, Protocol}}) ->
 1488: 			   %% On OpenBSD (at least 6.6) something screwy happens
 1489: 			   %% when domain = local.
 1490: 			   %% It will report a completely different protocol
 1491: 			   %% (icmp) but everything still works.
 1492:                            %% So we skip if this happens on OpenBSD...
 1493: 			   case os:type() of
 1494: 			       {unix, openbsd} when (Domain =:= local) ->
 1495: 				   {skip, ?F("Unexpected protocol: ~p instead of ~p",
 1496: 					     [Protocol, ExpProtocol])};
 1497: 			       _ ->
 1498: 				   {error, {unexpected_protocol,
 1499: 					    ExpProtocol, Protocol}}
 1500: 			   end;
 1501:                       %% Some platforms do not support this option
 1502:                       ({State, {error, {invalid, _}} = ERROR}) ->
 1503: 			   case socket:is_supported(options, socket, protocol) of
 1504: 			       true ->
 1505:                                    ERROR;
 1506: 			       false ->
 1507:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket option 'protocol' "
 1508:                                                "not supported"),
 1509:                                    {ok, State}
 1510: 			   end;
 1511:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 1512:                            ERROR
 1513:                    end},
 1514:          #{desc => "get controlling-process",
 1515:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 1516:                            Res = socket:getopt(Sock, otp, controlling_process),
 1517:                            {ok, {State, Res}}
 1518:                    end},
 1519:          #{desc => "validate controlling-process",
 1520:            cmd  => fun({State, {ok, Pid}}) ->
 1521:                            case self() of
 1522:                                Pid ->
 1523:                                    {ok, State};
 1524:                                _ ->
 1525:                                    {error, {unexpected_owner, Pid}}
 1526:                            end;
 1527:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 1528:                            ERROR
 1529:                    end},
 1530:          #{desc => "close socket",
 1531:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 1532:                            Res = socket:close(Sock),
 1533:                            {ok, {State, Res}}
 1534:                    end},
 1535:          #{desc => "validate socket close",
 1536:            cmd  => fun({_, ok}) ->
 1537:                            ok;
 1538:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 1539:                            ERROR
 1540:                    end},
 1541: 
 1542:          %% *** We are done ***
 1543:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 1544:         ],
 1545:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 1546:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 1547: 
 1548: 
 1549: 
 1550: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1551: 
 1552: %% Basically open (create) and (maybe) close an RAW socket.
 1553: 
 1554: api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1555:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1556:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw,
 1557:            fun() ->
 1558:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 1559:                                  type     => raw,
 1560:                                  protocol => {raw, 255}},
 1561:                    ok = do_api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw(InitState)
 1562:            end).
 1563: 
 1564: do_api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw(InitState) ->
 1565:     Tester = 
 1566:         [
 1567:          #{desc => "open",
 1568:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 1569:                          type     := Type,
 1570:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) -> 
 1571:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try open with:"
 1572:                                        "~n   Domain:   ~p"
 1573:                                        "~n   Type:     ~p"
 1574:                                        "~n   Protocol: ~p",
 1575:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol]),
 1576:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 1577:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 1578:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 1579:                                {error, Reason} when (Reason =:= eperm) orelse
 1580:                                                     (Reason =:= eacces) ->
 1581:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("not allowed (~w) => SKIP",
 1582:                                                [Reason]),
 1583:                                    {skip, Reason};
 1584:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 1585:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("open failed:"
 1586:                                                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 1587:                                    ERROR
 1588:                            end
 1589:                    end},
 1590:          #{desc => "close socket",
 1591:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 1592:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try socket close"),
 1593:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 1594:                                ok ->
 1595:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket closed"),
 1596:                                    {ok, maps:remote(sock, State)};
 1597:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 1598:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("close failed:"
 1599:                                                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 1600:                                    ERROR
 1601:                            end
 1602:                    end},
 1603: 
 1604:          %% *** We are done ***
 1605:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 1606:         ],
 1607:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Tester, InitState),
 1608:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 1609: 
 1610: 
 1611: 
 1612: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1613: 
 1614: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket using
 1615: %% sendto and recvfrom..
 1616: api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1617:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1618:     tc_try(api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4,
 1619:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 1620:            fun() ->
 1621:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 1622:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 1623:                           end,
 1624:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 1625:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock)
 1626:                           end,
 1627:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 1628:                                  proto  => udp,
 1629:                                  send   => Send,
 1630:                                  recv   => Recv},
 1631:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 1632:            end).
 1633: 
 1634: 
 1635: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1636: 
 1637: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket using
 1638: %% sendto and recvfrom.
 1639: api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1640:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1641:     tc_try(api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udpL,
 1642:            fun() ->
 1643:                    has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 1644: 		   is_not_windows(),
 1645:                    unix_domain_socket_host_cond()
 1646:            end,
 1647:            fun() ->
 1648:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 1649:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 1650:                           end,
 1651:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 1652:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock)
 1653:                           end,
 1654:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 1655:                                  proto  => default,
 1656:                                  send   => Send,
 1657:                                  recv   => Recv},
 1658:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 1659:            end).
 1660: 
 1661: 
 1662: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1663: 
 1664: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket
 1665: %% using sendmsg and recvmsg.
 1666: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1667:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1668:     tc_try(api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4,
 1669:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 1670:            fun() ->
 1671:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 1672:                                   %% We need tests for this,
 1673:                                   %% but this is not the place it.
 1674:                                   %% CMsg  = #{level => ip,
 1675:                                   %%              type  => tos,
 1676:                                   %%              data  => reliability},
 1677:                                   %% CMsgs = [CMsg],
 1678:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
 1679:                                              %% ctrl => CMsgs,
 1680:                                              iov  => [Data]},
 1681:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 1682:                           end,
 1683:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 1684:                                   %% We have some issues on old darwin...
 1685:                                   %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, {otp,debug}, true),
 1686:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 1687:                                       {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 1688:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 1689:                                           %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 1690:                                           {ok, {Source, Data}};
 1691:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 1692:                                           ERROR
 1693:                                   end
 1694:                           end,
 1695:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 1696:                                  proto  => udp,
 1697:                                  send   => Send,
 1698:                                  recv   => Recv},
 1699:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 1700:            end).
 1701: 
 1702: 
 1703: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1704: 
 1705: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket
 1706: %% using sendmsg and recvmsg.
 1707: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1708:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 1709:     tc_try(api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udpL,
 1710:            fun() ->
 1711:                    has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 1712: 		   is_not_windows(),
 1713:                    unix_domain_socket_host_cond()
 1714:            end,
 1715:            fun() ->
 1716:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 1717:                                   %% We need tests for this,
 1718:                                   %% but this is not the place it.
 1719:                                   %% CMsg  = #{level => ip,
 1720:                                   %%              type  => tos,
 1721:                                   %%              data  => reliability},
 1722:                                   %% CMsgs = [CMsg],
 1723:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
 1724:                                              %% ctrl => CMsgs,
 1725:                                              iov  => [Data]},
 1726:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 1727:                           end,
 1728:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 1729:                                   %% We have some issues on old darwing...
 1730:                                   %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 1731:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 1732:                                       {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 1733:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 1734:                                           %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 1735:                                           {ok, {Source, Data}};
 1736:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 1737:                                           ERROR
 1738:                                   end
 1739:                           end,
 1740:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 1741:                                  proto  => default,
 1742:                                  send   => Send,
 1743:                                  recv   => Recv},
 1744:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 1745:            end).
 1746: 
 1747: 
 1748: 
 1749: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1750: 
 1751: api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState) ->
 1752:     Seq = 
 1753:         [
 1754:          #{desc => "local address",
 1755:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local = Domain} = State) ->
 1756:                            LSASrc = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 1757:                            LSADst = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 1758:                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSASrc,
 1759:                                        lsa_dst => LSADst}};
 1760:                       (#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 1761:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 1762:                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSA,
 1763:                                        lsa_dst => LSA}}
 1764:                    end},
 1765: 
 1766:          #{desc => "open src socket",
 1767:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 1768:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 1769:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, Proto),
 1770:                            {ok, State#{sock_src => Sock}}
 1771:                    end},
 1772:          #{desc => "bind src socket",
 1773:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, lsa_src := LSA}) ->
 1774:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 1775:                                ok ->
 1776:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 1777:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound (to ~p)", [Port]),
 1778:                                    ok;
 1779:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 1780:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 1781:                                    ERROR
 1782:                            end
 1783:                    end},
 1784:          #{desc => "sockname src socket",
 1785:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
 1786:                            SASrc = sock_sockname(Sock),
 1787:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("src sockaddr: "
 1788:                                        "~n   ~p", [SASrc]),
 1789:                            {ok, State#{sa_src => SASrc}}
 1790:                    end},
 1791: 
 1792:          #{desc => "open dst socket",
 1793:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 1794:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 1795:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, Proto),
 1796:                            {ok, State#{sock_dst => Sock}}
 1797:                    end},
 1798:          #{desc => "bind dst socket",
 1799:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, lsa_dst := LSA}) ->
 1800:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 1801:                                ok ->
 1802:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 1803:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound (to ~p)", [Port]),
 1804:                                    ok;
 1805:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 1806:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 1807:                                    ERROR
 1808:                            end
 1809:                    end},
 1810:          #{desc => "sockname dst socket",
 1811:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
 1812:                            SADst = sock_sockname(Sock),
 1813:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("dst sockaddr: "
 1814:                                        "~n   ~p", [SADst]),
 1815:                            {ok, State#{sa_dst => SADst}}
 1816:                    end},
 1817:          #{desc => "send req (to dst)",
 1818:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, send := Send}) ->
 1819:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Dst)
 1820:                    end},
 1821:          #{desc => "recv req (from src)",
 1822:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, recv := Recv}) ->
 1823:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 1824:                                {ok, {Src, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 1825:                                    ok;
 1826:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 1827:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 1828:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 1829:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 1830:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 1831:                                    ERROR
 1832:                            end
 1833:                    end},
 1834:          #{desc => "send rep (to src)",
 1835:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, send := Send}) ->
 1836:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Src)
 1837:                    end},
 1838:          #{desc => "recv rep (from dst)",
 1839:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, recv := Recv}) ->
 1840:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 1841:                                {ok, {Dst, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
 1842:                                    ok;
 1843:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 1844:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 1845:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 1846:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 1847:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 1848:                                    ERROR
 1849:                            end
 1850:                    end},
 1851:          #{desc => "close src socket",
 1852:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 1853:                          sock_src := Sock,
 1854:                          lsa_src  := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 1855:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 1856:                            State1 =
 1857:                                unlink_path(Path,
 1858:                                            fun() -> maps:remove(lsa_src, State) end,
 1859:                                            fun() -> State end),
 1860:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_src, State1)};
 1861:                       (#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
 1862:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 1863:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_src, State)}
 1864:                    end},
 1865:          #{desc => "close dst socket",
 1866:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 1867:                          sock_dst := Sock,
 1868:                          lsa_dst  := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 1869:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 1870:                            State1 =
 1871:                                unlink_path(Path,
 1872:                                            fun() -> maps:remove(lsa_dst, State) end,
 1873:                                            fun() -> State end),
 1874:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_dst, State1)};
 1875:                       (#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
 1876:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 1877:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_dst, State)}
 1878:                    end},
 1879: 
 1880:          %% *** We are done ***
 1881:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 1882:         ],
 1883:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 1884:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 1885: 
 1886: 
 1887: 
 1888: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1889: 
 1890: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 1891: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 1892: api_b_send_and_recv_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1893:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 1894:     tc_try(api_b_send_and_recv_tcp4,
 1895:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 1896:            fun() ->
 1897:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 1898:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 1899:                           end,
 1900:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 1901:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 1902:                           end,
 1903:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 1904:                                  type   => stream,
 1905:                                  proto  => tcp,
 1906:                                  send   => Send,
 1907:                                  recv   => Recv},
 1908:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 1909:            end).
 1910: 
 1911: 
 1912: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1913: 
 1914: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 1915: %% on an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket.
 1916: api_b_send_and_recv_stream_sctp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1917:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 1918:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1919:            fun() ->
 1920:                    has_support_sctp(),
 1921:                    has_support_ipv4()
 1922:            end,
 1923:            fun() ->
 1924:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 1925:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 1926:                           end,
 1927:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 1928:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 1929:                           end,
 1930:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 1931:                                  type   => stream,
 1932:                                  proto  => sctp,
 1933:                                  send   => Send,
 1934:                                  recv   => Recv},
 1935:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 1936:            end).
 1937: 
 1938: 
 1939: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1940: 
 1941: %% Basically send and receive using the sendv and recv functions
 1942: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 1943: api_b_sendv_and_recv_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1944:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 1945:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1946:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 1947:            fun() ->
 1948:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 1949:                                   %% Since we are just reusing this test case,
 1950:                                   %% the I/O vector is just one binary.
 1951:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 1952:                                   Res = socket:sendv(Sock, [Data]),
 1953:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 1954:                                   Res
 1955:                           end,
 1956:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 1957:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 1958:                           end,
 1959:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 1960:                                  type   => stream,
 1961:                                  proto  => tcp,
 1962:                                  send   => Send,
 1963:                                  recv   => Recv},
 1964:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 1965:            end).
 1966: 
 1967: 
 1968: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1969: 
 1970: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 1971: %% on an Unix Domain (stream) socket (TCP).
 1972: api_b_send_and_recv_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1973:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 1974:     tc_try(api_b_send_and_recv_tcpL,
 1975:            fun() -> has_support_unix_domain_socket() end,
 1976:            fun() ->
 1977:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
