 1978:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 1979:                           end,
 1980:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 1981:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 1982:                           end,
 1983:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 1984:                                  type   => stream,
 1985:                                  proto  => default,
 1986:                                  send   => Send,
 1987:                                  recv   => Recv},
 1988:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 1989:            end).
 1990: 
 1991: 
 1992: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1993: 
 1994: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 1995: %% on an Unix Domain seqpacket socket.
 1996: api_b_send_and_recv_seqpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 1997:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 1998:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1999:            fun() ->
 2000: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 2001:                    is_not_windows()
 2002: 	   end,
 2003:            fun() ->
 2004:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 2005:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 2006:                           end,
 2007:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 2008:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 2009:                           end,
 2010:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 2011:                                  type   => seqpacket,
 2012:                                  proto  => default,
 2013:                                  send   => Send,
 2014:                                  recv   => Recv},
 2015:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 2016:            end).
 2017: 
 2018: 
 2019: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2020: 
 2021: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 2022: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 2023: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2024:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 2025:     tc_try(api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4,
 2026:            fun() ->
 2027:                    is_not_windows(),
 2028:                    has_support_ipv4()
 2029:            end,
 2030:            fun() ->
 2031:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 2032:                                   Msg = #{%% ctrl => CMsgs,
 2033:                                           iov => [Data]},
 2034:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 2035:                           end,
 2036:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 2037:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 2038:                                       {ok, #{addr  := _} = Addr} ->
 2039:                                           {error, {addr, Addr}};
 2040:                                       {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 2041:                                           {ok, Data};
 2042:                                       {ok, Msg} ->
 2043:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 2044:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2045:                                           ERROR
 2046:                                   end
 2047:                           end,
 2048:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 2049:                                  type   => stream,
 2050:                                  proto  => tcp,
 2051:                                  send   => Send,
 2052:                                  recv   => Recv},
 2053:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 2054:            end).
 2055: 
 2056: 
 2057: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2058: 
 2059: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 2060: %% on an Unix Domain (stream) socket (TCP).
 2061: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2062:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 2063:     tc_try(api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL,
 2064:            fun() ->
 2065: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 2066: 		   is_not_windows()
 2067: 	   end,
 2068:            fun() ->
 2069:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 2070:                                   Msg = #{iov => [Data]},
 2071:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 2072:                           end,
 2073:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 2074:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 2075:                                       %% On some platforms, the address
 2076:                                       %% *is* provided (e.g. linux)
 2077:                                       {ok, #{addr  := #{family := local},
 2078:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 2079:                                           socket:setopt(Sock, 
 2080:                                                         otp, 
 2081:                                                         debug, 
 2082:                                                         false),
 2083:                                           {ok, Data};
 2084:                                       {ok, #{addr := _} = Msg} ->
 2085:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 2086:                                       %% On some platforms, the address
 2087:                                       %% is *not* provided (e.g. FreeBSD)
 2088:                                       {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 2089:                                           {ok, Data};
 2090:                                       {ok, Msg} ->
 2091:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 2092:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2093:                                           socket:setopt(Sock, 
 2094:                                                         otp, 
 2095:                                                         debug, 
 2096:                                                         false),
 2097:                                           ERROR
 2098:                                   end
 2099:                           end,
 2100:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 2101:                                  type   => stream,
 2102:                                  proto  => default,
 2103:                                  send   => Send,
 2104:                                  recv   => Recv},
 2105:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 2106:            end).
 2107: 
 2108: 
 2109: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2110: 
 2111: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 2112: %% on an Unix Domain (stream) socket (TCP).
 2113: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_seqpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2114:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 2115:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2116:            fun() ->
 2117: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 2118:                    is_not_windows()
 2119: 	   end,
 2120:            fun() ->
 2121:                    Send =
 2122:                        fun(Sock, Data) ->
 2123:                                Msg =
 2124:                                    #{iov => [Data]},
 2125:                                socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 2126:                        end,
 2127:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 2128:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 2129:                                       %% On some platforms, the address
 2130:                                       %% *is* provided (e.g. linux)
 2131:                                       {ok,
 2132:                                        #{addr  := #{family := local},
 2133:                                          iov   := [Data]}} ->
 2134:                                           socket:setopt(
 2135:                                             Sock, otp, debug, false),
 2136:                                           {ok, Data};
 2137:                                       {ok, #{addr := _} = Msg} ->
 2138:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 2139:                                       %% On some platforms, the address
 2140:                                       %% is *not* provided (e.g. FreeBSD)
 2141:                                       {ok,
 2142:                                        #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 2143:                                           {ok, Data};
 2144:                                       {ok, Msg} ->
 2145:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 2146:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2147:                                           socket:setopt(
 2148:                                             Sock, otp, debug, false),
 2149:                                           ERROR
 2150:                                   end
 2151:                           end,
 2152:                    InitState =
 2153:                        #{domain => local,
 2154:                          type   => seqpacket,
 2155:                          proto  => default,
 2156:                          send   => Send,
 2157:                          recv   => Recv},
 2158:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 2159:            end).
 2160: 
 2161: 
 2162: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2163: 
 2164: api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState) ->
 2165:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2166: 
 2167:     ServerSeq = 
 2168:         [
 2169:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 2170:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 2171:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 2172:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2173:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 2174:                    end},
 2175:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 2176:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2177:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 2178:                            ok
 2179:                    end},
 2180: 
 2181:          %% *** Init part ***
 2182:          #{desc => "which local address",
 2183:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 2184:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 2185: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("LSA: ~p", [LSA]),
 2186:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 2187:                    end},
 2188:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 2189:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 2190:                          type := Type,
 2191:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 2192:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2193:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2194:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 2195:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 2196:                                    {skip, Reason};
 2197:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2198:                                    ERROR
 2199:                            end
 2200:                    end},
 2201:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 2202:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 2203:                          lsock  := LSock,
 2204:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
 2205: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try bind to: "
 2206: 				       "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
 2207: 			   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
 2208:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 2209:                                ok ->
 2210:                                    %% We do not care about the port for local
 2211: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 2212:                                    ok;
 2213:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 2214: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 2215: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("failed binding: "
 2216: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2217:                                    ERROR
 2218:                            end;
 2219:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 2220:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 2221:                                ok ->
 2222:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 2223:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 2224:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 2225:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2226:                                    ERROR
 2227:                            end
 2228:                    end},
 2229:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 2230:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 2231:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 2232:                    end},
 2233:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 2234:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 2235:                          tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
 2236:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
 2237:                            ok;
 2238:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 2239:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
 2240:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 2241:                            ok
 2242:                    end},
 2243: 
 2244:          %% The actual test
 2245:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 2246:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2247:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 2248:                    end},
 2249:          #{desc => "await connection",
 2250:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 2251: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try accept"),
 2252:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 2253:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2254:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 2255:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 2256:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 2257:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("accept failed: "
 2258: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2259:                                    ERROR
 2260:                            end
 2261:                    end},
 2262:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 2263:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2264:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 2265:                            ok
 2266:                    end},
 2267:          #{desc => "await (recv) request",
 2268:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 2269:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 2270:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 2271:                                    ok;
 2272:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2273:                                    ERROR
 2274:                            end
 2275:                    end},
 2276:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 2277:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2278:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 2279:                            ok
 2280:                    end},
 2281:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
 2282:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2283:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 2284:                    end},
 2285:          #{desc => "send reply",
 2286:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 2287:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 2288:                    end},
 2289:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
 2290:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2291:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 2292:                            ok
 2293:                    end},
 2294: 
 2295:          %% *** Termination ***
 2296:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 2297:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 2298:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 2299:                                ok ->
 2300:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 2301:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2302:                                    ERROR
 2303:                            end
 2304:                    end},
 2305:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 2306:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 2307:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2308:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 2309:                    end},
 2310:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 2311:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 2312:                          lsock    := Sock,
 2313:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 2314:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2315:                            State1 =
 2316:                                unlink_path(Path,
 2317:                                            fun() ->
 2318:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 2319:                                            end,
 2320:                                            fun() -> State end),
 2321:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
 2322:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 2323:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
 2324:                                ok ->
 2325:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
 2326:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2327:                                    ERROR
 2328:                            end
 2329:                    end},
 2330: 
 2331:          %% *** We are done ***
 2332:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2333:         ],
 2334: 
 2335:     ClientSeq =
 2336:         [
 2337:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 2338:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 2339:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
 2340:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2341:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
 2342:                       (State) ->
 2343:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2344:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 2345:                    end},
 2346:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 2347:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2348:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 2349:                            ok
 2350:                    end},
 2351: 
 2352:          %% *** The init part ***
 2353:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 2354:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
 2355:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
 2356:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 2357:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
 2358:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
 2359:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 2360:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 2361:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 2362:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 2363:                    end},
 2364:          #{desc => "create socket",
 2365:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 2366:                          type := Type,
 2367:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 2368:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2369:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2370:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 2371:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2372:                                    ERROR
 2373:                            end
 2374:                    end},
 2375:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 2376:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 2377:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 2378:                                ok ->
 2379:                                    ok;
 2380:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2381:                                    ERROR
 2382:                            end
 2383:                    end},
 2384:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 2385:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2386:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 2387:                            ok
 2388:                    end},
 2389: 
 2390:          %% *** The actual test ***
 2391:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 2392:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2393:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 2394:                    end},
 2395:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 2396:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 2397:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
 2398:                    end},
 2399:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 2400:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2401:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 2402:                            ok
 2403:                    end},
 2404:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 2405:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2406:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 2407:                    end},
 2408:          #{desc => "send request (to server)",
 2409:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 2410:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 2411:                    end},
 2412:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 2413:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2414:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 2415:                            ok
 2416:                    end},
 2417:          #{desc => "await recv reply (from server)",
 2418:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 2419:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 2420:                            ok
 2421:                    end},
 2422:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 2423:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2424:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 2425:                            ok
 2426:                    end},
 2427: 
 2428:          %% *** Termination ***
 2429:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 2430:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 2431:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 2432:                                ok ->
 2433:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 2434:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2435:                                    ERROR
 2436:                            end
 2437:                    end},
 2438:          #{desc => "close socket",
 2439:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 2440:                          sock     := Sock,
 2441:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 2442:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2443:                            State1 =
 2444:                                unlink_path(Path,
 2445:                                            fun() ->
 2446:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 2447:                                            end,
 2448:                                            fun() -> State end),
 2449:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
 2450:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 2451:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2452:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 2453:                    end},
 2454: 
 2455:          %% *** We are done ***
 2456:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2457:         ],
 2458: 
 2459:     TesterSeq =
 2460:         [
 2461:          %% *** Init part ***
 2462:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 2463:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 2464:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 2465:                            ok
 2466:                    end},
 2467:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 2468:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 2469:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 2470:                            ok
 2471:                    end},
 2472: 
 2473:          %% Start the server
 2474:          #{desc => "order server start",
 2475:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 2476:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 2477:                            ok
 2478:                    end},
 2479:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 2480:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 2481:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 2482:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 2483:                    end},
 2484: 
 2485:          %% Start the client
 2486:          #{desc => "order client start",
 2487:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 2488:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 2489:                            ok
 2490:                    end},
 2491:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 2492:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 2493:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 2494:                    end},
 2495: 
 2496:          %% *** The actual test ***
 2497:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 2498:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 2499:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 2500:                            ok
 2501:                    end},
 2502:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 2503:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
 2504:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 2505:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
 2506:                            ok
 2507:                    end},
 2508:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 2509:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 2510:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
 2511:                    end},
 2512:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 2513:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 2514:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 2515:                    end},
 2516:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request)",
 2517:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 2518:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 2519:                            ok
 2520:                    end},
 2521:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request)",
 2522:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 2523:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 2524:                    end},
 2525:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv)",
 2526:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 2527:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 2528:                    end},
 2529:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply)",
 2530:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 2531:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 2532:                            ok
 2533:                    end},
 2534:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent)",
 2535:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 2536:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 2537:                    end},
 2538:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
 2539:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 2540:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
 2541:                    end},
 2542: 
 2543: 
 2544:          %% *** Termination ***
 2545:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 2546:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 2547:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 2548:                            ok
 2549:                    end},
 2550:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 2551:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 2552:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 2553:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 2554:                            {ok, State1}
 2555:                    end},
 2556:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 2557:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 2558:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 2559:                            ok
 2560:                    end},
 2561:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 2562:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 2563:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 2564:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 2565:                            {ok, State1}
 2566:                    end},
 2567: 
 2568:          %% *** We are done ***
 2569:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2570:         ],
 2571: 
 2572:     i("start server evaluator"),
 2573:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 2574: 
 2575:     i("start client evaluator"),
 2576:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 2577:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 2578: 
 2579:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 2580:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 2581:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 2582:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 2583: 
 2584:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 2585: 
 2586: 
 2587: 
 2588: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2589: 
 2590: -define(REQ_IOV_SND, [<<0:32>>,
 2591:                       <<1:32>>,
 2592:                       <<2:32>>,
 2593:                       <<3:32>>,
 2594:                       <<4:32>>,
 2595:                       <<5:32>>,
 2596:                       <<6:32>>,
 2597:                       <<7:32>>,
 2598:                       <<8:32>>,
 2599:                       <<9:32>>]).
 2600: -define(REQ_IOV_RCV, erlang:iolist_to_binary(?REQ_IOV_SND)).
 2601: -define(REP_IOV_SND, [<<10:32>>,
 2602:                       <<11:32>>,
 2603:                       <<12:32>>,
 2604:                       <<13:32>>,
 2605:                       <<14:32>>,
 2606:                       <<15:32>>,
 2607:                       <<16:32>>,
 2608:                       <<17:32>>,
 2609:                       <<18:32>>,
 2610:                       <<19:32>>]).
 2611: -define(REP_IOV_RCV, erlang:iolist_to_binary(?REP_IOV_SND)).
 2612: 
 2613: ensure_sufficient_iov_max() ->
 2614:     case socket:info() of
 2615:         #{iov_max := IOVMax} ->
 2616:             IOVUsed = length(?REQ_IOV_SND),
 2617:             if
 2618:                 IOVMax >= IOVUsed ->
 2619:                     ok;
 2620:                 true ->
 2621:                     skip({iov_max, IOVMax, IOVUsed})
 2622:             end;
 2623:         _ ->
 2624:             skip(no_info)
 2625:     end.
 2626:     
 2627: 
 2628: %% Basically send a I/O vector and receive using the sendv and recv
 2629: %% functions on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 2630: api_b_sendv_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2631:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 2632:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2633:            fun() ->
 2634:                    has_support_ipv4(),
 2635:                    ensure_sufficient_iov_max()
 2636:            end,
 2637:            fun() ->
 2638:                    Send = fun(Sock, IOV) when is_list(IOV) ->
 2639:                                   %% Since we are just reusing this test case,
 2640:                                   %% the I/O vector is just one binary.
 2641:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 2642:                                   Res = socket:sendv(Sock, IOV),
 2643:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 2644:                                   Res
 2645:                           end,
 2646:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 2647:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 2648:                           end,
 2649:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 2650:                                  type   => stream,
 2651:                                  proto  => tcp,
 2652:                                  send   => Send,
 2653:                                  recv   => Recv},
 2654:                    ok = api_b_sendv(InitState)
 2655:            end).
 2656: 
 2657: 
 2658: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2659: 
 2660: %% Basically send a I/O vector and receive using the sendv and recv
 2661: %% functions on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 2662: api_b_sendv_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2663:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 2664:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2665:            fun() ->
 2666:                    has_support_ipv6(),
 2667:                    ensure_sufficient_iov_max()
 2668:            end,
 2669:            fun() ->
 2670:                    Send = fun(Sock, IOV) when is_list(IOV) ->
 2671:                                   %% Since we are just reusing this test case,
 2672:                                   %% the I/O vector is just one binary.
 2673:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 2674:                                   Res = socket:sendv(Sock, IOV),
 2675:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 2676:                                   Res
 2677:                           end,
 2678:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 2679:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 2680:                           end,
 2681:                    InitState = #{domain => inet6,
 2682:                                  type   => stream,
 2683:                                  proto  => tcp,
 2684:                                  send   => Send,
 2685:                                  recv   => Recv},
 2686:                    ok = api_b_sendv(InitState)
 2687:            end).
 2688: 
 2689: 
 2690: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2691: 
 2692: api_b_sendv(InitState) ->
 2693:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2694: 
 2695:     ServerSeq = 
 2696:         [
 2697:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 2698:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 2699:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 2700:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2701:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 2702:                    end},
 2703:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 2704:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2705:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 2706:                            ok
 2707:                    end},
 2708: 
 2709:          %% *** Init part ***
 2710:          #{desc => "which local address",
 2711:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 2712:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 2713: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("LSA: ~p", [LSA]),
 2714:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 2715:                    end},
 2716:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 2717:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 2718:                          type   := Type,
 2719:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 2720:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2721:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2722:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 2723:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 2724:                                    {skip, Reason};
 2725:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2726:                                    ERROR
 2727:                            end
 2728:                    end},
 2729:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 2730:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 2731:                          lsock  := LSock,
 2732:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
 2733: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try bind to: "
 2734: 				       "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
 2735: 			   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
 2736:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 2737:                                ok ->
 2738:                                    %% We do not care about the port for local
 2739: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 2740:                                    ok;
 2741:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 2742: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 2743: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("failed binding: "
 2744: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2745:                                    ERROR
 2746:                            end;
 2747:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 2748:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 2749:                                ok ->
 2750:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 2751:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 2752:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 2753:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2754:                                    ERROR
 2755:                            end
 2756:                    end},
 2757:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 2758:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 2759:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 2760:                    end},
 2761:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 2762:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 2763:                          tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
 2764:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
 2765:                            ok;
 2766:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 2767:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
 2768:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 2769:                            ok
 2770:                    end},
 2771: 
 2772:          %% The actual test
 2773:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 2774:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2775:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 2776:                    end},
 2777:          #{desc => "await connection",
 2778:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 2779: 			   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
 2780: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try accept"),
 2781:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 2782:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2783: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 2784:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 2785:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 2786:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 2787: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 2788:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("accept failed: "
 2789: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2790:                                    ERROR
 2791:                            end
 2792:                    end},
 2793:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 2794:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2795:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 2796:                            ok
 2797:                    end},
 2798: 
 2799:          #{desc => "await (recv) request",
 2800:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 2801:                            Rep = ?REQ_IOV_RCV,
 2802:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 2803:                                {ok, Rep} ->
 2804:                                    ok;
 2805:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2806:                                    ERROR
 2807:                            end
 2808:                    end},
 2809: 
 2810:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 2811:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2812:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 2813:                            ok
 2814:                    end},
 2815:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
 2816:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2817:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 2818:                    end},
 2819:          #{desc => "send reply",
 2820:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 2821:                            Send(Sock, ?REP_IOV_SND)
 2822:                    end},
 2823:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
 2824:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2825:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 2826:                            ok
 2827:                    end},
 2828: 
 2829:          %% *** Termination ***
 2830:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 2831:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 2832:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 2833:                                ok ->
 2834:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 2835:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2836:                                    ERROR
 2837:                            end
 2838:                    end},
 2839:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 2840:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 2841:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2842:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 2843:                    end},
 2844:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 2845:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 2846:                          lsock    := Sock,
 2847:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 2848:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2849:                            State1 =
 2850:                                unlink_path(Path,
 2851:                                            fun() ->
 2852:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 2853:                                            end,
 2854:                                            fun() -> State end),
 2855:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
 2856:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 2857:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
 2858:                                ok ->
 2859:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
 2860:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2861:                                    ERROR
 2862:                            end
 2863:                    end},
 2864: 
 2865:          %% *** We are done ***
 2866:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2867:         ],
 2868: 
 2869:     ClientSeq =
 2870:         [
 2871:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 2872:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 2873:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
 2874:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2875:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
 2876:                       (State) ->
 2877:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2878:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 2879:                    end},
 2880:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 2881:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2882:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 2883:                            ok
 2884:                    end},
 2885: 
 2886:          %% *** The init part ***
 2887:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 2888:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
 2889:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
 2890:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 2891:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
 2892:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
 2893:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 2894:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 2895:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 2896:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 2897:                    end},
 2898:          #{desc => "create socket",
 2899:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 2900:                          type := Type,
 2901:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 2902:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2903:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2904:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 2905:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2906:                                    ERROR
 2907:                            end
 2908:                    end},
 2909:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 2910:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 2911:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 2912:                                ok ->
 2913:                                    ok;
 2914:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2915:                                    ERROR
 2916:                            end
 2917:                    end},
 2918:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 2919:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2920:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 2921:                            ok
 2922:                    end},
 2923: 
 2924:          %% *** The actual test ***
 2925:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 2926:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2927:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 2928:                    end},
 2929:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 2930:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 2931:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
 2932:                    end},
 2933:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 2934:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2935:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 2936:                            ok
 2937:                    end},
 2938:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 2939:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2940:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 2941:                    end},
 2942: 
 2943:          #{desc => "send request (to server)",
 2944:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 2945:                            Send(Sock, ?REQ_IOV_SND)
 2946:                    end},
 2947: 
 2948:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 2949:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2950:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 2951:                            ok
 2952:                    end},
 2953:          #{desc => "await recv reply (from server)",
 2954:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 2955:                            Rep = ?REP_IOV_RCV,
 2956:                            {ok, Rep} = Recv(Sock),
 2957:                            ok
 2958:                    end},
 2959:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 2960:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2961:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 2962:                            ok
 2963:                    end},
 2964: 
 2965:          %% *** Termination ***
 2966:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 2967:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 2968:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 2969:                                ok ->
 2970:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 2971:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2972:                                    ERROR
 2973:                            end
 2974:                    end},
 2975:          #{desc => "close socket",
 2976:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 2977:                          sock     := Sock,
 2978:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 2979:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2980:                            State1 =
 2981:                                unlink_path(Path,
 2982:                                            fun() ->
 2983:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 2984:                                            end,
 2985:                                            fun() -> State end),
 2986:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
 2987:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 2988:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2989:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 2990:                    end},
 2991: 
 2992:          %% *** We are done ***
 2993:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2994:         ],
 2995: 
 2996:     TesterSeq =
 2997:         [
 2998:          %% *** Init part ***
 2999:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 3000:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 3001:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3002:                            ok
 3003:                    end},
 3004:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 3005:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 3006:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3007:                            ok
 3008:                    end},
 3009: 
 3010:          %% Start the server
 3011:          #{desc => "order server start",
 3012:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 3013:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 3014:                            ok
 3015:                    end},
 3016:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 3017:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 3018:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 3019:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 3020:                    end},
 3021: 
 3022:          %% Start the client
 3023:          #{desc => "order client start",
 3024:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 3025:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 3026:                            ok
 3027:                    end},
 3028:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 3029:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 3030:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 3031:                    end},
 3032: 
 3033:          %% *** The actual test ***
 3034:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 3035:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3036:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 3037:                            ok
 3038:                    end},
 3039:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 3040:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
 3041:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3042:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
 3043:                            ok
 3044:                    end},
 3045:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 3046:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3047:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
 3048:                    end},
 3049:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 3050:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3051:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 3052:                    end},
 3053:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request)",
 3054:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3055:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 3056:                            ok
 3057:                    end},
 3058:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request)",
 3059:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3060:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 3061:                    end},
 3062:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv)",
 3063:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3064:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 3065:                    end},
 3066:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply)",
 3067:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3068:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 3069:                            ok
 3070:                    end},
 3071:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent)",
 3072:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3073:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 3074:                    end},
 3075:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
 3076:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3077:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
 3078:                    end},
 3079: 
 3080: 
 3081:          %% *** Termination ***
 3082:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 3083:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3084:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 3085:                            ok
 3086:                    end},
 3087:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 3088:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 3089:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 3090:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 3091:                            {ok, State1}
 3092:                    end},
 3093:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 3094:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3095:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 3096:                            ok
 3097:                    end},
 3098:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 3099:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 3100:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 3101:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 3102:                            {ok, State1}
 3103:                    end},
 3104: 
 3105:          %% *** We are done ***
 3106:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3107:         ],
 3108: 
 3109:     i("start server evaluator"),
 3110:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 3111: 
 3112:     i("start client evaluator"),
 3113:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3114:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 3115: 
 3116:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 3117:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 3118:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 3119:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 3120: 
 3121:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 3122: 
 3123: 
 3124: 
 3125: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3126: 
 3127: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket
 3128: %% using sendmsg and recvmsg.
 3129: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream_sctp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3130:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3131:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3132:            fun() ->
 3133: 		   has_support_sctp(),
 3134:                    has_support_ipv4()%% ,
 3135: 		   %% not_yet_implemented()
 3136: 	   end,
 3137:            fun() ->
 3138:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 3139:                                   %% CMsg  = #{level => sctp,
 3140:                                   %%              type  => tos,
 3141:                                   %%              data  => reliability},
 3142:                                   %% CMsgs = [CMsg],
 3143:                                   Msg = #{%% ctrl => CMsgs,
 3144:                                           iov  => [Data]},
 3145:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 3146:                           end,
 3147:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3148:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 3149:                                       {ok, #{flags := [eor],
 3150:                                              addr  := _,
 3151:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 3152:                                           {ok, Data};
 3153:                                       {ok, Msg} ->
 3154:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 3155:                                       %% {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 3156:                                       %%        iov   := [Data]}} ->
 3157:                                       %%     {ok, {Source, Data}};
 3158:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3159:                                           ERROR
 3160:                                   end
 3161:                           end,
 3162:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3163:                                  type   => stream,
 3164:                                  proto  => sctp,
 3165:                                  send   => Send,
 3166:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3167:                    %% ok = api_b_send_and_recv_sctp(InitState)
 3168:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 3169:            end).
 3170: 
 3171: 
 3172: 
 3173: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3174: 
 3175: %% api_b_send_and_recv_sctp(_InitState) ->
 3176: %%     Seq = 
 3177: %%         [
 3178: %%          #{desc => "local address",
 3179: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 3180: %%                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3181: %%                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSA,
 3182: %%                                        lsa_dst => LSA}}
 3183: %%                    end},
 3184: 
 3185: %%          #{desc => "open src socket",
 3186: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 3187: %%                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 3188: %%                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, seqpacket, Proto),
 3189: %%                            {ok, State#{sock_src => Sock}}
 3190: %%                    end},
 3191: %%          #{desc => "bind src",
 3192: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, lsa_src := LSA}) ->
 3193: %%                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 3194: %%                                ok ->
 3195: %%                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound"),
 3196: %%                                    ok;
 3197: %%                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3198: %%                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 3199: %%                                    ERROR
 3200: %%                            end
 3201: %%                    end},
 3202: %%          #{desc => "sockname src socket",
 3203: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
 3204: %%                            SASrc = sock_sockname(Sock),
 3205: %%                            ?SEV_IPRINT("src sockaddr: "
 3206: %%                                        "~n   ~p", [SASrc]),
 3207: %%                            {ok, State#{sa_src => SASrc}}
 3208: %%                    end},
 3209: 
 3210: %%          #{desc => "open dst socket",
 3211: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 3212: %%                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 3213: %%                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, seqpacket, Proto),
 3214: %%                            {ok, State#{sock_dst => Sock}}
 3215: %%                    end},
 3216: %%          #{desc => "bind dst",
 3217: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, lsa_dst := LSA}) ->
 3218: %%                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 3219: %%                                ok ->
 3220: %%                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound"),
 3221: %%                                    ok;
 3222: %%                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3223: %%                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 3224: %%                                    ERROR
 3225: %%                            end
 3226: %%                    end},
 3227: %%          #{desc => "sockname dst socket",
 3228: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
 3229: %%                            SADst = sock_sockname(Sock),
 3230: %%                            ?SEV_IPRINT("dst sockaddr: "
 3231: %%                                        "~n   ~p", [SADst]),
 3232: %%                            {ok, State#{sa_dst => SADst}}
 3233: %%                    end},
 3234: %%          #{desc => "send req (to dst)",
 3235: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, send := Send}) ->
 3236: %%                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Dst)
 3237: %%                    end},
 3238: %%          #{desc => "recv req (from src)",
 3239: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, recv := Recv}) ->
 3240: %%                            case Recv(Sock) of
 3241: %%                                {ok, {Src, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 3242: %%                                    ok;
 3243: %%                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 3244: %%                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 3245: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3246: %%                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 3247: %%                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 3248: %%                                    ERROR
 3249: %%                            end
 3250: %%                    end},
 3251: %%          #{desc => "send rep (to src)",
 3252: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, send := Send}) ->
 3253: %%                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Src)
 3254: %%                    end},
 3255: %%          #{desc => "recv rep (from dst)",
 3256: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, recv := Recv}) ->
 3257: %%                            case Recv(Sock) of
 3258: %%                                {ok, {Dst, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
 3259: %%                                    ok;
 3260: %%                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 3261: %%                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 3262: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3263: %%                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 3264: %%                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 3265: %%                                    ERROR
 3266: %%                            end
 3267: %%                    end},
 3268: %%          #{desc => "close src socket",
 3269: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
 3270: %%                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 3271: %%                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_src, State)}
 3272: %%                    end},
 3273: %%          #{desc => "close dst socket",
 3274: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
 3275: %%                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 3276: %%                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_dst, State)}
 3277: %%                    end},
 3278: 
 3279: %%          %% *** We are done ***
 3280: %%          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3281: %%         ],
 3282: %%     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 3283: %%     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 3284: 
 3285: %%     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3286: %%     ServerSeq = 
 3287: %%         [
 3288: %%          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 3289: %%          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 3290: %%            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 3291: %%                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 3292: %%                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 3293: %%                    end},
 3294: %%          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 3295: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3296: %%                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 3297: %%                            ok
 3298: %%                    end},
 3299: 
 3300: %%          %% *** Init part ***
 3301: %%          #{desc => "which local address",
 3302: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 3303: %%                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3304: %%                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 3305: %%                    end},
 3306: %%          #{desc => "create (listen) socket",
 3307: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 3308: %%                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 3309: %%                            case socket:open(Domain, seqpacket, Proto) of
 3310: %%                                {ok, Sock} ->
 3311: %%                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 3312: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3313: %%                                    ERROR
 3314: %%                            end
 3315: %%                    end},
 3316: %%          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 3317: %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 3318: %%                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 3319: %%                                ok ->
 3320: %%                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 3321: %%                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 3322: %%                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 3323: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3324: %%                                    ERROR
 3325: %%                            end
 3326: %%                    end},
 3327: %%          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 3328: %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 3329: %%                            socket:listen(LSock)
 3330: %%                    end},
 3331: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 3332: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 3333: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 3334: %%                            ok
 3335: %%                    end},
 3336: 
 3337: %%          %% The actual test
 3338: %%          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 3339: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3340: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 3341: %%                    end},
 3342: %%          #{desc => "accepting (await connection) FAKE",
 3343: %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 3344: %% 			   {ok, State#{csock => LSock}}
 3345: %%                    end},
 3346: %% %%          #{desc => "accepting (await connection)",
 3347: %% %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 3348: %% %% 			   socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
 3349: %% %%                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 3350: %% %%                                {ok, Sock} ->
 3351: %% %% 				   socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 3352: %% %%                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 3353: %% %%                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 3354: %% %%                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3355: %% %% 				   socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 3356: %% %% 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed accepting: "
 3357: %% %% 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 3358: %% %%                                    ERROR
 3359: %% %%                            end
 3360: %% %%                    end},
 3361: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 3362: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3363: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 3364: %%                            ok
 3365: %%                    end},
 3366: %%          #{desc => "await (recv) request",
 3367: %%            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 3368: %%                            case Recv(Sock) of
 3369: %%                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 3370: %%                                    ok;
 3371: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3372: %%                                    ERROR
 3373: %%                            end
 3374: %%                    end},
 3375: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 3376: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3377: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 3378: %%                            ok
 3379: %%                    end},
 3380: %%          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
 3381: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3382: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 3383: %%                    end},
 3384: %%          #{desc => "send reply",
 3385: %%            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 3386: %%                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 3387: %%                    end},
 3388: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
 3389: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3390: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 3391: %%                            ok
 3392: %%                    end},
 3393: 
 3394: %%          %% *** Termination ***
 3395: %%          #{desc => "await terminate",
 3396: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 3397: %%                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 3398: %%                                ok ->
 3399: %%                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 3400: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3401: %%                                    ERROR
 3402: %%                            end
 3403: %%                    end},
 3404: %%          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 3405: %%            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 3406: %%                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 3407: %%                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 3408: %%                    end},
 3409: %%          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 3410: %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 3411: %%                            case socket:close(LSock) of
 3412: %%                                ok ->
 3413: %%                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
 3414: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3415: %%                                    ERROR
 3416: %%                            end
 3417: %%                    end},
 3418: 
 3419: %%          %% *** We are done ***
 3420: %%          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3421: %%         ],
 3422: 
 3423: %%     ClientSeq = 
 3424: %%         [
 3425: %%          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 3426: %%          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 3427: %%            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 3428: %%                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 3429: %%                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 3430: %%                    end},
 3431: %%          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 3432: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3433: %%                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 3434: %%                            ok
 3435: %%                    end},
 3436: 
 3437: %%          %% *** The init part ***
 3438: %%          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 3439: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 3440: %%                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3441: %%                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 3442: %%                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 3443: %%                    end},
 3444: %%          #{desc => "create socket",
 3445: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 3446: %%                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 3447: %%                            case socket:open(Domain, seqpacket, Proto) of
 3448: %%                                {ok, Sock} ->
 3449: %%                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 3450: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3451: %%                                    ERROR
 3452: %%                            end
 3453: %%                    end},
 3454: %%          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 3455: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 3456: %%                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 3457: %%                                ok ->
 3458: %%                                    ok;
 3459: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3460: %%                                    ERROR
 3461: %%                            end
 3462: %%                    end},
 3463: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 3464: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3465: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 3466: %%                            ok
 3467: %%                    end},
 3468: 
 3469: %%          %% *** The actual test ***
 3470: %%          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 3471: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 3472: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 3473: %%                    end},
 3474: %%          #{desc => "connect to server",
 3475: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 3476: %%                            case socket:connect(Sock, SSA) of
 3477: %% 			       ok ->
 3478: %% 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("connected"),
 3479: %% 				   ok;
 3480: %% 			       {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3481: %% 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed connect: "
 3482: %% 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 3483: %% 				   ERROR
 3484: %% 			   end
 3485: %%                    end},
 3486: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 3487: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3488: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 3489: %%                            ok
 3490: %%                    end},
 3491: %%          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 3492: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 3493: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 3494: %%                    end},
 3495: %%          #{desc => "send request (to server)",
 3496: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 3497: %%                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 3498: %%                    end},
 3499: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 3500: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3501: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 3502: %%                            ok
 3503: %%                    end},
 3504: %%          #{desc => "await recv reply (from server)",
 3505: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 3506: %%                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 3507: %%                            ok
 3508: %%                    end},
 3509: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 3510: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3511: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 3512: %%                            ok
 3513: %%                    end},
 3514: 
 3515: %%          %% *** Termination ***
 3516: %%          #{desc => "await terminate",
 3517: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 3518: %%                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 3519: %%                                ok ->
 3520: %%                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 3521: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3522: %%                                    ERROR
 3523: %%                            end
 3524: %%                    end},
 3525: %%          #{desc => "close socket",
 3526: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 3527: %%                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 3528: %%                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 3529: %%                    end},
 3530: 
 3531: %%          %% *** We are done ***
 3532: %%          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3533: %%         ],
 3534: 
 3535: %%     TesterSeq =
 3536: %%         [
 3537: %%          %% *** Init part ***
 3538: %%          #{desc => "monitor server",
 3539: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 3540: %%                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3541: %%                            ok
 3542: %%                    end},
 3543: %%          #{desc => "monitor client",
 3544: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 3545: %%                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3546: %%                            ok
 3547: %%                    end},
 3548: 
 3549: %%          %% Start the server
 3550: %%          #{desc => "order server start",
 3551: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 3552: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 3553: %%                            ok
 3554: %%                    end},
