 3555: %%          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 3556: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 3557: %%                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 3558: %%                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 3559: %%                    end},
 3560: 
 3561: %%          %% Start the client
 3562: %%          #{desc => "order client start",
 3563: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 3564: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 3565: %%                            ok
 3566: %%                    end},
 3567: %%          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 3568: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 3569: %%                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 3570: %%                    end},
 3571: 
 3572: %%          %% *** The actual test ***
 3573: %%          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 3574: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3575: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 3576: %%                            ok
 3577: %%                    end},
 3578: %%          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 3579: %%          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
 3580: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3581: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
 3582: %%                            ok
 3583: %%                    end},
 3584: %%          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 3585: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3586: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
 3587: %%                    end},
 3588: %%          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 3589: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3590: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 3591: %%                    end},
 3592: %%          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request)",
 3593: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3594: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 3595: %%                            ok
 3596: %%                    end},
 3597: %%          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request)",
 3598: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3599: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 3600: %%                    end},
 3601: %%          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv)",
 3602: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3603: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 3604: %%                    end},
 3605: %%          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply)",
 3606: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3607: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 3608: %%                            ok
 3609: %%                    end},
 3610: %%          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent)",
 3611: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3612: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 3613: %%                    end},
 3614: %%          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
 3615: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3616: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
 3617: %%                    end},
 3618: 
 3619: 
 3620: %%          %% *** Termination ***
 3621: %%          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 3622: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 3623: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 3624: %%                            ok
 3625: %%                    end},
 3626: %%          #{desc => "await client termination",
 3627: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 3628: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 3629: %%                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 3630: %%                            {ok, State1}
 3631: %%                    end},
 3632: %%          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 3633: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 3634: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 3635: %%                            ok
 3636: %%                    end},
 3637: %%          #{desc => "await server termination",
 3638: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 3639: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 3640: %%                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 3641: %%                            {ok, State1}
 3642: %%                    end},
 3643: 
 3644: %%          %% *** We are done ***
 3645: %%          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3646: %%         ],
 3647: 
 3648: %%     i("start server evaluator"),
 3649: %%     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 3650: 
 3651: %%     i("start client evaluator"),
 3652: %%     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3653: %%     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 3654: 
 3655: %%     i("start tester evaluator"),
 3656: %%     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 3657: %%                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 3658: %%     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 3659: 
 3660: %%     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 3661: 
 3662: %%     ok.
 3663: 
 3664: 
 3665: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3666: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3667: %%                                                                     %%
 3668: %%                           API IOV                                   %%
 3669: %%                                                                     %%
 3670: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3671: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3672: 
 3673: api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_inet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3674:     has_support_ipv4(),
 3675:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram(inet).
 3676: %%
 3677: api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3678:     has_support_ipv6(),
 3679:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram(inet6).
 3680: %%
 3681: api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3682:     has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 3683:     is_not_windows(), % on Windows, local only works for stream sockets
 3684:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram(local).
 3685: 
 3686: api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_inet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3687:     has_support_ipv4(),
 3688:     is_not_windows(), % sendmsg does not work on Windows
 3689:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream(inet).
 3690: %%
 3691: api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3692:     has_support_ipv6(),
 3693:     is_not_windows(), % sendmsg does not work on Windows
 3694:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream(inet6).
 3695: %%
 3696: api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3697:     has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 3698:     is_not_windows(), % sendmsg does not work on Windows
 3699:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream(local).
 3700: 
 3701: 
 3702: api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram(Domain) ->
 3703:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> entry with"
 3704:        "~n   Domain: ~p", [Domain]),
 3705:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3706:     #{iov_max := IOVMax} = socket:info(),
 3707:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> IOVMax: ~p", [IOVMax]),
 3708:     IOV =
 3709:         lists:map(
 3710:           fun (N) -> <<(rand:uniform(N) - 1)>> end,
 3711:           lists:duplicate(IOVMax, 256)),
 3712:     IOVTooLarge = IOV ++ IOV,
 3713:     Data = erlang:iolist_to_binary(IOV),
 3714:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: create socket"),
 3715:     {ok, Sa} = socket:open(Domain, dgram, #{debug => true}),
 3716:     try
 3717: 	?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: create socket"),
 3718:         {ok, Sb} = socket:open(Domain, dgram),
 3719:         try
 3720: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: bind socket"),
 3721:             ok = socket:bind(Sa, which_local_socket_addr(Domain)),
 3722: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: bind socket"),
 3723:             ok = socket:bind(Sb, which_local_socket_addr(Domain)),
 3724: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: get sockname"),
 3725:             {ok, Aa} = socket:sockname(Sa),
 3726: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: get sockname"),
 3727:             {ok, Ab} = socket:sockname(Sb),
 3728:             %%
 3729: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: sendmsg"),
 3730:             ok = socket:sendmsg(Sa, #{addr => Ab, iov => IOV}),
 3731: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: recvfrom"),
 3732:             {ok, {Aa, Data}} = socket:recvfrom(Sb),
 3733:             %%
 3734: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: sendmsg (too large => fail)"),
 3735:             {error, {invalid, _}} =
 3736:                 socket:sendmsg(Sb, #{addr => Aa, iov => IOVTooLarge}),
 3737: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> done"),
 3738:             ok
 3739:         after
 3740: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: close socket"),
 3741:             socket:close(Sb)
 3742:         end
 3743:     after
 3744: 	?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: close socket"),
 3745:         socket:close(Sa)
 3746:     end.
 3747: 
 3748: api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream(Domain) ->
 3749:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> entry with"
 3750:        "~n   Domain: ~p", [Domain]),
 3751:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3752:     #{iov_max := IOVMax} = socket:info(),
 3753:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> IOVMax: ~p", [IOVMax]),
 3754:     IOV =
 3755:         lists:map(
 3756:           fun (N) -> <<(rand:uniform(N) - 1)>> end,
 3757:           lists:duplicate(IOVMax, 256)),
 3758:     IOVTooLarge = IOV ++ IOV,
 3759:     Data = erlang:iolist_to_binary(IOV),
 3760:     DataTooLarge = erlang:iolist_to_binary(IOVTooLarge),
 3761:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> create stream socket a"),
 3762:     {ok, Sa} = socket:open(Domain, stream),
 3763:     try
 3764:         case os:type() of
 3765:             {win32,nt} ->
 3766: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream-> [win] a: bind socket"),
 3767:                 ok = socket:bind(Sa, which_local_socket_addr(Domain));
 3768:             _ ->
 3769:                 ok
 3770:         end,
 3771: 	?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> create stream socket b"),
 3772:         {ok, Sb} = socket:open(Domain, stream),
 3773:         try
 3774: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> b: bind socket"),
 3775:             ok = socket:bind(Sb, which_local_socket_addr(Domain)),
 3776: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> b: get sockname"),
 3777:             {ok, Ab} = socket:sockname(Sb),
 3778: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> b: make socket listen"),
 3779:             ok = socket:listen(Sb),
 3780: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: connect socket to b"),
 3781:             ok = socket:connect(Sa, Ab),
 3782: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: get sockname"),
 3783:             {ok, Aa} = socket:sockname(Sa),
 3784: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: get peername"),
 3785:             {ok, Ab} = socket:peername(Sa),
 3786: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> accept connection (=> c)"),
 3787:             {ok, Sc} = socket:accept(Sb),
 3788:             try
 3789: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> c: get sockname"),
 3790:                 {ok, Ab} = socket:sockname(Sc),
 3791: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> c: get peername"),
 3792:                 {ok, Aa} = socket:peername(Sc),
 3793:                 %%
 3794: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: sendmsg"),
 3795:                 ok = socket:sendmsg(Sa, #{iov => IOV}),
 3796: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> c: recv"),
 3797:                 {ok, Data} =
 3798:                     socket:recv(Sc, byte_size(Data)),
 3799: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> c: sendmsg (too large)"),
 3800:                 ok = socket:sendmsg(Sc, #{iov => IOVTooLarge}),
 3801: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: recv"),
 3802:                 {ok, DataTooLarge} =
 3803:                     socket:recv(Sa, byte_size(DataTooLarge)),
 3804: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> done"),
 3805:                 ok
 3806:             catch
 3807:                 error:notsup = Reason:_ ->
 3808: 		    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> notsup"),
 3809:                     exit({skip, Reason})
 3810:             after
 3811:                 socket:close(Sc)
 3812:             end
 3813:         after
 3814: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> after - b: close socket"),
 3815:             socket:close(Sb)
 3816:         end
 3817:     after
 3818: 	?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> after - a: close socket"),
 3819:         socket:close(Sa)
 3820:     end.
 3821: 
 3822: 
 3823: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3824: 
 3825: %% Basically connect, send and receive using the "common" functions
 3826: %% (send and recv) on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 3827: api_b_dgram_connect_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3828:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3829:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3830:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 3831:            fun() ->
 3832:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3833:                                  type   => dgram,
 3834:                                  proto  => udp},
 3835:                    ok = api_b_dgram_connect(InitState)
 3836:            end).
 3837: 
 3838: 
 3839: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3840: 
 3841: %% Basically connect, send and receive using the "common" functions
 3842: %% (send and recv) on an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 3843: api_b_dgram_connect_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3844:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3845:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3846:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 3847:            fun() ->
 3848:                    InitState = #{domain => inet6,
 3849:                                  type   => dgram,
 3850:                                  proto  => udp},
 3851:                    ok = api_b_dgram_connect(InitState)
 3852:            end).
 3853: 
 3854: 
 3855: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3856: 
 3857: api_b_dgram_connect(InitState) ->
 3858:     PeerSeq = 
 3859:         [
 3860:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 3861:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 3862:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 3863:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 3864:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 3865:                    end},
 3866:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 3867:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 3868:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 3869:                            ok
 3870:                    end},
 3871: 
 3872:          %% *** Init part ***
 3873:          #{desc => "which local address",
 3874:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 3875:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3876:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 3877:                    end},
 3878: 
 3879:          #{desc => "open",
 3880:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 3881:                          type   := Type,
 3882:                          proto  := Protocol} = State) ->
 3883:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 3884:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 3885:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 3886:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason}
 3887:                                  when (Reason =:= epfnosupport)    orelse
 3888:                                       (Reason =:= eprotonosupport) orelse
 3889:                                       (Reason =:= esocktnosupport) ->
 3890:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("failed open: ~p => SKIP",
 3891:                                                [Reason]),
 3892:                                    {skip, Reason};
 3893:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3894:                                    ERROR
 3895:                            end
 3896:                    end},
 3897: 
 3898:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 3899:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 3900:                          sock     := Sock,
 3901:                          local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 3902:                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 3903:                                ok ->
 3904:                                    {ok, State#{sock_sa => LSA}};
 3905:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3906: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("failed binding: "
 3907: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 3908:                                    ERROR
 3909:                            end;
 3910:                       (#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 3911:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA#{port => 0}) of
 3912:                                ok ->
 3913:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 3914:                                    {ok, State#{sock_sa => LSA#{port => Port}}};
 3915:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3916:                                    ERROR
 3917:                            end
 3918:                    end},
 3919: 
 3920:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 3921:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock_sa := SSA}) ->
 3922:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, SSA),
 3923:                            ok
 3924:                    end},
 3925: 
 3926:          %% The actual test
 3927:          #{desc => "await continue (peer sa)",
 3928:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 3929:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect) of
 3930:                                {ok, PeerSA} ->
 3931:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Peer SA:"
 3932:                                                "~n   ~p", [PeerSA]),
 3933:                                    {ok, State#{peer_sa => PeerSA}};
 3934:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3935:                                    ERROR
 3936:                            end
 3937:                    end},
 3938: 
 3939:          #{desc => "connect",
 3940:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, peer_sa := PSA}) ->
 3941:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try connect"),
 3942:                            socket:connect(Sock, PSA)
 3943:                    end},
 3944: 
 3945:          #{desc => "announce ready (connected)",
 3946:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3947:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connected),
 3948:                            ok
 3949:                    end},
 3950: 
 3951:          %% The actual test
 3952:          #{desc => "await continue (send and recv)",
 3953:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 3954:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester,
 3955:                                                     tester, send_and_recv) of
 3956:                                {ok, Role} ->
 3957:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("role: ~p", [Role]),
 3958:                                    {ok, State#{role => Role}};
 3959:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3960:                                    ERROR
 3961:                            end
 3962:                    end},
 3963: 
 3964:          #{desc => "send (client) or recv (server) request",
 3965:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, role := client}) ->
 3966:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[client] try send request"),
 3967:                            socket:send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ);
 3968:                       (#{sock := Sock, role := server}) ->
 3969:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[server] try recv request"),
 3970:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
 3971:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 3972:                                    ok;
 3973:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3974:                                    ERROR
 3975:                            end
 3976:                    end},
 3977: 
 3978:          #{desc => "recv (client) send (server) reply",
 3979:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, role := client}) ->
 3980:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[client] try recv reply"),
 3981:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
 3982:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REP} ->
 3983:                                    ok;
 3984:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3985:                                    ERROR
 3986:                            end;
 3987:                       (#{sock := Sock, role := server}) ->
 3988:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[server] try send reply"),
 3989:                            socket:send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 3990:                    end},
 3991: 
 3992:          #{desc => "announce ready (send_and_recv)",
 3993:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3994:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_and_recv),
 3995:                            ok
 3996:                    end},
 3997: 
 3998: 
 3999:          %% *** Termination ***
 4000:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 4001:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4002:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 4003:                                ok ->
 4004:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 4005:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4006:                                    ERROR
 4007:                            end
 4008:                    end},
 4009:          #{desc => "close socket",
 4010:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 4011:                            socket:close(Sock),
 4012:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 4013:                    end},
 4014: 
 4015:          %% *** We are done ***
 4016:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4017:         ],
 4018: 
 4019: 
 4020:     TesterSeq =
 4021:         [
 4022:          %% *** Init part ***
 4023:          #{desc => "monitor peer 1",
 4024:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4025:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4026:                            ok
 4027:                    end},
 4028:          #{desc => "monitor peer 2",
 4029:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4030:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4031:                            ok
 4032:                    end},
 4033: 
 4034:          #{desc => "order peer 1 start",
 4035:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid}) ->
 4036:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid)
 4037:                    end},
 4038:          #{desc => "order peer 2 start",
 4039:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid}) ->
 4040:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid)
 4041:                    end},
 4042: 
 4043:          #{desc => "await peer 1 ready (init)",
 4044:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = State) ->
 4045:                            {ok, PeerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer1, init),
 4046:                            {ok, State#{peer_1_sa => PeerSA}}
 4047:                    end},
 4048:          #{desc => "await peer 2 ready (init)",
 4049:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = State) ->
 4050:                            {ok, PeerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer2, init),
 4051:                            {ok, State#{peer_2_sa => PeerSA}}
 4052:                    end},
 4053: 
 4054: 
 4055:          #{desc => "order peer 1 to continue (with connect)",
 4056:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid, peer_2_sa := PeerSA} = _State) ->
 4057:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect, PeerSA),
 4058:                            ok
 4059:                    end},
 4060:          #{desc => "order peer 2 to continue (with connect)",
 4061:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid, peer_1_sa := PeerSA} = _State) ->
 4062:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect, PeerSA),
 4063:                            ok
 4064:                    end},
 4065: 
 4066: 
 4067:          #{desc => "await peer 1 ready (connected)",
 4068:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4069:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer1, connected)
 4070:                    end},
 4071:          #{desc => "await peer 2 ready (connected)",
 4072:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4073:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer2, connected)
 4074:                    end},
 4075: 
 4076: 
 4077: 
 4078:          %% We should pick one to issue the request
 4079:          %% (and the other is then to *await* the request
 4080:          %%  and respond).
 4081: 
 4082: 
 4083: 
 4084:          #{desc => "order peer 1 to continue (with send_and_recv)",
 4085:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4086:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_and_recv, client),
 4087:                            ok
 4088:                    end},
 4089:          #{desc => "order peer 2 to continue (with send_and_recv)",
 4090:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4091:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_and_recv, server),
 4092:                            ok
 4093:                    end},
 4094: 
 4095: 
 4096:          #{desc => "await peer 1 ready (send_and_recv)",
 4097:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4098:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer1, send_and_recv)
 4099:                    end},
 4100:          #{desc => "await peer 2 ready (send_and_recv)",
 4101:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4102:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer2, send_and_recv)
 4103:                    end},
 4104: 
 4105: 
 4106:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 4107: 
 4108: 
 4109:          %% *** Termination ***
 4110:          #{desc => "order peer 1 to terminate",
 4111:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4112:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 4113:                            ok
 4114:                    end},
 4115:          #{desc => "await peer 1 termination",
 4116:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = State) ->
 4117:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid),
 4118:                            State1 = maps:remove(peer_1, State),
 4119:                            {ok, State1}
 4120:                    end},
 4121:          #{desc => "order peer 2 to terminate",
 4122:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4123:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 4124:                            ok
 4125:                    end},
 4126:          #{desc => "await peer 2 termination",
 4127:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = State) ->
 4128:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid),
 4129:                            State1 = maps:remove(peer_2, State),
 4130:                            {ok, State1}
 4131:                    end},
 4132: 
 4133: 
 4134:          %% *** We are done ***
 4135:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4136:         ],
 4137: 
 4138: 
 4139:     Peer1  = ?SEV_START("peer 1", PeerSeq,   InitState),
 4140:     Peer2  = ?SEV_START("peer 2", PeerSeq,   InitState),
 4141:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, #{peer_1 => Peer1#ev.pid,
 4142:                                                peer_2 => Peer2#ev.pid}),
 4143:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Peer1, Peer2, Tester]).
 4144: 
 4145: 
 4146: 
 4147: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4148: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4149: %%                                                                     %%
 4150: %%                           API SENDFILE                              %%
 4151: %%                                                                     %%
 4152: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4153: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4154: 
 4155: api_sendfile_inet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4156:     has_support_sendfile(),
 4157:     has_support_ipv4(),
 4158:     api_sendfile(inet, Config, fun socket:sendfile/2).
 4159: 
 4160: api_sendfile_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4161:     has_support_sendfile(),
 4162:     has_support_ipv6(),
 4163:     api_sendfile(inet6, Config, fun socket:sendfile/2).
 4164: 
 4165: api_sendfile_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4166:     has_support_sendfile(),
 4167:     has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 4168:     api_sendfile(local, Config, fun socket:sendfile/2).
 4169: 
 4170: 
 4171: 
 4172: api_sendfile_loop_inet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4173:     has_support_sendfile(),
 4174:     has_support_ipv4(),
 4175:     api_sendfile(inet, Config, fun sendfile_loop/2).
 4176: 
 4177: api_sendfile_loop_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4178:     has_support_sendfile(),
 4179:     has_support_ipv6(),
 4180:     api_sendfile(inet6, Config, fun sendfile_loop/2).
 4181: 
 4182: api_sendfile_loop_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4183:     has_support_sendfile(),
 4184:     has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 4185:     api_sendfile(local, Config, fun sendfile_loop/2).
 4186: 
 4187: 
 4188: sendfile_loop(Sa, F) ->
 4189:     sendfile_loop(Sa, F, 0).
 4190: 
 4191: sendfile_loop(Sa, Cont, Offset) ->
 4192:     SelectHandle = make_ref(),
 4193:     case socket:sendfile(Sa, Cont, Offset, 0, SelectHandle) of
 4194:         {select, Select} ->
 4195:             receive
 4196:                 {'$socket', Sa, select, SelectHandle} ->
 4197:                     case Select of
 4198:                         {{select_info, _, _} = Cont_1, BytesSent} ->
 4199:                             sendfile_loop(Sa, Cont_1, Offset + BytesSent);
 4200:                         {select_info, _, _} = Cont_1 ->
 4201:                             sendfile_loop(Sa, Cont_1, Offset)
 4202:                     end;
 4203:                 {'$socket', Sa, abort, {SelectHandle, Reason}} ->
 4204:                     {error, {Reason, Offset}}
 4205:             end;
 4206:         {ok, BytesSent} ->
 4207:             {ok, Offset + BytesSent};
 4208:         {error, Reason} = Error ->
 4209:             io:format(
 4210:               "sendfile_loop(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p.~n",
 4211:               [Sa, Cont, Offset, Error]),
 4212:             {error, {Reason, Offset}}
 4213:     end.
 4214: 
 4215: 
 4216: 
 4217: api_sendfile(Domain, Config, Sendfile) ->
 4218:     case proplists:get_value(sendfile_file, Config) of
 4219:         undefined ->
 4220:             {skip, sendfile_not_supported};
 4221:         {File, Size, Data} ->
 4222:             api_sendfile(Domain, File, Size, Data, Sendfile)
 4223:     end.
 4224: 
 4225: api_sendfile(Domain, File, Size, Data, Sendfile) ->
 4226:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 4227:     TC = self(),
 4228:     BufSize = Size bsr 10, % /1k
 4229:     BindAddr = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 4230:     case BindAddr of
 4231:         #{family := local, path := Path} ->
 4232:             _ =
 4233:                 spawn(
 4234:                   fun () ->
 4235:                           Mref = monitor(process, TC),
 4236:                           receive
 4237:                               {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, _} ->
 4238:                                   unlink_path(Path)
 4239:                           end
 4240:                   end),
 4241:             ok;
 4242:         #{family := _} ->
 4243:             ok
 4244:     end,
 4245:     io:format("BindAddr = ~p~n", [BindAddr]),
 4246:     {ok, F} = file:open(File, [raw, read, binary]),
 4247:     io:format("F = ~p~n", [F]),
 4248:     {ok, L} = socket:open(Domain, stream),
 4249:     io:format("L = ~p~n", [L]),
 4250:     ok = socket:bind(L, BindAddr),
 4251:     ok = socket:listen(L),
 4252:     {ok, Addr} = socket:sockname(L),
 4253:     io:format("Addr = ~p~n", [Addr]),
 4254:     {ok, Sa} = socket:open(Domain, stream),
 4255:     io:format("Sa = ~p~n", [Sa]),
 4256:     ok = socket:setopt(Sa, {socket,sndbuf}, BufSize),
 4257:     ok = socket:connect(Sa, Addr),
 4258:     {ok, Sb} = socket:accept(L),
 4259:     io:format("Sb = ~p~n", [Sb]),
 4260:     ok = socket:setopt(Sb, {socket,rcvbuf}, BufSize),
 4261:     Verifyer =
 4262:         spawn_link(
 4263:           fun () ->
 4264:                   TC ! {self(), api_sendfile_verify(Sb, Data, 0)}
 4265:           end),
 4266:     io:format("Verifyer = ~p~n", [Verifyer]),
 4267:     %%
 4268:     SendfileResult = Sendfile(Sa, F),
 4269:     io:format("SendfileResult = ~p~n", [SendfileResult]),
 4270:     %%
 4271:     receive
 4272:         {Verifyer, VerifyerResult} ->
 4273:             io:format("VerifyerResult = ~p~n", [VerifyerResult]),
 4274:             case {SendfileResult, VerifyerResult} of
 4275:                 {{ok, Size}, {ok, Size}} ->
 4276:                     ok;
 4277:                 Other ->
 4278:                     ?FAIL({bad_result, Other})
 4279:             end
 4280:     end.
 4281: 
 4282: api_sendfile_verify(_S, [], M) ->
 4283:     {ok, M};
 4284: api_sendfile_verify(S, [Block | Data], M) when is_binary(Block) ->
 4285:     api_sendfile_verify_block(S, Data, M, Block, 1);
 4286: api_sendfile_verify(S, [{N, Block} | Data], M) ->
 4287:     api_sendfile_verify_block(S, Data, M, Block, N).
 4288: 
 4289: api_sendfile_verify_block(S, Data, M, Block, N) ->
 4290:     if
 4291:         0 < N ->
 4292:             ByteSize = byte_size(Block),
 4293:             case socket:recv(S, ByteSize, 2000) of
 4294:                 {ok, Block} ->
 4295:                     api_sendfile_verify_block(
 4296:                       S, Data, M + ByteSize, Block, N - 1);
 4297:                 Other ->
 4298:                     {error_at, M, Other}
 4299:             end;
 4300:         true ->
 4301:             api_sendfile_verify(S, Data, M)
 4302:     end.
 4303: 
 4304: 
 4305: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4306: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4307: %%                                                                     %%
 4308: %%                           API FROM FD                               %%
 4309: %%                                                                     %%
 4310: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4311: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4312: 
 4313: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4314: 
 4315: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 4316: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 4317: %% With some extra checks...
 4318: %% IPv4
 4319: %% Without dup
 4320: api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4321:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4322:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp4,
 4323:            fun() ->
 4324:                    has_support_ipv4()
 4325:            end,
 4326:            fun() ->
 4327:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 4328:                                  type     => dgram,
 4329:                                  protocol => udp,
 4330:                                  dup      => false},
 4331:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 4332:            end).
 4333: 
 4334: 
 4335: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4336: 
 4337: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 4338: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 4339: %% With some extra checks...
 4340: %% IPv6
 4341: %% Without dup
 4342: api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4343:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4344:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp6,
 4345:            fun() ->
 4346:                    has_support_ipv6()
 4347:            end,
 4348:            fun() ->
 4349:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 4350:                                  type     => dgram,
 4351:                                  protocol => udp,
 4352:                                  dup      => false},
 4353:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 4354:            end).
 4355: 
 4356: 
 4357: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4358: 
 4359: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 4360: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 4361: %% With some extra checks...
 4362: %% IPv4
 4363: %% With dup
 4364: api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4365:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4366:     tc_try(api_ffd_wd_open_and_info_udp4,
 4367:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 4368:            fun() ->
 4369:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 4370:                                  type     => dgram,
 4371:                                  protocol => udp,
 4372:                                  dup      => true},
 4373:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 4374:            end).
 4375: 
 4376: 
 4377: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4378: 
 4379: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 4380: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 4381: %% With some extra checks...
 4382: %% IPv6
 4383: %% With dup
 4384: api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4385:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4386:     tc_try(api_ffd_wd_open_and_info_udp6,
 4387:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 4388:            fun() ->
 4389:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 4390:                                  type     => dgram,
 4391:                                  protocol => udp,
 4392:                                  dup      => true},
 4393:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 4394:            end).
 4395: 
 4396: 
 4397: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4398: 
 4399: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 4400: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 4401: %% With some extra checks...
 4402: %% IPv6
 4403: %% Without dup
 4404: api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4405:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4406:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp4,
 4407:            fun() ->
 4408:                    has_support_ipv4()
 4409:            end,
 4410:            fun() ->
 4411:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 4412:                                  type     => stream,
 4413:                                  protocol => tcp,
 4414:                                  dup      => false},
 4415:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 4416:            end).
 4417: 
 4418: 
 4419: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4420: 
 4421: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 4422: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 4423: %% With some extra checks...
 4424: %% IPv6
 4425: %% Without dup
 4426: api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4427:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4428:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp6,
 4429:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 4430:            fun() ->
 4431:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 4432:                                  type     => stream,
 4433:                                  protocol => tcp,
 4434:                                  dup      => false},
 4435:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 4436:            end).
 4437: 
 4438: 
 4439: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4440: 
 4441: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 4442: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 4443: %% With some extra checks...
 4444: %% IPv6
 4445: %% With dup
 4446: api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4447:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4448:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp4,
 4449:            fun() ->
 4450:                    has_support_ipv4()
 4451:            end,
 4452:            fun() ->
 4453:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 4454:                                  type     => stream,
 4455:                                  protocol => tcp,
 4456:                                  dup      => true},
 4457:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 4458:            end).
 4459: 
 4460: 
 4461: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4462: 
 4463: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 4464: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 4465: %% With some extra checks...
 4466: %% IPv6
 4467: %% With dup
 4468: api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4469:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4470:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp6,
 4471:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 4472:            fun() ->
 4473:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 4474:                                  type     => stream,
 4475:                                  protocol => tcp,
 4476:                                  dup      => true},
 4477:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 4478:            end).
 4479: 
 4480: 
 4481: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4482: 
 4483: api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState) ->
 4484:     Seq = 
 4485:         [
 4486:          #{desc => "open",
 4487:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 4488:                          type     := Type,
 4489:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) -> 
 4490:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 4491:                                {ok, Sock1} ->
 4492:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1}};
 4493:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4494:                                    ERROR
 4495:                            end
 4496:                    end},
 4497:          #{desc => "get socket (1) FD",
 4498:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1} = State) ->
 4499:                            case socket:getopt(Sock1, otp, fd) of
 4500:                                {ok, FD} ->
 4501:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("FD: ~w", [FD]),
 4502:                                    {ok, State#{fd => FD}};
 4503:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 4504:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed get FD: "
 4505:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 4506:                                    ERROR
 4507:                            end
 4508:                    end},
 4509:          #{desc => "check if we need to provide domain or not",
 4510:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1} = State) ->
 4511:                            case socket:getopt(Sock1, socket, domain) of
 4512:                                {ok, _} ->
 4513:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("domain accessible"),
 4514:                                    {ok, State#{provide_domain => false}};
 4515:                                {error, Reason} ->
 4516:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("failed get domain: "
 4517:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 4518:                                    {ok, State#{provide_domain => true}}
 4519:                            end
 4520:                    end},
 4521:          #{desc => "check if we need to provide protocol or not",
 4522:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1} = State) ->
 4523:                            case socket:getopt(Sock1, socket, protocol) of
 4524:                                {ok, _} ->
 4525:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("protocol accessible"),
 4526:                                    {ok, State#{provide_protocol => false}};
 4527:                                {error, Reason} ->
 4528:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("failed get protocol: "
 4529:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 4530:                                    {ok, State#{provide_protocol => true}}
 4531:                            end
 4532:                    end},
 4533:          #{desc => "open with FD",
 4534:            cmd  => fun(#{fd               := FD,
 4535:                          dup              := DUP,
 4536:                          provide_domain   := PD,
 4537:                          domain           := Domain,
 4538:                          provide_protocol := PP,
 4539:                          protocol         := Protocol} = State) ->
 4540:                            Opts =
 4541:                                case {PD, PP} of
 4542:                                    {true, true} ->
 4543:                                        #{dup      => DUP,
 4544:                                          domain   => Domain,
 4545:                                          protocol => Protocol};
 4546:                                    {true, false} ->
 4547:                                        #{dup      => DUP,
 4548:                                          domain   => Domain};
 4549:                                    {false, true} ->
 4550:                                        #{dup      => DUP,
 4551:                                          protocol => Protocol};
 4552:                                    {false, false} ->
 4553:                                        #{dup      => DUP}
 4554:                                end,
 4555:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try open socket with"
 4556:                                        "~n   FD:   ~p"
 4557:                                        "~n   Opts: ~p", [FD, Opts]),
 4558:                            case socket:open(FD, Opts) of
 4559:                                {ok, Sock2} ->
 4560:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket 2 open"),
 4561:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock2}};
 4562:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 4563:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed open socket with FD "
 4564:                                                  "(p, ~w): "
 4565:                                                "~n   ~p", [FD, Reason]),
 4566:                                    ERROR
 4567:                            end
 4568:                    end},
 4569:          #{desc => "get socket (1) info",
 4570:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
 4571:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 4572:                            Info = socket:info(Sock),
 4573:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 4574:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Got Info: "
 4575:                                        "~n   ~p", [Info]),
 4576:                            {ok, State#{info1 => Info}}
 4577:                    end},
 4578:          #{desc => "get socket (2) info",
 4579:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock} = State) ->
 4580:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 4581:                            Info = socket:info(Sock),
 4582:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 4583:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Got Info: "
 4584:                                        "~n   ~p", [Info]),
 4585:                            {ok, State#{info2 => Info}}
 4586:                    end},
 4587:          #{desc => "validate socket (1) info",
 4588:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 4589:                          type     := Type,
 4590:                          protocol := Protocol,
 4591:                          info1    := #{domain        := Domain,
 4592:                                        type          := Type,
 4593:                                        protocol      := Protocol,
 4594:                                        ctype         := normal,
 4595:                                        counters      := _,
 4596:                                        num_readers   := 0,
 4597:                                        num_writers   := 0,
 4598:                                        num_acceptors := 0}}) ->
 4599:                            ok;
 4600:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 4601:                          type     := Type,
 4602:                          protocol := Protocol,
 4603:                          info     := Info}) ->
 4604:                            ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Info for socket 1: "
 4605:                                        "~n   (expected) Domain:      ~p"
 4606:                                        "~n   (expected) Type:        ~p"
 4607:                                        "~n   (expected) Protocol:    ~p"
 4608:                                        "~n   (expected) Create Type: ~p"
 4609:                                        "~n   ~p",
 4610:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol, normal, Info]),
 4611:                            {error, unexpected_infio}
 4612:                    end},
 4613:          #{desc => "validate socket (2) info",
 4614:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 4615:                          type     := Type,
 4616:                          protocol := Protocol,
 4617:                          fd       := _FD,
 4618:                          dup      := false,
 4619:                          info2    := #{domain        := Domain,
 4620:                                        type          := Type,
 4621:                                        protocol      := Protocol,
 4622:                                        ctype         := fromfd,
 4623:                                        counters      := _,
 4624:                                        num_readers   := 0,
 4625:                                        num_writers   := 0,
 4626:                                        num_acceptors := 0}}) ->
 4627:                            ok;
 4628:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 4629:                          type     := Type,
 4630:                          protocol := Protocol,
 4631:                          fd       := _FD,
 4632:                          dup      := false,
 4633:                          info     := Info}) ->
 4634:                            ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Info for socket 2: "
 4635:                                        "~n   (expected) Domain:      ~p"
 4636:                                        "~n   (expected) Type:        ~p"
 4637:                                        "~n   (expected) Protocol:    ~p"
 4638:                                        "~n   (expected) Create Type: ~p"
 4639:                                        "~n   ~p",
 4640:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol,
 4641:                                         fromfd, Info]),
 4642:                            {error, unexpected_info};
 4643:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 4644:                          type     := Type,
 4645:                          protocol := Protocol,
 4646:                          fd       := FD,
 4647:                          dup      := true,
 4648:                          info2    := #{domain        := Domain,
 4649:                                        type          := Type,
 4650:                                        protocol      := Protocol,
 4651:                                        ctype         := {fromfd, FD},
 4652:                                        counters      := _,
 4653:                                        num_readers   := 0,
 4654:                                        num_writers   := 0,
 4655:                                        num_acceptors := 0}}) ->
 4656:                            ok;
 4657:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 4658:                          type     := Type,
 4659:                          protocol := Protocol,
 4660:                          fd       := FD,
 4661:                          dup      := true,
 4662:                          info     := Info}) ->
 4663:                            ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Info for socket 2: "
 4664:                                        "~n   (expected) Domain:      ~p"
 4665:                                        "~n   (expected) Type:        ~p"
 4666:                                        "~n   (expected) Protocol:    ~p"
 4667:                                        "~n   (expected) Create Type: ~p"
 4668:                                        "~n   ~p",
 4669:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol,
 4670:                                         {fromfd, FD}, Info]),
 4671:                            {error, unexpected_info}
 4672:                    end},
 4673:          #{desc => "close socket (1)",
 4674:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
 4675:                            socket:close(Sock)
 4676:                    end},
 4677:          #{desc => "close socket (2)",
 4678:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
 4679:                            socket:close(Sock)
 4680:                    end},
 4681: 
 4682:          %% *** We are done ***
 4683:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4684:         ],
 4685:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 4686:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 4687: 
 4688: 
 4689: 
 4690: 
 4691: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4692: 
 4693: %% Basically open a socket (1) and then create another socket (2) from
 4694: %% its file descriptor *without* dup.
 4695: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 4696: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 4697: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 4698: %% IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 4699: %%
 4700: %% <WARNING>
 4701: %%
 4702: %% This is *not* how its intended to be used.
 4703: %% That an erlang process creating a socket and then handing over the
 4704: %% file descriptor to another erlang process. *But* its a convenient way
 4705: %% to test it!
 4706: %%
 4707: %% </WARNING>
 4708: %%
 4709: api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4710:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4711:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp4,
 4712:            fun() ->
 4713:                    has_support_ipv4()
 4714:            end,
 4715:            fun() ->
 4716:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 4717:                                  type     => dgram,
 4718:                                  protocol => udp,
 4719:                                  dup      => false},
 4720:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState)
 4721:            end).
 4722: 
 4723: 
 4724: 
 4725: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4726: 
 4727: %% Basically open a socket (1) and then create another socket (2) from
 4728: %% its file descriptor *without* dup.
 4729: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 4730: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 4731: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 4732: %% IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 4733: %%
 4734: %% <WARNING>
 4735: %%
 4736: %% This is *not* how its intended to be used.
 4737: %% That an erlang process creating a socket and then handing over the
 4738: %% file descriptor to another erlang process. *But* its a convenient way
 4739: %% to test it!
 4740: %%
 4741: %% </WARNING>
 4742: %%
 4743: api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4744:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4745:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp6,
 4746:            fun() ->
 4747:                    has_support_ipv6()
 4748:            end,
 4749:            fun() ->
 4750:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 4751:                                  type     => dgram,
 4752:                                  protocol => udp,
 4753:                                  dup      => false},
 4754:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState)
 4755:            end).
 4756: 
 4757: 
 4758: 
 4759: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4760: 
 4761: %% Basically open a socket (1) and then create another socket (2) from
 4762: %% its file descriptor *with* dup.
 4763: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 4764: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 4765: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 4766: %% IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 4767: %%
 4768: api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4769:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4770:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp4,
 4771:            fun() ->
 4772:                    has_support_ipv4()
 4773:            end,
 4774:            fun() ->
 4775:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 4776:                                  type     => dgram,
 4777:                                  protocol => udp,
 4778:                                  dup      => true},
 4779:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState)
 4780:            end).
 4781: 
 4782: 
 4783: 
 4784: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4785: 
 4786: %% Basically open a socket (1) and then create another socket (2) from
 4787: %% its file descriptor *with* dup.
 4788: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 4789: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 4790: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 4791: %% IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 4792: %%
 4793: api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4794:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4795:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp6,
 4796:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 4797:            fun() ->
 4798:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 4799:                                  type     => dgram,
 4800:                                  protocol => udp,
 4801:                                  dup      => true},
 4802:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState)
 4803:            end).
 4804: 
 4805: 
 4806: 
 4807: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4808: 
 4809: api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState) ->
 4810:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 4811:                    socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 4812:            end,
 4813:     Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 4814:                    socket:recvfrom(Sock)
 4815:            end,
 4816:     api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp2(InitState#{send   => Send,
 4817:                                                            recv   => Recv}).
 4818: 
 4819: api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp2(InitState) ->
 4820:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4821:     ServerSeq = 
 4822:         [
 4823:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 4824:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 4825:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 4826:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4827:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 4828:                    end},
 4829:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 4830:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4831:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 4832:                            ok
 4833:                    end},
 4834: 
 4835:          %% *** Init part ***
 4836:          #{desc => "which local address",
 4837:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 4838:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 4839:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 4840:                    end},
 4841:          #{desc => "create socket",
 4842:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 4843:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 4844:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
 4845:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4846:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 4847:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4848:                                    ERROR
 4849:                            end
 4850:                    end},
 4851:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 4852:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 4853:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 4854:                                ok ->
 4855:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 4856:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 4857:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
 4858:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4859:                                    ERROR
 4860:                            end
 4861:                    end},
 4862:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 4863:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, port := Port}) ->
 4864:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 4865:                            ok
 4866:                    end},
 4867: 
 4868:          #{desc => "await request 1 (recv)",
 4869:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 4870:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 4871:                                {ok, {Source, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 4872:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received request (1) from: "
 4873:                                                "~n   ~p", [Source]),
 4874:                                    {ok, State#{source => Source}};
 4875:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4876:                                    ERROR
 4877:                            end
 4878:                    end},
 4879:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (recv request)",
 4880:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4881:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 4882:                            ok
 4883:                    end},
 4884:          #{desc => "await continue 1 (with send reply)",
 4885:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4886:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 4887:                    end},
 4888:          #{desc => "send reply 1",
 4889:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, source := Source}) ->
 4890:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Source)
 4891:                    end},
 4892:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (send reply)",
 4893:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4894:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 4895:                            {ok, maps:remove(source, State)}
 4896:                    end},
 4897: 
 4898:          #{desc => "await request 2 (recv)",
 4899:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 4900:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 4901:                                {ok, {Source, ?BASIC_REQ}} -> 
 4902:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received request (2) from: "
 4903:                                                "~n   ~p", [Source]),
 4904:                                    {ok, State#{source => Source}};
 4905:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4906:                                    ERROR
 4907:                            end
 4908:                    end},
 4909:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (recv request)",
 4910:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4911:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 4912:                            ok
 4913:                    end},
 4914:          #{desc => "await continue 2 (with send reply)",
 4915:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4916:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 4917:                    end},
 4918:          #{desc => "send reply 2",
 4919:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, source := Source}) ->
 4920:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Source)
 4921:                    end},
 4922:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (send reply)",
 4923:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4924:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 4925:                            {ok, maps:remove(source, State)}
 4926:                    end},
 4927: 
 4928:          #{desc => "await request 3 (recv)",
 4929:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 4930:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 4931:                                {ok, {Source, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 4932:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received request (2) from: "
 4933:                                                "~n   ~p", [Source]),
 4934:                                    {ok, State#{source => Source}};
 4935:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4936:                                    ERROR
 4937:                            end
 4938:                    end},
 4939:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (recv request)",
 4940:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4941:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 4942:                            ok
 4943:                    end},
 4944:          #{desc => "await continue 3 (with send reply)",
 4945:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4946:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 4947:                    end},
 4948:          #{desc => "send reply 3",
 4949:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, source := Source}) ->
 4950:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Source)
 4951:                    end},
 4952:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (send reply)",
 4953:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4954:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 4955:                            {ok, maps:remove(source, State)}
 4956:                    end},
 4957: 
 4958:          %% *** Termination ***
 4959:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 4960:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4961:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 4962:                                ok ->
 4963:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 4964:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4965:                                    ERROR
 4966:                            end
 4967:                    end},
 4968:          #{desc => "close socket",
 4969:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 4970:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4971:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 4972:                    end},
 4973: 
 4974:          %% *** We are done ***
 4975:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4976:         ],
 4977: 
 4978: 
 4979:     Client1Seq =
 4980:         [
 4981:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 4982:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 4983:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 4984:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4985:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 4986:                    end},
 4987:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 4988:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4989:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 4990:                            ok
 4991:                    end},
 4992: 
 4993:          %% *** The init part ***
 4994:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 4995:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 4996:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 4997:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 4998:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 4999:                    end},
 5000:          #{desc => "create socket",
 5001:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 5002:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 5003:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
 5004:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5005:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 5006:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5007:                                    ERROR
 5008:                            end
 5009:                    end},
 5010:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 5011:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 5012:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 5013:                                ok ->
 5014:                                    ok;
 5015:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5016:                                    ERROR
 5017:                            end
 5018:                    end},
 5019:          #{desc => "get socket FD",
 5020:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 5021:                            case socket:getopt(Sock, otp, fd) of
 5022:                                {ok, FD} ->
 5023:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("FD: ~w", [FD]),
 5024:                                    {ok, State#{fd => FD}};
 5025:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5026:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed get FD: "
 5027:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5028:                                    ERROR
 5029:                            end
 5030:                    end},
 5031:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5032:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
 5033:                          fd     := FD}) ->
 5034:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, FD),
 5035:                            ok
 5036:                    end},
 5037: 
 5038:          %% *** The actual test ***
 5039:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 1)",
 5040:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5041:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 5042:                    end},
 5043:          #{desc => "send request 1 (to server)",
 5044:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 5045:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, SSA)
 5046:                    end},
 5047:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 1)",
 5048:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5049:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 5050:                            ok
 5051:                    end},
 5052:          #{desc => "await recv reply 1 (from server)",
 5053:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5054:                            {ok, {_, ?BASIC_REP}} = Recv(Sock),
 5055:                            ok
 5056:                    end},
 5057:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 1)",
 5058:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5059:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 5060:                            ok
 5061:                    end},
 5062: 
 5063:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 3)",
 5064:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5065:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 5066:                    end},
 5067:          #{desc => "send request 3 (to server)",
 5068:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 5069:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, SSA)
 5070:                    end},
 5071:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 3)",
 5072:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5073:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 5074:                            ok
 5075:                    end},
 5076:          #{desc => "await recv reply 3 (from server)",
 5077:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5078:                            {ok, {_, ?BASIC_REP}} = Recv(Sock),
 5079:                            ok
 5080:                    end},
 5081:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 3)",
 5082:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5083:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 5084:                            ok
 5085:                    end},
 5086: 
 5087:          %% *** Termination ***
 5088:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 5089:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5090:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5091:                                ok ->
 5092:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5093:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5094:                                    ERROR
 5095:                            end
 5096:                    end},
 5097:          #{desc => "close socket",
 5098:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 5099:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 5100:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 5101:                    end},
 5102: 
 5103:          %% *** We are done ***
 5104:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5105:         ],
 5106: 
 5107: 
 5108:     Client2Seq =
 5109:         [
 5110:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 5111:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 5112:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5113:                            {Tester, {Port, FD}} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5114:                            {ok, State#{tester      => Tester,
 5115:                                        server_port => Port,
 5116:                                        fd          => FD}}
 5117:                    end},
 5118:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5119:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5120:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5121:                            ok
 5122:                    end},
 5123: 
 5124:          %% *** The init part ***
 5125:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 5126:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 5127:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5128:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 5129:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => SSA}}
 5130:                    end},
 5131:          #{desc => "create socket",
 5132:            cmd  => fun(#{fd     := FD,
 5133:                          dup    := DUP,
 5134:                          domain := Domain} = State) ->
 5135:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try create socket with: "
 5136:                                        "~n   FD:     ~p"
 5137:                                        "~n   DUP:    ~p"
 5138:                                        "~n   Domain: ~p", [FD, DUP, Domain]),
 5139:                            %% On some platforms (Darwin and NetBSD) domain
 5140:                            %% is needed...
 5141:                            case socket:open(FD, #{dup    => DUP,
 5142:                                                   domain => Domain}) of
 5143:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5144:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 5145:                                {error,
 5146:                                 {invalid,{options,domain,#{dup := DUP}}} = R} ->
 5147:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed create socket:"
 5148:                                                "~n   ~p", [R]),
 5149:                                    {skip, domain};
 5150:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5151:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed create socket:"
 5152:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5153:                                    ERROR
 5154:                            end
 5155:                    end},
 5156:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5157:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5158:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 5159:                            ok
 5160:                    end},
 5161: 
 5162:          %% *** The actual test ***
 5163:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 2)",
 5164:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5165:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 5166:                    end},
 5167:          #{desc => "send request 2 (to server)",
 5168:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 5169:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, SSA)
 5170:                    end},
 5171:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 2)",
 5172:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5173:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 5174:                            ok
 5175:                    end},
 5176:          #{desc => "await recv reply 2 (from server)",
 5177:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5178:                            {ok, {_, ?BASIC_REP}} = Recv(Sock),
 5179:                            ok
 5180:                    end},
 5181:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 2)",
 5182:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5183:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 5184:                            ok
 5185:                    end},
 5186: 
 5187:          %% *** Termination ***
 5188:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 5189:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5190:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5191:                                ok ->
 5192:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5193:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5194:                                    ERROR
 5195:                            end
 5196:                    end},
 5197:          #{desc => "close socket",
 5198:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 5199:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
