 5200:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 5201:                    end},
 5202: 
 5203:          %% *** We are done ***
 5204:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5205:         ],
 5206: 
 5207: 
 5208:     TesterSeq =
 5209:         [
 5210:          %% *** Init part ***
 5211:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 5212:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5213:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5214:                            ok
 5215:                    end},
 5216:          #{desc => "monitor client 1",
 5217:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5218:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5219:                            ok
 5220:                    end},
 5221:          #{desc => "monitor client 2",
 5222:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5223:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5224:                            ok
 5225:                    end},
 5226: 
 5227:          %% Start the server
 5228:          #{desc => "order server start",
 5229:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5230:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 5231:                            ok
 5232:                    end},
 5233:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 5234:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 5235:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 5236:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 5237:                    end},
 5238: 
 5239:          %% Start the client 1
 5240:          #{desc => "order client 1 start",
 5241:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 5242:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 5243:                            ok
 5244:                    end},
 5245:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (init)",
 5246:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
 5247:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init) of
 5248:                                {ok, FD} ->
 5249:                                    {ok, State#{fd => FD}};
 5250:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5251:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Client 1 init error: "
 5252:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5253:                                    ERROR
 5254:                            end
 5255:                    end},
 5256: 
 5257:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5258: 
 5259:          %% Start the client 2
 5260:          #{desc => "order client 2 start",
 5261:            cmd  => fun(#{client2     := Pid,
 5262:                          server_port := Port,
 5263:                          fd          := FD} = _State) ->
 5264:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, {Port, FD}),
 5265:                            ok
 5266:                    end},
 5267:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (init)",
 5268:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5269:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
 5270:                    end},
 5271: 
 5272:          %% *** The actual test ***
 5273: 
 5274:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with send request 1)",
 5275:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 5276:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 5277:                            ok
 5278:                    end},
 5279:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (with send request 1)",
 5280:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 5281:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, send_req)
 5282:                    end},
 5283:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 1)",
 5284:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5285:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 5286:                    end},
 5287:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 1)",
 5288:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5289:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 5290:                            ok
 5291:                    end},
 5292:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 1 sent)",
 5293:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5294:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 5295:                    end},
 5296:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (reply recv 1)",
 5297:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 5298:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, recv_reply)
 5299:                    end},
 5300: 
 5301: 
 5302:          #{desc => "order client 2 to continue (with send request 2)",
 5303:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 5304:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 5305:                            ok
 5306:                    end},
 5307:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (with send request 2)",
 5308:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 5309:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client2, send_req)
 5310:                    end},
 5311:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 2)",
 5312:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5313:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 5314:                    end},
 5315:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 2)",
 5316:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5317:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 5318:                            ok
 5319:                    end},
 5320:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 2 sent)",
 5321:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5322:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 5323:                    end},
 5324:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (reply recv 2)",
 5325:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 5326:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client2, recv_reply)
 5327:                    end},
 5328: 
 5329: 
 5330:          #{desc => "order client 2 to terminate",
 5331:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 5332:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 5333:                            ok
 5334:                    end},
 5335:          #{desc => "await client 2 termination",
 5336:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = State) ->
 5337:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 5338:                            State1 = maps:remove(client2, State),
 5339:                            {ok, State1}
 5340:                    end},
 5341: 
 5342: 
 5343:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with send request 3)",
 5344:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 5345:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 5346:                            ok
 5347:                    end},
 5348:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (with send request 3)",
 5349:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 5350:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, send_req)
 5351:                    end},
 5352:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 3)",
 5353:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5354:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 5355:                    end},
 5356:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 3)",
 5357:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5358:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 5359:                            ok
 5360:                    end},
 5361:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 3 sent)",
 5362:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5363:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 5364:                    end},
 5365:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (reply recv 3)",
 5366:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 5367:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, recv_reply)
 5368:                    end},
 5369: 
 5370: 
 5371:          %% *** Termination ***
 5372:          #{desc => "order client 1 to terminate",
 5373:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 5374:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 5375:                            ok
 5376:                    end},
 5377:          #{desc => "await client 1 termination",
 5378:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = State) ->
 5379:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 5380:                            State1 = maps:remove(client1, State),
 5381:                            {ok, State1}
 5382:                    end},
 5383:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 5384:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5385:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 5386:                            ok
 5387:                    end},
 5388:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 5389:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 5390:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 5391:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 5392:                            {ok, State1}
 5393:                    end},
 5394: 
 5395:          %% *** We are done ***
 5396:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5397:         ],
 5398: 
 5399:     i("start server evaluator"),
 5400:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, maps:remove(dup, InitState)),
 5401: 
 5402:     i("start (socket origin) client 1 evaluator"),
 5403:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", Client1Seq, maps:remove(dup, InitState)),
 5404:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 5405: 
 5406:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
 5407:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", Client2Seq, InitState),
 5408:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 5409: 
 5410:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 5411:     TesterInitState = #{server  => Server#ev.pid,
 5412:                         client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
 5413:                         client2 => Client2#ev.pid},
 5414:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 5415: 
 5416:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client1, Client2, Tester]).
 5417: 
 5418: 
 5419: 
 5420: 
 5421: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5422: 
 5423: %% Basically open a socket (1), connect to a server and then create
 5424: %% another socket (2) from its file descriptor *without* dup.
 5425: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 5426: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 5427: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 5428: %% IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 5429: %%
 5430: %% <WARNING>
 5431: %%
 5432: %% This is *not* how its intended to be used.
 5433: %% That an erlang process creating a socket and then handing over the
 5434: %% file descriptor to another erlang process. *But* its a convenient way
 5435: %% to test it!
 5436: %%
 5437: %% </WARNING>
 5438: %%
 5439: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 5440:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 5441:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 5442:            fun() ->
 5443:                    has_support_ipv4()
 5444:            end,
 5445:            fun() ->
 5446:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 5447:                                  type     => stream,
 5448:                                  protocol => tcp,
 5449:                                  dup      => false},
 5450:                    ok = api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState)
 5451:            end).
 5452: 
 5453: 
 5454: 
 5455: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5456: 
 5457: %% Basically open a socket (1), connect to a server and then create
 5458: %% another socket (2) from its file descriptor *without* dup.
 5459: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 5460: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 5461: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 5462: %% IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 5463: %%
 5464: %% <WARNING>
 5465: %%
 5466: %% This is *not* how its intended to be used.
 5467: %% That an erlang process creating a socket and then handing over the
 5468: %% file descriptor to another erlang process. *But* its a convenient way
 5469: %% to test it!
 5470: %%
 5471: %% </WARNING>
 5472: %%
 5473: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 5474:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 5475:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp6,
 5476:            fun() ->
 5477:                    has_support_ipv6()
 5478:            end,
 5479:            fun() ->
 5480:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 5481:                                  type     => stream,
 5482:                                  protocol => tcp,
 5483:                                  dup      => false},
 5484:                    ok = api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState)
 5485:            end).
 5486: 
 5487: 
 5488: 
 5489: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5490: 
 5491: %% Basically open a socket (1), connect to a server and then create
 5492: %% another socket (2) from its file descriptor *with* dup.
 5493: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 5494: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 5495: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 5496: %% IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 5497: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 5498:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 5499:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp4,
 5500:            fun() ->
 5501:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 5502:                                  type     => stream,
 5503:                                  protocol => tcp,
 5504:                                  dup      => true},
 5505:                    ok = api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState)
 5506:            end).
 5507: 
 5508: 
 5509: 
 5510: 
 5511: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5512: 
 5513: %% Basically open a socket (1), connect to a server and then create
 5514: %% another socket (2) from its file descriptor *with* dup.
 5515: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 5516: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 5517: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 5518: %% IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 5519: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 5520:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 5521:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp6,
 5522:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 5523:            fun() ->
 5524:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 5525:                                  type     => stream,
 5526:                                  protocol => tcp,
 5527:                                  dup      => true},
 5528:                    ok = api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState)
 5529:            end).
 5530: 
 5531: 
 5532: 
 5533: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5534: 
 5535: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState) ->
 5536:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 5537:                    socket:send(Sock, Data)
 5538:            end,
 5539:     Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 5540:                    socket:recv(Sock)
 5541:            end,
 5542:     api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp2(InitState#{send   => Send,
 5543:                                                            recv   => Recv}).
 5544: 
 5545: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp2(InitState) ->
 5546:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 5547:     ServerSeq = 
 5548:         [
 5549:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 5550:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 5551:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5552:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5553:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 5554:                    end},
 5555:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5556:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5557:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5558:                            ok
 5559:                    end},
 5560: 
 5561:          %% *** Init part ***
 5562:          #{desc => "which local address",
 5563:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 5564:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5565:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 5566:                    end},
 5567:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 5568:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 5569:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 5570:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 5571:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5572:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 5573:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5574:                                    ERROR
 5575:                            end
 5576:                    end},
 5577:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 5578:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 5579:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 5580:                                ok ->
 5581:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 5582:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 5583:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 5584:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5585:                                    ERROR
 5586:                            end
 5587:                    end},
 5588:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 5589:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 5590:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 5591:                    end},
 5592:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5593:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 5594:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
 5595:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 5596:                            ok
 5597:                    end},
 5598: 
 5599:          %% The actual test
 5600:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 5601:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5602:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 5603:                    end},
 5604:          #{desc => "await connection",
 5605:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 5606:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 5607:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5608:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 5609:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 5610:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5611:                                    ERROR
 5612:                            end
 5613:                    end},
 5614:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 5615:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5616:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 5617:                            ok
 5618:                    end},
 5619: 
 5620:          #{desc => "await request 1 (recv)",
 5621:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5622:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 5623:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 5624:                                    ok;
 5625:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5626:                                    ERROR
 5627:                            end
 5628:                    end},
 5629:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (recv request)",
 5630:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5631:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 5632:                            ok
 5633:                    end},
 5634:          #{desc => "await continue 1 (with send reply)",
 5635:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5636:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 5637:                    end},
 5638:          #{desc => "send reply 1",
 5639:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 5640:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 5641:                    end},
 5642:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (send reply)",
 5643:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5644:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 5645:                            ok
 5646:                    end},
 5647: 
 5648:          #{desc => "await request 2 (recv)",
 5649:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5650:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 5651:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 5652:                                    ok;
 5653:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5654:                                    ERROR
 5655:                            end
 5656:                    end},
 5657:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (recv request)",
 5658:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5659:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 5660:                            ok
 5661:                    end},
 5662:          #{desc => "await continue 2 (with send reply)",
 5663:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5664:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 5665:                    end},
 5666:          #{desc => "send reply 2",
 5667:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 5668:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 5669:                    end},
 5670:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (send reply)",
 5671:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5672:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 5673:                            ok
 5674:                    end},
 5675: 
 5676:          #{desc => "await request 3 (recv)",
 5677:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5678:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 5679:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 5680:                                    ok;
 5681:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5682:                                    ERROR
 5683:                            end
 5684:                    end},
 5685:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (recv request)",
 5686:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5687:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 5688:                            ok
 5689:                    end},
 5690:          #{desc => "await continue 3 (with send reply)",
 5691:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5692:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 5693:                    end},
 5694:          #{desc => "send reply 3",
 5695:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 5696:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 5697:                    end},
 5698:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (send reply)",
 5699:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5700:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 5701:                            ok
 5702:                    end},
 5703: 
 5704:          %% *** Termination ***
 5705:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 5706:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5707:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5708:                                ok ->
 5709:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5710:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5711:                                    ERROR
 5712:                            end
 5713:                    end},
 5714:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 5715:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 5716:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 5717:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 5718:                    end},
 5719:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 5720:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 5721:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
 5722:                                ok ->
 5723:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
 5724:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5725:                                    ERROR
 5726:                            end
 5727:                    end},
 5728: 
 5729:          %% *** We are done ***
 5730:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5731:         ],
 5732: 
 5733: 
 5734:     Client1Seq =
 5735:         [
 5736:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 5737:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 5738:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5739:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5740:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 5741:                    end},
 5742:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5743:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5744:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5745:                            ok
 5746:                    end},
 5747: 
 5748:          %% *** The init part ***
 5749:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 5750:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 5751:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5752:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 5753:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 5754:                    end},
 5755:          #{desc => "create socket",
 5756:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 5757:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 5758:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 5759:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5760:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 5761:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5762:                                    ERROR
 5763:                            end
 5764:                    end},
 5765:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 5766:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 5767:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 5768:                                ok ->
 5769:                                    ok;
 5770:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5771:                                    ERROR
 5772:                            end
 5773:                    end},
 5774:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5775:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5776:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 5777:                            ok
 5778:                    end},
 5779: 
 5780: 
 5781:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 5782:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5783:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 5784:                    end},
 5785:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 5786:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 5787:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
 5788:                    end},
 5789:          #{desc => "get socket FD",
 5790:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 5791:                            case socket:getopt(Sock, otp, fd) of
 5792:                                {ok, FD} ->
 5793:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("FD: ~w", [FD]),
 5794:                                    {ok, State#{fd => FD}};
 5795:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5796:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed get FD: "
 5797:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5798:                                    ERROR
 5799:                            end
 5800:                    end},
 5801:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 5802:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
 5803:                          fd     := FD}) ->
 5804:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect, FD),
 5805:                            ok
 5806:                    end},
 5807: 
 5808: 
 5809:          %% *** The actual test ***
 5810:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 1)",
 5811:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5812:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 5813:                    end},
 5814:          #{desc => "send request 1 (to server)",
 5815:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 5816:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 5817:                    end},
 5818:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 1)",
 5819:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5820:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 5821:                            ok
 5822:                    end},
 5823:          #{desc => "await recv reply 1 (from server)",
 5824:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5825:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 5826:                            ok
 5827:                    end},
 5828:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 1)",
 5829:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5830:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 5831:                            ok
 5832:                    end},
 5833: 
 5834:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 3)",
 5835:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5836:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 5837:                    end},
 5838:          #{desc => "send request 3 (to server)",
 5839:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 5840:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 5841:                    end},
 5842:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 3)",
 5843:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5844:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 5845:                            ok
 5846:                    end},
 5847:          #{desc => "await recv reply 3 (from server)",
 5848:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5849:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 5850:                            ok
 5851:                    end},
 5852:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 3)",
 5853:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5854:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 5855:                            ok
 5856:                    end},
 5857: 
 5858:          %% *** Termination ***
 5859:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 5860:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5861:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5862:                                ok ->
 5863:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5864:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5865:                                    ERROR
 5866:                            end
 5867:                    end},
 5868:          #{desc => "close socket",
 5869:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 5870:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 5871:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 5872:                    end},
 5873: 
 5874:          %% *** We are done ***
 5875:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5876:         ],
 5877: 
 5878: 
 5879:     Client2Seq =
 5880:         [
 5881:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 5882:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 5883:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5884:                            {Tester, FD} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5885:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, fd => FD}}
 5886:                    end},
 5887:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5888:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5889:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5890:                            ok
 5891:                    end},
 5892: 
 5893:          %% *** The init part ***
 5894:          #{desc => "create socket",
 5895:            cmd  => fun(#{fd     := FD,
 5896:                          dup    := DUP,
 5897:                          domain := Domain} = State) ->
 5898:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try create socket with: "
 5899:                                        "~n   FD:     ~p"
 5900:                                        "~n   DUP:    ~p"
 5901:                                        "~n   Domain: ~p", [FD, DUP, Domain]),
 5902:                            case socket:open(FD, #{dup    => DUP,
 5903:                                                   domain => Domain}) of
 5904:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5905:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 5906:                                {error,
 5907:                                 {invalid,{options,domain,#{dup := DUP}}} = R} ->
 5908:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed create socket:"
 5909:                                                "~n   ~p", [R]),
 5910:                                    {skip, domain};
 5911:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5912:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed create socket:"
 5913:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5914:                                    ERROR
 5915:                            end
 5916:                    end},
 5917:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5918:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5919:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 5920:                            ok
 5921:                    end},
 5922: 
 5923:          %% *** The actual test ***
 5924:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 2)",
 5925:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5926:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 5927:                    end},
 5928:          #{desc => "send request 2 (to server)",
 5929:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 5930:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 5931:                    end},
 5932:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 2)",
 5933:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5934:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 5935:                            ok
 5936:                    end},
 5937:          #{desc => "await recv reply 2 (from server)",
 5938:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5939:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 5940:                            ok
 5941:                    end},
 5942:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 2)",
 5943:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5944:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 5945:                            ok
 5946:                    end},
 5947: 
 5948:          %% *** Termination ***
 5949:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 5950:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5951:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5952:                                ok ->
 5953:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5954:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5955:                                    ERROR
 5956:                            end
 5957:                    end},
 5958:          #{desc => "close socket",
 5959:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 5960:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 5961:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 5962:                    end},
 5963: 
 5964:          %% *** We are done ***
 5965:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5966:         ],
 5967: 
 5968: 
 5969:     TesterSeq =
 5970:         [
 5971:          %% *** Init part ***
 5972:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 5973:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5974:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5975:                            ok
 5976:                    end},
 5977:          #{desc => "monitor client 1",
 5978:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5979:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5980:                            ok
 5981:                    end},
 5982:          #{desc => "monitor client 2",
 5983:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5984:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5985:                            ok
 5986:                    end},
 5987: 
 5988:          %% Start the server
 5989:          #{desc => "order server start",
 5990:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5991:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 5992:                            ok
 5993:                    end},
 5994:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 5995:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 5996:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 5997:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 5998:                    end},
 5999: 
 6000:          %% Start the client 1
 6001:          #{desc => "order client 1 start",
 6002:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 6003:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 6004:                            ok
 6005:                    end},
 6006:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (init)",
 6007:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6008:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
 6009:                    end},
 6010: 
 6011:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 6012:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6013:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 6014:                            ok
 6015:                    end},
 6016:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6017:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with connect)",
 6018:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 6019:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
 6020:                            ok
 6021:                    end},
 6022:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (connect)",
 6023:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
 6024:                            {ok, FD} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, connect),
 6025:                            {ok, State#{fd => FD}}
 6026:                    end},
 6027:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 6028:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6029:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 6030:                    end},         
 6031: 
 6032:          %% Start the client 2
 6033:          #{desc => "order client 2 start",
 6034:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid, fd := FD} = _State) ->
 6035:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, FD),
 6036:                            ok
 6037:                    end},
 6038:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (init)",
 6039:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6040:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
 6041:                    end},
 6042: 
 6043:          %% *** The actual test ***
 6044: 
 6045:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with send request 1)",
 6046:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 6047:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 6048:                            ok
 6049:                    end},
 6050:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (with send request 1)",
 6051:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 6052:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, send_req)
 6053:                    end},
 6054:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 1)",
 6055:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6056:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 6057:                    end},
 6058:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 1)",
 6059:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6060:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 6061:                            ok
 6062:                    end},
 6063:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 1 sent)",
 6064:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6065:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 6066:                    end},
 6067:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (reply recv 1)",
 6068:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 6069:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, recv_reply)
 6070:                    end},
 6071: 
 6072: 
 6073:          #{desc => "order client 2 to continue (with send request 2)",
 6074:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 6075:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 6076:                            ok
 6077:                    end},
 6078:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (with send request 2)",
 6079:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 6080:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client2, send_req)
 6081:                    end},
 6082:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 2)",
 6083:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6084:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 6085:                    end},
 6086:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 2)",
 6087:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6088:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 6089:                            ok
 6090:                    end},
 6091:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 2 sent)",
 6092:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6093:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 6094:                    end},
 6095:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (reply recv 2)",
 6096:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 6097:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client2, recv_reply)
 6098:                    end},
 6099: 
 6100: 
 6101:          #{desc => "order client 2 to terminate",
 6102:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 6103:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 6104:                            ok
 6105:                    end},
 6106:          #{desc => "await client 2 termination",
 6107:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = State) ->
 6108:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 6109:                            State1 = maps:remove(client2, State),
 6110:                            {ok, State1}
 6111:                    end},
 6112: 
 6113: 
 6114:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with send request 3)",
 6115:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 6116:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 6117:                            ok
 6118:                    end},
 6119:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (with send request 3)",
 6120:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 6121:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, send_req)
 6122:                    end},
 6123:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 3)",
 6124:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6125:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 6126:                    end},
 6127:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 3)",
 6128:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6129:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 6130:                            ok
 6131:                    end},
 6132:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 3 sent)",
 6133:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6134:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 6135:                    end},
 6136:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (reply recv 3)",
 6137:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 6138:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, recv_reply)
 6139:                    end},
 6140: 
 6141: 
 6142:          %% *** Termination ***
 6143:          #{desc => "order client 1 to terminate",
 6144:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 6145:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 6146:                            ok
 6147:                    end},
 6148:          #{desc => "await client 1 termination",
 6149:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = State) ->
 6150:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 6151:                            State1 = maps:remove(client1, State),
 6152:                            {ok, State1}
 6153:                    end},
 6154:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 6155:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6156:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 6157:                            ok
 6158:                    end},
 6159:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 6160:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 6161:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 6162:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 6163:                            {ok, State1}
 6164:                    end},
 6165: 
 6166:          %% *** We are done ***
 6167:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6168:         ],
 6169: 
 6170:     i("start server evaluator"),
 6171:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, maps:remove(dup, InitState)),
 6172: 
 6173:     i("start (socket origin) client 1 evaluator"),
 6174:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", Client1Seq, maps:remove(dup, InitState)),
 6175:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 6176: 
 6177:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
 6178:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", Client2Seq, InitState),
 6179:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 6180: 
 6181:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 6182:     TesterInitState = #{server  => Server#ev.pid,
 6183:                         client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
 6184:                         client2 => Client2#ev.pid},
 6185:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 6186: 
 6187:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client1, Client2, Tester]).
 6188: 
 6189: 
 6190: 
 6191: 
 6192: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6193: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6194: %%                                                                     %%
 6195: %%                           API ASYNC                                 %%
 6196: %%                                                                     %%
 6197: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6198: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6199: 
 6200: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6201: 
 6202: %% Basically establish a TCP connection via an async connect. IPv4.
 6203: api_a_connect_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6204:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 6205:     tc_try(api_a_connect_tcp4,
 6206:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6207:            fun() ->
 6208:                    ok = api_a_connect_tcpD(inet, nowait(Config))
 6209:            end).
 6210: 
 6211: 
 6212: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6213: 
 6214: %% Basically establish a TCP connection via an async connect. IPv6.
 6215: api_a_connect_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6216:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 6217:     tc_try(api_a_connect_tcp6,
 6218:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6219:            fun() ->
 6220:                    ok = api_a_connect_tcpD(inet6, nowait(Config))
 6221:            end).
 6222: 
 6223: 
 6224: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6225: 
 6226: api_a_connect_tcpD(Domain, Nowait) ->
 6227:     Connect = fun(Sock, SockAddr) ->
 6228:                       socket:connect(Sock, SockAddr, Nowait)
 6229:               end,
 6230:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 6231:                    socket:send(Sock, Data)
 6232:            end,
 6233:     Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 6234:                    socket:recv(Sock)
 6235:            end,
 6236:     InitState = #{domain => Domain,
 6237:                   connect => Connect,
 6238:                   send => Send,
 6239:                   recv => Recv,
 6240:                   connect_ref => Nowait},
 6241:     api_a_connect_tcp(InitState).
 6242: 
 6243: 
 6244: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6245: 
 6246: api_a_connect_tcp(InitState) ->
 6247:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 6248:     ServerSeq = 
 6249:         [
 6250:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 6251:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6252:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6253:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6254:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6255:                    end},
 6256:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6257:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6258:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6259:                            ok
 6260:                    end},
 6261: 
 6262:          %% *** Init part ***
 6263:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6264:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6265:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6266:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 6267:                    end},
 6268:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 6269:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6270:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
 6271:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6272:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 6273:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6274:                                    ERROR
 6275:                            end
 6276:                    end},
 6277:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 6278:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 6279:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 6280:                                ok ->
 6281:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 6282:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 6283:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6284:                                    ERROR
 6285:                            end
 6286:                    end},
 6287:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 6288:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 6289:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 6290:                    end},
 6291:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6292:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 6293:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 6294:                            ok
 6295:                    end},
 6296: 
 6297:          %% The actual test
 6298:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 6299:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6300:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 6301:                    end},
 6302:          #{desc => "await connection",
 6303:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 6304:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 6305:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6306:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 6307:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 6308:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6309:                                    ERROR
 6310:                            end
 6311:                    end},
 6312:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 6313:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6314:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 6315:                            ok
 6316:                    end},
 6317: 
 6318:          #{desc => "await continue (recv_req)",
 6319:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6320:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv_req)
 6321:                    end},
 6322:          #{desc => "recv req",
 6323:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 6324:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 6325:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 6326:                                    ok;
 6327:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 6328:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 6329:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6330:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 6331:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 6332:                                    ERROR
 6333:                            end
 6334:                    end},
 6335:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_req)",
 6336:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6337:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 6338:                            ok
 6339:                    end},
 6340:          #{desc => "await continue (send_rep)",
 6341:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6342:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_rep)
 6343:                    end},
 6344:          #{desc => "send rep",
 6345:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 6346:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 6347:                    end},
 6348:          #{desc => "announce ready (send_rep)",
 6349:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6350:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_rep),
 6351:                            ok
 6352:                    end},
 6353: 	 
 6354: 
 6355:          %% *** Termination ***
 6356:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 6357:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6358:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6359:                                ok ->
 6360:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6361:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6362:                                    ERROR
 6363:                            end
 6364:                    end},
 6365:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 6366:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 6367:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 6368:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 6369:                    end},
 6370:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 6371:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
 6372:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 6373:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
 6374:                    end},
 6375: 
 6376:          %% *** We are done ***
 6377:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6378:         ],
 6379: 
 6380:     ClientSeq = 
 6381:         [
 6382:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 6383:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6384:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6385:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6386:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 6387:                    end},
 6388:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6389:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6390:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6391:                            ok
 6392:                    end},
 6393: 
 6394:          %% *** The init part ***
 6395:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 6396:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 6397:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6398:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 6399:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 6400:                    end},
 6401:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6402:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6403:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
 6404:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6405:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6406:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6407:                                    ERROR
 6408:                            end
 6409:                    end},
 6410:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 6411:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 6412:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6413:                                ok ->
 6414:                                    ok;
 6415:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6416:                                    ERROR
 6417:                            end
 6418:                    end},
 6419:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6420:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6421:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 6422:                            ok
 6423:                    end},
 6424: 
 6425:          %% *** The actual test ***
 6426:          #{desc => "await continue (async connect)",
 6427:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6428:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, async_connect)
 6429:                    end},
 6430:          #{desc => "connect (async) to server",
 6431:            cmd  => fun(#{sock        := Sock,
 6432:                          server_sa   := SSA,
 6433:                          connect     := Connect,
 6434:                          connect_ref := SR} = State) ->
 6435:                            case Connect(Sock, SSA) of
 6436:                                ok ->
 6437:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("ok -> "
 6438: 					       "unexpected success => SKIP", 
 6439:                                                []),
 6440:                                    {skip, unexpected_success};
 6441: 
 6442:                                {select, {select_info, ST, SelectRef}}
 6443:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 6444:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select nowait ->"
 6445:                                                "~n   tag: ~p"
 6446:                                                "~n   ref: ~p",
 6447:                                                [ST, SelectRef]),
 6448:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => select,
 6449:                                                connect_tag => ST,
 6450:                                                connect_ref => SelectRef}};
 6451:                                {select, {select_info, ST, SR}}
 6452:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 6453:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select ref ->"
 6454:                                                "~n   tag: ~p"
 6455:                                                "~n   ref: ~p", [ST, SR]),
 6456:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => select,
 6457:                                                connect_tag => ST}};
 6458: 
 6459:                                {completion,
 6460:                                 {completion_info, CT, CompletionRef}}
 6461:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 6462:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion nowait ->"
 6463:                                                "~n   tag: ~p"
 6464:                                                "~n   ref: ~p",
 6465:                                                [CT, CompletionRef]),
 6466:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => completion,
 6467:                                                connect_tag => CT,
 6468:                                                connect_ref => CompletionRef}};
 6469:                                {completion,
 6470:                                 {completion_info, CT, CR}}
 6471:                                  when is_reference(CR) ->
 6472:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion ref ->"
 6473:                                                "~n   tag: ~p"
 6474:                                                "~n   ref: ~p", [CT, CR]),
 6475:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => completion,
 6476:                                                connect_tag => CT}};
 6477: 
 6478:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6479:                                    ERROR
 6480:                            end
 6481:                    end},
 6482:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect select|completion)",
 6483:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6484:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect_select),
 6485:                            ok
 6486:                    end},
 6487:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
 6488:            cmd  => fun(#{sock        := Sock,
 6489:                          asynch_tag  := select,
 6490:                          connect_tag := connect,
 6491:                          connect_ref := Ref}) ->
 6492:                            receive
 6493:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
 6494:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select message ->"
 6495:                                                "~n   ref: ~p", [Ref]),
 6496:                                    ok
 6497:                            after 5000 ->
 6498:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout: "
 6499:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
 6500:                                                [?MQ()]),
 6501:                                    {error, timeout}
 6502:                            end;
 6503:                       (#{sock        := Sock,
 6504:                          asynch_tag  := completion,
 6505:                          connect_tag := connect,
 6506:                          connect_ref := Ref}) ->
 6507:                            receive
 6508:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, ok = Res}} ->
 6509:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion message ->"
 6510:                                                "~n   ref: ~p"
 6511:                                                "~n   res: ~p", [Ref, Res]),
 6512:                                    ok
 6513:                            after 5000 ->
 6514:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout: "
 6515:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
 6516:                                                [?MQ()]),
 6517:                                    {error, timeout}
 6518:                            end
 6519:                    end},
 6520:          #{desc => "announce ready (select|completion)",
 6521:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6522:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 6523:                            ok
 6524:                    end},
 6525:          #{desc => "(maybe) connect (async) to server",
 6526:            cmd  => fun(#{sock        := Sock,
 6527:                          server_sa   := SSA,
 6528:                          asynch_tag  := select,
 6529:                          connect_tag := connect,
 6530:                          connect     := Connect}) ->
 6531:                            case Connect(Sock, SSA) of
 6532:                                ok ->
 6533:                                    ok;
 6534:                                {select, SelectInfo} ->
 6535:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, SelectInfo}};
 6536:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6537:                                    ERROR
 6538:                            end;
 6539:                       (#{sock        := _Sock,
 6540:                          server_sa   := _SSA,
 6541:                          asynch_tag  := completion,
 6542:                          connect_tag := connect,
 6543:                          connect     := _Connect}) ->
 6544:                            ok
 6545:                    end},
 6546:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 6547:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6548:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 6549:                            ok
 6550:                    end},
 6551:          #{desc => "get peername",
 6552:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 6553:                            case socket:peername(Sock) of
 6554:                                {ok, SockAddr} ->
 6555:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Peer Name: ~p", [SockAddr]),
 6556:                                    ok;
 6557:                                 {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6558:                                    ERROR
 6559:                            end
 6560:                    end},
 6561: 
 6562:          #{desc => "await continue (send_req)",
 6563:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6564:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 6565:                    end},
 6566:          #{desc => "send req",
 6567:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 6568:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 6569:                    end},
 6570:          #{desc => "announce ready (send_req)",
 6571:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6572:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 6573:                            ok
 6574:                    end},
 6575:          #{desc => "await continue (recv_rep)",
 6576:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6577:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv_rep)
 6578:                    end},
 6579:          #{desc => "recv rep",
 6580:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 6581:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 6582:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REP} ->
 6583:                                    ok;
 6584:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 6585:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 6586:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6587:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 6588:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 6589:                                    ERROR
 6590:                            end
 6591:                    end},
 6592:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_rep)",
 6593:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6594:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_rep),
 6595:                            ok
 6596:                    end},
 6597: 
 6598:          %% *** Termination ***
 6599:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 6600:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6601:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6602:                                ok ->
 6603:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6604:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6605:                                    ERROR
 6606:                            end
 6607:                    end},
 6608:          #{desc => "close socket",
 6609:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6610:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 6611:                            State2 = maps:remove(sock,         State),
 6612:                            State3 = maps:remove(connect_stag, State2),
 6613:                            State4 = maps:remove(connect_sref, State3),
 6614:                            {ok, State4}
 6615:                    end},
 6616: 
 6617:          %% *** We are done ***
 6618:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6619:         ],
 6620: 
 6621:     TesterSeq =
 6622:         [
 6623:          %% *** Init part ***
 6624:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 6625:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6626:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6627:                            ok
 6628:                    end},
 6629:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 6630:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6631:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6632:                            ok
 6633:                    end},
 6634: 
 6635:          %% Start the server
 6636:          #{desc => "order server start",
 6637:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6638:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 6639:                            ok
 6640:                    end},
 6641:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 6642:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 6643:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 6644:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 6645:                    end},
 6646: 
 6647:          %% Start the client
 6648:          #{desc => "order client start",
 6649:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 6650:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 6651:                            ok
 6652:                    end},
 6653:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 6654:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 6655:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 6656:                    end},
 6657: 
 6658: 
 6659:          %% *** The actual test ***
 6660:          #{desc => "order client to continue (async connect)",
 6661:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 6662:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, async_connect),
 6663:                            ok
 6664:                    end},
 6665:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect select)",
 6666:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 6667:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect_select)
 6668:                    end},
 6669: 
 6670:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6671: 
 6672:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 6673:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6674:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 6675:                            ok
 6676:                    end},
 6677:          #{desc => "await client ready (select)",
 6678:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 6679:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, select)
 6680:                    end},
 6681:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 6682:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 6683:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
 6684:                    end},
 6685:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 6686:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6687:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 6688:                    end},
 6689: 
 6690:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 6691: 
 6692:          #{desc => "order server to recv test req (recv req)",
 6693:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6694:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv_req),
 6695:                            ok
 6696:                    end},
 6697:          #{desc => "order client to send test req (send req)",
 6698:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 6699:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 6700:                            ok
 6701:                    end},
 6702:          #{desc => "await client ready (send_req)",
 6703:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 6704:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 6705:                    end},
 6706:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv_req)",
 6707:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6708:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 6709:                    end},
 6710:          #{desc => "order client to recv test rep (send rep)",
 6711:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 6712:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, recv_rep),
 6713:                            ok
 6714:                    end},
 6715:          #{desc => "order server to send test rep (send rep)",
 6716:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6717:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_rep),
 6718:                            ok
 6719:                    end},
 6720:          #{desc => "await server ready (send_rep)",
 6721:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6722:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_rep)
 6723:                    end},
 6724:          #{desc => "await client ready (recv_rep)",
 6725:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 6726:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_rep)
 6727:                    end},
 6728: 
 6729: 
 6730:          %% *** Termination ***
 6731:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 6732:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 6733:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 6734:                            ok
 6735:                    end},
 6736:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 6737:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 6738:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 6739:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 6740:                            {ok, State1}
 6741:                    end},
 6742:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 6743:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 6744:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 6745:                            ok
 6746:                    end},
 6747:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 6748:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 6749:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 6750:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 6751:                            {ok, State1}
 6752:                    end},
 6753: 
 6754:          %% *** We are done ***
 6755:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6756:         ],
 6757: 
 6758:     i("start server evaluator"),
 6759:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 6760: 
 6761:     i("start client evaluator"),
 6762:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 6763:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 6764: 
 6765:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 6766:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 6767:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 6768:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 6769: 
 6770:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 6771: 
 6772: 
 6773: 
 6774: 
 6775: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6776: 
 6777: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket using
 6778: %% sendto and recvfrom. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 6779: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 6780: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvfrom,
 6781: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendto.
 6782: %%
 6783: api_a_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6784:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6785:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 6786:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 6787:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6788:            fun() ->
 6789:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 6790:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 6791:                           end,
 6792:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 6793:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 6794:                           end,
 6795:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6796:                                  send     => Send,
 6797:                                  recv     => Recv,
 6798:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 6799:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 6800:            end).
 6801: 
 6802: 
 6803: 
 6804: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6805: 
 6806: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket using
 6807: %% sendto and recvfrom. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 6808: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 6809: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvfrom,
 6810: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendto.
 6811: %%
 6812: api_a_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6813:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6814:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 6815:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 6816:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6817:            fun() ->
