 6818:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 6819:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 6820:                           end,
 6821:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 6822:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 6823:                           end,
 6824:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 6825:                                  send     => Send,
 6826:                                  recv     => Recv,
 6827:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 6828:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 6829:            end).
 6830: 
 6831: 
 6832: 
 6833: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6834: 
 6835: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket using
 6836: %% sendto and recvfrom. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 6837: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 6838: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvmsg,
 6839: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendmsg.
 6840: %%
 6841: api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6842:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6843:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 6844:     tc_try(api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4,
 6845:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6846:            fun() ->
 6847:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 6848:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
 6849:                                              %% ctrl => CMsgs,
 6850:                                              iov  => [Data]},
 6851:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 6852:                           end,
 6853:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 6854:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 6855:                                       {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 6856:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 6857:                                           {ok, {Source, Data}};
 6858:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 6859:                                           OK;
 6860:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 6861:                                           SELECT;
 6862:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 6863:                                           COMPLETION;
 6864:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6865:                                           ERROR
 6866:                                   end
 6867:                           end,
 6868:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6869:                                  send     => Send,
 6870:                                  recv     => Recv,
 6871:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 6872:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 6873:            end).
 6874: 
 6875: 
 6876: 
 6877: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6878: 
 6879: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket using
 6880: %% sendto and recvfrom. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 6881: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 6882: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvmsg,
 6883: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendmsg.
 6884: %%
 6885: api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6886:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6887:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 6888:     tc_try(api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp6,
 6889:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6890:            fun() ->
 6891:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 6892:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
 6893:                                              %% ctrl => CMsgs,
 6894:                                              iov  => [Data]},
 6895:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 6896:                           end,
 6897:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 6898:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 6899:                                       {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 6900:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 6901:                                           {ok, {Source, Data}};
 6902:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 6903:                                           OK;
 6904:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 6905:                                           SELECT;
 6906:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 6907:                                           COMPLETION;
 6908:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6909:                                           ERROR
 6910:                                   end
 6911:                           end,
 6912:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 6913:                                  send     => Send,
 6914:                                  recv     => Recv,
 6915:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 6916:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 6917:            end).
 6918: 
 6919: 
 6920: 
 6921: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6922: 
 6923: api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState) ->
 6924:     ServerSeq = 
 6925:         [
 6926:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 6927:          #{desc => "await start",
 6928:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6929:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6930:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6931:                    end},
 6932:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6933:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6934:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6935:                            ok
 6936:                    end},
 6937: 
 6938:          %% *** Init part ***
 6939:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6940:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6941:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6942:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 6943:                    end},
 6944:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6945:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6946:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
 6947:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6948:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6949:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6950:                                    ERROR
 6951:                            end
 6952:                    end},
 6953:          #{desc => "bind socket (to local address)",
 6954:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 6955:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6956:                                ok ->
 6957:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 6958:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
 6959:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6960:                                    ERROR
 6961:                            end
 6962:                    end},
 6963:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6964:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, port := Port}) ->
 6965:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 6966:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 6967:                            ok
 6968:                    end},
 6969: 
 6970:          %% The actual test
 6971:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 6972:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6973:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 6974:                    end},
 6975:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
 6976:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
 6977:                          recv     := Recv,
 6978:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
 6979:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 6980:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, RecvRef}}
 6981:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 6982:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select nowait: "
 6983:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 6984:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, RecvRef]),
 6985:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
 6986:                                                recv_tag  => Tag,
 6987:                                                recv_ref  => RecvRef}};
 6988:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 6989:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 6990:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select ref: "
 6991:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 6992:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 6993:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
 6994:                                                recv_tag  => Tag}};
 6995: 
 6996:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, RecvRef}}
 6997:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 6998:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select nowait: "
 6999:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7000:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, RecvRef]),
 7001:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => completion,
 7002:                                                recv_tag  => Tag,
 7003:                                                recv_ref  => RecvRef}};
 7004:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 7005:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 7006:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected completion ref: "
 7007:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7008:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 7009:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => completion,
 7010:                                                recv_tag  => Tag}};
 7011: 
 7012:                                {ok, X} ->
 7013:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 7014: 
 7015:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7016:                                    ERROR
 7017:                            end
 7018:                    end},
 7019:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 7020:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7021:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 7022:                            ok
 7023:                    end},
 7024:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
 7025:            cmd  => fun(#{async_tag := select,
 7026:                          sock      := Sock,
 7027:                          recv_ref  := RecvRef}) ->
 7028:                            receive
 7029:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, RecvRef} ->
 7030:                                    ok
 7031:                            after 5000 ->
 7032:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
 7033:                                                "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 7034:                                                "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 7035:                                                [socket:info(Sock), ?MQ()]),
 7036:                                    {error, timeout}
 7037:                            end;
 7038:                       (#{async_tag := completion,
 7039:                          sock      := Sock,
 7040:                          recv_ref  := RecvRef} = State) ->
 7041:                            receive
 7042:                                %% Recvfrom
 7043:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 7044:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, {Src, ?BASIC_REQ}}}} ->
 7045:                                    {ok, State#{req_src => Src}};
 7046:                                %% Recvmsg
 7047:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 7048:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, #{addr := Src,
 7049:                                                  iov  := [?BASIC_REQ]}}}} ->
 7050:                                    {ok, State#{req_src => Src}};
 7051:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 7052:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, Unexpected}}} ->
 7053:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected success result: "
 7054:                                                "~n   ~p", [Unexpected]),
 7055:                                    {error, {unexpected_success_result,
 7056:                                             Unexpected}};
 7057:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 7058:                                 {RecvRef, {error, Reason} = ERROR}} ->
 7059:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("completion with error: "
 7060:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 7061:                                    ERROR
 7062:                            after 5000 ->
 7063:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
 7064:                                                "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 7065:                                                "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 7066:                                                [socket:info(Sock), ?MQ()]),
 7067:                                    {error, timeout}
 7068:                            end
 7069:                    end},
 7070:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 7071:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7072:                            %% We are actually done *if* this was
 7073:                            %% a completion event, but to make the
 7074:                            %% test case simple...
 7075:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 7076:                            ok
 7077:                    end},
 7078:          #{desc => "now read the data (request), for select",
 7079:            cmd  => fun(#{async_tag := select,
 7080:                          sock      := Sock,
 7081:                          recv      := Recv} = State) ->
 7082:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 7083:                                {ok, {Src, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 7084:                                    {ok, State#{req_src => Src}};
 7085:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7086:                                    ERROR
 7087:                            end;
 7088:                       (#{async_tag := completion} = _State) ->
 7089:                            %% We are already done!
 7090:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Already done!"),
 7091:                            ok
 7092:                    end},
 7093:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 7094:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7095:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 7096:                            ok
 7097:                    end},
 7098: 
 7099:          #{desc => "await continue (send reply)",
 7100:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7101:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 7102:                    end},
 7103:          #{desc => "send reply",
 7104:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, req_src := Src, send := Send}) ->
 7105:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Src)
 7106:                    end},
 7107:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
 7108:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7109:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
 7110:                            ok
 7111:                    end},
 7112: 
 7113:          %% Termination
 7114:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 7115:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7116:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 7117:                                ok ->
 7118:                                    State2 = maps:remove(tester,    State),
 7119:                                    State3 = maps:remove(async_tag, State2),
 7120:                                    State4 = maps:remove(recv_tag,  State3),
 7121:                                    State5 = maps:remove(recv_ref,  State4),
 7122:                                    State6 = maps:remove(req_src,   State5),
 7123:                                    {ok, State6};
 7124:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7125:                                    ERROR
 7126:                            end
 7127:                    end},
 7128:          #{desc => "close socket",
 7129:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7130:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 7131:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 7132:                    end},
 7133: 
 7134:          %% *** We are done ***
 7135:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7136:         ],
 7137: 
 7138: 
 7139:     ClientSeq = 
 7140:         [
 7141:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 7142:          #{desc => "await start",
 7143:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 7144:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 7145:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
 7146:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
 7147:                    end},
 7148:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 7149:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7150:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 7151:                            ok
 7152:                    end},
 7153: 
 7154:          %% *** Init part ***
 7155:          #{desc => "local address",
 7156:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 7157:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 7158:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 7159:                    end},
 7160:          #{desc => "open socket",
 7161:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 7162:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, udp),
 7163:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
 7164:                    end},
 7165:          #{desc => "bind socket (to local address)",
 7166:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
 7167:                           case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 7168:                                ok ->
 7169:                                    ok;
 7170:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7171:                                    ERROR
 7172:                            end
 7173:                    end},
 7174:          #{desc => "sockname",
 7175:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7176:                            SA = sock_sockname(Sock),
 7177:                            {ok, State#{sa => SA}}
 7178:                    end},
 7179:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7180:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7181:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 7182:                            ok
 7183:                    end},
 7184: 
 7185:          %% The actual test
 7186:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 7187:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7188:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 7189:                    end},
 7190:          #{desc => "send request",
 7191:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := Server, send := Send}) ->
 7192:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Server)
 7193:                    end},
 7194:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 7195:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7196:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 7197:                            ok
 7198:                    end},
 7199:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 7200:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7201:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 7202:                    end},
 7203:          #{desc => "try recv reply (with nowait)",
 7204:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
 7205:                          recv     := Recv,
 7206:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
 7207:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 7208:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, RecvRef}}
 7209:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 7210:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
 7211:                                                recv_tag  => Tag,
 7212:                                                recv_ref  => RecvRef}};
 7213:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 7214:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 7215:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
 7216:                                                recv_tag  => Tag}};
 7217:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, RecvRef}}
 7218:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 7219:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => completion,
 7220:                                                recv_tag  => Tag,
 7221:                                                recv_ref  => RecvRef}};
 7222:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 7223:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 7224:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => completion,
 7225:                                                recv_tag  => Tag}};
 7226:                                {ok, X} ->
 7227:                                    {error, {unexpected_select_info, X}};
 7228:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7229:                                    ERROR
 7230:                            end
 7231:                    end},
 7232:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 7233:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7234:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 7235:                            ok
 7236:                    end},
 7237:          #{desc => "await select message",
 7238:            cmd  => fun(#{async_tag := select,
 7239:                          sock      := Sock,
 7240:                          recv_ref  := RecvRef}) ->
 7241:                            receive
 7242:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, RecvRef} ->
 7243:                                    ok
 7244:                            end;
 7245:                       (#{async_tag := completion,
 7246:                          sock      := Sock,
 7247:                          recv_ref  := RecvRef}) ->
 7248:                            receive
 7249:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 7250:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, _}}} ->
 7251:                                    ok
 7252:                            end
 7253:                    end},
 7254:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 7255:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7256:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 7257:                            ok
 7258:                    end},
 7259:          #{desc => "now read the data (reply)",
 7260:            cmd  => fun(#{async_tag := select,
 7261:                          sock      := Sock,
 7262:                          recv      := Recv}) ->
 7263:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 7264:                                {ok, {_Src, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
 7265:                                    ok;
 7266:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7267:                                    ERROR
 7268:                            end;
 7269:                       (#{async_tag := completion}) ->
 7270:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Already read!"),
 7271:                            ok
 7272:                    end},
 7273:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 7274:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7275:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_rep),
 7276:                            ok
 7277:                    end},
 7278: 
 7279:          %% Termination
 7280:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 7281:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7282:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 7283:                                ok ->
 7284:                                    State2 = maps:remove(tester,    State),
 7285:                                    State3 = maps:remove(async_tag, State2),
 7286:                                    State4 = maps:remove(recv_tag,  State3),
 7287:                                    State5 = maps:remove(recv_ref,  State4),
 7288:                                    {ok, State5};
 7289:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7290:                                    ERROR
 7291:                            end
 7292:                    end},
 7293:          #{desc => "close socket",
 7294:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7295:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 7296:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 7297:                    end},
 7298: 
 7299:          %% *** We are done ***
 7300:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7301:         ],
 7302: 
 7303: 
 7304:     TesterSeq = 
 7305:         [
 7306:          %% *** Init part ***
 7307:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 7308:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7309:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7310:                            ok
 7311:                    end},
 7312:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 7313:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 7314:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7315:                            ok
 7316:                    end},
 7317: 
 7318:          %% Start the server
 7319:          #{desc => "order server start",
 7320:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7321:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 7322:                            ok
 7323:                    end},
 7324:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 7325:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 7326:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 7327:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
 7328:                    end},
 7329: 
 7330:          %% Start the client
 7331:          #{desc => "order client start",
 7332:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Pid, 
 7333:                          server_sa := ServerSA} = _State) ->
 7334:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, ServerSA),
 7335:                            ok
 7336:                    end},
 7337:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 7338:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 7339:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 7340:                    end},
 7341:  
 7342:          %% The actual test
 7343:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
 7344:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7345:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 7346:                            ok
 7347:                    end},
 7348:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv_select)",
 7349:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7350:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
 7351:                    end},
 7352: 
 7353:          #{desc => "order client continue (send request)",
 7354:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 7355:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_req),
 7356:                            ok
 7357:                    end},
 7358:          #{desc => "await client ready (send request)",
 7359:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 7360:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, send_req)
 7361:                    end},
 7362:          #{desc => "await server ready (select)",
 7363:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7364:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, select)
 7365:                    end},
 7366:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv request)",
 7367:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7368:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_req)
 7369:                    end},
 7370: 
 7371:          #{desc => "order client continue (recv)",
 7372:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 7373:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 7374:                            ok
 7375:                    end},
 7376:          #{desc => "await client ready (recv_select)",
 7377:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 7378:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, recv_select)
 7379:                    end},
 7380:          #{desc => "order server continue (send reply)",
 7381:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7382:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_reply),
 7383:                            ok
 7384:                    end},
 7385:          #{desc => "await server ready (send)",
 7386:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7387:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, send)
 7388:                    end},
 7389:          #{desc => "await client ready (select)",
 7390:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 7391:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, select)
 7392:                    end},
 7393:          #{desc => "await client ready (recv reply)",
 7394:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 7395:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, recv_rep)
 7396:                    end},
 7397: 
 7398:          %% Terminations
 7399:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 7400:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 7401:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7402:                            ok
 7403:                    end},
 7404:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 7405:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 7406:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7407:                                ok ->
 7408:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 7409:                                    {ok, State1};
 7410:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7411:                                    ERROR
 7412:                            end
 7413:                    end},
 7414:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 7415:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7416:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 7417:                            ok
 7418:                    end},
 7419:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 7420:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 7421:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 7422:                                ok ->
 7423:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 7424:                                    {ok, State1};
 7425:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7426:                                    ERROR
 7427:                            end
 7428:                    end},
 7429: 
 7430: 
 7431:          %% *** We are done ***
 7432:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7433:         ],
 7434: 
 7435:     i("start server evaluator"),
 7436:     ServerInitState = InitState,
 7437:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 7438: 
 7439:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
 7440:     ClientInitState = InitState,
 7441:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 7442: 
 7443:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 7444:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 7445:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 7446:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 7447: 
 7448:     i("await evaluator"),
 7449:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 7450: 
 7451: 
 7452: 
 7453: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7454: 
 7455: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 7456: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 7457: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 7458: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recv,
 7459: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for send.
 7460: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 7461: api_a_send_and_recv_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7462:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7463:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 7464:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 7465:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 7466:            fun() ->
 7467:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 7468:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 7469:                           end,
 7470:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 7471:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 7472:                           end,
 7473:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet,
 7474:                                  proto     => tcp,
 7475:                                  send      => Send,
 7476:                                  recv      => Recv,
 7477:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 7478:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 7479:            end).
 7480: 
 7481: 
 7482: 
 7483: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7484: 
 7485: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 7486: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 7487: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 7488: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recv,
 7489: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for send.
 7490: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 7491: api_a_send_and_recv_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7492:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7493:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 7494:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 7495:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 7496:            fun() ->
 7497:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 7498:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 7499:                           end,
 7500:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 7501:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 7502:                           end,
 7503:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet6,
 7504:                                  proto     => tcp,
 7505:                                  send      => Send,
 7506:                                  recv      => Recv,
 7507:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 7508:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 7509:            end).
 7510: 
 7511: 
 7512: 
 7513: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7514: 
 7515: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 7516: %% on an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 7517: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 7518: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recv,
 7519: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for send.
 7520: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 7521: api_a_send_and_recv_sctp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7522:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7523:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 7524:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 7525:            fun() ->
 7526:                    has_support_sctp(),
 7527:                    has_support_ipv4()
 7528:            end,
 7529:            fun() ->
 7530:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 7531:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 7532:                           end,
 7533:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 7534:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 7535:                           end,
 7536:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet,
 7537:                                  proto     => sctp,
 7538:                                  send      => Send,
 7539:                                  recv      => Recv,
 7540:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 7541:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 7542:            end).
 7543: 
 7544: 
 7545: 
 7546: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7547: 
 7548: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 7549: %% on an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 7550: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 7551: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recv,
 7552: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for send.
 7553: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 7554: api_a_send_and_recv_sctp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7555:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7556:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 7557:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 7558:            fun() ->
 7559:                    has_support_sctp(),
 7560:                    has_support_ipv6()
 7561:            end,
 7562:            fun() ->
 7563:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 7564:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 7565:                           end,
 7566:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 7567:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 7568:                           end,
 7569:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet6,
 7570:                                  proto     => sctp,
 7571:                                  send      => Send,
 7572:                                  recv      => Recv,
 7573:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 7574:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 7575:            end).
 7576: 
 7577: 
 7578: 
 7579: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7580: 
 7581: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 7582: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 7583: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 7584: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvmsg,
 7585: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendmsg.
 7586: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 7587: api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7588:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7589:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 7590:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 7591:            fun() ->
 7592:                    is_not_windows(),
 7593:                    has_support_ipv4()
 7594:            end,
 7595:            fun() ->
 7596:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 7597:                                   Msg = #{iov => [Data]},
 7598:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 7599:                           end,
 7600:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 7601:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 7602:                                       {ok, #{iov := [Data]}} ->
 7603:                                           {ok, Data};
 7604:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 7605:                                           SELECT;
 7606: 				      {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7607:                                           ERROR
 7608:                                   end
 7609:                           end,
 7610:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet,
 7611:                                  proto     => tcp,
 7612:                                  send      => Send,
 7613:                                  recv      => Recv,
 7614:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 7615:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 7616:            end).
 7617: 
 7618: 
 7619: 
 7620: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7621: 
 7622: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 7623: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 7624: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 7625: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvmsg,
 7626: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendmsg.
 7627: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 7628: api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7629:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7630:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 7631:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 7632:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 7633:            fun() ->
 7634:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 7635:                                   Msg = #{iov => [Data]},
 7636:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 7637:                           end,
 7638:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 7639:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 7640:                                       {ok, #{iov := [Data]}} ->
 7641:                                           {ok, Data};
 7642:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 7643:                                           SELECT;
 7644: 				      {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7645:                                           ERROR
 7646:                                   end
 7647:                           end,
 7648:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet6,
 7649:                                  proto     => tcp,
 7650:                                  send      => Send,
 7651:                                  recv      => Recv,
 7652:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 7653:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 7654:            end).
 7655: 
 7656: 
 7657: 
 7658: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7659: 
 7660: api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState) ->
 7661:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 7662:     ServerSeq = 
 7663:         [
 7664:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 7665:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 7666:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 7667:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 7668:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 7669:                    end},
 7670:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 7671:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7672:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 7673:                            ok
 7674:                    end},
 7675: 
 7676:          %% *** Init part ***
 7677:          #{desc => "which local address",
 7678:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 7679:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 7680:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 7681:                    end},
 7682:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 7683:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 7684:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try create (open) ~w (~w) socket",
 7685:                                        [Proto, Domain]),
 7686:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 7687:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 7688:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 7689:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 7690:                                    {skip, Reason};
 7691:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7692:                                    ERROR
 7693:                            end
 7694:                    end},
 7695:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 7696:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 7697:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 7698:                                ok ->
 7699:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 7700:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 7701:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7702:                                    ERROR
 7703:                            end
 7704:                    end},
 7705:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 7706:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 7707:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 7708:                    end},
 7709:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7710:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 7711:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 7712:                            ok
 7713:                    end},
 7714: 
 7715:          %% The actual test
 7716:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 7717:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7718:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 7719:                    end},
 7720:          #{desc => "await connection (nowait)",
 7721:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 7722:                            Nowait = nowait(Config),
 7723:                            case socket:accept(LSock, Nowait) of
 7724:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 7725:                                  when Nowait =:= nowait ->
 7726:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select accept message: "
 7727:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7728:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 7729:                                    {ok, State#{sorc        => select,
 7730:                                                accept_stag => Tag,
 7731:                                                accept_sref => Ref}};
 7732:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Nowait}}
 7733:                                  when is_reference(Nowait) ->
 7734:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select accept result: "
 7735:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7736:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Nowait]),
 7737:                                    {ok, State#{sorc        => select,
 7738:                                                accept_stag => Tag,
 7739:                                                accept_sref => Nowait}};
 7740: 
 7741:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 7742:                                  when Nowait =:= nowait ->
 7743:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion accept result: "
 7744:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7745:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 7746:                                    {ok, State#{sorc        => completion,
 7747:                                                accept_stag => Tag,
 7748:                                                accept_sref => Ref}};
 7749:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Nowait}}
 7750:                                  when is_reference(Nowait) ->
 7751:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion accept result: "
 7752:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7753:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Nowait]),
 7754:                                    {ok, State#{sorc        => completion,
 7755:                                                accept_stag => Tag,
 7756:                                                accept_sref => Nowait}};
 7757: 
 7758:                                {ok, X} ->
 7759:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 7760:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7761:                                    ERROR
 7762:                            end
 7763:                    end},
 7764:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept_select)",
 7765:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7766:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept_select),
 7767:                            ok
 7768:                    end},
 7769:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
 7770:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock, accept_sref := Ref} = State) ->
 7771:                            receive
 7772:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
 7773:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select message: "
 7774:                                                "ready for accept"),
 7775:                                    ok;
 7776:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 7777:                                 {Ref, {ok, CSock}}} ->
 7778:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion message: accepted: "
 7779:                                                "~n   CSock: ~p", [Sock]),
 7780:                                    {ok, State#{csock => CSock}}
 7781:                            after 5000 ->
 7782:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("select|completion message timeout:"
 7783:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
 7784:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
 7785:                                                "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 7786:                                                [Sock, Ref, ?MQ()]),
 7787:                                    {error, timeout}
 7788:                            end
 7789:                    end},
 7790:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 7791:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7792:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 7793:                            ok
 7794:                    end},
 7795:          #{desc => "try accept (again)",
 7796:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, sorc := select} = State) ->
 7797:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try accept again"),
 7798:                            case socket:accept(LSock, nowait) of
 7799:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 7800:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: "
 7801:                                                "~n   Sock: ~p", [Sock]),
 7802:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 7803:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7804:                                    ERROR
 7805:                            end;
 7806:                        (#{sorc := completion})->
 7807:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("already accepted"),
 7808:                            ok
 7809:                    end},
 7810:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 7811:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7812:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 7813:                            ok
 7814:                    end},
 7815: 
 7816:          #{desc => "await continue (recv request)",
 7817:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7818:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv_req)
 7819:                    end},
 7820:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
 7821:            cmd  => fun(#{csock     := Sock,
 7822:                          recv      := Recv,
 7823:                          recv_sref := SR} = State) ->
 7824:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 7825:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 7826:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 7827:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
 7828:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7829:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 7830:                                    {ok, State#{recv_stag => Tag,
 7831:                                                recv_sref => Ref}};
 7832:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, SR}}
 7833:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 7834:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select ref: "
 7835:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7836:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, SR]),
 7837:                                    {ok, State#{recv_stag => Tag}};
 7838: 
 7839:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 7840:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 7841:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
 7842:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7843:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 7844:                                    {ok, State#{recv_stag => Tag,
 7845:                                                recv_sref => Ref}};
 7846:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, SR}}
 7847:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 7848:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion ref: "
 7849:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 7850:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, SR]),
 7851:                                    {ok, State#{recv_stag => Tag}};
 7852: 
 7853:                                {ok, X} ->
 7854:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 7855:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7856:                                    ERROR
 7857:                            end
 7858:                    end},
 7859:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 7860:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7861:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 7862:                            ok
 7863:                    end},
 7864:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
 7865:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv_sref := RecvRef}) ->
 7866:                            receive
 7867:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, RecvRef} ->
 7868:                                    ok;
 7869:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 7870:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, ?BASIC_REQ}}} ->
 7871:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected data"),
 7872:                                    ok;
 7873:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 7874:                                 {RecvRef, {error, Reason} = ERROR}} ->
 7875:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("received unexpected error: "
 7876:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 7877:                                    ERROR
 7878:                            end
 7879:                    end},
 7880:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 7881:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7882:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 7883:                            ok
 7884:                    end},
 7885:          #{desc => "now read the data (request)",
 7886:            cmd  => fun(#{sorc  := select,
 7887:                          csock := Sock,
 7888:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
 7889:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 7890:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 7891:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("read expected data"),
 7892:                                    ok;
 7893:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7894:                                    ERROR
 7895:                            end;
 7896:                       (#{sorc := completion}) ->
 7897:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("already received"),
 7898:                            ok
 7899:                    end},
 7900:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 7901:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7902:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 7903:                            ok
 7904:                    end},
 7905: 
 7906:          #{desc => "await continue (send reply)",
 7907:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7908:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_rep)
 7909:                    end},
 7910:          #{desc => "send reply",
 7911:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 7912:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 7913:                    end},
 7914:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
 7915:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7916:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_rep),
 7917:                            ok
 7918:                    end},
 7919: 
 7920:          %% *** Termination ***
 7921:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 7922:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7923:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 7924:                                ok ->
 7925:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 7926:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7927:                                    ERROR
 7928:                            end
 7929:                    end},
 7930:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 7931:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock}) ->
 7932:                            socket:close(Sock)
 7933:                    end},
 7934:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 7935:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
 7936:                            socket:close(Sock)
 7937:                    end},
 7938: 
 7939:          %% *** We are done ***
 7940:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7941:         ],
 7942: 
 7943: 
 7944:     ClientSeq = 
 7945:         [
 7946:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 7947:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 7948:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 7949:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 7950:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 7951:                    end},
 7952:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 7953:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7954:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 7955:                            ok
 7956:                    end},
 7957: 
 7958:          %% *** The init part ***
 7959:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 7960:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 7961:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 7962:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 7963:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 7964:                    end},
 7965:          #{desc => "create socket",
 7966:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 7967:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try create (open) ~w (~w) socket",
 7968:                                        [Proto, Domain]),
 7969:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 7970:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 7971:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 7972:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7973:                                    ERROR
 7974:                            end
 7975:                    end},
 7976:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 7977:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 7978:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 7979:                                ok ->
 7980:                                    ok;
 7981:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7982:                                    ERROR
 7983:                            end
 7984:                    end},
 7985:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7986:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7987:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 7988:                            ok
 7989:                    end},
 7990: 
 7991:          %% *** The actual test ***
 7992:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 7993:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7994:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 7995:                    end},
 7996:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 7997:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 7998:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
 7999:                    end},
 8000:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 8001:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8002:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 8003:                            ok
 8004:                    end},
 8005: 
 8006:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 8007:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8008:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 8009:                    end},
 8010:          #{desc => "send request (to server)",
 8011:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 8012:                            ok = Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 8013:                    end},
 8014:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 8015:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8016:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 8017:                            ok
 8018:                    end},
 8019: 
 8020:          #{desc => "try recv reply (with nowait, expect select|completion)",
 8021:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
 8022:                          recv := Recv,
 8023:                          recv_sref := SR} = State) ->
 8024:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 8025:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 8026:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 8027:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
 8028:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 8029:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 8030:                                    {ok, State#{sorc      => select,
 8031:                                                recv_stag => Tag,
 8032:                                                recv_sref => Ref}};
 8033:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, SR}}
 8034:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 8035:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select ref: "
 8036:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 8037:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, SR]),
 8038:                                    {ok, State#{sorc      => select,
 8039:                                                recv_stag => Tag}};
 8040: 
 8041:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 8042:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 8043:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
 8044:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 8045:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 8046:                                    {ok, State#{sorc      => completion,
 8047:                                                recv_stag => Tag,
 8048:                                                recv_sref => Ref}};
 8049:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, SR}}
 8050:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 8051:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion ref: "
 8052:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 8053:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, SR]),
 8054:                                    {ok, State#{sorc      => completion,
 8055:                                                recv_stag => Tag}};
 8056: 
 8057:                                {ok, X} ->
 8058:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 8059:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8060:                                    ERROR
 8061:                            end
 8062:                    end},
 8063:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 8064:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8065:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 8066:                            ok
 8067:                    end},
 8068:          #{desc => "await select message",
 8069:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv_sref := RecvRef}) ->
 8070:                            receive
 8071:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, RecvRef} ->
 8072:                                    ok;
 8073:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 8074:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, ?BASIC_REP}}} ->
 8075:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected reply"),
 8076:                                    ok
 8077:                            end
 8078:                    end},
 8079:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 8080:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8081:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 8082:                            ok
 8083:                    end},
 8084:          #{desc => "now read the data (reply)",
 8085:            cmd  => fun(#{sorc := select, sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 8086:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 8087:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[select] received expected reply"),
 8088:                            ok;
 8089:                       (#{sorc := completion}) ->
 8090:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[completion] "
 8091:                                        "expected reply already received"),
 8092:                            ok
 8093:                    end},
 8094:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 8095:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8096:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_rep),
 8097:                            ok
 8098:                    end},
 8099: 
 8100:          %% *** Termination ***
 8101:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 8102:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 8103:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 8104:                                ok ->
 8105:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 8106:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8107:                                    ERROR
 8108:                            end
 8109:                    end},
 8110:          #{desc => "close socket",
 8111:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
 8112:                            socket:close(Sock)
 8113:                    end},
 8114: 
 8115:          %% *** We are done ***
 8116:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8117:         ],
 8118: 
 8119:     TesterSeq =
 8120:         [
 8121:          %% *** Init part ***
 8122:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 8123:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8124:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 8125:                            ok
 8126:                    end},
 8127:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 8128:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8129:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 8130:                            ok
 8131:                    end},
 8132: 
 8133:          %% Start the server
 8134:          #{desc => "order server start",
 8135:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8136:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 8137:                            ok
 8138:                    end},
 8139:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 8140:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 8141:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 8142:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 8143:                    end},
 8144: 
 8145:          %% Start the client
 8146:          #{desc => "order client start",
 8147:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 8148:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 8149:                            ok
 8150:                    end},
 8151:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 8152:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8153:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 8154:                    end},
 8155: 
 8156:          %% *** The actual test ***
 8157:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 8158:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8159:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 8160:                            ok
 8161:                    end},
 8162:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept select)",
 8163:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8164:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept_select)
 8165:                    end},
 8166:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
 8167:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8168:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
 8169:                            ok
 8170:                    end},
 8171:          #{desc => "await server ready (select)",
 8172:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8173:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, select)
 8174:                    end},
 8175:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 8176:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8177:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept)
 8178:                    end},
 8179:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 8180:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8181:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, connect)
 8182:                    end},
 8183: 
 8184:          #{desc => "order server to continue (recv request)",
 8185:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8186:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv_req),
 8187:                            ok
 8188:                    end},
 8189:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
 8190:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8191:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
 8192:                    end},
 8193:          #{desc => "order client to continue (send request)",
 8194:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8195:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_req),
 8196:                            ok
 8197:                    end},
 8198:          #{desc => "await client ready (send request)",
 8199:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8200:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 8201:                    end},
 8202:          #{desc => "await server ready (select)",
 8203:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8204:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, select)
 8205:                    end},
 8206:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv request)",
 8207:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8208:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_req)
 8209:                    end},
 8210: 
 8211:          #{desc => "order client to continue (recv reply)",
 8212:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8213:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv_rep),
 8214:                            ok
 8215:                    end},
 8216:          #{desc => "await client ready (recv select)",
 8217:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8218:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, recv_select)
 8219:                    end},
 8220:          #{desc => "order server to continue (send reply)",
 8221:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8222:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_rep),
 8223:                            ok
 8224:                    end},
 8225:          #{desc => "await server ready (send reply)",
 8226:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8227:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, send_rep)
 8228:                    end},
 8229:          #{desc => "await client ready (select)",
 8230:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8231:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, select)
 8232:                    end},
 8233:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
 8234:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8235:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_rep)
 8236:                    end},
 8237: 
 8238: 
 8239:          %% *** Termination ***
 8240:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 8241:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8242:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 8243:                            ok
 8244:                    end},
 8245:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 8246:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 8247:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 8248:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 8249:                            {ok, State1}
 8250:                    end},
 8251:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 8252:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8253:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 8254:                            ok
 8255:                    end},
 8256:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 8257:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 8258:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 8259:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 8260:                            {ok, State1}
 8261:                    end},
 8262: 
 8263:          %% *** We are done ***
 8264:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8265:         ],
 8266: 
 8267:     i("start server evaluator"),
 8268:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 8269: 
 8270:     i("start client evaluator"),
 8271:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 8272: 
 8273:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 8274:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 8275:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 8276:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 8277: 
 8278:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 8279:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 8280: 
 8281: 
 8282: 
 8283: 
 8284: 
 8285: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8286: 
 8287: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvfrom,
 8288: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
 8289: %%
 8290: api_a_recvfrom_cancel_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8291:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 8292:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8293:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8294:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 8295:            fun() ->
 8296:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8297:                                   case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait) of
 8298:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 8299:                                           OK;
 8300:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 8301:                                           SELECT;
 8302:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 8303:                                           COMPLETION;
 8304:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8305:                                           ERROR
 8306:                                   end
 8307:                           end,
 8308:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 8309:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8310:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8311:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState)
 8312:            end).
 8313: 
 8314: 
 8315: 
 8316: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8317: 
 8318: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvfrom,
 8319: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
 8320: %%
 8321: api_a_recvfrom_cancel_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8322:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 8323:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8324:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8325:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 8326:            fun() ->
 8327:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8328:                                   case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait) of
 8329:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 8330:                                           OK;
 8331:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 8332:                                           SELECT;
 8333:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 8334:                                           COMPLETION;
 8335:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8336:                                           ERROR
 8337:                                   end
 8338:                           end,
 8339:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 8340:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8341:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
