 8342:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState)
 8343:            end).
 8344: 
 8345: 
 8346: 
 8347: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8348: 
 8349: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvmsg,
 8350: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
 8351: %%
 8352: api_a_recvmsg_cancel_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8353:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 8354:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8355:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8356:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 8357:            fun() ->
 8358:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8359:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 8360:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 8361:                                           OK;
 8362:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 8363:                                           SELECT;
 8364:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 8365:                                           COMPLETION;
 8366:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8367:                                           ERROR
 8368:                                   end
 8369:                           end,
 8370:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 8371:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8372:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8373:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState)
 8374:            end).
 8375: 
 8376: 
 8377: 
 8378: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8379: 
 8380: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvmsg,
 8381: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
 8382: %%
 8383: api_a_recvmsg_cancel_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8384:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 8385:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8386:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8387:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 8388:            fun() ->
 8389:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8390:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 8391:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 8392:                                           OK;
 8393:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 8394:                                           SELECT;
 8395:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 8396:                                           COMPLETION;
 8397:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8398:                                           ERROR
 8399:                                   end
 8400:                           end,
 8401:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 8402:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8403:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8404:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState)
 8405:            end).
 8406: 
 8407: 
 8408: 
 8409: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8410: 
 8411: api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState) ->
 8412:     ServerSeq = 
 8413:         [
 8414:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 8415:          #{desc => "await start",
 8416:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 8417:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 8418:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 8419:                    end},
 8420:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 8421:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8422:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 8423:                            ok
 8424:                    end},
 8425: 
 8426:          %% *** Init part ***
 8427:          #{desc => "which local address",
 8428:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8429:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 8430:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 8431:                    end},
 8432:          #{desc => "create socket",
 8433:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8434:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
 8435:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 8436:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 8437:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8438:                                    ERROR
 8439:                            end
 8440:                    end},
 8441:          #{desc => "bind socket (to local address)",
 8442:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 8443:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 8444:                                ok ->
 8445:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 8446:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
 8447:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8448:                                    ERROR
 8449:                            end
 8450:                    end},
 8451:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 8452:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, port := Port}) ->
 8453:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 8454:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 8455:                            ok
 8456:                    end},
 8457: 
 8458:          %% The actual test
 8459:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 8460:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8461:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 8462:                    end},
 8463:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select|completion)",
 8464:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
 8465:                          recv     := Recv,
 8466:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
 8467:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 8468:                                {select, SI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
 8469:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
 8470:                                {select,
 8471:                                 {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
 8472:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 8473:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
 8474: 
 8475:                                {completion, CI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
 8476:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
 8477:                                {completion,
 8478:                                 {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
 8479:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 8480:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
 8481: 
 8482:                                {ok, X} ->
 8483:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 8484: 
 8485:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8486:                                    ERROR
 8487:                            end
 8488:                    end},
 8489:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 8490:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8491:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 8492:                            ok
 8493:                    end},
 8494:          #{desc => "wait for select message - without success",
 8495:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
 8496:                            receive
 8497:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
 8498:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
 8499: 
 8500:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, C} ->
 8501:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}}
 8502: 
 8503:                            after 5000 ->
 8504:                                    ok
 8505:                            end
 8506:                    end},
 8507:          #{desc => "announce ready (no select)",
 8508:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8509:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, no_select),
 8510:                            ok
 8511:                    end},
 8512:          #{desc => "await continue (cancel)",
 8513:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8514:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, cancel)
 8515:                    end},
 8516:          #{desc => "cancel",
 8517:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv_select_info := SI}) ->
 8518:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, SI);
 8519:                       (#{sock := Sock, recv_completion_info := CI}) ->
 8520:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, CI)
 8521:                    end},
 8522: 
 8523:          #{desc => "announce ready (cancel)",
 8524:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8525:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, cancel),
 8526:                            ok
 8527:                    end},
 8528: 
 8529:          %% Termination
 8530:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 8531:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 8532:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 8533:                                ok ->
 8534:                                    State2 = maps:remove(tester,   State),
 8535:                                    State3 = maps:remove(recv_ref, State2),
 8536:                                    State4 = maps:remove(req_src,  State3),
 8537:                                    {ok, State4};
 8538:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8539:                                    ERROR
 8540:                            end
 8541:                    end},
 8542:          #{desc => "close socket",
 8543:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 8544:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 8545:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 8546:                    end},
 8547: 
 8548:          %% *** We are done ***
 8549:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8550:         ],
 8551: 
 8552: 
 8553:     TesterSeq = 
 8554:         [
 8555:          %% *** Init part ***
 8556:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 8557:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8558:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 8559:                            ok
 8560:                    end},
 8561: 
 8562:          %% Start the server
 8563:          #{desc => "order server start",
 8564:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8565:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 8566:                            ok
 8567:                    end},
 8568:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 8569:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 8570:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 8571:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
 8572:                    end},
 8573: 
 8574:          %% The actual test
 8575:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
 8576:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8577:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 8578:                            ok
 8579:                    end},
 8580:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
 8581:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8582:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
 8583:                    end},
 8584:          #{desc => "await server ready (no select)",
 8585:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8586:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, no_select)
 8587:                    end},
 8588:          #{desc => "order server continue (cancel)",
 8589:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8590:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, cancel),
 8591:                            ok
 8592:                    end},
 8593:          #{desc => "await server ready (cancel)",
 8594:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8595:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, cancel)
 8596:                    end},
 8597: 
 8598:          %% Terminations
 8599:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 8600:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8601:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 8602:                            ok
 8603:                    end},
 8604:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 8605:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 8606:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 8607:                                ok ->
 8608:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 8609:                                    {ok, State1};
 8610:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8611:                                    ERROR
 8612:                            end
 8613:                    end},
 8614: 
 8615: 
 8616:          %% *** We are done ***
 8617:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8618:         ],
 8619: 
 8620:     i("start server evaluator"),
 8621:     ServerInitState = InitState,
 8622:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 8623: 
 8624:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 8625:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid},
 8626:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 8627: 
 8628:     i("await evaluator"),
 8629:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Tester]).
 8630: 
 8631: 
 8632: 
 8633: 
 8634: 
 8635: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8636: 
 8637: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to accept,
 8638: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
 8639: %%
 8640: api_a_accept_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8641:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 8642:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8643:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8644:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 8645:            fun() ->
 8646:                    Accept = fun(Sock) ->
 8647:                                     case socket:accept(Sock, Nowait) of
 8648:                                         {ok, _} = OK ->
 8649:                                             OK;
 8650:                                         {select, _} = SELECT ->
 8651:                                             SELECT;
 8652:                                         {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 8653:                                             COMPLETION;
 8654:                                         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8655:                                             ERROR
 8656:                                     end
 8657:                             end,
 8658:                    InitState = #{domain     => inet,
 8659:                                  accept     => Accept,
 8660:                                  accept_ref => Nowait},
 8661:                    ok = api_a_accept_cancel_tcp(InitState)
 8662:            end).
 8663: 
 8664: 
 8665: 
 8666: 
 8667: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8668: 
 8669: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to accept,
 8670: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
 8671: %%
 8672: api_a_accept_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8673:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 8674:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8675:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8676:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 8677:            fun() ->
 8678:                    Accept = fun(Sock) ->
 8679:                                     case socket:accept(Sock, Nowait) of
 8680:                                         {ok, _} = OK ->
 8681:                                             OK;
 8682:                                         {select, _} = SELECT ->
 8683:                                             SELECT;
 8684:                                         {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 8685:                                             COMPLETION;
 8686:                                         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8687:                                             ERROR
 8688:                                     end
 8689:                             end,
 8690:                    InitState = #{domain     => inet6,
 8691:                                  accept     => Accept,
 8692:                                  accept_ref => Nowait},
 8693:                    ok = api_a_accept_cancel_tcp(InitState)
 8694:            end).
 8695: 
 8696: 
 8697: 
 8698: 
 8699: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8700: 
 8701: api_a_accept_cancel_tcp(InitState) ->
 8702:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 8703:     ServerSeq = 
 8704:         [
 8705:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 8706:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 8707:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 8708:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 8709:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 8710:                    end},
 8711:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 8712:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8713:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 8714:                            ok
 8715:                    end},
 8716: 
 8717:          %% *** Init part ***
 8718:          #{desc => "which local address",
 8719:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8720:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 8721:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 8722:                    end},
 8723:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 8724:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8725:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
 8726:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 8727:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 8728:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8729:                                    ERROR
 8730:                            end
 8731:                    end},
 8732:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 8733:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 8734:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 8735:                                ok ->
 8736:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 8737:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 8738:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8739:                                    ERROR
 8740:                            end
 8741:                    end},
 8742:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 8743:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 8744:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 8745:                    end},
 8746:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 8747:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 8748:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 8749:                            ok
 8750:                    end},
 8751: 
 8752:          %% The actual test
 8753:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 8754:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8755:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 8756:                    end},
 8757:          #{desc => "await connection (nowait)",
 8758:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock      := LSock,
 8759:                          accept     := Accept,
 8760:                          accept_ref := Ref} = State) ->
 8761:                            case Accept(LSock) of
 8762:                                {select, {select_info, T, R} = SI}
 8763:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 8764:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept select nowait: "
 8765:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
 8766:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, R]),
 8767:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
 8768:                                {select, {select_info, T, Ref} = SI}
 8769:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 8770:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept select ref: "
 8771:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
 8772:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, Ref]),
 8773:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
 8774: 
 8775:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, R} = CI}
 8776:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 8777:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept completion nowait: "
 8778:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
 8779:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, R]),
 8780:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
 8781:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, Ref} = CI}
 8782:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 8783:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept completion ref: "
 8784:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
 8785:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, Ref]),
 8786:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
 8787: 
 8788:                                {ok, X} ->
 8789:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 8790: 
 8791:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8792:                                    ERROR
 8793:                            end
 8794:                    end},
 8795:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept_select)",
 8796:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8797:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept_select),
 8798:                            ok
 8799:                    end},
 8800:          #{desc => "await select message (without success)",
 8801:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
 8802:                            receive
 8803:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
 8804:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
 8805: 
 8806:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, C} ->
 8807:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}}
 8808: 
 8809:                            after 5000 ->
 8810:                                    ok
 8811:                            end
 8812:                    end},
 8813:          #{desc => "announce ready (no select)",
 8814:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8815:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, no_select),
 8816:                            ok
 8817:                    end},
 8818:          #{desc => "await continue (cancel)",
 8819:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8820:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, cancel)
 8821:                    end},
 8822:          #{desc => "cancel",
 8823:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock              := Sock,
 8824:                          accept_select_info := SelectInfo}) ->
 8825:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, SelectInfo);
 8826:                       (#{lsock                  := Sock,
 8827:                          accept_completion_info := CompletionInfo}) ->
 8828:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, CompletionInfo)
 8829:                    end},
 8830:          #{desc => "announce ready (cancel)",
 8831:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8832:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, cancel),
 8833:                            ok
 8834:                    end},
 8835: 
 8836:          %% *** Termination ***
 8837:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 8838:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 8839:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 8840:                                ok ->
 8841:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 8842:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8843:                                    ERROR
 8844:                            end
 8845:                    end},
 8846:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 8847:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
 8848:                            socket:close(Sock)
 8849:                    end},
 8850: 
 8851:          %% *** We are done ***
 8852:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8853:         ],
 8854: 
 8855: 
 8856:     TesterSeq =
 8857:         [
 8858:          %% *** Init part ***
 8859:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 8860:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8861:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 8862:                            ok
 8863:                    end},
 8864: 
 8865:          %% Start the server
 8866:          #{desc => "order server start",
 8867:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8868:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 8869:                            ok
 8870:                    end},
 8871:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 8872:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 8873:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 8874:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 8875:                    end},
 8876: 
 8877:          %% *** The actual test ***
 8878:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 8879:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8880:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 8881:                            ok
 8882:                    end},
 8883:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept select)",
 8884:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8885:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept_select)
 8886:                    end},
 8887:          #{desc => "await server ready (no select)",
 8888:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8889:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, no_select)
 8890:                    end},
 8891:          #{desc => "order server to continue (cancel)",
 8892:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8893:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, cancel),
 8894:                            ok
 8895:                    end},
 8896:          #{desc => "await server ready (cancel)",
 8897:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8898:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, cancel)
 8899:                    end},
 8900: 
 8901:          %% *** Termination ***
 8902:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 8903:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8904:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 8905:                            ok
 8906:                    end},
 8907:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 8908:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 8909:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 8910:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 8911:                            {ok, State1}
 8912:                    end},
 8913: 
 8914:          %% *** We are done ***
 8915:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8916:         ],
 8917: 
 8918:     i("start server evaluator"),
 8919:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 8920: 
 8921:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 8922:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid},
 8923:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 8924: 
 8925:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 8926:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Tester]).
 8927: 
 8928: 
 8929: 
 8930: 
 8931: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8932: 
 8933: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recv,
 8934: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
 8935: %%
 8936: api_a_recv_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8937:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 8938:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8939:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8940:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 8941:            fun() ->
 8942:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8943:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 8944:                           end,
 8945:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 8946:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8947:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8948:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
 8949:            end).
 8950: 
 8951: 
 8952: 
 8953: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8954: 
 8955: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recv,
 8956: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
 8957: %%
 8958: api_a_recv_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8959:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 8960:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8961:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8962:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 8963:            fun() ->
 8964:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8965:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 8966:                           end,
 8967:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 8968:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8969:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8970:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
 8971:            end).
 8972: 
 8973: 
 8974: 
 8975: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8976: 
 8977: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvmsg,
 8978: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
 8979: %%
 8980: api_a_recvmsg_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8981:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 8982:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8983:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8984:            fun() ->
 8985:                    is_not_windows(),
 8986:                    has_support_ipv4()
 8987:            end,
 8988:            fun() ->
 8989:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8990:                                   socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait)
 8991:                           end,
 8992:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 8993:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8994:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8995:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
 8996:            end).
 8997: 
 8998: 
 8999: 
 9000: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9001: 
 9002: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvmsg,
 9003: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
 9004: %%
 9005: api_a_recvmsg_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9006:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 9007:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9008:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 9009:            fun() ->
 9010:                    is_not_windows(),
 9011:                    has_support_ipv6()
 9012:            end,
 9013:            fun() ->
 9014:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9015:                                   socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait)
 9016:                           end,
 9017:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 9018:                                  recv     => Recv,
 9019:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 9020:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
 9021:            end).
 9022: 
 9023: 
 9024: 
 9025: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9026: 
 9027: api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState) ->
 9028:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 9029:     ServerSeq = 
 9030:         [
 9031:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 9032:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 9033:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 9034:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 9035:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 9036:                    end},
 9037:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 9038:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9039:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 9040:                            ok
 9041:                    end},
 9042: 
 9043:          %% *** Init part ***
 9044:          #{desc => "which local address",
 9045:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 9046:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 9047:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 9048:                    end},
 9049:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 9050:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 9051:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
 9052:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 9053:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 9054:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9055:                                    ERROR
 9056:                            end
 9057:                    end},
 9058:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 9059:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 9060:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 9061:                                ok ->
 9062:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 9063:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 9064:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9065:                                    ERROR
 9066:                            end
 9067:                    end},
 9068:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 9069:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 9070:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 9071:                    end},
 9072:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 9073:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 9074:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 9075:                            ok
 9076:                    end},
 9077: 
 9078:          %% The actual test
 9079:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 9080:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9081:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 9082:                    end},
 9083:          #{desc => "await connection",
 9084:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 9085:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 9086:                                {ok, CSock} ->
 9087:                                    {ok, State#{csock => CSock}};
 9088:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9089:                                    ERROR
 9090:                            end
 9091:                    end},
 9092:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 9093:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9094:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 9095:                            ok
 9096:                    end},
 9097: 
 9098:          #{desc => "await continue (nowait recv)",
 9099:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9100:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 9101:                    end},
 9102: 
 9103:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select|completion)",
 9104:            cmd  => fun(#{csock    := Sock,
 9105:                          recv     := Recv,
 9106:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
 9107:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 9108:                                {select, {select_info, T, R} = SI}
 9109:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 9110:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
 9111:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9112:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, R]),
 9113:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
 9114:                                {select, {select_info, T, Ref} = SI}
 9115:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 9116:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select ref: "
 9117:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9118:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, Ref]),
 9119:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
 9120: 
 9121:                                {completion,
 9122:                                 {completion_info, T, R} = CI}
 9123:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 9124:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
 9125:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9126:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, R]),
 9127:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
 9128:                                {completion,
 9129:                                 {completion_info, T, Ref} = CI}
 9130:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 9131:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion ref: "
 9132:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9133:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, Ref]),
 9134:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
 9135: 
 9136:                                {ok, X} ->
 9137:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 9138: 
 9139:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9140:                                    ERROR
 9141:                            end
 9142:                    end},
 9143:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 9144:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9145:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 9146:                            ok
 9147:                    end},
 9148:          #{desc => "await select message",
 9149:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock}) ->
 9150:                            receive
 9151:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
 9152:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
 9153: 
 9154:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, C} ->
 9155:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}}
 9156: 
 9157:                            after 5000 ->
 9158:                                    ok
 9159:                            end
 9160:                    end},
 9161:          #{desc => "announce ready (no select)",
 9162:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9163:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, no_select),
 9164:                            ok
 9165:                    end},
 9166:          #{desc => "await continue (cancel)",
 9167:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9168:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, cancel)
 9169:                    end},
 9170:          #{desc => "cancel",
 9171:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv_select_info := SI}) ->
 9172:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, SI);
 9173: 
 9174:                       (#{csock := Sock, recv_completion_info := CI}) ->
 9175:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, CI)
 9176:                    end},
 9177:          #{desc => "announce ready (cancel)",
 9178:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9179:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, cancel),
 9180:                            ok
 9181:                    end},
 9182: 
 9183:          %% *** Termination ***
 9184:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 9185:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 9186:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 9187:                                ok ->
 9188:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 9189:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9190:                                    ERROR
 9191:                            end
 9192:                    end},
 9193:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 9194:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock}) ->
 9195:                            socket:close(Sock)
 9196:                    end},
 9197:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 9198:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
 9199:                            socket:close(Sock)
 9200:                    end},
 9201: 
 9202:          %% *** We are done ***
 9203:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9204:         ],
 9205: 
 9206: 
 9207:     ClientSeq = 
 9208:         [
 9209:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 9210:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 9211:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 9212:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 9213:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 9214:                    end},
 9215:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 9216:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9217:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 9218:                            ok
 9219:                    end},
 9220: 
 9221:          %% *** The init part ***
 9222:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 9223:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 9224:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 9225:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 9226:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 9227:                    end},
 9228:          #{desc => "create socket",
 9229:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 9230:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
 9231:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 9232:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 9233:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9234:                                    ERROR
 9235:                            end
 9236:                    end},
 9237:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 9238:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 9239:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 9240:                                ok ->
 9241:                                    ok;
 9242:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9243:                                    ERROR
 9244:                            end
 9245:                    end},
 9246:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 9247:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9248:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 9249:                            ok
 9250:                    end},
 9251: 
 9252:          %% *** The actual test ***
 9253:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 9254:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9255:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 9256:                    end},
 9257:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 9258:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 9259:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
 9260:                    end},
 9261:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 9262:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9263:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 9264:                            ok
 9265:                    end},
 9266: 
 9267:          %% *** Termination ***
 9268:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 9269:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 9270:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 9271:                                ok ->
 9272:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 9273:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9274:                                    ERROR
 9275:                            end
 9276:                    end},
 9277:          #{desc => "close socket",
 9278:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
 9279:                            socket:close(Sock)
 9280:                    end},
 9281: 
 9282:          %% *** We are done ***
 9283:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9284:         ],
 9285: 
 9286:     TesterSeq =
 9287:         [
 9288:          %% *** Init part ***
 9289:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 9290:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9291:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 9292:                            ok
 9293:                    end},
 9294:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 9295:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9296:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 9297:                            ok
 9298:                    end},
 9299: 
 9300:          %% Start the server
 9301:          #{desc => "order server start",
 9302:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9303:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 9304:                            ok
 9305:                    end},
 9306:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 9307:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 9308:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 9309:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 9310:                    end},
 9311: 
 9312:          %% Start the client
 9313:          #{desc => "order client start",
 9314:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 9315:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 9316:                            ok
 9317:                    end},
 9318:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 9319:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9320:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 9321:                    end},
 9322: 
 9323:          %% *** The actual test ***
 9324:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 9325:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 9326:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 9327:                            ok
 9328:                    end},
 9329:          #{desc => "order client to continue (connect)",
 9330:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9331:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
 9332:                            ok
 9333:                    end},
 9334:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 9335:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9336:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, connect)
 9337:                    end},
 9338:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 9339:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9340:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept)
 9341:                    end},
 9342: 
 9343:          #{desc => "order server to continue (recv)",
 9344:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9345:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 9346:                            ok
 9347:                    end},
 9348:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
 9349:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9350:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
 9351:                    end},
 9352:          #{desc => "await server ready (no select)",
 9353:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9354:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, no_select)
 9355:                    end},
 9356:          #{desc => "order server to continue (send request)",
 9357:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9358:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, cancel),
 9359:                            ok
 9360:                    end},
 9361:          #{desc => "await server ready (cancel)",
 9362:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9363:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, cancel)
 9364:                    end},
 9365: 
 9366:          %% *** Termination ***
 9367:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 9368:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 9369:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 9370:                            ok
 9371:                    end},
 9372:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 9373:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 9374:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 9375:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 9376:                            {ok, State1}
 9377:                    end},
 9378:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 9379:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 9380:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 9381:                            ok
 9382:                    end},
 9383:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 9384:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 9385:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 9386:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 9387:                            {ok, State1}
 9388:                    end},
 9389: 
 9390:          %% *** We are done ***
 9391:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9392:         ],
 9393: 
 9394:     i("start server evaluator"),
 9395:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 9396: 
 9397:     i("start client evaluator"),
 9398:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 9399: 
 9400:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 9401:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 9402:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 9403:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 9404: 
 9405:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 9406:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 9407: 
 9408: 
 9409: 
 9410: 
 9411: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9412: 
 9413: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvfrom
 9414: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel.
 9415: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
 9416: %%
 9417: api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9418:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
 9419:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9420:     tc_try(api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp4,
 9421:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 9422:            fun() ->
 9423:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9424:                                   case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait) of
 9425:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 9426:                                           OK;
 9427:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 9428:                                           SELECT;
 9429:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 9430:                                           COMPLETION;
 9431:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9432:                                           ERROR
 9433:                                   end
 9434:                           end,
 9435:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 9436:                                  recv     => Recv,
 9437:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 9438:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState)
 9439:            end).
 9440: 
 9441: 
 9442: 
 9443: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9444: 
 9445: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvfrom
 9446: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel.
 9447: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
 9448: %%
 9449: api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9450:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
 9451:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9452:     tc_try(api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp6,
 9453:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 9454:            fun() ->
 9455:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9456:                                   case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait) of
 9457:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 9458:                                           OK;
 9459:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 9460:                                           SELECT;
 9461:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 9462:                                           COMPLETION;
 9463:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9464:                                           ERROR
 9465:                                   end
 9466:                           end,
 9467:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 9468:                                  recv     => Recv,
 9469:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 9470:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState)
 9471:            end).
 9472: 
 9473: 
 9474: 
 9475: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9476: 
 9477: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvmsg
 9478: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel.
 9479: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
 9480: %%
 9481: api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9482:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
 9483:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9484:     tc_try(api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp4,
 9485:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 9486:            fun() ->
 9487:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9488:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 9489:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 9490:                                           OK;
 9491:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 9492:                                           SELECT;
 9493:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 9494:                                           COMPLETION;
 9495:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9496:                                           ERROR
 9497:                                   end
 9498:                           end,
 9499:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 9500:                                  recv     => Recv,
 9501:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 9502:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState)
 9503:            end).
 9504: 
 9505: 
 9506: 
 9507: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9508: 
 9509: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvmsg
 9510: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel.
 9511: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
 9512: %%
 9513: api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9514:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
 9515:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9516:     tc_try(api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp6,
 9517:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 9518:            fun() ->
 9519:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9520:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 9521:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 9522:                                           OK;
 9523:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 9524:                                           SELECT;
 9525:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 9526:                                           COMPLETION;
 9527:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9528:                                           ERROR
 9529:                                   end
 9530:                           end,
 9531:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 9532:                                  recv     => Recv,
 9533:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 9534:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState)
 9535:            end).
 9536: 
 9537: 
 9538: 
 9539: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9540: 
 9541: api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState) ->
 9542:     ServerSeq = 
 9543:         [
 9544:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 9545:          #{desc => "await start",
 9546:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 9547:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 9548:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 9549:                    end},
 9550:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 9551:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9552:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 9553:                            ok
 9554:                    end},
 9555: 
 9556:          %% *** Init part ***
 9557:          #{desc => "which local address",
 9558:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 9559:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 9560:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 9561:                    end},
 9562:          #{desc => "create socket",
 9563:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 9564:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
 9565:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 9566:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 9567:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9568:                                    ERROR
 9569:                            end
 9570:                    end},
 9571:          #{desc => "bind socket (to local address)",
 9572:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 9573:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 9574:                                ok ->
 9575:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 9576:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
 9577:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9578:                                    ERROR
 9579:                            end
 9580:                    end},
 9581:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 9582:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock}) ->
 9583:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
 9584:                            ok
 9585:                    end},
 9586: 
 9587:          %% The actual test
 9588:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 9589:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9590:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 9591:                    end},
 9592:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
 9593:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
 9594:                          recv     := Recv,
 9595:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
 9596:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 9597:                                {select, SI}
 9598:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 9599:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
 9600:                                {select, {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
 9601:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 9602:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
 9603: 
 9604:                                {completion, CI}
 9605:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 9606:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
 9607:                                {completion, {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
 9608:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 9609:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
 9610: 
 9611:                                {ok, X} ->
 9612:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 9613: 
 9614:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9615:                                    ERROR
 9616:                            end
 9617:                    end},
 9618:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 9619:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9620:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 9621:                            ok
 9622:                    end},
 9623:          #{desc => "await abort message",
 9624:            cmd  => fun(#{sock             := Sock,
 9625:                          recv_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} =
 9626:                            State) ->
 9627:                            receive
 9628:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
 9629:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
 9630:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
 9631:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 9632:                            after 5000 ->
 9633:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [?MQ()]),
 9634:                                    {error, timeout}
 9635:                            end;
 9636:                       (#{sock                 := Sock,
 9637:                          recv_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = 
 9638:                            State) ->
 9639:                            receive
 9640:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, CS}} ->
 9641:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, CS}};
 9642:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
 9643:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 9644:                            after 5000 ->
 9645:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [?MQ()]),
 9646:                                    {error, timeout}
 9647:                            end
 9648:                    end},
 9649:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
 9650:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9651:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
 9652:                            ok
 9653:                    end},
 9654: 
 9655:          %% Termination
 9656:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 9657:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 9658:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 9659:                                ok ->
 9660:                                    State2 = maps:remove(tester,   State),
 9661:                                    State3 = maps:remove(recv_ref, State2),
 9662:                                    {ok, State3};
 9663:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9664:                                    ERROR
 9665:                            end
 9666:                    end},
 9667: 
 9668:          %% *** We are done ***
 9669:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9670:         ],
 9671: 
 9672: 
 9673:     AltServerSeq = 
 9674:         [
 9675:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 9676:          #{desc => "await start",
 9677:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 9678:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 9679:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, sock => Sock}}
 9680:                    end},
 9681:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 9682:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9683:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 9684:                            ok
 9685:                    end},
 9686:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 9687:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9688:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 9689:                            ok
 9690:                    end},
 9691: 
 9692:          %% The actual test
 9693:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 9694:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9695:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 9696:                    end},
 9697:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
 9698:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
 9699:                          recv     := Recv,
 9700:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
 9701:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 9702:                                {select, SI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
 9703:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
 9704:                                {select,
 9705:                                 {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
 9706:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 9707:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
 9708: 
 9709:                                {completion, CI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
 9710:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
 9711:                                {completion,
 9712:                                 {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
 9713:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 9714:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
 9715: 
 9716:                                {ok, X} ->
 9717:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 9718: 
 9719:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9720:                                    ERROR
 9721:                            end
 9722:                    end},
 9723:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 9724:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9725:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 9726:                            ok
 9727:                    end},
 9728:          #{desc => "await abort message",
 9729:            cmd  => fun(#{sock             := Sock,
 9730:                          recv_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
 9731:                            receive
 9732:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
 9733:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
 9734:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
 9735:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 9736:                            after 5000 ->
 9737:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [?MQ()]),
 9738:                                    {error, timeout}
 9739:                            end;
 9740: 
 9741:                       (#{sock                 := Sock,
 9742:                          recv_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} =
 9743:                            State) ->
 9744:                            receive
 9745:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, CS}} ->
 9746:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, CS}};
 9747:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
 9748:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 9749:                            after 5000 ->
 9750:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [?MQ()]),
 9751:                                    {error, timeout}
 9752:                            end
 9753:                    end},
 9754:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
 9755:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9756:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
 9757:                            ok
 9758:                    end},
 9759: 
 9760:          %% Termination
 9761:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 9762:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 9763:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 9764:                                ok ->
 9765:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
 9766:                                    State1 = maps:remove(recv_select_info, State),
 9767:                                    State2 = maps:remove(recv_completion_info, State1),
 9768:                                    State3 = maps:remove(tester,           State2),
 9769:                                    State4 = maps:remove(sock,             State3),
 9770:                                    {ok, State4};
 9771:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9772:                                    ERROR
 9773:                            end
 9774:                    end},
 9775: 
 9776:          %% *** We are done ***
 9777:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9778:         ],
 9779: 
 9780: 
 9781: 
 9782:     TesterSeq = 
 9783:         [
 9784:          %% *** Init part ***
 9785:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 9786:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9787:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 9788:                            ok
 9789:                    end},
 9790:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 1",
 9791:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9792:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 9793:                            ok
 9794:                    end},
 9795:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 2",
 9796:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9797:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 9798:                            ok
 9799:                    end},
 9800: 
 9801:          %% Start the server
 9802:          #{desc => "order server start",
 9803:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9804:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 9805:                            ok
 9806:                    end},
 9807:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 9808:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 9809:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 9810:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
 9811:                    end},
 9812: 
 9813:          %% Start the alt-server 1
 9814:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 start",
 9815:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 9816:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
 9817:                            ok
 9818:                    end},
 9819:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (init)",
 9820:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9821:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, init)
 9822:                    end},
 9823: 
 9824:          %% Start the alt-server 2
 9825:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 start",
 9826:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 9827:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
 9828:                            ok
 9829:                    end},
 9830:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (init)",
 9831:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9832:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, init)
 9833:                    end},
 9834: 
 9835: 
 9836:          %% The actual test
 9837:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
 9838:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9839:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 9840:                            ok
 9841:                    end},
 9842:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
 9843:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9844:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
 9845:                    end},
 9846: 
 9847:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 continue (recv)",
 9848:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9849:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 9850:                            ok
 9851:                    end},
 9852:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (recv select)",
 9853:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9854:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, recv_select)
 9855:                    end},
 9856: 
 9857:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 continue (recv)",
 9858:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9859:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 9860:                            ok
 9861:                    end},
 9862:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (recv select)",
 9863:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9864:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, recv_select)
 9865:                    end},
 9866: 
 9867:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 9868: 
 9869:          #{desc => "close the socket",
 9870:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 9871:                            socket:close(Sock)
 9872:                    end},
 9873: 
 9874:          #{desc => "await server ready (abort)",
 9875:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9876:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, abort)
 9877:                    end},
 9878:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (abort)",
 9879:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9880:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, abort)
 9881:                    end},
 9882:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (abort)",
 9883:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9884:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, abort)
 9885:                    end},
 9886: 
 9887:          %% Terminations
 9888:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 to terminate",
 9889:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9890:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 9891:                            ok
 9892:                    end},
 9893:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 termination",
 9894:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = State) ->
 9895:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 9896:                                ok ->
 9897:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server2, State),
 9898:                                    {ok, State1};
 9899:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9900:                                    ERROR
 9901:                            end
 9902:                    end},
 9903: 
 9904:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 to terminate",
 9905:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 9906:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 9907:                            ok
 9908:                    end},
 9909:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 termination",
 9910:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = State) ->
 9911:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 9912:                                ok ->
 9913:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server1, State),
 9914:                                    {ok, State1};
 9915:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9916:                                    ERROR
 9917:                            end
 9918:                    end},
 9919: 
 9920:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 9921:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9922:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 9923:                            ok
 9924:                    end},
 9925:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 9926:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 9927:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 9928:                                ok ->
 9929:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 9930:                                    {ok, State1};
 9931:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9932:                                    ERROR
 9933:                            end
 9934:                    end},
 9935: 
 9936: 
 9937:          %% *** We are done ***
 9938:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9939:         ],
 9940: 
 9941:     i("start server evaluator"),
 9942:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 9943: 
 9944:     i("start alt-server 1 evaluator"),
 9945:     AltServer1 = ?SEV_START("alt_server1", AltServerSeq, InitState),
 9946: 
 9947:     i("start alt-server 2 evaluator"),
 9948:     AltServer2 = ?SEV_START("alt_server2", AltServerSeq, InitState),
 9949: 
 9950:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 9951:     TesterInitState = #{server      => Server#ev.pid,
 9952:                         alt_server1 => AltServer1#ev.pid,
 9953:                         alt_server2 => AltServer2#ev.pid},
 9954:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 9955: 
 9956:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 9957:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, AltServer1, AltServer2, Tester]).
 9958: 
 9959: 
 9960: 
 9961: 
 9962: 
 9963: 
 9964: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9965: 
 9966: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to accept
 9967: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
 9968: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
 9969: %%
 9970: api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9971:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
 9972:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9973:     tc_try(api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp4,
 9974:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 9975:            fun() ->
 9976:                    Accept = fun(Sock) ->
 9977:                                     case socket:accept(Sock, Nowait) of
 9978:                                         {ok, _} = OK ->
 9979:                                             OK;
 9980:                                         {select, _} = SELECT ->
 9981:                                             SELECT;
 9982:                                         {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 9983:                                             COMPLETION;
 9984:                                         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9985:                                             ERROR
 9986:                                     end
 9987:                             end,
 9988:                    InitState = #{domain     => inet,
