 9989:                                  accept     => Accept,
 9990:                                  accept_ref => Nowait},
 9991:                    ok = api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp(InitState)
 9992:            end).
 9993: 
 9994: 
 9995: 
 9996: 
 9997: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9998: 
 9999: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to accept
10000: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
10001: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
10002: %%
10003: api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10004:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
10005:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10006:     tc_try(api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp6,
10007:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
10008:            fun() ->
10009:                    Accept = fun(Sock) ->
10010:                                     case socket:accept(Sock, Nowait) of
10011:                                         {ok, _} = OK ->
10012:                                             OK;
10013:                                         {select, _} = SELECT ->
10014:                                             SELECT;
10015:                                         {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
10016:                                             COMPLETION;
10017:                                         {error, _} = ERROR ->
10018:                                             ERROR
10019:                                     end
10020:                             end,
10021:                    InitState = #{domain     => inet6,
10022:                                  accept     => Accept,
10023:                                  accept_ref => Nowait},
10024:                    ok = api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10025:            end).
10026: 
10027: 
10028: 
10029: 
10030: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10031: 
10032: api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp(InitState) ->
10033:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
10034:     ServerSeq = 
10035:         [
10036:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
10037:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
10038:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
10039:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
10040:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
10041:                    end},
10042:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
10043:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10044:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
10045:                            ok
10046:                    end},
10047: 
10048:          %% *** Init part ***
10049:          #{desc => "which local address",
10050:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10051:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
10052:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
10053:                    end},
10054:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
10055:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10056:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
10057:                                {ok, Sock} ->
10058:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
10059:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10060:                                    ERROR
10061:                            end
10062:                    end},
10063:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
10064:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
10065:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
10066:                                ok ->
10067:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
10068:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
10069:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10070:                                    ERROR
10071:                            end
10072:                    end},
10073:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
10074:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
10075:                            socket:listen(LSock)
10076:                    end},
10077:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
10078:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lsock := Sock}) ->
10079:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
10080:                            ok
10081:                    end},
10082: 
10083:          %% The actual test
10084:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
10085:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10086:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
10087:                    end},
10088:          #{desc => "await connection (nowait)",
10089:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock      := LSock,
10090:                          accept     := Accept,
10091:                          accept_ref := Ref} = State) ->
10092:                            case Accept(LSock) of
10093:                                {select, {select_info, T, R} = SI}
10094:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
10095:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept select nowait: "
10096:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
10097:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, R]),
10098:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
10099:                                {select, {select_info, T, Ref} = SI}
10100:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10101:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept select ref: "
10102:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
10103:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, Ref]),
10104:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
10105: 
10106:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, R} = CI}
10107:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
10108:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept completion nowait: "
10109:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
10110:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, R]),
10111:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
10112:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, Ref} = CI}
10113:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10114:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept completion ref: "
10115:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
10116:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, Ref]),
10117:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
10118: 
10119:                                {ok, X} ->
10120:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
10121: 
10122:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10123:                                    ERROR
10124:                            end
10125:                    end},
10126:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept_select)",
10127:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10128:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept_select),
10129:                            ok
10130:                    end},
10131:          #{desc => "await select message (without success)",
10132:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock              := Sock,
10133:                          accept_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
10134:                            receive
10135:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
10136:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
10137:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
10138:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
10139:                            after 5000 ->
10140:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
10141:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
10142:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
10143:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
10144:                                                [Sock, Ref, ?MQ()]),
10145:                                    {error, timeout}
10146:                            end;
10147:                       (#{lsock                  := Sock,
10148:                          accept_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
10149:                            receive
10150:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, _} = C} ->
10151:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}};
10152:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
10153:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
10154:                            after 5000 ->
10155:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
10156:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
10157:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
10158:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
10159:                                                [Sock, Ref, ?MQ()]),
10160:                                    {error, timeout}
10161:                            end
10162:                    end},
10163:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
10164:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10165:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
10166:                            ok
10167:                    end},
10168: 
10169:          %% *** Termination ***
10170:          #{desc => "await terminate",
10171:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
10172:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
10173:                                ok ->
10174:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
10175:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10176:                                    ERROR
10177:                            end
10178:                    end},
10179: 
10180:          %% *** We are done ***
10181:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10182:         ],
10183: 
10184: 
10185:     AltServerSeq =
10186:         [
10187:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
10188:          #{desc => "await start",
10189:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
10190:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
10191:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, lsock => Sock}}
10192:                    end},
10193:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
10194:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10195:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
10196:                            ok
10197:                    end},
10198:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
10199:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10200:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
10201:                            ok
10202:                    end},
10203: 
10204:          %% The actual test
10205:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
10206:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10207:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
10208:                    end},
10209:          #{desc => "try accept request (with nowait, expect select)",
10210:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock      := Sock,
10211:                          accept     := Accept,
10212:                          accept_ref := Ref} = State) ->
10213:                            case Accept(Sock) of
10214:                                {select, SI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
10215:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
10216:                                {select, {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
10217:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10218:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
10219: 
10220:                                {completion, CI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
10221:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
10222:                                {completion, {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
10223:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10224:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
10225: 
10226:                                {ok, X} ->
10227:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
10228: 
10229:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10230:                                    ERROR
10231:                            end
10232:                    end},
10233:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept_select)",
10234:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10235:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept_select),
10236:                            ok
10237:                    end},
10238:          #{desc => "await abort message",
10239:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock              := Sock,
10240:                          accept_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
10241:                            receive
10242:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
10243:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
10244:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
10245:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
10246:                            after 5000 ->
10247:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
10248:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
10249:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
10250:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
10251:                                                [Sock, Ref, ?MQ()]),
10252:                                    {error, timeout}
10253:                            end;
10254:                       (#{lsock              := Sock,
10255:                          accept_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
10256:                            receive
10257:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, _} = C} ->
10258:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}};
10259:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
10260:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
10261:                            after 5000 ->
10262:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
10263:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
10264:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
10265:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
10266:                                                [Sock, Ref, ?MQ()]),
10267:                                    {error, timeout}
10268:                            end
10269:                    end},
10270:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
10271:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10272:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
10273:                            ok
10274:                    end},
10275: 
10276:          %% Termination
10277:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
10278:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
10279:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
10280:                                ok ->
10281:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
10282:                                    State1 = maps:remove(tester,             State),
10283:                                    State2 = maps:remove(accept_select_info, State1),
10284:                                    State3 = maps:remove(accept_completion_info, State2),
10285:                                    State4 = maps:remove(lsock,              State3),
10286:                                    {ok, State4};
10287:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10288:                                    ERROR
10289:                            end
10290:                    end},
10291: 
10292:          %% *** We are done ***
10293:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10294:         ],
10295: 
10296: 
10297:     TesterSeq =
10298:         [
10299:          %% *** Init part ***
10300:          #{desc => "monitor server",
10301:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10302:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
10303:                            ok
10304:                    end},
10305:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 1",
10306:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
10307:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
10308:                            ok
10309:                    end},
10310:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 2",
10311:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
10312:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
10313:                            ok
10314:                    end},
10315: 
10316:          %% Start the server
10317:          #{desc => "order server start",
10318:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10319:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
10320:                            ok
10321:                    end},
10322:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
10323:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
10324:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
10325:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
10326:                    end},
10327: 
10328:          %% Start the alt-server 1
10329:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 start",
10330:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
10331:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
10332:                            ok
10333:                    end},
10334:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (init)",
10335:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
10336:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, init)
10337:                    end},
10338: 
10339:          %% Start the alt-server 2
10340:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 start",
10341:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
10342:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
10343:                            ok
10344:                    end},
10345:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (init)",
10346:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
10347:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, init)
10348:                    end},
10349: 
10350: 
10351:          %% *** The actual test ***
10352:          #{desc => "order server continue (accept)",
10353:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10354:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
10355:                            ok
10356:                    end},
10357:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept select)",
10358:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10359:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept_select)
10360:                    end},
10361: 
10362:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 continue (accept)",
10363:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
10364:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
10365:                            ok
10366:                    end},
10367:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (accept select)",
10368:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
10369:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, accept_select)
10370:                    end},
10371: 
10372:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 continue (accept)",
10373:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
10374:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
10375:                            ok
10376:                    end},
10377:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (accept select)",
10378:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
10379:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, accept_select)
10380:                    end},
10381: 
10382:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
10383: 
10384:          #{desc => "close the socket",
10385:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
10386:                            socket:close(Sock)
10387:                    end},
10388: 
10389:          #{desc => "await server ready (abort)",
10390:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10391:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, abort)
10392:                    end},
10393:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (abort)",
10394:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
10395:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, abort)
10396:                    end},
10397:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (abort)",
10398:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
10399:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, abort)
10400:                    end},
10401: 
10402: 
10403:          %% *** Termination ***
10404:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 to terminate",
10405:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
10406:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
10407:                            ok
10408:                    end},
10409:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 termination",
10410:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = State) ->
10411:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
10412:                                ok ->
10413:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server2, State),
10414:                                    {ok, State1};
10415:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10416:                                    ERROR
10417:                            end
10418:                    end},
10419: 
10420:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 to terminate",
10421:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
10422:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
10423:                            ok
10424:                    end},
10425:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 termination",
10426:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = State) ->
10427:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
10428:                                ok ->
10429:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server1, State),
10430:                                    {ok, State1};
10431:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10432:                                    ERROR
10433:                            end
10434:                    end},
10435: 
10436:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
10437:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
10438:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
10439:                            ok
10440:                    end},
10441:          #{desc => "await server termination",
10442:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
10443:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
10444:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
10445:                            {ok, State1}
10446:                    end},
10447: 
10448:          %% *** We are done ***
10449:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10450:         ],
10451: 
10452:     i("start server evaluator"),
10453:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
10454: 
10455:     i("start alt-server 1 evaluator"),
10456:     AltServer1 = ?SEV_START("alt_server1", AltServerSeq, InitState),
10457: 
10458:     i("start alt-server 2 evaluator"),
10459:     AltServer2 = ?SEV_START("alt_server2", AltServerSeq, InitState),
10460: 
10461:     i("start tester evaluator"),
10462:     TesterInitState = #{server      => Server#ev.pid,
10463:                         alt_server1 => AltServer1#ev.pid,
10464:                         alt_server2 => AltServer2#ev.pid},
10465:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
10466: 
10467:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
10468:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, AltServer1, AltServer2, Tester]).
10469: 
10470: 
10471: 
10472: 
10473: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10474: 
10475: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recv
10476: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
10477: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
10478: %%
10479: api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10480:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
10481:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10482:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10483:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
10484:            fun() ->
10485:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10486:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
10487:                           end,
10488:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
10489:                                  recv     => Recv,
10490:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10491:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10492:            end).
10493: 
10494: 
10495: 
10496: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10497: 
10498: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recv
10499: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
10500: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
10501: %%
10502: api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10503:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
10504:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10505:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10506:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
10507:            fun() ->
10508:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10509:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
10510:                           end,
10511:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
10512:                                  recv     => Recv,
10513:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10514:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10515:            end).
10516: 
10517: 
10518: 
10519: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10520: 
10521: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvmsg
10522: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
10523: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
10524: %%
10525: api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10526:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
10527:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10528:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10529:            fun() ->
10530:                    is_not_windows(),
10531:                    has_support_ipv4()
10532:            end,
10533:            fun() ->
10534:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10535:                                   socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait)
10536:                           end,
10537:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
10538:                                  recv     => Recv,
10539:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10540:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10541:            end).
10542: 
10543: 
10544: 
10545: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10546: 
10547: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvmsg
10548: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
10549: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
10550: %%
10551: api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10552:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
10553:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10554:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10555:            fun() ->
10556:                    is_not_windows(),
10557:                    has_support_ipv6()
10558:            end,
10559:            fun() ->
10560:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10561:                                   socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait)
10562:                           end,
10563:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
10564:                                  recv     => Recv,
10565:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10566:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10567:            end).
10568: 
10569: 
10570: 
10571: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10572: 
10573: api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState) ->
10574:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
10575:     ServerSeq = 
10576:         [
10577:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
10578:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
10579:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
10580:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
10581:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
10582:                    end},
10583:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
10584:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10585:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
10586:                            ok
10587:                    end},
10588: 
10589:          %% *** Init part ***
10590:          #{desc => "which local address",
10591:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10592:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
10593:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
10594:                    end},
10595:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
10596:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10597:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
10598:                                {ok, Sock} ->
10599:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
10600:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10601:                                    ERROR
10602:                            end
10603:                    end},
10604:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
10605:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
10606:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
10607:                                ok ->
10608:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
10609:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
10610:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10611:                                    ERROR
10612:                            end
10613:                    end},
10614:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
10615:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
10616:                            socket:listen(LSock)
10617:                    end},
10618:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
10619:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
10620:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
10621:                            ok
10622:                    end},
10623: 
10624:          %% The actual test
10625:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
10626:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10627:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
10628:                    end},
10629:          #{desc => "await connection",
10630:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
10631:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
10632:                                {ok, CSock} ->
10633:                                    {ok, State#{csock => CSock}};
10634:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10635:                                    ERROR
10636:                            end
10637:                    end},
10638:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
10639:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, csock := Sock}) ->
10640:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept, Sock),
10641:                            ok
10642:                    end},
10643: 
10644:          #{desc => "await continue (nowait recv)",
10645:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10646:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
10647:                    end},
10648:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select|completion)",
10649:            cmd  => fun(#{csock    := Sock,
10650:                          recv     := Recv,
10651:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
10652:                            case Recv(Sock) of
10653:                                {select, {select_info, T, R} = SI}
10654:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
10655:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
10656:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
10657:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, R]),
10658:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
10659:                                {select, {select_info, T, Ref} = SI}
10660:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10661:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
10662:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
10663:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, Ref]),
10664:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
10665: 
10666:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, R} = CI}
10667:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
10668:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
10669:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
10670:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, R]),
10671:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
10672:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, Ref} = CI}
10673:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10674:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
10675:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
10676:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, Ref]),
10677:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
10678: 
10679:                                {ok, X} ->
10680:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
10681: 
10682:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10683:                                    ERROR
10684:                            end
10685:                    end},
10686:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
10687:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10688:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
10689:                            ok
10690:                    end},
10691:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
10692:            cmd  => fun(#{csock            := Sock,
10693:                          recv_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
10694:                            receive
10695:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
10696:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
10697:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
10698:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
10699:                            after 5000 ->
10700:                                    ok
10701:                            end;
10702:                       (#{csock                := Sock,
10703:                          recv_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
10704:                            receive
10705:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, _} = C} ->
10706:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}};
10707:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
10708:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
10709:                            after 5000 ->
10710:                                    ok
10711:                            end
10712:                    end},
10713:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
10714:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10715:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
10716:                            ok
10717:                    end},
10718: 
10719:          %% *** Termination ***
10720:          #{desc => "await terminate",
10721:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
10722:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
10723:                                ok ->
10724:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
10725:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10726:                                    ERROR
10727:                            end
10728:                    end},
10729:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
10730:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
10731:                            socket:close(Sock)
10732:                    end},
10733: 
10734:          %% *** We are done ***
10735:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10736:         ],
10737: 
10738:     AltServerSeq =
10739:         [
10740:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
10741:          #{desc => "await start",
10742:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
10743:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
10744:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, sock => Sock}}
10745:                    end},
10746:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
10747:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10748:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
10749:                            ok
10750:                    end},
10751:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
10752:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10753:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
10754:                            ok
10755:                    end},
10756: 
10757:          %% The actual test
10758:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
10759:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10760:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
10761:                    end},
10762:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
10763:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
10764:                          recv     := Recv,
10765:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
10766:                            case Recv(Sock) of
10767:                                {select, SI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
10768:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
10769:                                {select, {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
10770:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10771:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
10772: 
10773:                                {completion, CI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
10774:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
10775:                                {completion, {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
10776:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10777:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
10778: 
10779:                                {ok, X} ->
10780:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
10781: 
10782:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10783:                                    ERROR
10784:                            end
10785:                    end},
10786:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
10787:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10788:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
10789:                            ok
10790:                    end},
10791:          #{desc => "await abort message",
10792:            cmd  => fun(#{sock             := Sock,
10793:                          recv_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
10794:                            receive
10795:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
10796:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
10797:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
10798:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
10799:                            after 5000 ->
10800:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [?MQ()]),
10801:                                    {error, timeout}
10802:                            end;
10803:                       (#{sock             := Sock,
10804:                          recv_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
10805:                            receive
10806:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, _} = C} ->
10807:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}};
10808:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
10809:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
10810:                            after 5000 ->
10811:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [?MQ()]),
10812:                                    {error, timeout}
10813:                            end
10814:                    end},
10815:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
10816:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10817:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
10818:                            ok
10819:                    end},
10820: 
10821:          %% Termination
10822:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
10823:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
10824:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
10825:                                ok ->
10826:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
10827:                                    State1 = maps:remove(recv_select_info, State),
10828:                                    State2 = maps:remove(recv_completion_info, State1),
10829:                                    State3 = maps:remove(tester,           State2),
10830:                                    State4 = maps:remove(sock,             State3),
10831:                                    {ok, State4};
10832:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10833:                                    ERROR
10834:                            end
10835:                    end},
10836: 
10837:          %% *** We are done ***
10838:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10839:         ],
10840: 
10841:     ClientSeq = 
10842:         [
10843:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
10844:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
10845:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
10846:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
10847:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
10848:                    end},
10849:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
10850:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10851:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
10852:                            ok
10853:                    end},
10854: 
10855:          %% *** The init part ***
10856:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
10857:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
10858:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
10859:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
10860:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
10861:                    end},
10862:          #{desc => "create socket",
10863:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10864:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
10865:                                {ok, Sock} ->
10866:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
10867:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10868:                                    ERROR
10869:                            end
10870:                    end},
10871:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
10872:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
10873:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
10874:                                ok ->
10875:                                    ok;
10876:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10877:                                    ERROR
10878:                            end
10879:                    end},
10880:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
10881:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10882:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
10883:                            ok
10884:                    end},
10885: 
10886:          %% *** The actual test ***
10887:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
10888:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10889:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
10890:                    end},
10891:          #{desc => "connect to server",
10892:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
10893:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
10894:                    end},
10895:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
10896:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10897:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
10898:                            ok
10899:                    end},
10900: 
10901:          %% *** Termination ***
10902:          #{desc => "await terminate",
10903:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
10904:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
10905:                                ok ->
10906:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
10907:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10908:                                    ERROR
10909:                            end
10910:                    end},
10911:          #{desc => "close socket",
10912:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
10913:                            socket:close(Sock)
10914:                    end},
10915: 
10916:          %% *** We are done ***
10917:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10918:         ],
10919: 
10920:     TesterSeq =
10921:         [
10922:          %% *** Init part ***
10923:          #{desc => "monitor server",
10924:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10925:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
10926:                            ok
10927:                    end},
10928:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 1",
10929:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
10930:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
10931:                            ok
10932:                    end},
10933:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 2",
10934:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
10935:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
10936:                            ok
10937:                    end},
10938:          #{desc => "monitor client",
10939:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
10940:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
10941:                            ok
10942:                    end},
10943: 
10944:          %% Start the server
10945:          #{desc => "order server start",
10946:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10947:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
10948:                            ok
10949:                    end},
10950:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
10951:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
10952:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
10953:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
10954:                    end},
10955: 
10956:          %% Start the client
10957:          #{desc => "order client start",
10958:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
10959:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
10960:                            ok
10961:                    end},
10962:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
10963:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
10964:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
10965:                    end},
10966: 
10967:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
10968:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
10969:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
10970:                            ok
10971:                    end},
10972:          #{desc => "order client to continue (connect)",
10973:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
10974:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
10975:                            ok
10976:                    end},
10977:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
10978:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
10979:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, connect)
10980:                    end},
10981:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
10982:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
10983:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept),
10984:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
10985:                    end},
10986: 
10987:          %% Start the alt server 1
10988:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 start",
10989:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
10990:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
10991:                            ok
10992:                    end},
10993:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (init)",
10994:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
10995:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, init)
10996:                    end},
10997: 
10998:          %% Start the alt server 2
10999:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 start",
11000:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
11001:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
11002:                            ok
11003:                    end},
11004:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (init)",
11005:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11006:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, init)
11007:                    end},
11008: 
11009: 
11010:          %% *** The actual test ***
11011:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
11012:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11013:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
11014:                            ok
11015:                    end},
11016:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
11017:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11018:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
11019:                    end},
11020: 
11021:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 continue (recv)",
11022:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11023:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
11024:                            ok
11025:                    end},
11026:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (recv select)",
11027:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11028:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, recv_select)
11029:                    end},
11030: 
11031:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 continue (recv)",
11032:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11033:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
11034:                            ok
11035:                    end},
11036:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (recv select)",
11037:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11038:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, recv_select)
11039:                    end},
11040: 
11041:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
11042: 
11043:          #{desc => "close the socket",
11044:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
11045:                            socket:close(Sock)
11046:                    end},
11047: 
11048:          #{desc => "await server ready (abort)",
11049:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11050:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, abort)
11051:                    end},
11052:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (abort)",
11053:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11054:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, abort)
11055:                    end},
11056:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (abort)",
11057:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11058:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, abort)
11059:                    end},
11060: 
11061:          %% Terminations
11062:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
11063:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
11064:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
11065:                            ok
11066:                    end},
11067:          #{desc => "await client termination",
11068:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
11069:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
11070:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
11071:                            {ok, State1}
11072:                    end},
11073: 
11074:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 to terminate",
11075:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11076:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11077:                            ok
11078:                    end},
11079:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 termination",
11080:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = State) ->
11081:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11082:                                ok ->
11083:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server2, State),
11084:                                    {ok, State1};
11085:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11086:                                    ERROR
11087:                            end
11088:                    end},
11089: 
11090:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 to terminate",
11091:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11092:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11093:                            ok
11094:                    end},
11095:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 termination",
11096:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = State) ->
11097:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11098:                                ok ->
11099:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server1, State),
11100:                                    {ok, State1};
11101:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11102:                                    ERROR
11103:                            end
11104:                    end},
11105: 
11106:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
11107:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11108:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11109:                            ok
11110:                    end},
11111:          #{desc => "await server termination",
11112:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
11113:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11114:                                ok ->
11115:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
11116:                                    {ok, State1};
11117:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11118:                                    ERROR
11119:                            end
11120:                    end},
11121: 
11122: 
11123:          %% *** We are done ***
11124:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11125:         ],
11126: 
11127:     i("start server evaluator"),
11128:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
11129: 
11130:     i("start alt-server 1 evaluator"),
11131:     AltServer1 = ?SEV_START("alt_server1", AltServerSeq, InitState),
11132: 
11133:     i("start alt-server 2 evaluator"),
11134:     AltServer2 = ?SEV_START("alt_server2", AltServerSeq, InitState),
11135: 
11136:     i("start client evaluator"),
11137:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
11138: 
11139:     i("start tester evaluator"),
11140:     TesterInitState = #{server      => Server#ev.pid,
11141:                         alt_server1 => AltServer1#ev.pid,
11142:                         alt_server2 => AltServer2#ev.pid,
11143:                         client      => Client#ev.pid},
11144:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
11145: 
11146:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
11147:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, AltServer1, AltServer2, Client, Tester]).
11148: 
11149: 
11150: 
11151: 
11152: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11153: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11154: %%                                                                     %%
11155: %%                           API OPTIONS                               %%
11156: %%                                                                     %%
11157: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11158: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11159: 
11160: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11161: 
11162: %% Perform some simple getopt and setopt with the level = otp options
11163: api_opt_simple_otp_options(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
11164:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
11165:     tc_try(api_opt_simple_otp_options,
11166:            fun() -> api_opt_simple_otp_options() end).
11167: 
11168: api_opt_simple_otp_options() ->
11169:     Get = fun(S, Key) ->
11170:                   socket:getopt(S, otp, Key)
11171:           end,
11172:     Set = fun(S, Key, Val) ->
11173:                   socket:setopt(S, otp, Key, Val)
11174:           end,
11175: 
11176:     Seq = 
11177:         [
11178:          %% *** Init part ***
11179:          #{desc => "create socket",
11180:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
11181:                          type     := Type,
11182:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) ->
11183:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Protocol),
11184:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
11185:                    end},
11186:          #{desc => "create dummy process",
11187:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
11188:                            Pid =  spawn_link(fun() -> 
11189:                                                      put(sname, "dummy"),
11190:                                                      receive
11191:                                                          die -> 
11192:                                                              exit(normal) 
11193:                                                      end 
11194:                                              end),
11195:                            {ok, State#{dummy => Pid}}
11196:                    end},
11197: 
11198:          %% *** Check iow part ***
11199:          #{desc => "get iow",
11200:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11201:                            case Get(Sock, iow) of
11202:                                {ok, IOW} when is_boolean(IOW) ->
11203:                                    {ok, State#{iow => IOW}};
11204:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11205:                                    {error, OK};
11206:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11207:                                    ERROR
11208:                            end
11209:                    end},
11210: 
11211:          %% #{desc => "enable debug",
11212:          %%   cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
11213:          %%                   ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true)
11214:          %%           end},
11215: 
11216:          #{desc => "set (new) iow",
11217:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, iow := OldIOW} = State) ->
11218:                            NewIOW = not OldIOW,
11219:                            case Set(Sock, iow, NewIOW) of
11220:                                ok ->
11221:                                    {ok, State#{iow => NewIOW}};
11222:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11223:                                    ERROR
11224:                            end
11225:                    end},
11226:          #{desc => "get (new) iow",
11227:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, iow := IOW}) ->
11228:                            case Get(Sock, iow) of
11229:                                {ok, IOW} ->
11230:                                    ok;
11231:                                {ok, _} = OK->
11232:                                    {error, OK};
11233:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11234:                                    ERROR
11235:                            end
11236:                    end},
11237: 
11238:          %% *** Check rcvbuf part ***
11239:          #{desc => "get rcvbuf",
11240:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11241:                            case Get(Sock, rcvbuf) of
11242:                                {ok, RcvBuf} when is_integer(RcvBuf) ->
11243:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => RcvBuf}};
11244:                                {ok, {N, RcvBuf} = V} when is_integer(N) andalso 
11245:                                                           is_integer(RcvBuf) ->
11246:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => V}};
11247:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11248:                                    {error, OK};
11249:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11250:                                    ERROR
11251:                            end
11252:                    end},
11253:          #{desc => "set (new) rcvbuf",
11254:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := {OldN, OldRcvBuf}} = State) ->
11255:                            NewRcvBuf = {OldN+2, OldRcvBuf + 1024},
11256:                            case Set(Sock, rcvbuf, NewRcvBuf) of
11257:                                ok ->
11258:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
11259:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11260:                                    ERROR
11261:                            end;
11262:                       (#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := OldRcvBuf} = State) when is_integer(OldRcvBuf) ->
11263:                            NewRcvBuf = 2 * OldRcvBuf,
11264:                            case Set(Sock, rcvbuf, NewRcvBuf) of
11265:                                ok ->
11266:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
11267:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11268:                                    ERROR
11269:                            end;
11270:                       (#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := OldRcvBuf,
11271:                          type := stream,
11272:                          protocol := tcp} = State) when is_integer(OldRcvBuf) ->
11273:                            NewRcvBuf = {2, OldRcvBuf},
11274:                            case Set(Sock, rcvbuf, NewRcvBuf) of
11275:                                ok ->
11276:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
11277:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11278:                                    ERROR
11279:                            end
11280:                    end},
11281:          #{desc => "get (new) rcvbuf",
11282:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := RcvBuf}) ->
11283:                            case Get(Sock, rcvbuf) of
11284:                                {ok, RcvBuf} ->
11285:                                    ok;
11286:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11287:                                    {error, OK};
11288:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11289:                                    ERROR
11290:                            end
11291:                    end},
11292: 
11293:          %% *** Check rcvctrlbuf part ***
11294:          #{desc => "get rcvctrlbuf",
11295:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11296:                            case Get(Sock, rcvctrlbuf) of
11297:                                {ok, RcvCtrlBuf} when is_integer(RcvCtrlBuf) ->
11298:                                    {ok, State#{rcvctrlbuf => RcvCtrlBuf}};
11299:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11300:                                    {error, OK};
11301:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11302:                                    ERROR
11303:                            end
11304:                    end},
11305:          #{desc => "set (new) rcvctrlbuf",
11306:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvctrlbuf := OldRcvCtrlBuf} = State) ->
11307:                            NewRcvCtrlBuf = 2 * OldRcvCtrlBuf,
11308:                            case Set(Sock, rcvctrlbuf, NewRcvCtrlBuf) of
11309:                                ok ->
11310:                                    {ok, State#{rcvctrlbuf => NewRcvCtrlBuf}};
11311:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11312:                                    ERROR
11313:                            end
11314:                    end},
11315:          #{desc => "get (new) rcvctrlbuf",
11316:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvctrlbuf := RcvCtrlBuf}) ->
11317:                            case Get(Sock, rcvctrlbuf) of
11318:                                {ok, RcvCtrlBuf} ->
11319:                                    ok;
11320:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11321:                                    {error, OK};
11322:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11323:                                    ERROR
11324:                            end
11325:                    end},
11326:          %% *** Check rcvctrlbuf part ***
11327:          #{desc => "get rcvctrlbuf",
11328:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11329:                            case Get(Sock, rcvctrlbuf) of
11330:                                {ok, RcvCtrlBuf} when is_integer(RcvCtrlBuf) ->
11331:                                    {ok, State#{rcvctrlbuf => RcvCtrlBuf}};
11332:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11333:                                    {error, OK};
11334:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11335:                                    ERROR
11336:                            end
11337:                    end},
11338:          #{desc => "set (new) rcvctrlbuf",
11339:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvctrlbuf := OldRcvCtrlBuf} = State) ->
11340:                            NewRcvCtrlBuf = 2 * OldRcvCtrlBuf,
11341:                            case Set(Sock, rcvctrlbuf, NewRcvCtrlBuf) of
11342:                                ok ->
11343:                                    {ok, State#{rcvctrlbuf => NewRcvCtrlBuf}};
11344:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11345:                                    ERROR
11346:                            end
11347:                    end},
11348:          #{desc => "get (new) rcvctrlbuf",
11349:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvctrlbuf := RcvCtrlBuf}) ->
11350:                            case Get(Sock, rcvctrlbuf) of
11351:                                {ok, RcvCtrlBuf} ->
11352:                                    ok;
11353:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11354:                                    {error, OK};
11355:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11356:                                    ERROR
11357:                            end
11358:                    end},
11359: 
11360: 
11361:          %% *** Check sndctrlbuf part ***
11362:          #{desc => "get sndctrlbuf",
11363:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11364:                            case Get(Sock, sndctrlbuf) of
11365:                                {ok, SndCtrlBuf} when is_integer(SndCtrlBuf) ->
11366:                                    {ok, State#{sndctrlbuf => SndCtrlBuf}};
11367:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11368:                                    {error, OK};
11369:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11370:                                    ERROR
11371:                            end
11372:                    end},
11373:          #{desc => "set (new) sndctrlbuf",
11374:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, sndctrlbuf := OldSndCtrlBuf} = State) ->
11375:                            NewSndCtrlBuf = 2 * OldSndCtrlBuf,
11376:                            case Set(Sock, sndctrlbuf, NewSndCtrlBuf) of
11377:                                ok ->
11378:                                    {ok, State#{sndctrlbuf => NewSndCtrlBuf}};
11379:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11380:                                    ERROR
11381:                            end
11382:                    end},
11383:          #{desc => "get (new) sndctrlbuf",
11384:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, sndctrlbuf := SndCtrlBuf}) ->
11385:                            case Get(Sock, sndctrlbuf) of
11386:                                {ok, SndCtrlBuf} ->
11387:                                    ok;
11388:                                {ok, _} = OK->
11389:                                    {error, OK};
11390:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11391:                                    ERROR
11392:                            end
11393:                    end},
11394: 
11395:          %% *** Check controlling-process part ***
11396:          #{desc => "verify self as controlling-process",
11397:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
11398:                            Self = self(),
11399:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
11400:                                {ok, Self} ->
11401:                                    ok;
11402:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11403:                                    {error, OK};
11404:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11405:                                    ERROR
11406:                            end
11407:                    end},
11408:          #{desc => "set dummy as controlling-process",
11409:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, dummy := Dummy}) ->
11410:                            Set(Sock, controlling_process, Dummy)
11411:                    end},
11412:          #{desc => "verify dummy as controlling-process",
11413:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, dummy := Dummy}) ->
11414:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
11415:                                {ok, Dummy} ->
11416:                                    ok;
11417:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
11418:                                    {error, OK};
11419:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11420:                                    ERROR
11421:                            end
11422:                    end},
11423: 
11424:          %% *** We are done ***
11425:          #{desc => "finish",
11426:            cmd  => fun(#{ dummy := Dummy }) ->
11427:                            Dummy ! die,
11428:                            {ok, normal}
11429:                    end}
11430:         ],
11431: 
11432:     i("start tcp (stream) evaluator"),
11433:     InitState1 = #{domain => inet, type => stream, protocol => tcp},
11434:     Tester1 = ?SEV_START("tcp-tester", Seq, InitState1),
11435:     i("await tcp evaluator"),
11436:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester1]),
11437: 
11438:     i("start udp (dgram) socket"),
11439:     InitState2 = #{domain => inet, type => dgram, protocol => udp},
11440:     Tester2 = ?SEV_START("udp-tester", Seq, InitState2),
11441:     i("await udp evaluator"),
11442:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester2]).
11443: 
11444: 
11445: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11446: 
11447: %% Perform some simple getopt and setopt otp meta option
11448: api_opt_simple_otp_meta_option(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
11449:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
11450:     tc_try(api_opt_simple_otp_meta_option,
11451:            fun() -> api_opt_simple_otp_meta_option() end).
11452: 
11453: api_opt_simple_otp_meta_option() ->
11454:     Get = fun(S) ->
11455:                   socket:getopt(S, otp, meta)
11456:           end,
11457:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
11458:                   socket:setopt(S, otp, meta, Val)
11459:           end,
11460: 
11461:     MainSeq =
11462:         [
11463:          #{desc => "monitor helper",
11464:            cmd => fun(#{helper := Pid}) ->
11465:                           _ = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11466:                           ok
11467:                   end},
11468: 
11469:          #{desc => "create socket",
11470:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
11471:                          type     := Type,
11472:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) ->
11473:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Protocol),
11474:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
11475:                    end},
11476: 
11477:          #{desc => "get default",
11478:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
11479:                           case Get(Sock) of
11480:                               {ok, undefined} ->
11481:                                   ok;
11482:                               {ok, _} = OK ->
11483:                                   {error, OK};
11484:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
11485:                                   ERROR
11486:                           end
11487:                   end},
11488: 
11489:          #{desc => "set value",
11490:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11491:                           Value = make_ref(),
11492:                           case Set(Sock, Value) of
11493:                               ok ->
11494:                                   {ok, State#{value => Value}};
11495:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
11496:                                   ERROR
11497:                           end
11498:                   end},
11499: 
11500:          #{desc => "get value",
11501:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock, value := Value}) ->
11502:                           case Get(Sock) of
11503:                               {ok, Value} ->
11504:                                   ok;
11505:                               {ok, _} = OK ->
11506:                                   {error, OK};
11507:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
11508:                                   ERROR
11509:                           end
11510:                   end},
11511: 
11512:          #{desc => "set complex value",
11513:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11514:                           Value =
11515:                               #{a => 1,
11516:                                 b => {2, 3},
11517:                                 c => make_ref(),
11518:                                 d => self(),
11519:                                 e => State},
11520:                           case Set(Sock, Value) of
11521:                               ok ->
11522:                                   {ok, State#{value := Value}};
11523:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
11524:                                   ERROR
11525:                           end
11526:                   end},
11527: 
11528:          #{desc => "get complex value",
11529:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock, value := Value}) ->
11530:                           case Get(Sock) of
11531:                               {ok, Value} ->
11532:                                   ok;
11533:                               {ok, _} = OK->
11534:                                   {error, OK};
11535:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
11536:                                   ERROR
11537:                           end
11538:                   end},
11539: 
11540:          #{desc => "start helper",
11541:            cmd => fun(#{helper := Pid,  sock := Sock, value := Value}) ->
11542:                           ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, {Sock, Value}),
11543:                           ok
11544:                   end},
11545: 
11546:          #{desc => "wait for helper ready",
11547:            cmd => fun(#{helper := Pid}) ->
11548:                           ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, helper, test)
11549:                   end},
11550: 
11551:          #{desc => "socket close",
11552:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
11553:                           socket:close(Sock)
11554:                   end},
11555: 
11556:         ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL],
11557: 
11558:     HelperSeq =
11559:         [#{desc => "await start",
11560:            cmd => fun (State) ->
11561:                           {Main, {Sock, Value}} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11562:                           {ok, State#{main => Main,
11563:                                       sock => Sock,
11564:                                       value => Value}}
11565:                   end},
11566:          #{desc => "monitor main",
11567:            cmd => fun(#{main := Main}) ->
11568:                           _ = erlang:monitor(process, Main),
11569:                           ok
11570:                   end},
11571: 
11572:          #{desc => "get value",
11573:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock, value := Value}) ->
11574:                           case Get(Sock) of
11575:                               {ok, Value} ->
11576:                                   ok;
11577:                               {ok, _} = OK->
11578:                                   {error, OK};
11579:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
11580:                                   ERROR
