11581:                           end
11582:                   end},
11583: 
11584:          #{desc => "set and fail",
11585:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
11586:                           Value = self(),
11587:                           case Set(Sock, Value) of
11588:                               ok ->
11589:                                   {error, only_owner_may_set};
11590:                               {error, {invalid, not_owner}} ->
11591:                                   ok;
11592:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
11593:                                   ERROR
11594:                           end
11595:                   end},
11596: 
11597:          #{desc => "announce ready (test)",
11598:            cmd  => fun(#{main := Main}) ->
11599:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Main, test),
11600:                            ok
11601:                    end},
11602: 
11603:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL],
11604: 
11605: 
11606:     i("start tcp helper evaluator"),
11607:     Helper = ?SEV_START("tcp-helper", HelperSeq, #{}),
11608: 
11609:     i("start tcp main evaluator"),
11610:     MainState = #{domain => inet, type => stream, protocol => tcp,
11611:                   helper => Helper#ev.pid},
11612:     Main = ?SEV_START("tcp-main", MainSeq, MainState),
11613: 
11614:     i("await tcp evaluators"),
11615:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Helper, Main]).
11616: 
11617: 
11618: 
11619: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11620: 
11621: %% Perform some simple operations with the rcvbuf otp option
11622: %% The operations we test here are only for type = stream and
11623: %% protocol = tcp.
11624: api_opt_simple_otp_rcvbuf_option(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
11625:     ?TT(?SECS(15)),
11626:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
11627:            fun() ->
11628:                    api_opt_simple_otp_rcvbuf_option()
11629:            end).
11630: 
11631: api_opt_simple_otp_rcvbuf_option() ->
11632:     Get = fun(S) ->
11633:                   socket:getopt(S, otp, rcvbuf)
11634:           end,
11635:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
11636:                   socket:setopt(S, otp, rcvbuf, Val)
11637:           end,
11638: 
11639:     ServerSeq = 
11640:         [
11641:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
11642:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
11643:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
11644:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11645:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
11646:                    end},
11647:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
11648:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11649:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
11650:                            ok
11651:                    end},
11652: 
11653:          %% *** Init part ***
11654:          #{desc => "which local address",
11655:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
11656:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
11657:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
11658:                    end},
11659:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
11660:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
11661:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
11662:                                {ok, Sock} ->
11663:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
11664:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11665:                                    ERROR
11666:                            end
11667:                    end},
11668:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
11669:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
11670:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
11671:                                ok ->
11672:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
11673:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
11674:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11675:                                    ERROR
11676:                            end
11677:                    end},
11678:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
11679:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
11680:                            socket:listen(LSock)
11681:                    end},
11682:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
11683:            cmd  => fun(#{tester   := Tester,
11684:                          local_sa := LocalSA,
11685:                          lport    := Port}) ->
11686:                            ServerSA = LocalSA#{port => Port},
11687:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
11688:                            ok
11689:                    end},
11690: 
11691: 
11692:          %% *** The actual test part ***
11693:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
11694:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11695:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
11696:                    end},
11697:          #{desc => "attempt to accept",
11698:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
11699:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
11700:                                {ok, Sock} ->
11701:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
11702:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11703:                                    ERROR
11704:                            end
11705:                    end},
11706:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
11707:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11708:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
11709:                            ok
11710:                    end},
11711: 
11712:          %% Recv with default size for (otp) rcvbuf
11713:          #{desc => "await continue (recv initial)",
11714:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11715:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
11716:                                {ok, MsgSz} ->
11717:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("MsgSz: ~p", [MsgSz]),
11718:                                    {ok, State#{msg_sz => MsgSz}};
11719:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11720:                                    ERROR
11721:                            end
11722:                    end},
11723:          #{desc => "attempt to recv",
11724:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, msg_sz := MsgSz} = _State) ->
11725:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try recv ~w bytes when rcvbuf is ~s", 
11726:                                        [MsgSz,
11727:                                         case Get(Sock) of
11728:                                             {ok, RcvBuf} -> ?F("~w", [RcvBuf]);
11729:                                             {error, _}   -> "-"
11730:                                         end]),
11731:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
11732:                                {ok, Data} when (size(Data) =:= MsgSz) ->
11733:                                    ok;
11734:                                {ok, Data} ->
11735:                                    {error, {invalid_msg_sz, MsgSz, size(Data)}};
11736:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11737:                                    ERROR
11738:                            end
11739:                    end},
11740:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv initial)",
11741:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11742:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
11743:                            ok
11744:                    end},
11745: 
11746:          %% Recv with new size (1) for (otp) rcvbuf
11747:          #{desc => "await continue (recv 1)",
11748:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11749:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
11750:                                {ok, NewRcvBuf} ->
11751:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("set new rcvbuf: ~p", [NewRcvBuf]),
11752:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
11753:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11754:                                    ERROR
11755:                            end
11756:                    end},
11757:          #{desc => "attempt to setopt rcvbuf",
11758:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := NewRcvBuf} = _State) ->
11759:                            case Set(Sock, NewRcvBuf) of
11760:                                ok ->
11761:                                    ok;
11762:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11763:                                    ERROR
11764:                            end
11765:                    end},
11766:          #{desc => "attempt to recv",
11767:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, msg_sz := MsgSz} = _State) ->
11768:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try recv ~w bytes when rcvbuf is ~s", 
11769:                                        [MsgSz,
11770:                                         case Get(Sock) of
11771:                                             {ok, RcvBuf} -> ?F("~w", [RcvBuf]);
11772:                                             {error, _}   -> "-"
11773:                                         end]),
11774:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
11775:                                {ok, Data} when (size(Data) =:= MsgSz) ->
11776:                                    ok;
11777:                                {ok, Data} ->
11778:                                    {error, {invalid_msg_sz, MsgSz, size(Data)}};
11779:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11780:                                    ERROR
11781:                            end
11782:                    end},
11783:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv 1)",
11784:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11785:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
11786:                            ok
11787:                    end},
11788: 
11789:          %% Recv with new size (2) for (otp) rcvbuf
11790:          #{desc => "await continue (recv 2)",
11791:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11792:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
11793:                                {ok, NewRcvBuf} ->
11794:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("set new rcvbuf: ~p", [NewRcvBuf]),
11795:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
11796:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11797:                                    ERROR
11798:                            end
11799:                    end},
11800:          #{desc => "attempt to setopt rcvbuf",
11801:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := NewRcvBuf} = _State) ->
11802:                            case Set(Sock, NewRcvBuf) of
11803:                                ok ->
11804:                                    ok;
11805:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11806:                                    ERROR
11807:                            end
11808:                    end},
11809:          #{desc => "attempt to recv",
11810:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, msg_sz := MsgSz} = _State) ->
11811:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
11812:                                {ok, Data} when (size(Data) =:= MsgSz) ->
11813:                                    ok;
11814:                                {ok, Data} ->
11815:                                    {error, {invalid_msg_sz, MsgSz, size(Data)}};
11816:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11817:                                    ERROR
11818:                            end
11819:                    end},
11820:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv 2)",
11821:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11822:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
11823:                            ok
11824:                    end},
11825: 
11826:          %% Recv with new size (3) for (otp) rcvbuf
11827:          #{desc => "await continue (recv 3, truncated)",
11828:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11829:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
11830:                                {ok, {ExpSz, NewRcvBuf}} ->
11831:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("set new rcvbuf:"
11832:                                                "~n   New RcvBuf:  ~p"
11833:                                                "~n   Expect Size: ~p",
11834:                                                [ExpSz, NewRcvBuf]),
11835:                                    {ok, State#{msg_sz => ExpSz,
11836:                                                rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
11837:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11838:                                    ERROR
11839:                            end
11840:                    end},
11841:          #{desc => "attempt to setopt rcvbuf",
11842:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := NewRcvBuf} = _State) ->
11843:                            case Set(Sock, NewRcvBuf) of
11844:                                ok ->
11845:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("set new rcvbuf: ~p",
11846:                                                [NewRcvBuf]),
11847:                                    ok;
11848:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11849:                                    ERROR
11850:                            end
11851:                    end},
11852:          #{desc => "attempt to recv",
11853:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, msg_sz := MsgSz} = _State) ->
11854:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try recv ~w bytes of data", [MsgSz]),
11855:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
11856:                                {ok, Data} when (size(Data) =:= MsgSz) ->
11857:                                    ok;
11858:                                {ok, Data} ->
11859:                                    {error, {invalid_msg_sz, MsgSz, size(Data)}};
11860:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11861:                                    ERROR
11862:                            end
11863:                    end},
11864:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
11865:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11866:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
11867:                            ok
11868:                    end},
11869: 
11870: 
11871:          %% Termination
11872:          #{desc => "await terminate",
11873:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11874:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
11875:                                ok ->
11876:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
11877:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11878:                                    ERROR
11879:                            end
11880:                    end},
11881:          #{desc => "close socket(s)",
11882:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, sock := Sock} = State) ->
11883:                            sock_close(Sock),
11884:                            sock_close(LSock),
11885:                            State1 = maps:remove(sock,  State),
11886:                            State2 = maps:remove(lport, State1),
11887:                            State3 = maps:remove(lsock, State2),
11888:                            {ok, State3}
11889:                    end},
11890: 
11891:          %% *** We are done ***
11892:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11893:         ],
11894: 
11895:     ClientSeq =
11896:         [
11897:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
11898:          #{desc => "await start",
11899:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
11900:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11901:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester,
11902:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
11903:                    end},
11904:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
11905:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11906:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
11907:                            ok
11908:                    end},
11909: 
11910:          %% *** Init part ***
11911:          #{desc => "which local address",
11912:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
11913:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
11914:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
11915:                    end},
11916:          #{desc => "create socket",
11917:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
11918:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
11919:                                {ok, Sock} ->
11920:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
11921:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11922:                                    ERROR
11923:                            end
11924:                    end},
11925:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
11926:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
11927:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
11928:                                ok ->
11929:                                    ok;
11930:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11931:                                    ERROR
11932:                            end
11933:                    end},
11934:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
11935:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11936:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
11937:                            ok
11938:                    end},
11939: 
11940:          %% The actual test
11941:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
11942:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11943:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
11944:                    end},
11945:          #{desc => "connect to server",
11946:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
11947:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
11948:                    end},
11949:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
11950:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11951:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
11952:                            ok
11953:                    end},
11954: 
11955:          #{desc => "await continue (send initial)",
11956:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11957:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send) of
11958:                                {ok, Data} ->
11959:                                    {ok, State#{data => Data}};
11960:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11961:                                    ERROR
11962:                            end
11963:                    end},
11964:          #{desc => "send (initial) data to server",
11965:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, data := Data} = _State) ->
11966:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send ~w bytes", [size(Data)]),
11967:                            socket:send(Sock, Data)
11968:                    end},
11969:          #{desc => "announce ready (send initial)",
11970:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11971:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
11972:                            ok
11973:                    end},
11974: 
11975:          #{desc => "await continue (send 1)",
11976:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11977:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
11978:                    end},
11979:          #{desc => "send (1) data to server",
11980:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, data := Data}) ->
11981:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send ~w bytes", [size(Data)]),
11982:                            socket:send(Sock, Data)
11983:                    end},
11984:          #{desc => "announce ready (send 1)",
11985:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11986:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
11987:                            ok
11988:                    end},
11989: 
11990:          #{desc => "await continue (send 2)",
11991:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11992:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
11993:                    end},
11994:          #{desc => "send (2) data to server",
11995:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, data := Data}) ->
11996:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send ~w bytes", [size(Data)]),
11997:                            socket:send(Sock, Data)
11998:                    end},
11999:          #{desc => "announce ready (send 2)",
12000:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12001:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
12002:                            ok
12003:                    end},
12004: 
12005:          #{desc => "await continue (send 3)",
12006:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
12007:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
12008:                    end},
12009:          #{desc => "send (3) data to server",
12010:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, data := Data}) ->
12011:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send ~w bytes", [size(Data)]),
12012:                            socket:send(Sock, Data)
12013:                    end},
12014:          #{desc => "announce ready (send 3)",
12015:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12016:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
12017:                            ok
12018:                    end},
12019: 
12020: 
12021:          %% Termination
12022:          #{desc => "await terminate",
12023:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
12024:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
12025:                                ok ->
12026:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
12027:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12028:                                    ERROR
12029:                            end
12030:                    end},
12031:          #{desc => "close socket",
12032:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
12033:                            socket:close(Sock)
12034:                    end},
12035: 
12036:          %% *** We are done ***
12037:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12038:         ],
12039: 
12040:     TesterSeq =
12041:         [
12042:          %% *** Init part ***
12043:          #{desc => "monitor server",
12044:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
12045:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Server),
12046:                            ok
12047:                    end},
12048:          #{desc => "monitor client",
12049:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12050:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Client),
12051:                            ok
12052:                    end},
12053:          #{desc => "order server start",
12054:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server}) ->
12055:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Server)
12056:                    end},
12057:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
12058:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
12059:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, init),
12060:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
12061:                    end},
12062:          #{desc => "order client start",
12063:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Client,
12064:                          server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
12065:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, ServerSA),
12066:                            ok
12067:                    end},
12068:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
12069:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12070:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, init)
12071:                    end},
12072: 
12073: 
12074:          %% The actual test (connecting)
12075:          #{desc => "order server accept (accept)",
12076:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
12077:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
12078:                            ok
12079:                    end},
12080:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12081:          #{desc => "order client continue (connect)",
12082:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12083:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
12084:                            ok
12085:                    end},
12086:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
12087:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12088:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
12089:                    end},
12090:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
12091:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
12092:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
12093:                    end},
12094: 
12095:          %% The actual test (initial part)
12096:          #{desc => "order client continue (send initial)",
12097:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client, data := Data} = _State) ->
12098:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send, Data),
12099:                            ok
12100:                    end},
12101:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12102:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv initial)",
12103:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, data := Data} = _State) ->
12104:                            ExpMsgSz = size(Data),
12105:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv, ExpMsgSz),
12106:                            ok
12107:                    end},
12108:          #{desc => "await client ready (send initial)",
12109:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
12110:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
12111:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send,
12112:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
12113:                                ok ->
12114:                                    ok;
12115:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12116:                                    ERROR
12117:                            end
12118:                    end},
12119:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv initial)",
12120:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
12121:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
12122:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, client, recv,
12123:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
12124:                                ok ->
12125:                                    ok;
12126:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12127:                                    ERROR
12128:                            end
12129:                    end},
12130: 
12131:          %% The actual test (part 1)
12132:          #{desc => "order client continue (send 1)",
12133:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12134:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
12135:                            ok
12136:                    end},
12137:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12138:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv 1)",
12139:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, data := Data} = _State) ->
12140:                            MsgSz     = size(Data),
12141:                            NewRcvBuf =
12142:                                case os:type() of
12143:                                    {win32, nt} ->
12144:                                        (((2 * MsgSz) div 1024) + 1) * 1024;
12145:                                    _ ->
12146:                                        {2 + (MsgSz div 1024), 1024}
12147:                                end,
12148:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv, NewRcvBuf),
12149:                            ok
12150:                    end},
12151:          #{desc => "await client ready (send 1)",
12152:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
12153:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
12154:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send,
12155:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
12156:                                ok ->
12157:                                    ok;
12158:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12159:                                    ERROR
12160:                            end
12161:                    end},
12162:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv 1)",
12163:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
12164:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
12165:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, client, recv,
12166:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
12167:                                ok ->
12168:                                    ok;
12169:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12170:                                    ERROR
12171:                            end
12172:                    end},
12173: 
12174:          %% The actual test (part 2)
12175:          #{desc => "order client continue (send 2)",
12176:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12177:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
12178:                            ok
12179:                    end},
12180:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12181:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv 2)",
12182:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, data := Data} = _State) ->
12183:                            MsgSz     = size(Data),
12184:                            NewRcvBuf = 
12185:                                case os:type() of
12186:                                    {win32, nt} ->
12187:                                        (((3 * MsgSz) div 1024) + 1) * 1024;
12188:                                    _ ->
12189:                                        {2 + (MsgSz div 2048), 2048}
12190:                                end,
12191:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv, NewRcvBuf),
12192:                            ok
12193:                    end},
12194:          #{desc => "await client ready (send 2)",
12195:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
12196:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
12197:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send,
12198:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
12199:                                ok ->
12200:                                    ok;
12201:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12202:                                    ERROR
12203:                            end
12204:                    end},
12205:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv 2)",
12206:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
12207:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
12208:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, client, recv,
12209:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
12210:                                ok ->
12211:                                    ok;
12212:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12213:                                    ERROR
12214:                            end
12215:                    end},
12216: 
12217: 
12218:          %% The actual test (part 3)
12219:          #{desc => "order client continue (send 3)",
12220:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12221:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
12222:                            ok
12223:                    end},
12224:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12225:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv 3)",
12226:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, data := Data} = _State) ->
12227:                            MsgSz = size(Data),
12228:                            BufSz = 2048,
12229:                            N     = MsgSz div BufSz - 1,
12230:                            {ExpSz, NewRcvBuf} =
12231:                                case os:type() of
12232:                                    {win32, nt} ->
12233:                                        {N*BufSz, N*BufSz};
12234:                                    _ ->
12235:                                        {N*BufSz, {N, BufSz}}
12236:                                end,
12237:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv,
12238:                                                   {ExpSz, NewRcvBuf})
12239:                    end},
12240:          #{desc => "await client ready (send 3)",
12241:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
12242:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
12243:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send,
12244:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
12245:                                ok ->
12246:                                    ok;
12247:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12248:                                    ERROR
12249:                            end
12250:                    end},
12251:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv 3)",
12252:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
12253:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
12254:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, client, recv,
12255:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
12256:                                ok ->
12257:                                    ok;
12258:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12259:                                    ERROR
12260:                            end
12261:                    end},
12262: 
12263: 
12264:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12265: 
12266:          %% *** Terminate server ***
12267:          #{desc => "order client terminate",
12268:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12269:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
12270:                            ok
12271:                    end},
12272:          #{desc => "await client down",
12273:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
12274:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
12275:                            State1 = maps:remove(client,    State),
12276:                            {ok, State1}
12277:                    end},
12278:          #{desc => "order server terminate",
12279:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
12280:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
12281:                            ok
12282:                    end},
12283:          #{desc => "await server down",
12284:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
12285:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
12286:                            State1 = maps:remove(server,    State),
12287:                            State2 = maps:remove(server_sa, State1),
12288:                            {ok, State2}
12289:                    end},
12290: 
12291:          %% *** We are done ***
12292:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12293:         ],
12294: 
12295:     %% Create a data binary of 6*1024 bytes
12296:     Data      = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(6*4, lists:seq(0, 255))),
12297:     InitState = #{domain => inet_or_inet6(),
12298:                   data   => Data},
12299: 
12300:     i("create server evaluator"),
12301:     ServerInitState = #{domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
12302:     Server          = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
12303: 
12304:     i("create client evaluator"),
12305:     ClientInitState = #{host   => local_host(),
12306:                         domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
12307:     Client          = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
12308: 
12309:     i("create tester evaluator"),
12310:     TesterInitState = InitState#{server => Server#ev.pid,
12311:                                  client => Client#ev.pid},
12312:     Tester          = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
12313: 
12314:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
12315:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
12316: 
12317: 
12318: 
12319: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12320: 
12321: %% Perform some simple getopt and setopt with the level = otp options
12322: api_opt_simple_otp_controlling_process(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
12323:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
12324:     tc_try(api_opt_simple_otp_controlling_process,
12325:            fun() -> api_opt_simple_otp_controlling_process() end).
12326: 
12327: api_opt_simple_otp_controlling_process() ->
12328:     Get = fun(S, Key) ->
12329:                   socket:getopt(S, otp, Key)
12330:           end,
12331:     Set = fun(S, Key, Val) ->
12332:                   socket:setopt(S, otp, Key, Val)
12333:           end,
12334: 
12335:     ClientSeq =
12336:         [
12337:          %% *** Init part ***
12338:          #{desc => "await start",
12339:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
12340:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
12341:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester,
12342:                                        sock   => Sock}}
12343:                    end},
12344:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
12345:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12346:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
12347:                            ok
12348:                    end},
12349: 
12350:          %% *** The actual test ***
12351:          #{desc => "verify tester as controlling-process",
12352:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12353:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
12354:                                {ok, Tester} ->
12355:                                    ok;
12356:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
12357:                                    {error, OK};
12358:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12359:                                    ERROR
12360:                            end
12361:                    end},
12362:          #{desc => "attempt invalid controlling-process transfer (to self)",
12363:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12364:                            case Set(Sock, controlling_process, self()) of
12365:                                {error, {invalid, not_owner}} ->
12366:                                    ok;
12367:                                ok ->
12368:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
12369:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12370:                                    ERROR
12371:                            end
12372:                    end},
12373:          #{desc => "announce ready (not owner)",
12374:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
12375:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, not_owner),
12376:                            ok
12377:                    end},
12378:          #{desc => "await continue (owner)",
12379:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
12380:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, owner)
12381:                    end},
12382:          #{desc => "verify self as controlling-process",
12383:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12384:                            Self = self(),
12385:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
12386:                                {ok, Self} ->
12387:                                    ok;
12388:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
12389:                                    {error, OK};
12390:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12391:                                    ERROR
12392:                            end
12393:                    end},
12394:          #{desc => "attempt controlling-process transfer to tester",
12395:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12396:                            Set(Sock, controlling_process, Tester)
12397:                    end},
12398:          #{desc => "attempt invalid controlling-process transfer (to self)",
12399:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12400:                            case Set(Sock, controlling_process, self()) of
12401:                                {error, {invalid, not_owner}} ->
12402:                                    ok;
12403:                                ok ->
12404:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
12405:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12406:                                    ERROR
12407:                            end
12408:                    end},
12409:          #{desc => "announce ready (owner)",
12410:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
12411:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, owner),
12412:                            ok
12413: 
12414:                    end},
12415:          
12416:          %% *** Termination ***
12417:          #{desc => "await termination",
12418:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
12419:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester),
12420:                            State1 = maps:remove(tester, State),
12421:                            State2 = maps:remove(sock, State1),
12422:                            {ok, State2}
12423:                    end},
12424: 
12425:          %% *** We are done ***
12426:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12427:         ],
12428: 
12429:     TesterSeq =
12430:         [
12431:          %% *** Init part ***
12432:          #{desc => "create socket",
12433:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
12434:                          type     := Type,
12435:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) ->
12436:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Protocol),
12437:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
12438:                    end},
12439:          #{desc => "monitor client",
12440:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12441:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Client),
12442:                            ok
12443:                    end},
12444: 
12445:          %% *** The actual test ***
12446:          #{desc => "verify self as controlling-process",
12447:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12448:                            Self = self(),
12449:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
12450:                                {ok, Self} ->
12451:                                    ok;
12452:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
12453:                                    {error, OK};
12454:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12455:                                    ERROR
12456:                            end
12457:                    end},
12458:          #{desc => "order (client) start",
12459:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12460:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, Sock),
12461:                            ok
12462:                    end},
12463:          #{desc => "await (client) ready (not owner)",
12464:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12465:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, not_owner)
12466:                    end},
12467:          #{desc => "attempt controlling-process transfer to client",
12468:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12469:                            Set(Sock, controlling_process, Client)
12470:                    end},
12471:          #{desc => "verify client as controlling-process",
12472:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12473:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
12474:                                {ok, Client} ->
12475:                                    ok;
12476:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
12477:                                    {error, OK};
12478:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12479:                                    ERROR
12480:                            end
12481:                    end},
12482:          #{desc => "attempt invalid controlling-process transfer (to self)",
12483:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12484:                            case Set(Sock, controlling_process, self()) of
12485:                                {error, {invalid, not_owner}} ->
12486:                                    ok;
12487:                                ok ->
12488:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
12489:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12490:                                    ERROR
12491:                            end
12492:                    end},
12493:          #{desc => "order (client) continue (owner)",
12494:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12495:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, owner),
12496:                            ok
12497:                    end},
12498:          #{desc => "await (client) ready (2)",
12499:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12500:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, owner),
12501:                            ok
12502:                    end},
12503:          #{desc => "verify self as controlling-process",
12504:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12505:                            Self = self(),
12506:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
12507:                                {ok, Self} ->
12508:                                    ok;
12509:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
12510:                                    {error, OK};
12511:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12512:                                    ERROR
12513:                            end
12514:                    end},
12515: 
12516:          %% *** Termination ***
12517:          #{desc => "order (client) terminate",
12518:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12519:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
12520:                            ok
12521:                    end},
12522:          #{desc => "await client termination",
12523:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
12524:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
12525:                            {ok, maps:remove(client, State)}
12526:                    end},
12527:          #{desc => "close socket",
12528:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
12529:                            sock_close(Sock),
12530:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
12531:                    end},
12532: 
12533:          %% *** We are done ***
12534:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12535:         ],
12536: 
12537:     i("start tcp (stream) client evaluator"),
12538:     ClientInitState1 = #{},
12539:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("tcp-client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState1),
12540: 
12541:     i("start tcp (stream) tester evaluator"),
12542:     TesterInitState1 = #{domain   => inet,
12543:                          type     => stream, 
12544:                          protocol => tcp,
12545:                          client   => Client1#ev.pid},
12546:     Tester1 = ?SEV_START("tcp-tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState1),
12547: 
12548:     i("await tcp evaluator(s)"),
12549:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester1, Client1]),
12550: 
12551:     i("start udp (dgram) client evaluator"),
12552:     ClientInitState2 = #{},
12553:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("udp-client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState2),
12554: 
12555:     i("start udp (dgram) tester evaluator"),
12556:     TesterInitState2 = #{domain   => inet,
12557:                          type     => dgram, 
12558:                          protocol => udp,
12559:                          client   => Client2#ev.pid},
12560:     Tester2 = ?SEV_START("udp-tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState2),
12561: 
12562:     i("await udp evaluator(s)"),
12563:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester2, Client2]).
12564: 
12565: 
12566: 
12567: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12568: 
12569: %% Tests the socket option acceptconn for UDP.
12570: %% This should be possible to get but not set.
12571: 
12572: api_opt_sock_acceptconn_udp(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
12573:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
12574:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_acceptconn_udp,
12575:            fun() ->
12576:                    has_support_sock_acceptconn()
12577:            end,
12578:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_acceptconn_udp() end).
12579: 
12580: 
12581: 
12582: api_opt_sock_acceptconn_udp() ->
12583:     Opt = acceptconn,
12584:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
12585:                   socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
12586:           end,
12587:     Get = fun(S) ->
12588:                   socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
12589:           end,
12590: 
12591:     TesterSeq =
12592:         [
12593:          #{desc => "which local address",
12594:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
12595:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
12596:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
12597:                    end},
12598:          #{desc => "create socket",
12599:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
12600:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
12601:                                {ok, Sock} ->
12602:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
12603:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12604:                                    ERROR
12605:                            end
12606:                    end},
12607: 
12608:          #{desc => "[get] verify socket (before bind)",
12609:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12610:                            case Get(Sock) of
12611:                                {ok, false} ->
12612:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
12613:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
12614:                                    ok;
12615:                                {ok, true} ->
12616:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12617:                                                "Accepting connections"),
12618:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
12619:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
12620:                                    %% On some platforms this is not accepted
12621:                                    %% for UDP, so skip this part (UDP).
12622:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Expected Failure: "
12623:                                                "~p => SKIP", [Reason]),
12624:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
12625:                                    {skip, Reason};
12626:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
12627:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
12628:                                                [Reason]),
12629:                                    ERROR
12630:                            end
12631:                    end},
12632:          #{desc => "[set] verify socket (before bind)",
12633:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12634:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
12635:                                {error, Reason} ->
12636:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p",
12637:                                                [Reason]),
12638:                                    ok;
12639:                                ok ->
12640:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12641:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
12642:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
12643:                            end
12644:                    end},
12645: 
12646:          #{desc => "bind socket to local address",
12647:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
12648:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
12649:                                ok ->
12650:                                    ok;
12651:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12652:                                    ERROR
12653:                            end
12654:                    end},
12655: 
12656:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12657: 
12658:          #{desc => "[get] verify socket (after bind)",
12659:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12660:                            case Get(Sock) of
12661:                                {ok, false} ->
12662:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
12663:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
12664:                                    ok;
12665:                                {ok, true} ->
12666:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12667:                                                "Accepting connections"),
12668:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
12669:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
12670:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
12671:                                                [Reason]),
12672:                                    ERROR
12673:                            end
12674:                    end},
12675:          #{desc => "[set] verify socket (after bind)",
12676:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12677:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
12678:                                {error, Reason} ->
12679:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p",
12680:                                                [Reason]),
12681:                                    ok;
12682:                                ok ->
12683:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12684:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
12685:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
12686:                            end
12687:                    end},
12688: 
12689:          %% *** Termination ***
12690:          #{desc => "close socket",
12691:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
12692:                            socket:close(Sock),
12693:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
12694:                    end},
12695: 
12696:          %% *** We are done ***
12697:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12698:         ],
12699: 
12700:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
12701: 
12702:     i("start tester evaluator"),
12703:     InitState = #{domain  => Domain},
12704:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
12705: 
12706:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
12707:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
12708: 
12709: 
12710: 
12711: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12712: 
12713: %% Tests the socket option acceptconn for TCP.
12714: %% This should be possible to get but not set.
12715: 
12716: api_opt_sock_acceptconn_tcp(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
12717:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
12718:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_acceptconn_tcp,
12719:            fun() ->
12720:                    has_support_sock_acceptconn()
12721:            end,
12722:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_acceptconn_tcp() end).
12723: 
12724: 
12725: 
12726: api_opt_sock_acceptconn_tcp() ->
12727:     Opt = acceptconn,
12728:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
12729:                   socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
12730:           end,
12731:     Get = fun(S) ->
12732:                   socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
12733:           end,
12734: 
12735:     TesterSeq =
12736:         [
12737:          #{desc => "which local address",
12738:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
12739:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
12740:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
12741:                    end},
12742: 
12743:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
12744:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
12745:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
12746:                                {ok, Sock} ->
12747:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
12748:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12749:                                    ERROR
12750:                            end
12751:                    end},
12752: 
12753:          #{desc => "[get] verify listen socket (before bind)",
12754:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
12755:                            case Get(Sock) of
12756:                                {ok, false} ->
12757:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
12758:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
12759:                                    ok;
12760:                                {ok, true} ->
12761:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12762:                                                "Accepting connections"),
12763:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
12764:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
12765:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Expected Failure: "
12766:                                                "~p => SKIP", [Reason]),
12767:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
12768:                                    {skip, Reason};
12769:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
12770:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
12771:                                                [Reason]),
12772:                                    ERROR
12773:                            end
12774:                    end},
12775:          #{desc => "[set] verify listen socket (before bind)",
12776:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
12777:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
12778:                                {error, Reason} ->
12779:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12780:                                    ok;
12781:                                ok ->
12782:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12783:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
12784:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
12785:                            end
12786:                    end},
12787: 
12788:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12789: 
12790:          #{desc => "bind listen socket to local address",
12791:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
12792:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
12793:                                ok ->
12794:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
12795:                                    {ok, State#{server_sa => LSA#{port => Port}}};
12796:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12797:                                    ERROR
12798:                            end
12799:                    end},
12800: 
12801:          #{desc => "[get] verify listen socket (after bind)",
12802:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
12803:                            case Get(Sock) of
12804:                                {ok, false} ->
12805:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
12806:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
12807:                                    ok;
12808:                                {ok, true} ->
12809:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12810:                                                "Accepting connections"),
12811:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
12812:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
12813:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12814:                                    ERROR
12815:                            end
12816:                    end},
12817:          #{desc => "[set] verify listen socket (after bind)",
12818:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
12819:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
12820:                                {error, Reason} ->
12821:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12822:                                    ok;
12823:                                ok ->
12824:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12825:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
12826:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
12827:                            end
12828:                    end},
12829: 
12830:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12831: 
12832:          #{desc => "make listen socket accept connections",
12833:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
12834:                            case socket:listen(Sock) of
12835:                                ok ->
12836:                                    ok;
12837:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12838:                                    ERROR
12839:                            end
12840:                    end},
12841: 
12842:          #{desc => "[get] verify listen socket (after listen)",
12843:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
12844:                            case Get(Sock) of
12845:                                {ok, true} ->
12846:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
12847:                                                "Accepting connections"),
12848:                                    ok;
12849:                                {ok, false} ->
12850:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12851:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
12852:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, false}}};
12853:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
12854:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12855:                                    ERROR
12856:                            end
12857:                    end},
12858:          #{desc => "[set] verify listen socket (after listen)",
12859:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
12860:                            case Set(Sock, false) of
12861:                                {error, Reason} ->
12862:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12863:                                    ok;
12864:                                ok ->
12865:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12866:                                                "Set acceptconn (=false)"),
12867:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
12868:                            end
12869:                    end},
12870: 
12871:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12872: 
12873:          #{desc => "create (connecting) socket",
12874:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
12875:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
12876:                                {ok, Sock} ->
12877:                                    {ok, State#{csockc => Sock}};
12878:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12879:                                    ERROR
12880:                            end
12881:                    end},
12882: 
12883:          #{desc => "bind connecting socket to local address",
12884:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
12885:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
12886:                                ok ->
12887:                                    ok;
12888:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12889:                                    ERROR
12890:                            end
12891:                    end},
12892: 
12893:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12894: 
12895:          #{desc => "[get] verify connecting socket (before connect)",
12896:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = _State) ->
12897:                            case Get(Sock) of
12898:                                {ok, false} ->
12899:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
12900:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
12901:                                    ok;
12902:                                {ok, true} ->
12903:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12904:                                                "Accepting connections"),
12905:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
12906:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
12907:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12908:                                    ERROR
12909:                            end
12910:                    end},
12911:          #{desc => "[set] verify connecting socket (before connect)",
12912:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = _State) ->
12913:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
12914:                                {error, Reason} ->
12915:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12916:                                    ok;
12917:                                ok ->
12918:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12919:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
12920:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
12921:                            end
12922:                    end},
12923: 
12924:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12925: 
12926:          #{desc => "connect to server",
12927:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock, server_sa := SSA} = _State) ->
12928:                            case socket:connect(Sock, SSA) of
12929:                                ok ->
12930:                                    ok;
12931:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12932:                                    ERROR
12933:                            end
12934:                    end},
12935: 
12936:          #{desc => "accept connection",
12937:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
12938:                            case socket:accept(Sock) of
12939:                                {ok, CSock} ->
12940:                                    {ok, State#{csocks => CSock}};
12941:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12942:                                    ERROR
12943:                            end
12944:                    end},
12945: 
12946:          #{desc => "[get] verify connecting socket (after connect)",
12947:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = _State) ->
12948:                            case Get(Sock) of
12949:                                {ok, false} ->
12950:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
12951:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
12952:                                    ok;
12953:                                {ok, true} ->
12954:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12955:                                                "Accepting connections"),
12956:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
12957:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
12958:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12959:                                    ERROR
12960:                            end
12961:                    end},
12962:          #{desc => "[set] verify connecting socket (after connect)",
12963:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = _State) ->
12964:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
12965:                                {error, Reason} ->
12966:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12967:                                    ok;
12968:                                ok ->
12969:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12970:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
12971:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
12972:                            end
12973:                    end},
12974: 
12975:          #{desc => "[get] verify connected socket",
12976:            cmd  => fun(#{csocks := Sock} = _State) ->
12977:                            case Get(Sock) of
12978:                                {ok, false} ->
12979:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
12980:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
12981:                                    ok;
12982:                                {ok, true} ->
12983:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12984:                                                "Accepting connections"),
12985:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
12986:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
12987:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12988:                                    ERROR
12989:                            end
12990:                    end},
12991:          #{desc => "[set] verify connected socket",
12992:            cmd  => fun(#{csocks := Sock} = _State) ->
12993:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
12994:                                {error, Reason} ->
12995:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
12996:                                    ok;
12997:                                ok ->
12998:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
12999:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
13000:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
13001:                            end
13002:                    end},
13003: 
13004:          #{desc => "[get] verify listen socket (after connect)",
13005:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
13006:                            case Get(Sock) of
13007:                                {ok, true} ->
13008:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
13009:                                                "Accepting connections"),
13010:                                    ok;
13011:                                {ok, false} ->
13012:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
13013:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
13014:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, false}}};
13015:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13016:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13017:                                    ERROR
13018:                            end
13019:                    end},
13020:          #{desc => "[set] verify listen socket (after connect)",
13021:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
13022:                            case Set(Sock, false) of
13023:                                {error, Reason} ->
13024:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13025:                                    ok;
13026:                                ok ->
13027:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
13028:                                                "Set acceptconn (=false)"),
13029:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
13030:                            end
13031:                    end},
13032: 
13033:          %% *** Termination ***
13034:          #{desc => "close connecting socket(s)",
13035:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = State0) ->
13036:                            socket:close(Sock),
13037:                            State1 = maps:remove(csockc, State0),
13038:                            State2 = maps:remove(csocks, State1), %% Auto-close
13039:                            {ok, maps:remove(csockc, State2)}
13040:                    end},
13041:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
13042:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
13043:                            socket:close(Sock),
13044:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
13045:                    end},
13046: 
13047:          %% *** We are done ***
13048:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
13049:         ],
13050: 
13051: 
13052:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
13053: 
13054:     i("start tester evaluator"),
13055:     InitState = #{domain  => Domain},
13056:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
13057: 
13058:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
13059:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
13060: 
13061: 
13062: 
13063: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
13064: 
13065: %% Tests the socket option acceptfilter. PLACEHOLDER!
13066: 
13067: api_opt_sock_acceptfilter(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
13068:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
13069:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_acceptfilter,
13070:            fun() -> not_yet_implemented() end,
13071:            fun() -> ok end).
13072: 
13073: 
13074: 
13075: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
13076: 
13077: %% Tests the socket option bindtodevice.
13078: %% It has not always been possible to 'get' this option
13079: %% (at least on linux).
13080: 
13081: api_opt_sock_bindtodevice(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
13082:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
13083:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_bindtodevice,
13084:            fun() -> has_support_sock_bindtodevice() end,
13085:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_bindtodevice() end).
13086: 
13087: 
13088: api_opt_sock_bindtodevice() ->
13089:     Opt = bindtodevice,
13090:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
13091:                   socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
13092:           end,
13093:     Get = fun(S) ->
13094:                   socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
13095:           end,
13096: 
13097:     TesterSeq =
13098:         [
13099:          #{desc => "which local address",
13100:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13101:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
13102:                                {ok, #{name := Name, addr := Addr}} ->
13103:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info (~p): "
13104:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
13105:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
13106:                                                [Domain, Name, Addr]),
13107:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
13108:                                            addr   => Addr},
13109:                                    {ok, State#{dev      => Name,
13110:                                                local_sa => LSA}};
13111:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13112:                                    ERROR
13113:                            end
13114:                    end},
13115:          #{desc => "create UDP socket 1",
13116:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13117:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
13118:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13119:                                    {ok, State#{usock1 => Sock}};
13120:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13121:                                    ERROR
13122:                            end
13123:                    end},
13124:          #{desc => "create UDP socket 2",
13125:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13126:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
13127:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13128:                                    {ok, State#{usock2 => Sock}};
13129:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13130:                                    ERROR
13131:                            end
13132:                    end},
13133:          #{desc => "create TCP socket 1",
13134:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13135:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
13136:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13137:                                    {ok, State#{tsock1 => Sock}};
13138:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13139:                                    ERROR
13140:                            end
13141:                    end},
13142:          #{desc => "create TCP socket 2",
13143:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13144:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
13145:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13146:                                    {ok, State#{tsock2 => Sock}};
13147:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13148:                                    ERROR
13149:                            end
13150:                    end},
13151: 
13152:          #{desc => "[get] verify UDP socket 1 (before bindtodevice)",
13153:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
13154:                            case Get(Sock) of
13155:                                {ok, Dev} ->
13156:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
13157:                                    ok;
13158:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
13159:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p => SKIP",
13160: 					       [Reason]),
13161:                                    {skip, Reason};
13162:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13163:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
