13164: 					       [Reason]),
13165:                                    ERROR
13166:                            end
13167:                    end},
13168:          #{desc => "[get] verify UDP socket 2 (before bind)",
13169:            cmd  => fun(#{usock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
13170:                            case Get(Sock) of
13171:                                {ok, Dev} ->
13172:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
13173:                                    ok;
13174:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13175:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13176:                                    ERROR
13177:                            end
13178:                    end},
13179:          #{desc => "[get] verify TCP socket 1 (before bindtodevice)",
13180:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
13181:                            case Get(Sock) of
13182:                                {ok, Dev} ->
13183:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
13184:                                    ok;
13185:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13186:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13187:                                    ERROR
13188:                            end
13189:                    end},
13190:          #{desc => "[get] verify TCP socket 2 (before bind)",
13191:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
13192:                            case Get(Sock) of
13193:                                {ok, Dev} ->
13194:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
13195:                                    ok;
13196:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13197:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13198:                                    ERROR
13199:                            end
13200:                    end},
13201: 
13202:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13203: 
13204:          #{desc => "Bind UDP socket 1 to device",
13205:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := Sock, dev := Dev} = State) ->
13206:                            case Set(Sock, Dev) of
13207:                                ok ->
13208:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
13209:                                    ok;
13210:                                {error, eperm = Reason} ->
13211:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13212:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
13213:                                    {ok, State#{usock1 => skip}};
13214:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13215:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13216:                                    ERROR
13217:                            end
13218:                    end},
13219:          #{desc => "Bind UDP socket 2 to local address",
13220:            cmd  => fun(#{usock2 := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
13221:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
13222:                                ok ->
13223:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
13224:                                    ok;
13225:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13226:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13227:                                    ERROR
13228:                            end
13229:                    end},
13230:          #{desc => "Bind TCP socket 1 to device",
13231:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := USock1,
13232:                          tsock1 := Sock, dev := Dev} = State) ->
13233:                            case Set(Sock, Dev) of
13234:                                ok ->
13235:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
13236:                                    ok;
13237:                                {error, eperm = Reason} when (USock1 =:= skip) ->
13238:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13239:                                    {skip, Reason};
13240:                                {error, eperm = Reason} ->
13241:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13242:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
13243:                                    {ok, State#{tsock1 => skip}};
13244:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13245:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13246:                                    ERROR
13247:                            end
13248:                    end},
13249:          #{desc => "Bind TCP socket 2 to local address",
13250:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock2 := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
13251:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
13252:                                ok ->
13253:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
13254:                                    ok;
13255:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13256:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13257:                                    ERROR
13258:                            end
13259:                    end},
13260: 
13261:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13262: 
13263:          #{desc => "[get] verify UDP socket 1 (after bindtodevice)",
13264:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := skip} = _State) ->
13265:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP'ed (previous eperm)"),
13266:                            ok;
13267:                       (#{usock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
13268:                            case Get(Sock) of
13269:                                {ok, Dev} ->
13270:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
13271:                                    ok;
13272:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13273:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13274:                                    ERROR
13275:                            end
13276:                    end},
13277:          #{desc => "[get] verify UDP socket 2 (after bind)",
13278:            cmd  => fun(#{usock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
13279:                            case Get(Sock) of
13280:                                {ok, Dev} ->
13281:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
13282:                                    ok;
13283:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13284:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13285:                                    ERROR
13286:                            end
13287:                    end},
13288:          #{desc => "[get] verify TCP socket 1 (after bindtodevice)",
13289:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock1 := skip} = _State) ->
13290:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP'ed (previous eperm)"),
13291:                            ok;
13292:                       (#{tsock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
13293:                            case Get(Sock) of
13294:                                {ok, Dev} ->
13295:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
13296:                                    ok;
13297:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13298:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13299:                                    ERROR
13300:                            end
13301:                    end},
13302:          #{desc => "[get] verify TCP socket 2 (after bind)",
13303:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
13304:                            case Get(Sock) of
13305:                                {ok, Dev} ->
13306:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
13307:                                    ok;
13308:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13309:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
13310:                                    ERROR
13311:                            end
13312:                    end},
13313: 
13314:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13315: 
13316:          %% *** Termination ***
13317:          #{desc => "close UDP socket 1",
13318:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := skip} = State) ->
13319:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP'ed (already closed)"),
13320:                            {ok, maps:remove(usock1, State)};
13321:                       (#{usock1 := Sock} = State) ->
13322:                            socket:close(Sock),
13323:                            {ok, maps:remove(usock1, State)}
13324:                    end},
13325:          #{desc => "close UDP socket 2",
13326:            cmd  => fun(#{usock2 := Sock} = State) ->
13327:                            socket:close(Sock),
13328:                            {ok, maps:remove(usock2, State)}
13329:                    end},
13330:          #{desc => "close TCP socket 1",
13331:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock1 := skip} = State) ->
13332:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP'ed (already closed)"),
13333:                            {ok, maps:remove(tsock1, State)};
13334:                       (#{tsock1 := Sock} = State) ->
13335:                            socket:close(Sock),
13336:                            {ok, maps:remove(tsock1, State)}
13337:                    end},
13338:          #{desc => "close TCP socket 2",
13339:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock2 := Sock} = State) ->
13340:                            socket:close(Sock),
13341:                            {ok, maps:remove(tsock2, State)}
13342:                    end},
13343: 
13344:          %% *** We are done ***
13345:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
13346:         ],
13347: 
13348:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
13349: 
13350:     i("start tester evaluator"),
13351:     InitState = #{domain  => Domain},
13352:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
13353: 
13354:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
13355:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
13356: 
13357: 
13358: 
13359: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
13360: 
13361: %% Tests the socket option broadcast.
13362: %% Make it possible for datagram sockets to send packets to a broadcast
13363: %% address (IPv4 only).
13364: 
13365: api_opt_sock_broadcast(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
13366:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
13367:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_broadcast,
13368:            fun() -> has_support_sock_broadcast() end,
13369:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_broadcast() end).
13370: 
13371: 
13372: api_opt_sock_broadcast() ->
13373:     Opt    = broadcast,
13374:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_boolean(Val) ->
13375:                      socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
13376:              end,
13377:     Get    = fun(S) ->
13378:                      socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
13379:              end,
13380: 
13381:     TesterSeq =
13382:         [
13383:          #{desc => "which local address",
13384:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13385:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
13386:                                {ok, #{name      := Name,
13387:                                       addr      := Addr,
13388:                                       broadaddr := BAddr}}
13389: 				 when (BAddr =/= undefined) ->
13390:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
13391:                                                "~n   Name:           ~p"
13392:                                                "~n   Addr:           ~p"
13393:                                                "~n   Broadcast Addr: ~p",
13394:                                                [Name, Addr, BAddr]),
13395:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
13396:                                            addr   => Addr},
13397:                                    BSA = #{family => Domain,
13398:                                            addr   => BAddr},
13399:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA,
13400:                                                bsa => BSA}};
13401: 			       {ok, _} ->
13402: 				   {skip, no_broadcast_address};
13403:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13404:                                    ERROR
13405:                            end
13406:                    end},
13407: 
13408:          #{desc => "[socket 1] create UDP socket (listening 1)",
13409:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13410:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
13411:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13412:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock}};
13413:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13414:                                    ERROR
13415:                            end
13416:                    end},
13417:          #{desc => "[socket 1] Bind UDP socket (to limited broadcast address)",
13418:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
13419: 			   BSA = #{family => inet,
13420: 				   addr   => broadcast},
13421:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try bind (socket 1) to: "
13422:                                        "~n   ~p", [BSA]),
13423:                            case socket:bind(Sock, BSA) of
13424:                                ok ->
13425:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
13426:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (bound): ~p",
13427:                                                [Port]),
13428:                                    {ok, State#{sa1 => BSA#{port => Port}}};
13429:                                {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
13430:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("~p => "
13431: 					       "SKIP limited broadcast test",
13432: 					       [Reason]),
13433:                                    {ok, State#{sa1 => skip}};
13434:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13435:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13436: 					       [Reason]),
13437:                                    ERROR
13438:                            end
13439:                    end},
13440:          #{desc => "[socket 1] UDP socket sockname",
13441:            cmd  => fun(#{sa1 := skip} = _State) ->
13442:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP limited broadcast test"),
13443:                            ok;
13444: 		      (#{sock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
13445: 			   case socket:sockname(Sock) of
13446: 			       {ok, SA} ->
13447: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("SA: ~p", [SA]),
13448: 				   ok;
13449: 			       {error, _} = ERROR ->
13450: 				   ERROR
13451: 			   end
13452:                    end},
13453: 
13454:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13455: 
13456:          #{desc => "[socket 2] create UDP socket (listening 2)",
13457:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13458:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
13459:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13460:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock}};
13461:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13462:                                    ERROR
13463:                            end
13464:                    end},
13465:          #{desc => "[socket 2] Bind UDP socket (to subnet-directed broadcast address)",
13466:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock,
13467: 			 bsa   := BSA} = State) ->
13468:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try bind (socket 1) to: "
13469:                                        "~n   ~p", [BSA]),
13470:                            case socket:bind(Sock, BSA) of
13471:                                ok ->
13472:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
13473:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (bound): ~p",
13474:                                                [Port]),
13475:                                    {ok, State#{sa2 => BSA#{port => Port}}};
13476:                                {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
13477:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("~p => "
13478: 					       "SKIP subnet-directed broadcast test",
13479: 					       [Reason]),
13480:                                    {ok, State#{sa2 => skip}};
13481:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13482:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13483: 					       [Reason]),
13484:                                    ERROR
13485:                            end
13486:                    end},
13487:          #{desc => "[socket 2] UDP socket sockname",
13488:            cmd  => fun(#{sa2 := skip} = _State) ->
13489:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP subnet-directed broadcast test"),
13490:                            ok;
13491: 		      (#{sock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
13492:                            case socket:sockname(Sock) of
13493:                                {ok, SA} ->
13494: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("SA: ~p", [SA]),
13495:                                    ok;
13496:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13497:                                    ERROR
13498:                            end
13499:                    end},
13500: 
13501:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13502: 
13503:          #{desc => "[socket 3] create UDP socket (sender)",
13504:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13505:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
13506:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13507:                                    {ok, State#{sock3 => Sock}};
13508:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13509:                                    ERROR
13510:                            end
13511:                    end},
13512:          #{desc => "[socket 3][get] verify UDP socket (before bind and set)",
13513:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = _State) ->
13514:                            case Get(Sock) of
13515:                                {ok, false} ->
13516:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
13517:                                                "broadcast not allowed"),
13518:                                    ok;
13519:                                {ok, true} ->
13520:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success result: "
13521:                                                "broadcast already allowed"),
13522:                                    ok;
13523:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13524:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13525: 					       [Reason]),
13526:                                    ERROR
13527:                            end
13528:                    end},
13529:          #{desc => "[socket 3] Try make broadcast allowed",
13530:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = _State) ->
13531:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
13532:                                ok ->
13533:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
13534:                                                "broadcast now allowed"),
13535:                                    ok;
13536:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13537:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13538: 					       [Reason]),
13539:                                    ERROR
13540:                            end
13541:                    end},
13542:          #{desc => "[socket 3] verify UDP socket broadcast allowed",
13543:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = _State) ->
13544:                            case Get(Sock) of
13545:                                {ok, true} ->
13546:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
13547:                                                "broadcast allowed"),
13548:                                    ok;
13549:                                {ok, false} ->
13550:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success result: "
13551:                                                "broadcast *not* allowed"),
13552:                                    ok;
13553:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13554:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13555: 					       [Reason]),
13556:                                    ERROR
13557:                            end
13558:                    end},
13559:          #{desc => "[socket 3] Bind UDP socket (to local address)",
13560:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
13561:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try bind (socket 2) to: "
13562:                                        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
13563:                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
13564:                                ok ->
13565:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
13566:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (bound): ~p",
13567:                                                [Port]),
13568:                                    {ok, State#{sa3 => LSA#{port => Port}}};
13569:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13570:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13571: 					       [Reason]),
13572:                                    ERROR
13573:                            end
13574:                    end},
13575:          #{desc => "[socket 3] verify UDP socket (after set)",
13576:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = _State) ->
13577:                            case Get(Sock) of
13578:                                {ok, true} ->
13579:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
13580:                                                "broadcast allowed"),
13581:                                    ok;
13582:                                {ok, false} ->
13583:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success result: "
13584:                                                "broadcast not allowed"),
13585:                                    {error, not_allowed};
13586:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13587:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13588: 					       [Reason]),
13589:                                    ERROR
13590:                            end
13591:                    end},
13592: 
13593: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13594: 
13595:          #{desc => "[socket 3] try send to limited broadcast address",
13596:            cmd  => fun(#{sa1 := skip} = _State) ->
13597:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP limited broadcast test (send)"),
13598: 			   ok;
13599: 		      (#{sock3 := Sock,
13600: 			 sa1   := Dest} = _State) ->
13601: 			   Data = list_to_binary("hejsan"),
13602: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try send to broadcast address: "
13603: 				       "~n   ~p", [Dest]),
13604: 			   case socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest) of
13605: 			       ok ->
13606: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
13607: 					       "broadcast message sent"),
13608: 				   ok;
13609: 			       {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13610: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13611: 					       [Reason]),
13612: 				   ERROR
13613: 			   end
13614: 		   end},
13615:          #{desc => "[socket 1] try recv",
13616:            cmd  => fun(#{sa1 := skip} = _State) ->
13617: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP limited broadcast test (recv)"),
13618: 			   ok;
13619: 		      (#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
13620:                            case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, 5000) of
13621:                                {ok, _} ->
13622:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
13623:                                                "received message"),
13624:                                    ok;
13625:                                {error, timeout = Reason} ->
13626:                                    %% Some platforms seem to balk at this.
13627:                                    %% It spossible to bind to this, and
13628:                                    %% send to it, but no data is received.
13629:                                    %% At some point we should investigate...
13630:                                    %% For now, we just skip this part of
13631:                                    %% the test...
13632:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13633: 					       [Reason]),
13634:                                    {ok, State#{sa1 => skip}};
13635:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13636:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13637: 					       [Reason]),
13638:                                    ERROR
13639:                            end
13640:                    end},
13641: 
13642: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13643: 
13644:          #{desc => "[socket 2] try send to subnet-directed broadcast address",
13645:            cmd  => fun(#{sa2 := skip} = _State) ->
13646: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP subnet-directed broadcast test "
13647:                                        "(send)"),
13648: 			   ok;
13649: 		      (#{sock2 := Sock,
13650:                          sa2   := Dest} = _State) ->
13651:                            Data = list_to_binary("hejsan"),
13652:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send to broadcast address: "
13653:                                        "~n   ~p", [Dest]),
13654:                            case socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest) of
13655:                                ok ->
13656:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
13657:                                                "broadcast message sent"),
13658:                                    ok;
13659:                                {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
13660:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p => SKIP",
13661:                                                [Reason]),
13662:                                    {skip, Reason};
13663:                                {error, eacces = Reason} ->
13664:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p => SKIP",
13665: 					       [Reason]),
13666:                                    {skip, Reason};
13667:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13668:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13669: 					       [Reason]),
13670:                                    ERROR
13671:                            end
13672:                    end},
13673:          #{desc => "[socket 2] try recv",
13674:            cmd  => fun(#{sa2 := skip} = _State) ->
13675: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP subnet-directed broadcast test "
13676:                                          "(recv)"),
13677: 			   ok;
13678: 		      (#{sock2 := Sock, sa2 := SA2} = _State) ->
13679:                            case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, 5000) of
13680:                                {ok, _} ->
13681:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
13682:                                                "received message"),
13683:                                    ok;
13684:                                {error, timeout = Reason} when (SA2 =:= skip) ->
13685:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13686: 					       [Reason]),
13687:                                    {skip, "receive timeout"};
13688:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13689:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13690: 					       [Reason]),
13691:                                    ERROR
13692:                            end
13693:                    end},
13694: 
13695:          %% *** Termination ***
13696:          #{desc => "[socket 3] close UDP socket (sender)",
13697:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = State0) ->
13698:                            socket:close(Sock),
13699: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock3, State0),
13700: 			   State2 = maps:remove(sa3,   State1),
13701: 			   {ok, State2}
13702:                    end},
13703:          #{desc => "[socket 2] close UDP socket (listener 2)",
13704:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock} = State0) ->
13705:                            socket:close(Sock),
13706: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock2, State0),
13707: 			   State2 = maps:remove(sa2,   State1),
13708:                            {ok, State2}
13709:                    end},
13710:          #{desc => "[socket 1] close UDP socket (listener 1)",
13711:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State0) ->
13712:                            socket:close(Sock),
13713: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock1, State0),
13714: 			   State2 = maps:remove(sa1,   State1),
13715:                            {ok, State2}
13716:                    end},
13717: 
13718:          %% *** We are done ***
13719:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
13720:         ],
13721: 
13722:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
13723: 
13724:     i("start tester evaluator"),
13725:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
13726:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
13727: 
13728:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
13729:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
13730: 
13731: 
13732: 
13733: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
13734: 
13735: %% Tests the socket option debug.
13736: %% On linux, this test requires that the user running the test to have
13737: %% CAP_NET_ADMIN capabilities or be root (effective user ID of 0), 
13738: %% therefore we explicitly test for the result eacces when attempting to
13739: %% set, and skip if we get it.
13740: 
13741: api_opt_sock_debug(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
13742:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
13743:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_debug,
13744:            fun() -> has_support_sock_debug() end,
13745:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_debug() end).
13746: 
13747: 
13748: api_opt_sock_debug() ->
13749:     Opt    = debug,
13750:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_integer(Val) ->
13751:                      socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
13752:              end,
13753:     Get    = fun(S) ->
13754:                      socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
13755:              end,
13756: 
13757:     TesterSeq =
13758:         [
13759:          #{desc => "which local address",
13760:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13761:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
13762:                                {ok, #{name      := Name,
13763:                                       addr      := Addr}} ->
13764:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
13765:                                                "~n   Name:           ~p"
13766:                                                "~n   Addr:           ~p",
13767:                                                [Name, Addr]),
13768:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
13769:                                            addr   => Addr},
13770:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
13771:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13772:                                    ERROR
13773:                            end
13774:                    end},
13775: 
13776:          #{desc => "create UDP socket",
13777:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13778:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
13779:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13780:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
13781:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13782:                                    ERROR
13783:                            end
13784:                    end},
13785:          #{desc => "Get current debug value",
13786:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
13787:                            case Get(Sock) of
13788:                                {ok, Debug} when is_integer(Debug) ->
13789:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Debug]),
13790:                                    {ok, State#{debug => Debug}};
13791:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13792:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
13793:                                                [Reason]),
13794:                                    ERROR
13795:                            end
13796:                    end},
13797:          #{desc => "Try enable socket debug",
13798:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, debug := Debug} = State) ->
13799: 			   NewDebug = Debug + 1,
13800:                            case Set(Sock, NewDebug) of
13801:                                ok ->
13802:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
13803:                                    {ok, State#{debug => NewDebug}};
13804:                                {error, eacces = Reason} ->
13805:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("NO ACCESS => SKIP"),
13806:                                    {skip, Reason};
13807:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13808:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
13809: 					       [Reason]),
13810:                                    ERROR
13811:                            end
13812:                    end},
13813:          #{desc => "Get current (new) debug value",
13814:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, debug := Debug} = _State) ->
13815:                            case Get(Sock) of
13816:                                {ok, Debug} when is_integer(Debug) ->
13817:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Debug]),
13818:                                    ok;
13819:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13820:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
13821:                                                [Reason]),
13822:                                    ERROR
13823:                            end
13824:                    end},
13825: 
13826:          %% *** Termination ***
13827:          #{desc => "close UDP socket",
13828:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State0) ->
13829:                            socket:close(Sock),
13830: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock, State0),
13831:                            {ok, State1}
13832:                    end},
13833: 
13834:          %% *** We are done ***
13835:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
13836:         ],
13837: 
13838:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
13839: 
13840:     i("start tester evaluator"),
13841:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
13842:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
13843: 
13844:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
13845:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
13846: 
13847: 
13848: 
13849: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
13850: 
13851: %% Tests the socket option domain.
13852: %% This is a read only option. Also not available on all platforms.
13853: 
13854: api_opt_sock_domain(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
13855:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
13856:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_domain,
13857:            fun() -> has_support_sock_domain() end,
13858:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_domain() end).
13859: 
13860: 
13861: api_opt_sock_domain() ->
13862:     Opt = domain,
13863:     Get = fun(S) ->
13864:                   socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
13865:           end,
13866: 
13867:     TesterSeq =
13868:         [
13869:          #{desc => "which local address",
13870:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13871:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
13872:                                {ok, #{name := Name,
13873:                                       addr := Addr}} ->
13874:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
13875:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
13876:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
13877:                                                [Name, Addr]),
13878:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
13879:                                            addr   => Addr},
13880:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
13881:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13882:                                    ERROR
13883:                            end
13884:                    end},
13885: 
13886:          #{desc => "create IPv4 UDP socket",
13887:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13888:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
13889:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13890:                                    {ok, State#{usock => Sock}};
13891:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13892:                                    ERROR
13893:                            end
13894:                    end},
13895:          #{desc => "Get domain for the UDP socket",
13896:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, usock := Sock} = _State) ->
13897:                            case Get(Sock) of
13898:                                {ok, Domain} ->
13899:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Domain]),
13900:                                    ok;
13901:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13902:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
13903:                                                [Reason]),
13904:                                    ERROR
13905:                            end
13906:                    end},
13907:          #{desc => "create TCP socket",
13908:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13909:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
13910:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13911:                                    {ok, State#{tsock => Sock}};
13912:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13913:                                    ERROR
13914:                            end
13915:                    end},
13916:          #{desc => "Get domain for the TCP socket",
13917:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, tsock := Sock} = _State) ->
13918:                            case Get(Sock) of
13919:                                {ok, Domain} ->
13920:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Domain]),
13921:                                    ok;
13922:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
13923:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
13924:                                                [Reason]),
13925:                                    ERROR
13926:                            end
13927:                    end},
13928: 
13929:          %% *** Termination ***
13930:          #{desc => "close UDP socket",
13931:            cmd  => fun(#{usock := Sock} = State0) ->
13932:                            socket:close(Sock),
13933: 			   State1 = maps:remove(usock, State0),
13934:                            {ok, State1}
13935:                    end},
13936:          #{desc => "close TCP socket",
13937:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock := Sock} = State0) ->
13938:                            socket:close(Sock),
13939: 			   State1 = maps:remove(tsock, State0),
13940:                            {ok, State1}
13941:                    end},
13942: 
13943:          %% *** We are done ***
13944:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
13945:         ],
13946: 
13947:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
13948: 
13949:     i("start tester evaluator"),
13950:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
13951:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
13952: 
13953:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
13954:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
13955: 
13956: 
13957: 
13958: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
13959: 
13960: %% Tests the socket option dontroute.
13961: %% The man page has the following to say:
13962: %% "Don't send via a gateway, send only to directly connected hosts.
13963: %%  The same effect can be achieved by setting the MSG_DONTROUTE
13964: %%  flag on a socket send(2) operation."
13965: %% Since its "kind of" difficult to check if it actually takes an 
13966: %% effect (you would need a gateway for that and a machine "on the
13967: %% other side"), we only test if we can set and get the value.
13968: %% Better then nothing.
13969: 
13970: api_opt_sock_dontroute(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
13971:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
13972:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_dontroute,
13973:            fun() -> has_support_sock_dontroute() end,
13974:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_dontroute() end).
13975: 
13976: 
13977: api_opt_sock_dontroute() ->
13978:     Opt    = dontroute,
13979:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_boolean(Val) ->
13980:                      socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
13981:              end,
13982:     Get    = fun(S) ->
13983:                      socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
13984:              end,
13985: 
13986:     TesterSeq =
13987:         [
13988:          #{desc => "which local address",
13989:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13990:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
13991:                                {ok, #{name := Name,
13992:                                       addr := Addr}} ->
13993:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
13994:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
13995:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
13996:                                                [Name, Addr]),
13997:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
13998:                                            addr   => Addr},
13999:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
14000:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14001:                                    ERROR
14002:                            end
14003:                    end},
14004: 
14005:          #{desc => "create UDP socket",
14006:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14007:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
14008:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14009:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
14010:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14011:                                    ERROR
14012:                            end
14013:                    end},
14014:          #{desc => "Get current value",
14015:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
14016:                            case Get(Sock) of
14017:                                {ok, Val} when is_boolean(Val) ->
14018:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Val]),
14019:                                    {ok, State#{dontroute => Val}};
14020:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14021:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
14022:                                                [Reason]),
14023:                                    ERROR
14024:                            end
14025:                    end},
14026:          #{desc => "Try change value",
14027:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, dontroute := Current} = State) ->
14028: 			   New = not Current,
14029:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Change from ~p to ~p", [Current, New]),
14030:                            case Set(Sock, New) of
14031:                                ok ->
14032:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
14033:                                    {ok, State#{dontroute => New}};
14034:                                {error, eopnotsupp = Reason} ->
14035:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p",
14036: 					       [Reason]),
14037:                                    {skip, Reason};
14038:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14039:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
14040: 					       [Reason]),
14041:                                    ERROR
14042:                            end
14043:                    end},
14044:          #{desc => "Verify changed value",
14045:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, dontroute := Val} = _State) ->
14046:                            case Get(Sock) of
14047:                                {ok, Val} ->
14048:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
14049:                                    ok;
14050:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14051:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
14052:                                                [Reason]),
14053:                                    ERROR
14054:                            end
14055:                    end},
14056: 
14057:          %% *** Termination ***
14058:          #{desc => "close UDP socket",
14059:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State0) ->
14060:                            socket:close(Sock),
14061: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock, State0),
14062:                            {ok, State1}
14063:                    end},
14064: 
14065:          %% *** We are done ***
14066:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
14067:         ],
14068: 
14069:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
14070: 
14071:     i("start tester evaluator"),
14072:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
14073:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
14074: 
14075:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
14076:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
14077: 
14078: 
14079: 
14080: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14081: 
14082: %% Tests the socket option error. PLACEHOLDER!
14083: 
14084: api_opt_sock_error(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14085:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
14086:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_error,
14087:            fun() -> not_yet_implemented() end,
14088:            fun() -> ok end).
14089: 
14090: 
14091: 
14092: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14093: 
14094: %% Tests the socket option keepalive.
14095: %% This is bit tricky to test, partly because we have no control over
14096: %% the underlying TCP timeouts. So, for now, we just test that we can
14097: %% change the value.
14098: 
14099: api_opt_sock_keepalive(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14100:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
14101:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_keepalive,
14102:            fun() -> has_support_sock_keepalive() end,
14103:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_keepalive() end).
14104: 
14105: 
14106: api_opt_sock_keepalive() ->
14107:     Opt    = keepalive,
14108:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_boolean(Val) ->
14109:                      socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
14110:              end,
14111:     Get    = fun(S) ->
14112:                      socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
14113:              end,
14114: 
14115:     TesterSeq =
14116:         [
14117:          #{desc => "which local address",
14118:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14119:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
14120:                                {ok, #{name      := Name,
14121:                                       addr      := Addr}} ->
14122:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
14123:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
14124:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
14125:                                                [Name, Addr]),
14126:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
14127:                                            addr   => Addr},
14128:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
14129:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14130:                                    ERROR
14131:                            end
14132:                    end},
14133: 
14134:          #{desc => "create TCP socket",
14135:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14136:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
14137:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14138:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
14139:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14140:                                    ERROR
14141:                            end
14142:                    end},
14143:          #{desc => "Get current value",
14144:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
14145:                            case Get(Sock) of
14146:                                {ok, Val} when is_boolean(Val) ->
14147:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Val]),
14148:                                    {ok, State#{keepalive => Val}};
14149:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14150:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
14151:                                                [Reason]),
14152:                                    ERROR
14153:                            end
14154:                    end},
14155:          #{desc => "Try change the value",
14156:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, keepalive := Current} = State) ->
14157: 			   New = not Current,
14158:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try change value from ~p to ~p", 
14159:                                        [Current, New]),
14160:                            case Set(Sock, New) of
14161:                                ok ->
14162:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
14163:                                    {ok, State#{keepalive => New}};
14164:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14165:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
14166: 					       [Reason]),
14167:                                    ERROR
14168:                            end
14169:                    end},
14170:          #{desc => "Verify (new) current value",
14171:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, keepalive := Val} = _State) ->
14172:                            case Get(Sock) of
14173:                                {ok, Val} ->
14174:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (~p)", [Val]),
14175:                                    ok;
14176:                                {ok, OtherVal} ->
14177:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success: ~p",
14178:                                                [OtherVal]),
14179:                                    {error, {unexpected_success_value,
14180:                                             Val, OtherVal}};
14181:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14182:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
14183:                                                [Reason]),
14184:                                    ERROR
14185:                            end
14186:                    end},
14187: 
14188:          %% *** Termination ***
14189:          #{desc => "close UDP socket",
14190:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State0) ->
14191:                            socket:close(Sock),
14192: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock, State0),
14193:                            {ok, State1}
14194:                    end},
14195: 
14196:          %% *** We are done ***
14197:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
14198:         ],
14199: 
14200:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
14201: 
14202:     i("start tester evaluator"),
14203:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
14204:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
14205: 
14206:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
14207:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
14208: 
14209: 
14210: 
14211: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14212: 
14213: %% Tests the socket option reuseaddr.
14214: %% This is the most basic of tests. We only test that we can set the
14215: %% option and then read back.
14216: 
14217: api_opt_sock_reuseaddr(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14218:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
14219:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
14220:            fun() ->
14221:                    %% [IPv4] Nothing to do with the option,
14222:                    %% [IPv4] but we use it the test so make
14223:                    %% [IPv4] use we have it.
14224:                    has_support_ipv4(),
14225:                    has_support_sock_reuseaddr()
14226:            end,
14227:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_reuseaddr() end).
14228: 
14229: 
14230: api_opt_sock_reuseaddr() ->
14231:     api_opt_simple_bool(inet, socket, stream, reuseaddr,
14232:                        #{bind => false}).
14233: 
14234: 
14235: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14236: 
14237: %% Tests the socket option exclusiveaddruse.
14238: %% This is the most basic of tests. We only test that we can set the
14239: %% option and then read back.
14240: 
14241: api_opt_sock_exclusiveaddruse(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14242:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
14243:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
14244:            fun() ->
14245:                    %% [IPv4] Nothing to do with the option,
14246:                    %% [IPv4] but we use it the test so make
14247:                    %% [IPv4] use we have it.
14248:                    has_support_ipv4(),
14249:                    has_support_sock_exclusiveaddruse()
14250:            end,
14251:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_exclusiveaddruse() end).
14252: 
14253: 
14254: api_opt_sock_exclusiveaddruse() ->
14255:     api_opt_simple_bool(inet, socket, stream, exclusiveaddruse,
14256: 			#{bind => false}).
14257: 
14258: 
14259: 
14260: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14261: 
14262: %% *Simple* test for a bool option.
14263: %% This basically just tests that we can set and get the option.
14264: %% This assumes that the option is supported.
14265: %% What if its required that the socket is bound before set/get?
14266: %% What if its required that set/get is done before bind?
14267: 
14268: api_opt_simple_bool(Domain, Level, Type, Option, InitState) ->
14269: 
14270:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_boolean(Val) ->
14271:                      socket:setopt(S, Level, Option, Val)
14272:              end,
14273:     Get    = fun(S) ->
14274:                      socket:getopt(S, Level, Option)
14275:              end,
14276: 
14277:     TesterSeq =
14278:         [
14279:          #{desc => "(maybe) which local address",
14280:            cmd  => fun(#{bind := true} = State) ->
14281:                            case ?SLIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
14282:                                {ok, #{name      := Name,
14283:                                       addr      := Addr}} ->
14284:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
14285:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
14286:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
14287:                                                [Name, Addr]),
14288:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
14289:                                            addr   => Addr},
14290:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
14291:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14292:                                    ERROR
14293:                            end;
14294:                       (_State) ->
14295:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("ignore get local address"),
14296:                            ok
14297:                    end},
14298: 
14299:          #{desc => "create socket",
14300:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
14301:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type) of
14302:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14303:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
14304:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14305:                                    ERROR
14306:                            end
14307:                    end},
14308: 
14309:          #{desc => "(maybe) bind",
14310:            cmd  => fun(#{bind := true, lsa := LSA, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14311:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try binding"),
14312:                            socket:bind(Sock, LSA);
14313:                       (_State) ->
14314:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("ignore binding"),
14315:                            ok
14316:                    end},
14317: 
14318:          #{desc => "Get current value",
14319:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
14320:                            case Get(Sock) of
14321:                                {ok, Val} when is_boolean(Val) ->
14322:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Val]),
14323:                                    {ok, State#{Option => Val}};
14324:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14325:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
14326:                                                [Reason]),
14327:                                    ERROR
14328:                            end
14329:                    end},
14330:          #{desc => "Try change the value",
14331:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
14332:                            Current = maps:get(Option, State),
14333: 			   New     = not Current,
14334:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try change value from ~p to ~p", 
14335:                                        [Current, New]),
14336:                            case Set(Sock, New) of
14337:                                ok ->
14338:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
14339:                                    {ok, State#{Option => New}};
14340:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14341:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
14342: 					       [Reason]),
14343:                                    ERROR
14344:                            end
14345:                    end},
14346:          #{desc => "Verify (new) current value",
14347:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
14348:                            Val = maps:get(Option, State),
14349:                            case Get(Sock) of
14350:                                {ok, Val} ->
14351:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (~p)", [Val]),
14352:                                    ok;
14353:                                {ok, OtherVal} ->
14354:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success: ~p",
14355:                                                [OtherVal]),
14356:                                    {error, {unexpected_success_value,
14357:                                             Val, OtherVal}};
14358:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14359:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
14360:                                                [Reason]),
14361:                                    ERROR
14362:                            end
14363:                    end},
14364: 
14365:          %% *** Termination ***
14366:          #{desc => "close socket",
14367:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State0) ->
14368:                            socket:close(Sock),
14369: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock, State0),
14370:                            {ok, State1}
14371:                    end},
14372: 
14373:          %% *** We are done ***
14374:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
14375:         ],
14376: 
14377:     i("start tester evaluator"),
14378:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
14379: 
14380:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
14381:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
14382: 
14383: 
14384: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14385: 
14386: %% Tests the socket option bsp_state.
14387: %% This is the most basic of tests. We test that we can,
14388: %% create sockets, bind and connect and extract bsp-state
14389: %% in the various state(s) of the socket.
14390: %% For both dgram and stream sockets.
14391: 
14392: api_opt_sock_bsp_state(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14393:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
14394:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
14395:            fun() ->
14396: 		   %% This is not a 'IPv4' option,
14397: 		   %% but since we used it in the test...
14398:                    has_support_ipv4(),
14399:                    has_support_sock_bsp_state()
14400:            end,
14401:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_bsp_state() end).
14402: 
14403: 
14404: api_opt_sock_bsp_state() ->
14405:     LSA        = which_local_socket_addr(inet),
14406:     BspState   = fun(S) ->
14407: 			 case socket:getopt(S, socket, bsp_state) of
14408: 			     {ok, BS} ->
14409: 				 BS;
14410: 			     {error, Reason} ->
14411: 				 ?FAIL({getopt_bsp_state, Reason})
14412: 			 end
14413: 		 end,
14414:     CreateSock = fun(T, P) ->
14415: 			 case socket:open(inet, T, P) of
14416: 			     {ok, Sock}      ->
14417: 				 Sock;
14418: 			     {error, Reason} ->
14419: 				 skip({socket_create_fail, Reason})
14420: 			 end
14421: 		 end,
14422:     CloseSock = fun(S) ->
14423: 			socket:close(S)
14424: 		end,
14425:     BindSock   = fun(S, SA) ->
14426: 			 case socket:bind(S, SA) of
14427: 			     ok ->
14428: 				 ok;
14429: 			     {error, Reason} ->
14430: 				 ?FAIL({bind, Reason})
14431: 			 end
14432: 		 end,
14433:     Sockname   = fun(S) ->
14434: 			 case socket:sockname(S) of
14435: 			     {ok, SA} ->
14436: 				 SA;
14437: 			     {error, Reason} ->
14438: 				 ?FAIL({sockname, Reason})
14439: 			 end
14440: 		 end,
14441:     %% Setopt      = fun(S, L, O, V) ->
14442:     %% 			  socket:setopt(S, L, O, V)
14443:     %% 		  end,
14444:     %% SetOtpOpt = fun(S, O, V) -> Setopt(S, otp, O, V) end,
14445:     %% SetDebug  = fun(S, D) when is_boolean(D) -> SetOptOpt(S, debug, D) end,
14446:     %% EnableDebug = fun(S) -> SetDebug(S, true) end,
14447:     ConnectSock = fun(S, SA) ->
14448: 			  case socket:connect(S, SA) of
14449: 			      ok ->
14450: 				  ok;
14451: 			      {error, Reason} ->
14452: 				  ?FAIL({connect, Reason})
14453: 			  end
14454: 		  end,
14455:     ListenSock = fun(S) ->
14456: 			 case socket:listen(S) of
14457: 			     ok ->
14458: 				 ok;
14459: 			     {error, Reason} ->
14460: 				 ?FAIL({listen, Reason})
14461: 			 end
14462: 		 end,
14463:     AcceptSock = fun(S) ->
14464: 			 case socket:accept(S) of
14465: 			     {ok, A} ->
14466: 				 A;
14467: 			     {error, Reason} ->
14468: 				 ?FAIL({accept, Reason})
14469: 			 end
14470: 		 end,
14471: 
14472:     VerifyBspState = fun(S, Type, Proto,
14473: 			 Bound, Connected) ->
14474: 			     verify_bsp_state(S, Type, Proto,
14475: 					      Bound, Connected)
14476: 		     end,
14477: 
14478:     ?P("Create UDP socket 1:"),
14479:     US1 = CreateSock(dgram, udp),
14480:     ?P("UDP[1] [Unbound | Unconnected] => ~p", [BspState(US1)]),
14481:     VerifyBspState(BspState(US1), dgram, udp, false, false),
14482: 
14483:     ?P("Create UDP socket 2:"),
14484:     US2 = CreateSock(dgram, udp),
14485:     ?P("UDP[2] [Unbound | Unconnected] => ~p", [BspState(US2)]),
14486:     VerifyBspState(BspState(US2), dgram, udp, false, false),
14487: 
14488:     ?P("Bind UDP socket 1"),
14489:     BindSock(US1, LSA),
14490:     ?P("UDP[1] [Bound | Unconnected]   => ~p", [BspState(US1)]),
14491:     VerifyBspState(BspState(US1), dgram, udp, true, false),
14492: 
14493:     ?P("Bind UDP socket 2"),
14494:     BindSock(US2, LSA),
14495:     ?P("UDP[2] [Bound | Unconnected]   => ~p", [BspState(US2)]),
14496:     VerifyBspState(BspState(US2), dgram, udp, true, false),
14497: 
14498:     %% We have not yet implemented 'connect' for UDP on Windows,
14499:     %% so we leave this commented for now:
14500: 
14501:     %% ?P("socknames"),
14502:     %% USN1 = Sockname(US1),
14503:     %% USN2 = Sockname(US2),
14504: 
14505:     %% ?P("enable debug for US1"),
14506:     %% EnableDebug(US1),
14507: 
14508:     %% ?P("Connect UDP socket 1 to"
14509:     %%    "~n   ~p", [USN2]),
14510:     %% ConnectSock(US1, USN2),
14511:     %% ?P("UDP[1] [Bound | Connected]     => ~p", [BspState(US1)]),
14512: 
14513:     %% ?P("Connect UDP socket 2 to"
14514:     %%    "~n   ~p", [USN1]),
14515:     %% ConnectSock(US2, USN1),
14516:     %% ?P("UDP[2] [Bound | Connected]     => ~p", [BspState(US2)]),
14517: 
14518: 
14519:     ?P("Create TCP socket 1:"),
14520:     TS1 = CreateSock(stream, tcp),
14521:     ?P("TCP[1] [Unbound | Unconnected] => ~p", [BspState(TS1)]),
14522:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS1), stream, tcp, false, false),
14523: 
14524:     ?P("Create TCP socket 2 (listen):"),
14525:     TS2 = CreateSock(stream, tcp),
14526:     ?P("TCP[2] [Unbound | Unconnected] => ~p", [BspState(TS2)]),
14527:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS2), stream, tcp, false, false),
14528: 
14529:     ?P("Bind TCP socket 1"),
14530:     BindSock(TS1, LSA),
14531:     ?P("TCP[1] [Bound | Unconnected]   => ~p", [BspState(TS1)]),
14532:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS1), stream, tcp, true, false),
14533: 
14534:     ?P("Bind TCP socket 2"),
14535:     BindSock(TS2, LSA),
14536:     ?P("TCP[2] [Bound | Unconnected]   => ~p", [BspState(TS2)]),
14537:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS2), stream, tcp, true, false),
14538: 
14539:     ?P("Make TCP socket 2 listen"),
14540:     ListenSock(TS2),
14541: 
14542:     ?P("socknames"),
14543:     TSN2 = Sockname(TS2),
14544: 
14545:     ?P("Connect TCP socket 1 to"
14546:        "~n   ~p", [TSN2]),
14547:     ConnectSock(TS1, TSN2),
14548:     ?P("TCP[1] [Bound | Connected]   => ~p", [BspState(TS1)]),
14549:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS1), stream, tcp, true, true),
14550: 
14551:     ?P("Accept TCP socket 3"),
14552:     TS3 = AcceptSock(TS2),
14553:     ?P("TCP[3] [Bound | Connected]   => ~p", [BspState(TS3)]),
14554:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS3), stream, tcp, true, true),
14555: 
14556:     ?P("Close socket(s)"),
14557:     CloseSock(TS3),
14558:     CloseSock(TS2),
14559:     CloseSock(TS1),
14560: 
14561:     ?P("done"),
14562:     ok.
14563: 
14564: 
14565: verify_bsp_state(#{type        := T,
14566: 		   protocol    := P,
14567: 		   local_addr  := LA,
14568: 		   remote_addr := RA},
14569: 		 Type, Proto,
14570: 		 Bound, Connected) when (T =:= Type) andalso (P =:= Proto) ->
14571:     case {Bound, LA} of
14572: 	{false, undefined} ->
14573: 	    ok;
14574: 	{true, _} when (LA =/= undefined) ->
14575: 	    ok;
14576: 	_ ->
14577: 	    ?FAIL({invalid_bound_la, Bound, LA})
14578:     end,
14579:     case {Connected, RA} of
14580: 	{false, undefined} ->
14581: 	    ok;
14582: 	{true, _} when (RA =/= undefined) ->
14583: 	    ok;
14584: 	_ ->
14585: 	    ?FAIL({invalid_connected_ra, Connected, RA})
14586:     end,
14587:     ok;
14588: verify_bsp_state(#{type     := T,
14589: 		   protocol := P},
14590: 		 Type, Proto,
14591: 		 _Bound, _Connected) ->
14592:     ?FAIL({invalid_type_or_proto, {T, Type}, {P, Proto}}).
14593: 
14594: 
14595:     
14596: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14597: 
14598: %% Tests the socket option linger. PLACEHOLDER!
14599: 
14600: api_opt_sock_linger(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14601:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
14602:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_linger,
14603:            fun() -> not_yet_implemented() end,
14604:            fun() -> ok end).
14605: 
14606: 
14607: 
14608: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14609: 
14610: %% Tests the socket option mark. PLACEHOLDER!
14611: 
14612: api_opt_sock_mark(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14613:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
14614:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_mark,
14615:            fun() -> not_yet_implemented() end,
14616:            fun() -> ok end).
14617: 
14618: 
14619: 
14620: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14621: 
14622: %% Tests the socket option maxdg.
14623: 
14624: api_opt_sock_maxdg(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14625:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
14626:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
14627: 	   fun() ->
14628: 		   %% This is not a 'IPv4' option,
14629: 		   %% but since we used it in the test...
14630:                    has_support_ipv4(),
14631:                    has_support_sock_maxdg()
14632:            end,
14633:            fun() -> do_api_opt_sock_maxdg() end).
14634: 
14635: do_api_opt_sock_maxdg() ->
14636:     ?P("create DGRAM socket"),
14637:     {ok, S} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
14638:     ?P("get maxdg"),
14639:     case socket:getopt(S, socket, maxdg) of
14640: 	{ok, Sz} ->
14641: 	    ?P("success: Sz = ~p", [Sz]),
14642: 	    ok;
14643: 	{error, Reason} ->
14644: 	    ?FAIL({failed_get_maxdg, Reason})
14645:     end.
14646: 
14647: 
14648: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14649: 
14650: %% Tests the socket option max_msg_size.
14651: 
14652: api_opt_sock_max_msg_size(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14653:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
14654:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
14655: 	   fun() ->
14656: 		   %% This is not a 'IPv4' option,
14657: 		   %% but since we used it in the test...
14658:                    has_support_ipv4(),
14659:                    has_support_sock_max_msg_size()
14660:            end,
14661:            fun() -> do_api_opt_sock_max_msg_size() end).
14662: 
14663: do_api_opt_sock_max_msg_size() ->
14664:     {ok, S} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
14665:     case socket:getopt(S, socket, max_msg_size) of
14666: 	{ok, Sz} ->
14667: 	    ?P("success: Sz = ~p", [Sz]),
14668: 	    ok;
14669: 	{error, Reason} ->
14670: 	    ?FAIL({failed_get_max_msg_size, Reason})
14671:     end.
14672: 
14673: 
14674: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14675: 
14676: %% This test case tries to test that the oobinline socket 'socket' option
14677: %% works.
14678: %% So, this is done on the receiving side: 
14679: %%
14680: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, oobinline, boolean()).
14681: %%
14682: %% This works on linux of some version (at least linux kernel 4.15.0),
14683: %% but not on FreeBSD (12) for some reason. Until we have figured out
14684: %% exctly why, we skip a bunch of OSs...
14685: %%
14686: %% Do we need to make sure the two entities does not run in the same
14687: %% process? This test case does not currently do that (which works in'
14688: %% linux but maybe not in, say, FreeBSD).
14689: %%
14690: 
14691: api_opt_sock_oobinline(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14692:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
14693:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_ooinline,
14694:            fun() ->
14695:                    has_support_sock_oobinline(),
14696:                    has_support_msg_flag(oob),
14697:                    is_valid_oobinline_platform()
14698:            end,
14699:            fun() ->
14700:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
14701:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, oobinline, Value)
14702:                           end,
14703:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
14704:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, oobinline)
14705:                           end,
14706:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, true) ->
14707:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data, [oob]);
14708:                              (Sock, Data, false) ->
14709:                                      socket:send(Sock, Data)
14710:                           end,
14711:                    Recv = fun(Sock, true) ->
14712:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, [oob]);
14713:                              (Sock, false) ->
14714:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
14715:                           end,
14716:                    InitState = #{domain => inet_or_inet6(),
14717:                                  proto  => tcp,
14718:                                  send   => Send,
14719:                                  recv   => Recv,
14720:                                  set    => Set,
14721:                                  get    => Get},
14722:                    ok = do_api_opt_sock_oobinline(InitState)
14723:            end).
14724: 
14725: %% Hopefully this is a temporary solution...
14726: is_valid_oobinline_platform() ->
14727:     case os:type() of
14728:         {unix, linux} ->
14729:             ok;
14730: 
14731:         Type ->
14732:             %% Actually, all we know is that the
14733:             %% test case only work for linux, but
14734:             %% it *should* for FreeBSD and Solaris
14735:             %% also...
14736:             not_supported(Type)
14737:     end.
14738:     
14739: 
14740: 
14741: 
14742: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14743: 
14744: do_api_opt_sock_oobinline(InitState) ->
14745:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
14746:     ServerSeq =
14747:         [
14748:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
14749:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
14750:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
14751:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
14752:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
14753:                    end},
14754:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
14755:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14756:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
14757:                            ok
14758:                    end},
14759: 
14760:          %% *** Init part ***
14761:          #{desc => "which local address",
14762:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14763:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
14764:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
14765:                    end},
14766:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
14767:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
14768:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
14769:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
14770:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14771:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
14772:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14773:                                    ERROR
14774:                            end
14775:                    end},
14776:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
14777:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
14778:                          lsock  := LSock,
14779:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
14780:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
14781:                                ok ->
14782:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
14783:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14784:                                    ERROR
14785:                            end;
14786:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
14787:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
14788:                                ok ->
14789:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
14790:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
14791:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
14792:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14793:                                    ERROR
14794:                            end
14795:                    end},
14796:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
14797:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
14798:                            socket:listen(LSock)
14799:                    end},
14800:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
14801:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
14802:                          tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
14803:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
14804:                            ok;
14805:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
14806:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
14807:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
14808:                            ok
14809:                    end},
14810: 
14811: 
14812:          %% The actual test
14813:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
14814:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14815:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
14816:                    end},
14817:          #{desc => "await connection",
14818:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
14819:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
14820:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14821:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
14822:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
14823:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14824:                                    ERROR
14825:                            end
14826:                    end},
14827:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
14828:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14829:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
14830:                            ok
14831:                    end},
14832: 
14833:          %% *** no oobinline ***
14834: 
14835:          #{desc => "await continue (verify no oobinline)",
14836:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
14837:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_oobinline)
14838:                    end},
14839:          #{desc => "verify no oobinline",
14840:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
14841:                            case Get(Sock) of
14842:                                {ok, false = _Value} ->
14843:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("oobinline: ~p", [_Value]),
14844:                                    ok;
14845:                                {ok, Unexpected} ->
14846:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected oobinline: ~p",
14847:                                                [Unexpected]),
14848:                                    {error, {unexpected_oobinline, Unexpected}};
14849:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14850:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting oobinline:"
14851:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
14852:                                    ERROR
14853:                            end                                   
14854:                    end},
14855:          #{desc => "announce ready (no oobinline)",
14856:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14857:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, no_oobinline),
14858:                            ok
14859:                    end},
14860: 
14861:          #{desc => "await continue (recv no oobinline)",
