14862:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14863:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
14864:                    end},
14865:          #{desc => "await plain data",
14866:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
14867:                            case Recv(Sock, false) of
14868:                                {ok, <<"a">>} ->
14869:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received plain data"),
14870:                                    ok;
14871:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14872:                                    ERROR
14873:                            end
14874:                    end},
14875:          #{desc => "announce ready (plain data)",
14876:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14877:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_plain),
14878:                            ok
14879:                    end},
14880:          #{desc => "await oob data",
14881:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
14882:                            case Recv(Sock, true) of
14883:                                {ok, <<"b">>} ->
14884:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received oob data"),
14885:                                    ok;
14886:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14887:                                    ERROR
14888:                            end
14889:                    end},
14890:          #{desc => "announce ready (oob data)",
14891:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14892:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_oob),
14893:                            ok
14894:                    end},
14895: 
14896:          %% *** oobinline ***
14897: 
14898:           #{desc => "await continue (enable oobinline)",
14899:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
14900:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, enable_oobinline)
14901:                    end},
14902:          #{desc => "enable oobinline",
14903:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
14904:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
14905:                                ok ->
14906:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("oobinline enabled"),
14907:                                    ok;
14908:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14909:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed enable oobinline:"
14910:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
14911:                                    ERROR
14912:                            end                                   
14913:                    end},
14914:          #{desc => "announce ready (oobinline)",
14915:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14916:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, oobinline),
14917:                            ok
14918:                    end},
14919: 
14920:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
14921:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
14922:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
14923:                    end},
14924:        #{desc => "await (recv) data",
14925:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
14926:                            case Recv(Sock, false) of
14927:                                {ok, <<"ba">>} ->
14928:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected message: "
14929:                                                "both plain and oob data"),
14930:                                    ok;
14931:                                {ok, BadMsg} ->
14932:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("received unexpected message: ~p",
14933:                                                [BadMsg]),
14934:                                    {error, {unexpected_msg, BadMsg}};
14935:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14936:                                    ERROR
14937:                            end
14938:                    end},
14939:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
14940:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14941:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
14942:                            ok
14943:                    end},
14944: 
14945:          %% *** Termination ***
14946:          #{desc => "await terminate",
14947:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
14948:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
14949:                                ok ->
14950:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
14951:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14952:                                    ERROR
14953:                            end
14954:                    end},
14955:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
14956:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
14957:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
14958:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
14959:                    end},
14960:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
14961:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
14962:                          lsock    := Sock,
14963:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
14964:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
14965:                            State1 =
14966:                                unlink_path(Path,
14967:                                            fun() ->
14968:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
14969:                                            end,
14970:                                            fun() -> State end),
14971:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
14972:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
14973:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
14974:                                ok ->
14975:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
14976:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14977:                                    ERROR
14978:                            end
14979:                    end},
14980: 
14981:          %% *** We are done ***
14982:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
14983:         ],
14984: 
14985: 
14986:     ClientSeq =
14987:         [
14988:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
14989:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
14990:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
14991:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
14992:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
14993:                       (State) ->
14994:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
14995:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
14996:                    end},
14997:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
14998:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14999:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
15000:                            ok
15001:                    end},
15002: 
15003:          %% *** The init part ***
15004:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
15005:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
15006:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
15007:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
15008:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
15009:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
15010:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
15011:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
15012:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
15013:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
15014:                    end},
15015:          #{desc => "create socket",
15016:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
15017:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
15018:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
15019:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15020:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
15021:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15022:                                    ERROR
15023:                            end
15024:                    end},
15025:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
15026:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
15027:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
15028:                                ok ->
15029:                                    ok;
15030:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15031:                                    ERROR
15032:                            end
15033:                    end},
15034:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
15035:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15036:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
15037:                            ok
15038:                    end},
15039: 
15040:          %% *** The actual test ***
15041:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
15042:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15043:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
15044:                    end},
15045:          #{desc => "connect to server",
15046:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
15047:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
15048:                    end},
15049:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
15050:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15051:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
15052:                            ok
15053:                    end},
15054: 
15055:          %% *** First batch of data (no oobinline) ***
15056: 
15057:          #{desc => "await continue (send data)",
15058:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15059:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
15060:                    end},
15061:          #{desc => "send plain data",
15062:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15063:                            Send(Sock, <<"a">>, false)
15064:                    end},
15065:          %% #{desc => "enable (socket & global) debug",
15066:          %%   cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
15067:          %%                   ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
15068:          %%                   ok = socket:debug(true)
15069:          %%           end},
15070:          #{desc => "send oob data",
15071:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15072:                            Send(Sock, <<"b">>, true)
15073:                    end},
15074:          %% #{desc => "disable (socket) debug",
15075:          %%   cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
15076:          %%                   ok = socket:debug(true),
15077:          %%                   ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false)
15078:          %%           end},
15079:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
15080:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15081:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
15082:                            ok
15083:                    end},
15084: 
15085:          %% *** Second batch of data (oobinline) ***
15086: 
15087:          #{desc => "await continue (send data)",
15088:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15089:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
15090:                    end},
15091:          #{desc => "send plain data",
15092:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15093:                            Send(Sock, <<"a">>, false)
15094:                    end},
15095:          #{desc => "send oob data",
15096:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15097:                            Send(Sock, <<"b">>, true)
15098:                    end},
15099:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
15100:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15101:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
15102:                            ok
15103:                    end},
15104: 
15105:          %% *** Termination ***
15106:          #{desc => "await terminate",
15107:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
15108:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
15109:                                ok ->
15110:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
15111:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15112:                                    ERROR
15113:                            end
15114:                    end},
15115:          #{desc => "close socket",
15116:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
15117:                          sock     := Sock,
15118:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
15119:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
15120:                            State1 =
15121:                                unlink_path(Path,
15122:                                            fun() ->
15123:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
15124:                                            end,
15125:                                            fun() -> State end),
15126:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
15127:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
15128:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
15129:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
15130:                    end},
15131: 
15132:          %% *** We are done ***
15133:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15134:         ],
15135: 
15136: 
15137:     TesterSeq =
15138:         [
15139:          %% *** Init part ***
15140:          #{desc => "monitor server",
15141:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
15142:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
15143:                            ok
15144:                    end},
15145:          #{desc => "monitor client",
15146:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
15147:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
15148:                            ok
15149:                    end},
15150: 
15151:          %% Start the server
15152:          #{desc => "order server start",
15153:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
15154:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
15155:                            ok
15156:                    end},
15157:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
15158:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
15159:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
15160:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
15161:                    end},
15162: 
15163:          %% Start the client
15164:          #{desc => "order client start",
15165:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
15166:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
15167:                            ok
15168:                    end},
15169:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
15170:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
15171:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
15172:                    end},
15173: 
15174:          %% *** The actual test ***
15175:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
15176:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15177:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
15178:                            ok
15179:                    end},
15180:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
15181:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
15182:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15183:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
15184:                            ok
15185:                    end},
15186:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
15187:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15188:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
15189:                    end},
15190:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
15191:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15192:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
15193:                    end},
15194: 
15195:          %% *** First batch of data (no oobinline) ***
15196: 
15197:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with verify no oobinline)",
15198:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15199:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_oobinline),
15200:                            ok
15201:                    end},
15202:          #{desc => "await server ready (no oobinline)",
15203:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15204:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, no_oobinline)
15205:                    end},
15206: 
15207:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send)",
15208:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15209:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
15210:                            ok
15211:                    end},
15212:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send)",
15213:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15214:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send)
15215:                    end},
15216:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with recv plain)",
15217:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15218:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv),
15219:                            ok
15220:                    end},
15221:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv plain)",
15222:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15223:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_plain)
15224:                    end},
15225:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv oob)",
15226:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15227:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_oob)
15228:                    end},
15229: 
15230:          %% Second message (w timestamp)
15231: 
15232:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with enable oobinline)",
15233:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15234:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, enable_oobinline),
15235:                            ok
15236:                    end},
15237:          #{desc => "await server ready (oobinline)",
15238:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15239:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, oobinline)
15240:                    end},
15241: 
15242:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send)",
15243:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15244:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
15245:                            ok
15246:                    end},
15247:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send)",
15248:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15249:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send)
15250:                    end},
15251:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with recv)",
15252:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15253:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv),
15254:                            ok
15255:                    end},
15256:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv plain)",
15257:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15258:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv)
15259:                    end},
15260: 
15261: 
15262:          %% *** Termination ***
15263:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
15264:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15265:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
15266:                            ok
15267:                    end},
15268:          #{desc => "await client termination",
15269:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
15270:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
15271:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
15272:                            {ok, State1}
15273:                    end},
15274:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
15275:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15276:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
15277:                            ok
15278:                    end},
15279:          #{desc => "await server termination",
15280:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
15281:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
15282:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
15283:                            {ok, State1}
15284:                    end},
15285: 
15286:          %% *** We are done ***
15287:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15288:         ],
15289: 
15290: 
15291:     i("start server evaluator"),
15292:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
15293: 
15294:     i("start client evaluator"),
15295:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
15296: 
15297:     i("start tester evaluator"),
15298:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
15299:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
15300:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
15301: 
15302:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
15303: 
15304: 
15305: 
15306: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15307: 
15308: %% Tests that the credentials control message header is received when
15309: %% setting the socket 'socket' option true when using sendmsg/recvmsg
15310: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
15311: %% So, this is done on the receiving side: 
15312: %%
15313: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, passcred, boolean()).
15314: %%
15315: %% We *may* need to run the different entities (server and client) in 
15316: %% separate VM (os processes) for this to actually work.
15317: %% As it is now, the client does *not* get any credentials!
15318: %% Until this has been done, this case is skipped!.
15319: 
15320: api_opt_sock_passcred_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
15321:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
15322:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_passcred_tcp4,
15323:            fun() -> has_support_sock_passcred(),
15324:                     not_yet_implemented()
15325:            end,
15326:            fun() ->
15327:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
15328:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, passcred, Value)
15329:                           end,
15330:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
15331:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, passcred)
15332:                           end,
15333:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
15334:                                   Msg = #{iov  => [Data]},
15335:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
15336:                           end,
15337:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
15338:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
15339:                                       {ok, #{ctrl := CMsgs,
15340:                                              iov  := [Data]}} ->
15341:                                           {ok, {CMsgs, Data}};
15342:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
15343:                                           ERROR
15344:                                   end
15345:                           end,
15346:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
15347:                                  proto  => tcp,
15348:                                  send   => Send,
15349:                                  recv   => Recv,
15350:                                  set    => Set,
15351:                                  get    => Get},
15352:                    ok = api_opt_sock_passcred_tcp(InitState)
15353:            end).
15354: 
15355: 
15356: 
15357: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15358: 
15359: api_opt_sock_passcred_tcp(InitState) ->
15360:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
15361:     ServerSeq =
15362:         [
15363:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
15364:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
15365:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
15366:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
15367:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
15368:                    end},
15369:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
15370:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15371:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
15372:                            ok
15373:                    end},
15374: 
15375:          %% *** Init part ***
15376:          #{desc => "which local address",
15377:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15378:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
15379:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
15380:                    end},
15381:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
15382:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
15383:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
15384:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
15385:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15386:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
15387:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15388:                                    ERROR
15389:                            end
15390:                    end},
15391:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
15392:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
15393:                          lsock  := LSock,
15394:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
15395:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
15396:                                ok ->
15397:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
15398:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15399:                                    ERROR
15400:                            end;
15401:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
15402:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
15403:                                ok ->
15404:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
15405:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
15406:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
15407:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15408:                                    ERROR
15409:                            end
15410:                    end},
15411:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
15412:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
15413:                            socket:listen(LSock)
15414:                    end},
15415:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
15416:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
15417:                          tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
15418:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
15419:                            ok;
15420:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
15421:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
15422:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
15423:                            ok
15424:                    end},
15425: 
15426: 
15427:          %% The actual test
15428:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
15429:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15430:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
15431:                    end},
15432:          #{desc => "await connection",
15433:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
15434:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
15435:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15436:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
15437:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
15438:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15439:                                    ERROR
15440:                            end
15441:                    end},
15442:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
15443:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15444:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
15445:                            ok
15446:                    end},
15447: 
15448:          %% *** First message ***
15449: 
15450:          #{desc => "await (recv) request 1",
15451:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
15452:                            case Recv(Sock) of
15453:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
15454:                                    ok;
15455:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15456:                                    ERROR
15457:                            end
15458:                    end},
15459:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
15460:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15461:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
15462:                            ok
15463:                    end},
15464:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
15465:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15466:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
15467:                    end},
15468:          #{desc => "send reply",
15469:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15470:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
15471:                    end},
15472:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
15473:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15474:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
15475:                            ok
15476:                    end},
15477: 
15478:          %% *** Second message ***
15479: 
15480:          #{desc => "await (recv) request 2",
15481:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
15482:                            case Recv(Sock) of
15483:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
15484:                                    ok;
15485:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15486:                                    ERROR
15487:                            end
15488:                    end},
15489:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
15490:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15491:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
15492:                            ok
15493:                    end},
15494:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
15495:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15496:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
15497:                    end},
15498:          #{desc => "send reply",
15499:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15500:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
15501:                    end},
15502:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
15503:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15504:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
15505:                            ok
15506:                    end},
15507: 
15508:          %% *** Third message ***
15509: 
15510:          #{desc => "await (recv) request 3",
15511:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
15512:                            case Recv(Sock) of
15513:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
15514:                                    ok;
15515:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15516:                                    ERROR
15517:                            end
15518:                    end},
15519:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
15520:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15521:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
15522:                            ok
15523:                    end},
15524:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
15525:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15526:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
15527:                    end},
15528:          #{desc => "send reply",
15529:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15530:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
15531:                    end},
15532:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
15533:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15534:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
15535:                            ok
15536:                    end},
15537: 
15538:          %% *** Termination ***
15539:          #{desc => "await terminate",
15540:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
15541:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
15542:                                ok ->
15543:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
15544:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15545:                                    ERROR
15546:                            end
15547:                    end},
15548:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
15549:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
15550:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
15551:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
15552:                    end},
15553:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
15554:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
15555:                          lsock    := Sock,
15556:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
15557:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
15558:                            State1 =
15559:                                unlink_path(Path,
15560:                                            fun() ->
15561:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
15562:                                            end,
15563:                                            fun() -> State end),
15564:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
15565:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
15566:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
15567:                                ok ->
15568:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
15569:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15570:                                    ERROR
15571:                            end
15572:                    end},
15573: 
15574:          %% *** We are done ***
15575:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15576:         ],
15577: 
15578: 
15579:     ClientSeq =
15580:         [
15581:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
15582:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
15583:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
15584:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
15585:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
15586:                       (State) ->
15587:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
15588:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
15589:                    end},
15590:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
15591:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15592:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
15593:                            ok
15594:                    end},
15595: 
15596:          %% *** The init part ***
15597:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
15598:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
15599:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
15600:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
15601:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
15602:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
15603:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
15604:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
15605:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
15606:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
15607:                    end},
15608:          #{desc => "create socket",
15609:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
15610:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
15611:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
15612:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15613:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
15614:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15615:                                    ERROR
15616:                            end
15617:                    end},
15618:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
15619:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
15620:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
15621:                                ok ->
15622:                                    ok;
15623:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15624:                                    ERROR
15625:                            end
15626:                    end},
15627:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
15628:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15629:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
15630:                            ok
15631:                    end},
15632: 
15633:          %% *** The actual test ***
15634:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
15635:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15636:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
15637:                    end},
15638:          #{desc => "connect to server",
15639:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
15640:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
15641:                    end},
15642:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
15643:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15644:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
15645:                            ok
15646:                    end},
15647: 
15648:          %% *** First message (default=wo passcred) ***
15649: 
15650:          #{desc => "await continue (verify timestamp off)",
15651:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15652:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_passcred)
15653:                    end},
15654:          #{desc => "verify passcred off",
15655:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
15656:                            case Get(Sock) of
15657:                                {ok, false = _Value} ->
15658:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("passcred: ~p", [_Value]),
15659:                                    ok;
15660:                                {ok, Unexpected} ->
15661:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected passcred: ~p",
15662:                                                [Unexpected]),
15663:                                    {error, {unexpected_passcred, Unexpected}};
15664:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15665:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting passcred:"
15666:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
15667:                                    ERROR
15668:                            end                                   
15669:                    end},
15670:          #{desc => "announce ready (passcred off)",
15671:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15672:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, passcred_off),
15673:                            ok
15674:                    end},
15675: 
15676:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
15677:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15678:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
15679:                    end},
15680:          #{desc => "send request 1 (to server)",
15681:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15682:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
15683:                    end},
15684:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
15685:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15686:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
15687:                            ok
15688:                    end},
15689:          #{desc => "await recv reply 1 (from server, wo passcred)",
15690:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
15691:                            case Recv(Sock) of
15692:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REP}} ->
15693:                                    ok;
15694:                                {ok, {[], UnexpData}} ->
15695:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_data, UnexpData}};
15696:                                {ok, {BadCMsgs, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
15697:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_cmsgs,
15698:                                             BadCMsgs}};
15699:                                {ok, BadReply} ->
15700:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply, BadReply}};
15701:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15702:                                    ERROR
15703:                            end
15704:                    end},
15705:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (recv reply)",
15706:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15707:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
15708:                            ok
15709:                    end},
15710: 
15711:          %% *** Second message (w passcred) ***
15712: 
15713:          #{desc => "await continue (enable passcred)",
15714:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15715:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, enable_passcred)
15716:                    end},
15717:          #{desc => "enable passcred",
15718:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
15719:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
15720:                                ok ->
15721:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("passcred enabled"),
15722:                                    ok;
15723:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15724:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed enable passcred:"
15725:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
15726:                                    ERROR
15727:                            end                                   
15728:                    end},
15729:          #{desc => "announce ready (passcred on)",
15730:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15731:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, passcred_on),
15732:                            ok
15733:                    end},
15734: 
15735:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 2)",
15736:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15737:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
15738:                    end},
15739:          #{desc => "send request 2 (to server)",
15740:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15741:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
15742:                    end},
15743:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 2)",
15744:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15745:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
15746:                            ok
15747:                    end},
15748:          #{desc => "await recv reply 2 (from server, w passcred)",
15749:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
15750:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
15751:                            case Recv(Sock) of
15752:                                {ok, {[#{level := socket,
15753:                                         type  := passcred,
15754:                                         value := Cred}], ?BASIC_REP}} ->
15755:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
15756:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received reply *with* "
15757:                                                "expected passcred: "
15758:                                                "~n   ~p", [Cred]),
15759:                                    ok;
15760:                                {ok, {BadCMsgs, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
15761:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
15762:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_cmsgs,
15763:                                             BadCMsgs}};
15764:                                {ok, {[#{level := socket,
15765:                                         type  := passcred,
15766:                                         value := _Cred}], BadData}} ->
15767:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
15768:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_data,
15769:                                             BadData}};
15770:                                {ok, BadReply} ->
15771:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
15772:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply, BadReply}};
15773:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15774:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
15775:                                    ERROR
15776:                            end
15777:                    end},
15778:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (recv reply)",
15779:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15780:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
15781:                            ok
15782:                    end},
15783: 
15784:          %% *** Third message (wo passcred) ***
15785: 
15786:          #{desc => "await continue (disable passcred)",
15787:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15788:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, disable_passcred)
15789:                    end},
15790:          #{desc => "disable passcred",
15791:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
15792:                            case Set(Sock, false) of
15793:                                ok ->
15794:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("passcred disabled"),
15795:                                    ok;
15796:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15797:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed disable timestamp:"
15798:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
15799:                                    ERROR
15800:                            end                                   
15801:                    end},
15802:          #{desc => "announce ready (passcred off)",
15803:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15804:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, passcred_off),
15805:                            ok
15806:                    end},
15807: 
15808:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 3)",
15809:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
15810:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
15811:                    end},
15812:          #{desc => "send request 3 (to server)",
15813:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
15814:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
15815:                    end},
15816:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 3)",
15817:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15818:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
15819:                            ok
15820:                    end},
15821:          #{desc => "await recv reply 3 (from server, wo passcred)",
15822:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
15823:                            case Recv(Sock) of
15824:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REP}} ->
15825:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received reply *without* "
15826:                                                "passcred"),
15827:                                    ok;
15828:                                {ok, {BadCMsgs, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
15829:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_cmsgs,
15830:                                             BadCMsgs}};
15831:                                {ok, {[], BadData}} ->
15832:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_data,
15833:                                             BadData}};
15834:                                {ok, BadReply} ->
15835:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply, BadReply}};
15836:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15837:                                    ERROR
15838:                            end
15839:                    end},
15840:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (recv reply)",
15841:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
15842:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
15843:                            ok
15844:                    end},
15845: 
15846:          %% *** Termination ***
15847:          #{desc => "await terminate",
15848:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
15849:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
15850:                                ok ->
15851:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
15852:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15853:                                    ERROR
15854:                            end
15855:                    end},
15856:          #{desc => "close socket",
15857:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
15858:                          sock     := Sock,
15859:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
15860:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
15861:                            State1 =
15862:                                unlink_path(Path,
15863:                                            fun() ->
15864:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
15865:                                            end,
15866:                                            fun() -> State end),
15867:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
15868:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
15869:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
15870:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
15871:                    end},
15872: 
15873:          %% *** We are done ***
15874:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15875:         ],
15876: 
15877: 
15878:     TesterSeq =
15879:         [
15880:          %% *** Init part ***
15881:          #{desc => "monitor server",
15882:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
15883:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
15884:                            ok
15885:                    end},
15886:          #{desc => "monitor client",
15887:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
15888:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
15889:                            ok
15890:                    end},
15891: 
15892:          %% Start the server
15893:          #{desc => "order server start",
15894:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
15895:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
15896:                            ok
15897:                    end},
15898:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
15899:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
15900:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
15901:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
15902:                    end},
15903: 
15904:          %% Start the client
15905:          #{desc => "order client start",
15906:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
15907:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
15908:                            ok
15909:                    end},
15910:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
15911:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
15912:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
15913:                    end},
15914: 
15915:          %% *** The actual test ***
15916:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
15917:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15918:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
15919:                            ok
15920:                    end},
15921:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
15922:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
15923:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15924:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
15925:                            ok
15926:                    end},
15927:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
15928:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15929:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
15930:                    end},
15931:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
15932:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15933:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
15934:                    end},
15935: 
15936:          %% *** First message (default=wo passcred) ***
15937: 
15938:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with verify timestamp off)",
15939:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15940:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, verify_passcred),
15941:                            ok
15942:                    end},
15943:          #{desc => "await client ready (passcred off)",
15944:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15945:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, passcred_off)
15946:                    end},
15947: 
15948:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request 1)",
15949:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15950:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
15951:                            ok
15952:                    end},
15953:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request 1)",
15954:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15955:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
15956:                    end},
15957:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 1)",
15958:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15959:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
15960:                    end},
15961:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply)",
15962:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15963:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
15964:                            ok
15965:                    end},
15966:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent)",
15967:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15968:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
15969:                    end},
15970:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
15971:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15972:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
15973:                    end},
15974: 
15975:          %% Second message (w passcred)
15976: 
15977:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with enable passcred)",
15978:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15979:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, enable_passcred),
15980:                            ok
15981:                    end},
15982:          #{desc => "await client ready (passcred on)",
15983:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15984:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, passcred_on)
15985:                    end},
15986: 
15987:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request 2)",
15988:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15989:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
15990:                            ok
15991:                    end},
15992:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request 2)",
15993:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
15994:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
15995:                    end},
15996:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 2)",
15997:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
15998:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
15999:                    end},
16000:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 2)",
16001:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16002:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
16003:                            ok
16004:                    end},
16005:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent 2)",
16006:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16007:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
16008:                    end},
16009:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv 2)",
16010:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16011:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
16012:                    end},
16013: 
16014:          %% Third message (wo passcred)
16015: 
16016:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with disable passcred)",
16017:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16018:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, disable_passcred),
16019:                            ok
16020:                    end},
16021:          #{desc => "await client ready (passcred off)",
16022:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16023:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, passcred_off)
16024:                    end},
16025: 
16026:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request 3)",
16027:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16028:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
16029:                            ok
16030:                    end},
16031:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request 3)",
16032:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16033:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
16034:                    end},
16035:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 3)",
16036:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16037:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
16038:                    end},
16039:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 3)",
16040:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16041:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
16042:                            ok
16043:                    end},
16044:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent 3)",
16045:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16046:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
16047:                    end},
16048:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv 3)",
16049:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16050:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
16051:                    end},
16052: 
16053: 
16054:          %% *** Termination ***
16055:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
16056:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16057:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
16058:                            ok
16059:                    end},
16060:          #{desc => "await client termination",
16061:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
16062:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
16063:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
16064:                            {ok, State1}
16065:                    end},
16066:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
16067:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16068:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
16069:                            ok
16070:                    end},
16071:          #{desc => "await server termination",
16072:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
16073:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
16074:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
16075:                            {ok, State1}
16076:                    end},
16077: 
16078:          %% *** We are done ***
16079:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
16080:         ],
16081: 
16082: 
16083:     i("start server evaluator"),
16084:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
16085: 
16086:     i("start client evaluator"),
16087:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
16088: 
16089:     i("start tester evaluator"),
16090:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
16091:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
16092:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
16093: 
16094:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
16095: 
16096: 
16097: 
16098: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16099: 
16100: %% Tests the the peek-off socket option for a unix domain socket
16101: %% (stream TCP in this case).
16102: %%
16103: %% THIS IS A PLACEHOLDER!!
16104: %%
16105: %%
16106: 
16107: api_opt_sock_peek_off_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
16108:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
16109:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_peek_off_tcpL,
16110:            fun() ->
16111:                    has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
16112:                    has_support_sock_peek_off(),
16113:                    has_support_msg_flag(peek)
16114:            end,
16115:            fun() ->
16116:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Val) when is_integer(Val) ->
16117:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, peek_off, Val)
16118:                           end,
16119:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
16120:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, peek_off)
16121:                           end,
16122:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
16123:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
16124:                           end,
16125:                    Recv = fun(Sock, L, false) ->
16126:                                   socket:recv(Sock, L);
16127:                              (Sock, L, true) ->
16128:                                   socket:recv(Sock, L, [peek])
16129:                           end,
16130:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
16131:                                  proto  => default, % Type = stream => tcp
16132:                                  set    => Set,
16133:                                  get    => Get,
16134:                                  send   => Send,
16135:                                  recv   => Recv},
16136:                    ok = api_opt_sock_peek_off(InitState)
16137:            end).
16138: 
16139: api_opt_sock_peek_off(InitState) ->
16140:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
16141:     ServerSeq = 
16142:         [
16143:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
16144:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
16145:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
16146:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
16147:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
16148:                    end},
16149:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
16150:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16151:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
16152:                            ok
16153:                    end},
16154: 
16155:          %% *** Init part ***
16156:          #{desc => "which local address",
16157:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
16158:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
16159:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
16160:                    end},
16161:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
16162:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
16163:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
16164:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
16165:                                {ok, Sock} ->
16166:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
16167:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16168:                                    ERROR
16169:                            end
16170:                    end},
16171:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
16172:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock,
16173:                          lsa   := LSA} = _State) ->
16174:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
16175:                                ok ->
16176:                                    %% We do not care about the port for local
16177:                                    ok;
16178:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16179:                                    ERROR
16180:                            end
16181:                    end},
16182:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
16183:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
16184:                            socket:listen(LSock)
16185:                    end},
16186:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
16187:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
16188:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
16189:                            ok
16190:                    end},
16191: 
16192:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
16193:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16194:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
16195:                    end},
16196:          #{desc => "await connection",
16197:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
16198:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
16199:                                {ok, Sock} ->
16200:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
16201:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
16202:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16203:                                    ERROR
16204:                            end
16205:                    end},
16206:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
16207:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16208:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
16209:                            ok
16210:                    end},
16211: 
16212: 
16213:          %% The actual test
16214: 
16215:          %% 1) peek (0 = everything: 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
16216:          #{desc => "1a: await continue (peek)",
16217:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16218:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, peek)
16219:                    end},
16220:          #{desc => "1a: peek read",
16221:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16222:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
16223:                            case Recv(Sock, 0, true) of
16224:                                {ok, <<1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8>>} ->
16225:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("peek'ed expected data"),
16226:                                    ok;
16227:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16228:                                    ERROR
16229:                            end
16230:                    end},
16231:          #{desc => "1a: announce ready (peek)",
16232:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16233:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, peek),
16234:                            ok
16235:                    end},
16236: 
16237:          #{desc => "1b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
16238:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16239:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
16240:                    end},
16241:          #{desc => "1b: verify peek-off",
16242:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16243:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
16244:                            case Get(Sock) of
16245:                                {ok, DefaultPeekOff} ->
16246:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w",
16247:                                                [DefaultPeekOff]),
16248:                                    ok;
16249:                                {error, {not_supported, {socket, peek_off}}} ->
16250:                                    {skip, "Not supported"};
16251:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16252:                                    ERROR
16253:                            end
16254:                    end},
16255:          #{desc => "1b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
16256:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16257:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
16258:                            ok
16259:                    end},
16260: 
16261: 
16262:          %% 2) set peek-off to 4
16263:          #{desc => "2a: await continue (set peek-off: 4)",
16264:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16265:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, set_peek_off)
16266:                    end},
16267:          #{desc => "2a: set peek-off: 4",
16268:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16269:                          set   := Set} = _State) ->
16270:                            case Set(Sock, 4) of
16271:                                ok ->
16272:                                    ok;
16273:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16274:                                    ERROR
16275:                            end
16276:                    end},
16277:          #{desc => "2a: announce ready (set peek-off: 4)",
16278:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16279:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, set_peek_off),
16280:                            ok
16281:                    end},
16282: 
16283:          #{desc => "2b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
16284:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16285:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
16286:                    end},
16287:          #{desc => "2b: verify peek-off",
16288:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16289:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
16290:                            case Get(Sock) of
16291:                                {ok, 4 = PeekOff} ->
16292:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w", [PeekOff]),
16293:                                    ok;
16294:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16295:                                    ERROR
16296:                            end
16297:                    end},
16298:          #{desc => "2b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
16299:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16300:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
16301:                            ok
16302:                    end},
16303: 
16304: 
16305:          %% 3) peek (0 = everything: 5,6,7,8)
16306:          %%    NOTE THAT THIS WILL MOVE THE PEEK-OFF "POINTER" TO THE END OF 
16307:          %%    THE *CURRENT* DATA POSITION IN THE BUFFER (READY FOR NEXT BATCH
16308:          %%    OF DATA).
16309:          #{desc => "3a: await continue (peek)",
16310:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16311:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, peek)
16312:                    end},
16313:          #{desc => "3a: peek read",
16314:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16315:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
16316:                            case Recv(Sock, 0, true) of
16317:                                {ok, <<5,6,7,8>>} ->
16318:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("peek'ed expected data"),
16319:                                    ok;
16320:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16321:                                    ERROR
16322:                            end
16323:                    end},
16324:          #{desc => "3a: announce ready (peek)",
16325:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16326:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, peek),
16327:                            ok
16328:                    end},
16329: 
16330:          #{desc => "3b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
16331:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16332:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
16333:                    end},
16334:          #{desc => "3b: verify peek-off",
16335:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16336:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
16337:                            case Get(Sock) of
16338:                                {ok, 8 = PeekOff} ->
16339:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w", [PeekOff]),
16340:                                    ok;
16341:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16342:                                    ERROR
16343:                            end
16344:                    end},
16345:          #{desc => "3b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
16346:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16347:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
16348:                            ok
16349:                    end},
16350: 
16351: 
16352:          %% 4) read two byte(s): 1,2
16353:          #{desc => "4a: await continue (read 2 byte)",
16354:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16355:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, read)
16356:                    end},
16357:          #{desc => "4a: read (2 bytes)",
16358:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16359:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
16360:                            case Recv(Sock, 2, false) of
16361:                                {ok, <<1,2>>} ->
16362:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("read expected data"),
16363:                                    ok;
16364:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16365:                                    ERROR
16366:                            end
16367:                    end},
16368:          #{desc => "4a: announce ready (read)",
16369:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16370:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, read),
16371:                            ok
16372:                    end},
16373: 
16374:          #{desc => "4b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
16375:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16376:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
16377:                    end},
16378:          #{desc => "4b: verify peek-off",
16379:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16380:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
16381:                            case Get(Sock) of
16382:                                {ok, 6 = PeekOff} ->
16383:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w", [PeekOff]),
16384:                                    ok;
16385:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16386:                                    ERROR
16387:                            end
16388:                    end},
16389:          #{desc => "4b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
16390:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16391:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
16392:                            ok
16393:                    end},
16394: 
16395: 
16396:          %% 5) read the rest: 3,4,5,6,7,8)
16397:          #{desc => "5a: await continue (read the rest)",
16398:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16399:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, read)
16400:                    end},
16401:          #{desc => "5a: read (the rest)",
16402:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16403:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
16404:                            case Recv(Sock, 0, false) of
16405:                                {ok, <<3,4,5,6,7,8>>} ->
16406:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("read expected data"),
16407:                                    ok;
16408:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16409:                                    ERROR
16410:                            end
16411:                    end},
16412:          #{desc => "5a: announce ready (read)",
16413:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16414:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, read),
16415:                            ok
16416:                    end},
16417: 
16418:          #{desc => "5b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
16419:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16420:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
16421:                    end},
16422:          #{desc => "5b: verify peek-off",
16423:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
16424:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
16425:                            case Get(Sock) of
16426:                                {ok, PeekOff} ->
16427:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w", [PeekOff]),
16428:                                    ok;
16429:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16430:                                    ERROR
16431:                            end
16432:                    end},
16433:          #{desc => "5b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
