16434:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16435:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
16436:                            ok
16437:                    end},
16438: 
16439: 
16440:          %% *** Termination ***
16441:          #{desc => "await terminate",
16442:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
16443:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
16444:                                ok ->
16445:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
16446:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16447:                                    ERROR
16448:                            end
16449:                    end},
16450:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
16451:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
16452:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
16453:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
16454:                    end},
16455:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
16456:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock,
16457:                          lsa   := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
16458:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
16459:                            State1 =
16460:                                unlink_path(Path,
16461:                                            fun() ->
16462:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
16463:                                            end,
16464:                                            fun() -> State end),
16465:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)}
16466:                    end},
16467: 
16468:          %% *** We are done ***
16469:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
16470:         ],
16471: 
16472:     ClientSeq = 
16473:         [
16474:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
16475:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
16476:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
16477:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
16478:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}}
16479:                    end},
16480:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
16481:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16482:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
16483:                            ok
16484:                    end},
16485: 
16486:          %% *** The init part ***
16487:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
16488:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
16489:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
16490:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
16491:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
16492:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
16493:                    end},
16494:          #{desc => "create socket",
16495:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
16496:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
16497:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
16498:                                {ok, Sock} ->
16499:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
16500:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16501:                                    ERROR
16502:                            end
16503:                    end},
16504:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
16505:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
16506:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
16507:                                ok ->
16508:                                    ok;
16509:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16510:                                    ERROR
16511:                            end
16512:                    end},
16513:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
16514:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16515:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
16516:                            ok
16517:                    end},
16518: 
16519:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
16520:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16521:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
16522:                    end},
16523:          #{desc => "connect to server",
16524:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
16525:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
16526:                    end},
16527:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
16528:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16529:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
16530:                            ok
16531:                    end},
16532: 
16533: 
16534:          %% *** The actual test ***
16535:          #{desc => "await continue (send data)",
16536:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16537:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_data)
16538:                    end},
16539:          #{desc => "send data (to server)",
16540:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
16541:                            Send(Sock, <<1:8/integer,
16542:                                         2:8/integer,
16543:                                         3:8/integer,
16544:                                         4:8/integer,
16545:                                         5:8/integer,
16546:                                         6:8/integer,
16547:                                         7:8/integer,
16548:                                         8:8/integer>>)
16549:                    end},
16550:          #{desc => "announce ready (send data)",
16551:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16552:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_data),
16553:                            ok
16554:                    end},
16555: 
16556:          %% *** Termination ***
16557:          #{desc => "await terminate",
16558:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
16559:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
16560:                                ok ->
16561:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
16562:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16563:                                    ERROR
16564:                            end
16565:                    end},
16566:          #{desc => "close socket",
16567:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
16568:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
16569:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
16570:                            State1 =
16571:                                unlink_path(Path,
16572:                                            fun() ->
16573:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
16574:                                            end,
16575:                                            fun() -> State end),
16576:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)}
16577:                    end},
16578: 
16579:          %% *** We are done ***
16580:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
16581:         ],
16582: 
16583:     TesterSeq =
16584:         [
16585:          %% *** Init part ***
16586:          #{desc => "monitor server",
16587:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
16588:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
16589:                            ok
16590:                    end},
16591:          #{desc => "monitor client",
16592:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
16593:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
16594:                            ok
16595:                    end},
16596: 
16597:          %% Start the server
16598:          #{desc => "order server start",
16599:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
16600:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
16601:                            ok
16602:                    end},
16603:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
16604:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
16605:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
16606:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
16607:                    end},
16608: 
16609:          %% Start the client
16610:          #{desc => "order client start",
16611:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
16612:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
16613:                            ok
16614:                    end},
16615:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
16616:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
16617:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
16618:                    end},
16619: 
16620:          %% Establish the connection
16621:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
16622:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16623:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
16624:                            ok
16625:                    end},
16626:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
16627:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16628:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
16629:                            ok
16630:                    end},
16631:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
16632:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16633:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
16634:                    end},
16635:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
16636:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16637:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
16638:                    end},
16639: 
16640: 
16641:          %% *** The actual test ***
16642:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send data)",
16643:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16644:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_data),
16645:                            ok
16646:                    end},
16647:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send data)",
16648:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16649:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_data)
16650:                    end},
16651: 
16652:          %% There is no way to be sure that the data has actually arrived,
16653:          %% and with no data on the server side, the peek will fail.
16654:          %% Hopefully a sleep will take care of this...
16655:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
16656: 
16657:          %% 1) peek
16658:          #{desc => "1a: order server to continue (peek)",
16659:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16660:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, peek),
16661:                            ok
16662:                    end},
16663:          #{desc => "1a: await server ready (peek)",
16664:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16665:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, peek)
16666:                    end},
16667: 
16668:          #{desc => "1b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
16669:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16670:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
16671:                            ok
16672:                    end},
16673:          #{desc => "1b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
16674:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16675:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
16676:                    end},
16677: 
16678: 
16679:          %% 2) set peek-off
16680:          #{desc => "2a: order server to continue (set peek-off)",
16681:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16682:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, set_peek_off),
16683:                            ok
16684:                    end},
16685:          #{desc => "2a: await server ready (set peek-off)",
16686:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16687:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, set_peek_off)
16688:                    end},
16689: 
16690:          #{desc => "2b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
16691:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16692:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
16693:                            ok
16694:                    end},
16695:          #{desc => "2b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
16696:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16697:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
16698:                    end},
16699: 
16700: 
16701: 
16702:          %% 3) peek
16703:          #{desc => "3a: order server to continue (peek)",
16704:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16705:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, peek),
16706:                            ok
16707:                    end},
16708:          #{desc => "3a: await server ready (peek)",
16709:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16710:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, peek)
16711:                    end},
16712: 
16713:          #{desc => "3b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
16714:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16715:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
16716:                            ok
16717:                    end},
16718:          #{desc => "3b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
16719:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16720:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
16721:                    end},
16722: 
16723: 
16724: 
16725:          %% 4) read part
16726:          #{desc => "4a: order server to continue (read part)",
16727:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16728:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, read),
16729:                            ok
16730:                    end},
16731:          #{desc => "4a: await server ready (peek)",
16732:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16733:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, read)
16734:                    end},
16735: 
16736:          #{desc => "4b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
16737:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16738:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
16739:                            ok
16740:                    end},
16741:          #{desc => "4b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
16742:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16743:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
16744:                    end},
16745: 
16746: 
16747:          %% 5) read (the rest)
16748:          #{desc => "5a: order server to continue (read the rest)",
16749:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16750:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, read),
16751:                            ok
16752:                    end},
16753:          #{desc => "5a: await server ready (peek)",
16754:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16755:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, read)
16756:                    end},
16757: 
16758:          #{desc => "5b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
16759:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16760:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
16761:                            ok
16762:                    end},
16763:          #{desc => "5b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
16764:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16765:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
16766:                    end},
16767: 
16768: 
16769:          %% *** Termination ***
16770:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
16771:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16772:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
16773:                            ok
16774:                    end},
16775:          #{desc => "await client termination",
16776:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
16777:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
16778:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
16779:                            {ok, State1}
16780:                    end},
16781:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
16782:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16783:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
16784:                            ok
16785:                    end},
16786:          #{desc => "await server termination",
16787:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
16788:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
16789:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
16790:                            {ok, State1}
16791:                    end},
16792: 
16793:          %% *** We are done ***
16794:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
16795:         ],
16796: 
16797:     i("start server evaluator"),
16798:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
16799: 
16800:     i("start client evaluator"),
16801:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
16802:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
16803: 
16804:     i("start tester evaluator"),
16805:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
16806:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
16807:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
16808: 
16809:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
16810: 
16811: 
16812: 
16813: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16814: 
16815: %% Tests that we get the peer credentials for a connected unix domain
16816: %% TCP (stream) socket.
16817: %% That is, all we need to do is to create a node, and have 
16818: %% process connect from that to a local (unix domain socket) socket.
16819: %%
16820: %% THIS IS A PLACEHOLDER!!
16821: %%
16822: %% We need to figure out what the ucred structure looks like,
16823: %% and decode it...
16824: %%
16825: 
16826: api_opt_sock_peercred_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
16827:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
16828:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_peercred_tcpL,
16829:            fun() ->
16830:                    has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
16831:                    has_support_sock_peercred(),
16832:                    not_yet_implemented()
16833:            end,
16834:            fun() ->
16835:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
16836:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, peercred)
16837:                           end,
16838:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
16839:                                  proto  => default, % Type = stream => tcp
16840:                                  get    => Get},
16841:                    ok = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp(InitState)
16842:            end).
16843: 
16844: 
16845: api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp(_InitState) ->
16846:     %% ServerSeq =
16847:     %%     [
16848:     %%      %% *** Wait for start order part ***
16849:     %%      #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
16850:     %%        cmd  => fun(State) ->
16851:     %%                        {Tester, Backlog} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
16852:     %%                        {ok, State#{tester  => Tester,
16853:     %%                                    backlog => Backlog}}
16854:     %%                end},
16855:     %%      #{desc => "monitor tester",
16856:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16857:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
16858:     %%                        ok
16859:     %%                end},
16860: 
16861:     %%      %% *** Init part ***
16862:     %%      #{desc => "which local address",
16863:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
16864:     %%                        LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
16865:     %%                        {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
16866:     %%                end},
16867:     %%      #{desc => "create listen socket",
16868:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
16869:     %%                        case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
16870:     %%                            {ok, Sock} ->
16871:     %%                                {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
16872:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
16873:     %%                                ERROR
16874:     %%                        end
16875:     %%                end},
16876:     %%      #{desc => "bind to local address",
16877:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
16878:     %%                      lsock  := LSock,
16879:     %%                      lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
16880:     %%                        case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
16881:     %%                            ok ->
16882:     %%                                ok;
16883:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
16884:     %%                                ERROR
16885:     %%                        end
16886:     %%                end},
16887:     %%      #{desc => "make listen socket",
16888:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
16889:     %%                        socket:listen(LSock)
16890:     %%                end},
16891:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
16892:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
16893:     %%                      tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
16894:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
16895:     %%                        ok
16896:     %%                end},
16897: 
16898: 
16899:     %%      %% The actual test
16900:     %%      #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
16901:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16902:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
16903:     %%                end},
16904:     %%      #{desc => "await connection",
16905:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
16906:     %%                        case socket:accept(LSock) of
16907:     %%                            {ok, Sock} ->
16908:     %%                                ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
16909:     %%                                {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
16910:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
16911:     %%                                ERROR
16912:     %%                        end
16913:     %%                end},
16914:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
16915:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16916:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
16917:     %%                        ok
16918:     %%                end},
16919: 
16920:     %%      #{desc => "await continue (peercred)",
16921:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16922:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, peercred)
16923:     %%                end},
16924:     %%      #{desc => "get peercred",
16925:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
16926:     %%                        case Get(Sock) of
16927:     %%                            {ok, PeerCred} ->
16928:     %%                                ?SEV_IPRINT("PeerCred: ~n   ~p", [PeerCred]),
16929:     %%                                ok;
16930:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
16931:     %%                                ERROR
16932:     %%                        end
16933:     %%                end},
16934:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (peercred)",
16935:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16936:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, peercred),
16937:     %%                        ok
16938:     %%                end},
16939: 
16940: 
16941:     %%      %% Termination
16942:     %%      #{desc => "await terminate",
16943:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
16944:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
16945:     %%                            ok ->
16946:     %%                                {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
16947:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
16948:     %%                                ERROR
16949:     %%                        end
16950:     %%                end},
16951:     %%      #{desc => "close connection socket",
16952:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
16953:     %%                        ok = socket:close(Sock),
16954:     %%                        {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
16955:     %%                end},
16956:     %%      #{desc => "close listen socket",
16957:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
16958:     %%                      lsock  := Sock,
16959:     %%                      lsa    := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
16960:     %%                        ok = socket:close(Sock),
16961:     %%                        State1 =
16962:     %%                            unlink_path(Path,
16963:     %%                                        fun() ->
16964:     %%                                                maps:remove(lsa, State)
16965:     %%                                        end,
16966:     %%                                        fun() -> State end),
16967:     %%                        {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)}
16968:     %%                end},
16969: 
16970:     %%      %% *** We are done ***
16971:     %%      ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
16972:     %%     ],
16973: 
16974: 
16975:     %% ClientSeq =
16976:     %%     [
16977:     %%      %% *** Wait for start order part ***
16978:     %%      #{desc => "await start",
16979:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
16980:     %%                        {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
16981:     %%                        {ok, State#{tester    => Tester,
16982:     %%                                    server_path => Path}}
16983:     %%                end},
16984:     %%      #{desc => "monitor tester",
16985:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16986:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
16987:     %%                        ok
16988:     %%                end},
16989: 
16990: 
16991:     %%      %% *** Init part ***
16992:     %%      #{desc => "which local address",
16993:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
16994:     %%                      server_path := Path} = State) ->
16995:     %%                        LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
16996:     %%                        SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
16997:     %%                        {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
16998:     %%                end},
16999:     %%      #{desc => "create node",
17000:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{host := Host} = State) ->
17001:     %%     		   ?SEV_IPRINT("try create node on ~p", [Host]),
17002:     %%                        case ?CT_PEER() of
17003:     %%                            {ok, Peer, Node} ->
17004:     %%                                ?SEV_IPRINT("client node ~p started",
17005:     %%                                            [Node]),
17006:     %%                                {ok, State#{node => Node, peer => Peer}};
17007:     %%                            {error, Reason} ->
17008:     %%                                {skip, Reason}
17009:     %%                        end
17010:     %%                end},
17011:     %%       #{desc => "monitor client node",
17012:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
17013:     %%                        true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
17014:     %%                        ok
17015:     %%                end},
17016:     %%      #{desc => "start remote client on client node",
17017:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
17018:     %%                        Pid = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_start(Node),
17019:     %%                        ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client ~p started", [Pid]),
17020:     %%                        {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}}
17021:     %%                end},
17022:     %%      #{desc => "monitor remote client",
17023:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Pid}) ->
17024:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
17025:     %%                        ok
17026:     %%                end},
17027:     %%      #{desc => "order remote client to start",
17028:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient   := Client,
17029:     %%                     proto      := Proto,
17030:     %%                      server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
17031:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, {Proto, ServerSA}),
17032:     %%                        ok
17033:     %%                end},
17034:     %%      #{desc => "await remote client ready",
17035:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
17036:     %%                      rclient := Client} = _State) ->
17037:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, rclient, init,
17038:     %%                                         [{tester, Tester}])
17039:     %%                end},
17040:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
17041:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17042:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
17043:     %%                        ok
17044:     %%                end},
17045: 
17046: 
17047:     %%      %% The actual test
17048:     %%      #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
17049:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
17050:     %%                      rclient := Client} = State) ->
17051:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect,
17052:     %%                                                 [{rclient, Client}]) of
17053:     %%                            {ok, {ConTimeout, ConLimit}} ->
17054:     %%                                {ok, State#{connect_timeout => ConTimeout,
17055:     %%                                            connect_limit   => ConLimit}};
17056:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
17057:     %%                                ERROR
17058:     %%                        end
17059:     %%                end},
17060:     %%      #{desc => "order remote client to continue (connect)",
17061:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient         := RClient,
17062:     %%                      connect_timeout := ConTimeout,
17063:     %%                      connect_limit   := ConLimit}) ->
17064:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, connect,
17065:     %%                                               {ConTimeout, ConLimit}),
17066:     %%                        ok
17067:     %%                end},
17068:     %%      #{desc => "await remote client ready (connect)",
17069:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
17070:     %%                      rclient := RClient} = State) ->
17071:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, connect,
17072:     %%                                              [{tester, Tester}]) of
17073:     %%                            {ok, ok = _Result} ->
17074:     %%                                {ok, maps:remove(connect_limit, State)};
17075:     %%                            {ok, {error, {connect_limit_reached,R,L}}} ->
17076:     %%                                {skip,
17077:     %%                                 ?SLIB:f("Connect limit reached ~w: ~w",
17078:     %%                                        [L, R])};
17079:     %%                            {ok, Result} ->
17080:     %%                                Result;
17081:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
17082:     %%                                ERROR
17083:     %%                        end
17084:     %%                end},
17085:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
17086:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17087:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
17088:     %%                        ok
17089:     %%                end},
17090: 
17091:     %%      %% Termination
17092:     %%      #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
17093:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
17094:     %%                      rclient := RClient} = State) ->
17095:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
17096:     %%                                                  [{rclient, RClient}]) of
17097:     %%                            ok ->
17098:     %%                                {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
17099:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
17100:     %%                                ERROR
17101:     %%                        end
17102:     %%                end},
17103:     %%      #{desc => "kill remote client",
17104:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Client}) ->
17105:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
17106:     %%                        ok
17107:     %%                end},
17108:     %%      #{desc => "await remote client termination",
17109:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Client} = State) ->
17110:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
17111:     %%                        State1 = maps:remove(rclient, State),
17112:     %%                        {ok, State1}
17113:     %%                end},
17114:     %%      #{desc => "stop client node",
17115:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = _State) ->
17116:     %%                        peer:stop(Peer)
17117:     %%                end},
17118:     %%      #{desc => "await client node termination",
17119:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
17120:     %%                        receive
17121:     %%                            {nodedown, Node} ->
17122:     %%                                State1 = maps:remove(node_id, State),
17123:     %%                                State2 = maps:remove(node,    State1),
17124:     %%                                {ok, State2}
17125:     %%                        end
17126:     %%                end},
17127: 
17128:     %%      %% *** We are done ***
17129:     %%      ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17130:     %%    ],
17131: 
17132:     %% TesterSeq =
17133:     %%     [
17134:     %%      %% *** Init part ***
17135:     %%      #{desc => "monitor server",
17136:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17137:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Server),
17138:     %%                        ok
17139:     %%                end},
17140:     %%      #{desc => "monitor client",
17141:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17142:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Client),
17143:     %%                        ok
17144:     %%                end},
17145:     %%      #{desc => "which local address",
17146:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
17147:     %%                        LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17148:     %%                        {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
17149:     %%                end},
17150:     %%      #{desc => "order server start",
17151:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server  := Server,
17152:     %%                      backlog := Backlog}) ->
17153:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Server, Backlog),
17154:     %%                        ok
17155:     %%                end},
17156:     %%      #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
17157:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
17158:     %%                        {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, init),
17159:     %%                        ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
17160:     %%                        {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
17161:     %%                end},
17162:     %%      #{desc => "order client start",
17163:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client    := Client,
17164:     %%                      server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
17165:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, ServerSA),
17166:     %%                        ok
17167:     %%                end},
17168:     %%      #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
17169:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17170:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, init),
17171:     %%                        ok
17172:     %%                end},
17173: 
17174: 
17175:     %%      %% The actual test
17176:     %%      %% The server accepts the connect from the client, announces
17177:     %%      %% this to us (accept) and then attempts to get peercred.
17178:     %%      #{desc => "order client continue (connect)",
17179:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client        := Client,
17180:     %%                      timeout       := Timeout,
17181:     %%                      connect_limit := ConLimit} = _State) ->
17182:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect,
17183:     %%                                               {Timeout, ConLimit}),
17184:     %%                        ok
17185:     %%                end},
17186:     %%      #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
17187:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
17188:     %%                      client := Client} = _State) ->
17189:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect,
17190:     %%                                              [{server, Server}]) of
17191:     %%                            ok ->
17192:     %%                                ok;
17193:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
17194:     %%                                ERROR
17195:     %%                        end
17196:     %%                end},
17197:     %%      #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
17198:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
17199:     %%                      client := Client} = _State) ->
17200:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept,
17201:     %%                                              [{client, Client}]) of
17202:     %%                            ok ->
17203:     %%                                ok;
17204:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
17205:     %%                                ERROR
17206:     %%                        end
17207:     %%                end},
17208:     %%      #{desc => "await server ready (peercred)",
17209:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
17210:     %%                      client := Client} = _State) ->
17211:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, peercred,
17212:     %%                                              [{client, Client}]) of
17213:     %%                            ok ->
17214:     %%                                ok;
17215:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
17216:     %%                                ERROR
17217:     %%                        end
17218:     %%                end},
17219: 
17220: 
17221:     %%      %% *** Terminate server ***
17222:     %%      #{desc => "order client terminate",
17223:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17224:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
17225:     %%                        ok
17226:     %%                end},
17227:     %%      #{desc => "await client down",
17228:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
17229:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
17230:     %%                        State1 = maps:remove(client,    State),
17231:     %%                        {ok, State1}
17232:     %%                end},
17233:     %%      #{desc => "order server terminate",
17234:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17235:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
17236:     %%                        ok
17237:     %%                end},
17238:     %%      #{desc => "await server down",
17239:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
17240:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
17241:     %%                        State1 = maps:remove(server,    State),
17242:     %%                        State2 = maps:remove(server_sa, State1),
17243:     %%                        {ok, State2}
17244:     %%                end},
17245: 
17246:     %%      %% *** We are done ***
17247:     %%      ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17248:     %%     ],
17249: 
17250:     %% i("create server evaluator"),
17251:     %% ServerInitState = #{domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
17252:     %% Server          = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
17253: 
17254:     %% i("create client evaluator"),
17255:     %% ClientInitState = #{host   => local_host(),
17256:     %%                     domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
17257:     %% Client          = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
17258: 
17259:     %% i("create tester evaluator"),
17260:     %% TesterInitState = InitState#{server => Server#ev.pid,
17261:     %%                              client => Client#ev.pid},
17262:     %% Tester          = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
17263: 
17264:     %% i("await evaluator(s)"),
17265:     %% ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
17266: 
17267: 
17268:     %% This should actually never be called (the conditions should cause a skip),
17269:     %% but just to be on the safe side...
17270:     skip.
17271: 
17272: 
17273: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_start(Node) ->
17274: %%     Self = self(),
17275: %%     Fun  = fun() -> api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client(Self) end,
17276: %%     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
17277: 
17278: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client(Parent) ->
17279: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_init(Parent),
17280: %%     {Proto, ServerSA} = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
17281: %%     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
17282: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
17283: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
17284: %%     Result = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_connect(Domain, Proto, ServerSA),
17285: %%     ?SEV_IPRINT("result: ~p", [Result]),
17286: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect, Result),
17287: %%     Reason = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
17288: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_close(Result),
17289: %%     exit(Reason).
17290: 
17291: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
17292: %%     put(sname, "rclient"),
17293: %%     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
17294: %%     ok.
17295: 
17296: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
17297: %%     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
17298: 
17299: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
17300: %%     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
17301: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Result) ->
17302: %%     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Result).
17303: 
17304: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
17305: %%     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
17306: %%         ok ->
17307: %%             ok;
17308: %%         {ok, Extra} ->
17309: %%             Extra;
17310: %%         {error, Reason} ->
17311: %%             exit({await_continue, Slogan, Reason})
17312: %%     end.
17313: 
17314: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
17315: %%     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
17316: %%         ok ->
17317: %%             ok;
17318: %%         {error, Reason} ->
17319: %%             Reason
17320: %%     end.
17321: 
17322: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_connect(Domain, Proto, ServerSA) ->
17323: %%     LSA  = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17324: %%     Sock = case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
17325: %%                {ok, S} ->
17326: %%                    S;
17327: %%                {error, OReason} ->
17328: %%                    ?FAIL({open, OReason})
17329: %%            end,
17330: %%     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
17331: %%         ok ->
17332: %%             ok;
17333: %%         {error, BReason} ->
17334: %%             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
17335: %%             ?FAIL({bind, BReason})
17336: %%     end,
17337: %%     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA) of
17338: %%         ok ->
17339: %%             {ok, Sock};
17340: %%         {error, Reason} ->
17341: %%             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
17342: %%             ?FAIL({connect, Reason})
17343: %%     end.
17344: 
17345: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_close({ok, Sock}) ->
17346: %%     (catch socket:close(Sock));
17347: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_close(_) ->
17348: %%     ok.
17349: 
17350: 
17351: 
17352: 
17353: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17354: 
17355: %% Tests the 'PRIORITY' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
17356: %%
17357: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, priority, integer()).
17358: %%
17359: %%
17360: 
17361: api_opt_sock_priority_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17362:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17363:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_priority_udp4,
17364:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_priority() end,
17365:            fun() ->
17366:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
17367:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, priority, Value)
17368:                           end,
17369:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
17370:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, priority)
17371:                           end,
17372:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
17373:                                  type   => dgram,
17374:                                  proto  => udp,
17375:                                  set    => Set,
17376:                                  get    => Get},
17377:                    ok = api_opt_sock_priority(InitState)
17378:            end).
17379: 
17380: 
17381: 
17382: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17383: 
17384: %% Tests the 'PRIORITY' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 TCP:
17385: %%
17386: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, priority, integer()).
17387: %%
17388: %%
17389: 
17390: api_opt_sock_priority_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17391:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17392:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_priority_tcp4,
17393:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_priority() end,
17394:            fun() ->
17395:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
17396:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, priority, Value)
17397:                           end,
17398:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
17399:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, priority)
17400:                           end,
17401:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
17402:                                  type   => stream,
17403:                                  proto  => tcp,
17404:                                  set    => Set,
17405:                                  get    => Get},
17406:                    ok = api_opt_sock_priority(InitState)
17407:            end).
17408: 
17409: 
17410: 
17411: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17412: 
17413: api_opt_sock_priority(InitState) ->
17414:     Seq = 
17415:         [
17416:          #{desc => "local address",
17417:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
17418:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17419:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
17420:                    end},
17421: 
17422:          #{desc => "open socket",
17423:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
17424:                          type   := Type,
17425:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
17426:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto),
17427:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
17428:                    end},
17429:          #{desc => "bind",
17430:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
17431:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
17432:                                ok ->
17433:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound"),
17434:                                    ok;
17435:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17436:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
17437:                                    ERROR
17438:                            end
17439:                    end},
17440:          #{desc => "get current (default) priority",
17441:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = State) ->
17442:                            case Get(Sock) of
17443:                                {ok, Prio} ->
17444:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("(default) priority: ~p",
17445:                                                [Prio]),
17446:                                    {ok, State#{default => Prio}};
17447:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17448:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) "
17449:                                                "priority:"
17450:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17451:                                    ERROR
17452:                            end
17453:                    end},
17454: 
17455:          #{desc => "change priority (to within non-root range)",
17456:            cmd  => fun(#{sock    := Sock,
17457:                          default := DefaultPrio,
17458:                          set     := Set} = _State) ->
17459:                            NewPrio =
17460:                                if
17461:                                    (DefaultPrio =< 0) andalso
17462:                                    (DefaultPrio < 6) ->
17463:                                        DefaultPrio+1;
17464:                                    (DefaultPrio =:= 6) ->
17465:                                        DefaultPrio-1;
17466:                                    true ->
17467:                                        3 % ...
17468:                                end,
17469:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try set new priority (to ~p)",
17470:                                        [NewPrio]),
17471:                            case Set(Sock, NewPrio) of
17472:                                ok ->
17473:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("priority changed (to ~p)",
17474:                                                [NewPrio]),
17475:                                    ok;
17476:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17477:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed setting timestamp:"
17478:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17479:                                    ERROR
17480:                            end
17481:                    end},
17482: 
17483:          #{desc => "change priority (to outside root-range)",
17484:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
17485:                          set  := Set} = _State) ->
17486:                            NewPrio = 42,
17487:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try set new priority (to ~p)",
17488:                                        [NewPrio]),
17489:                            case Set(Sock, NewPrio) of
17490:                                ok ->
17491:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("priority changed (to ~p)",
17492:                                                [NewPrio]),
17493:                                    ok;
17494:                                {error, eperm} ->
17495:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("priority change not allowed"),
17496:                                    ok;
17497:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17498:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed setting timestamp:"
17499:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17500:                                    ERROR
17501:                            end
17502:                    end},
17503: 
17504:          #{desc => "close socket",
17505:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
17506:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
17507:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
17508:                    end},
17509: 
17510:          %% *** We are done ***
17511:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17512:         ],
17513:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
17514:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
17515: 
17516: 
17517: 
17518: 
17519: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17520: 
17521: %% Tests the 'SNDBUF' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
17522: %%
17523: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf, integer()).
17524: %%
17525: %%
17526: 
17527: api_opt_sock_rcvbuf_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17528:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17529:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_rcvbuf_udp4,
17530:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_rcvbuf() end,
17531:            fun() ->
17532:                    ok = api_opt_sock_buf_udp4(rcvbuf)
17533:            end).
17534: 
17535: 
17536: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17537: 
17538: %% Tests the 'RCVBUF' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
17539: %%
17540: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf, integer()).
17541: %%
17542: %%
17543: 
17544: api_opt_sock_sndbuf_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17545:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17546:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_sndbuf_udp4,
17547:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_sndbuf() end,
17548:            fun() ->
17549:                    ok = api_opt_sock_buf_udp4(sndbuf)
17550:            end).
17551: 
17552: 
17553: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17554: 
17555: api_opt_sock_buf_udp4(Opt) ->
17556:     Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
17557:                    socket:setopt(Sock, socket, Opt, Value)
17558:            end,
17559:     Get  = fun(Sock) ->
17560:                    socket:getopt(Sock, socket, Opt)
17561:            end,
17562:     InitState = #{domain => inet,
17563:                   type   => dgram,
17564:                   proto  => udp,
17565:                   set    => Set,
17566:                   get    => Get},
17567:     ok = api_opt_sock_buf(InitState).
17568: 
17569: 
17570: api_opt_sock_buf(InitState) ->
17571:     Seq = 
17572:         [
17573:          #{desc => "local address",
17574:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
17575:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17576:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
17577:                    end},
17578: 
17579:          #{desc => "open socket",
17580:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
17581:                          type   := Type,
17582:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
17583:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto),
17584:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
17585:                    end},
17586:          #{desc => "bind",
17587:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
17588:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
17589:                                ok ->
17590:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound"),
17591:                                    ok;
17592:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17593:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
17594:                                    ERROR
17595:                            end
17596:                    end},
17597:          #{desc => "get current (default) buffer size",
17598:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = State) ->
17599:                            case Get(Sock) of
17600:                                {ok, Sz} ->
17601:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("(default) buffer: ~p",
17602:                                                [Sz]),
17603:                                    {ok, State#{default_sz => Sz}};
17604:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17605:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) "
17606:                                                "buffer size:"
17607:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17608:                                    ERROR
17609:                            end
17610:                    end},
17611: 
17612:          #{desc => "change buffer size (default + 1024)",
17613:            cmd  => fun(#{sock       := Sock,
17614:                          default_sz := DefaultSz,
17615:                          set        := Set} = State) ->
17616:                            NewSz = DefaultSz + 1024,
17617:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try set new buffer size to ~w", [NewSz]),
17618:                            case Set(Sock, NewSz) of
17619:                                ok ->
17620:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Buffer size change success", []),
17621:                                    {ok, State#{new_sz => NewSz}};
17622:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17623:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed changing buffer size:"
17624:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17625:                                    ERROR
17626:                            end
17627:                    end},
17628: 
17629:          #{desc => "validate buffer change",
17630:            cmd  => fun(#{sock   := Sock,
17631:                          get    := Get,
17632:                          new_sz := ExpSz} = _State) ->
17633:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try validate buffer size (~w)", [ExpSz]),
17634:                            case Get(Sock) of
17635:                                {ok, Sz} when (Sz >= ExpSz) ->
17636:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("buffer size validated:"
17637:                                                "~n   Sz: ~w (~w)", [Sz, ExpSz]),
17638:                                    ok;
17639:                                {ok, Sz} ->
17640:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("buffer size invalid:"
17641:                                                "~n   Sz:          ~w"
17642:                                                "~n   Expected Sz: ~w", [Sz, ExpSz]),
17643:                                    {error, {invalid_size, Sz, ExpSz}};
17644:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17645:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed get buffer size:"
17646:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17647:                                    ERROR
17648:                            end
17649:                    end},
17650: 
17651:          #{desc => "close socket",
17652:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
17653:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
17654:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
17655:                    end},
17656: 
17657:          %% *** We are done ***
17658:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17659:         ],
17660:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
17661:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
17662: 
17663: 
17664: 
17665: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17666: 
17667: %% Tests the 'RCVTIMEO' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
17668: %%
17669: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvtimeo, #{sec  => integer(),
17670: %%                                                       usec => integer()}).
17671: %%
17672: %% We should really test that the receive behaves as expected,
17673: %% but we don't (we just set the value and read it back...)
17674: %%
17675: 
17676: api_opt_sock_rcvtimeo_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17677:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17678:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_rcvtimeo_udp4,
17679:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_rcvtimeo() end,
17680:            fun() ->
17681:                    ok = api_opt_sock_timeo_udp4(rcvtimeo)
17682:            end).
17683: 
17684: 
17685: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17686: 
17687: %% Tests the 'SNDTIMEO' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
17688: %%
17689: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndtimeo, integer()).
17690: %%
17691: %%
17692: 
17693: api_opt_sock_sndtimeo_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17694:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17695:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_sndtimeo_udp4,
17696:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_sndtimeo() end,
17697:            fun() ->
17698:                    ok = api_opt_sock_timeo_udp4(sndtimeo)
17699:            end).
17700: 
17701: 
17702: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17703: 
17704: api_opt_sock_timeo_udp4(Opt) ->
17705:     Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
17706:                    socket:setopt(Sock, socket, Opt, Value)
17707:            end,
17708:     Get  = fun(Sock) ->
17709:                    socket:getopt(Sock, socket, Opt)
17710:            end,
17711:     InitState = #{domain => inet,
17712:                   type   => dgram,
17713:                   proto  => udp,
17714: 		  opt   => Opt,
17715:                   set    => Set,
17716:                   get    => Get},
17717:     ok = api_opt_sock_timeo(InitState).
17718: 
17719: 
17720: api_opt_sock_timeo(InitState) ->
17721:     Seq = 
17722:         [
17723:          #{desc => "local address",
17724:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
17725:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17726:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
17727:                    end},
17728: 
17729:          #{desc => "open socket",
17730:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
17731:                          type   := Type,
17732:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
17733:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto),
17734:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
17735:                    end},
17736:          #{desc => "bind",
17737:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
17738:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
17739:                                ok ->
17740:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound"),
17741:                                    ok;
17742:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17743:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
17744:                                    ERROR
17745:                            end
17746:                    end},
17747:          #{desc => "get current (default) timeout",
17748:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = State) ->
17749:                            case Get(Sock) of
17750:                                {ok, #{sec := _, usec := _} = TO} ->
17751:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("(default) timeout: ~p", [TO]),
17752:                                    {ok, State#{default_timeo => TO}};
17753:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
17754:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed getting (default) timeout:"
17755:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17756:                                    {skip, Reason};
17757:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17758:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) timeout:"
17759:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17760:                                    ERROR
17761:                            end
17762:                    end},
17763: 
17764:          #{desc => "change timeout",
17765:            cmd  => fun(#{sock          := Sock,
17766:                          default_timeo := #{sec := DefaultSec} = DefaultTO,
17767:                          set           := Set} = State) ->
17768:                            NewTO = DefaultTO#{sec => DefaultSec + 100},
17769:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try set new timeout to ~w", [NewTO]),
17770:                            case Set(Sock, NewTO) of
17771:                                ok ->
17772:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Timeout change success", []),
17773:                                    {ok, State#{new_timeo => NewTO}};
17774:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17775:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed changing timeout:"
17776:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17777:                                    ERROR
17778:                            end
17779:                    end},
17780: 
17781:          #{desc => "validate timeout change",
17782:            cmd  => fun(#{sock      := Sock,
17783:                          get       := Get,
17784:                          new_timeo := #{sec := ExpSec} = ExpTO} = _State) ->
17785:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try validate timeout (~w)", [ExpTO]),
17786:                            case Get(Sock) of
17787:                                {ok, ExpTO} ->
17788:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("timeout (exactly) validated"),
17789:                                    ok;
17790:                                {ok, #{sec := Sec}} when (ExpSec =:= Sec) ->
17791: 				   %% For some reason OpenBSD "adjusts" the timeout,
17792: 				   %% so that usec does not (always match)
17793:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("timeout (approx) validated"),
17794:                                    ok;
17795:                                {ok, TO} ->
17796:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout invalid:"
17797:                                                "~n   Timeout:          ~w"
17798:                                                "~n   Expected Timeout: ~w",
17799:                                                [TO, ExpTO]),
17800:                                    {error, {invalid_timeo, TO, ExpTO}};
17801:                                {error, edom = Reason} ->
17802: 				   %% On OpenBSD (at least) its possible that if the value
17803: 				   %% is too far "out of bounds", this will be the result:
17804: 				   %%
17805: 				   %%     "Numerical argument out of domain"
17806: 				   %%
17807:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed get timeout:"
17808:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17809:                                    {skip, Reason};
17810:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17811:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed get timeout:"
17812:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17813:                                    ERROR
17814:                            end
17815:                    end},
17816: 
17817:          #{desc => "close socket",
17818:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
17819:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
17820:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
17821:                    end},
17822: 
17823:          %% *** We are done ***
17824:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17825:         ],
17826:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
17827:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
17828: 
17829: 
17830: 
17831: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17832: 
17833: %% Tests the 'RCVLOWAT' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
17834: %%
17835: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvlowat, integer()).
17836: %%
17837: %%
17838: 
17839: api_opt_sock_rcvlowat_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17840:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17841:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_rcvlowat_udp4,
17842:            fun() ->
17843:                    is_not_windows(), % einval on Windows
17844:                    has_support_ipv4(),
17845:                    has_support_sock_rcvlowat()
17846:            end,
17847:            fun() ->
17848:                    ok = api_opt_sock_lowat_udp4(rcvlowat)
17849:            end).
17850: 
17851: 
17852: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17853: 
17854: %% Tests the 'SNDLOWAT' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
17855: %%
17856: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndlowat, integer()).
17857: %%
17858: %% This is (currently) not changeable on linux (among others),
17859: %% so we skip if we get ENOPROTOOPT when attempting a change.
17860: %%
17861: 
17862: api_opt_sock_sndlowat_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17863:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17864:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_sndlowat_udp4,
17865:            fun() ->
17866:                    is_not_windows(), % einval on Windows
17867:                    has_support_ipv4(),
17868:                    has_support_sock_sndlowat()
17869:            end,
17870:            fun() ->
17871:                    ok = api_opt_sock_lowat_udp4(sndlowat)
17872:            end).
17873: 
17874: 
17875: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17876: 
17877: api_opt_sock_lowat_udp4(Opt) ->
17878:     Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
17879:                    socket:setopt(Sock, socket, Opt, Value)
17880:            end,
17881:     Get  = fun(Sock) ->
17882:                    socket:getopt(Sock, socket, Opt)
17883:            end,
17884:     InitState = #{domain => inet,
17885:                   type   => dgram,
17886:                   proto  => udp,
17887:                   set    => Set,
17888:                   get    => Get},
17889:     ok = api_opt_sock_lowat(InitState).
17890: 
17891: 
17892: api_opt_sock_lowat(InitState) ->
17893:     Seq = 
17894:         [
17895:          #{desc => "local address",
17896:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
17897:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17898:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
17899:                    end},
17900: 
17901:          #{desc => "open socket",
17902:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
17903:                          type   := Type,
17904:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
17905:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto),
17906:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
17907:                    end},
17908:          #{desc => "bind",
17909:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
17910:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
17911:                                ok ->
17912:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound"),
17913:                                    ok;
17914:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17915:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
17916:                                    ERROR
17917:                            end
17918:                    end},
17919:          #{desc => "get current (default) lowat",
17920:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = State) ->
17921:                            case Get(Sock) of
17922:                                {ok, LOWAT} ->
17923:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("(default) lowat: ~p",
17924:                                                [LOWAT]),
17925:                                    {ok, State#{default_lowat => LOWAT}};
17926:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
17927:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed getting (default) lowat:"
17928:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17929:                                    {skip, Reason};
17930:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17931:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) lowat:"
17932:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17933:                                    ERROR
17934:                            end
17935:                    end},
17936: 
17937:          #{desc => "change lowat ( + 1 )",
17938:            cmd  => fun(#{sock          := Sock,
17939:                          default_lowat := DefaultLOWAT,
17940:                          set           := Set} = State) ->
17941:                            NewLOWAT = DefaultLOWAT + 1,
17942:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try set new lowat to ~w", [NewLOWAT]),
17943:                            case Set(Sock, NewLOWAT) of
17944:                                ok ->
17945:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("LOWAT change success", []),
17946:                                    {ok, State#{new_lowat => NewLOWAT}};
17947:                                {error, enoprotoopt} ->
17948:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("LOWAT not changeable", []),
17949:                                    {skip, "Not changeable"};
17950:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17951:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed changing buffer size:"
17952:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17953:                                    ERROR
17954:                            end
17955:                    end},
17956: 
17957:          #{desc => "validate lowat",
17958:            cmd  => fun(#{sock      := Sock,
17959:                          get       := Get,
17960:                          new_lowat := ExpLOWAT} = _State) ->
17961:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try validate lowat (~w)", [ExpLOWAT]),
17962:                            case Get(Sock) of
17963:                                {ok, ExpLOWAT} ->
17964:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("lowat validated:"
17965:                                                "~n   LOWAT: ~w", [ExpLOWAT]),
17966:                                    ok;
17967:                                {ok, LOWAT} ->
17968:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("lowat invalid:"
17969:                                                "~n   LOWAT:          ~w"
17970:                                                "~n   Expected LOWAT: ~w",
17971:                                                [LOWAT, ExpLOWAT]),
17972:                                    {error, {invalid_lowat, LOWAT, ExpLOWAT}};
17973:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17974:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed get lowat:"
17975:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17976:                                    ERROR
17977:                            end
17978:                    end},
17979: 
17980:          #{desc => "close socket",
17981:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
17982:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
17983:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
17984:                    end},
17985: 
17986:          %% *** We are done ***
17987:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17988:         ],
17989:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
17990:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
17991: 
17992: 
17993: 
17994: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17995: 
17996: %% Tests that the timestamp control message header is received when
17997: %% setting the socket 'socket' option true when using sendmsg/recvmsg
17998: %% on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
17999: %% So, this is done on the receiving side: 
18000: %%
18001: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, timestamp, boolean()).
18002: %%
18003: %% All subsequent *received* messages will be timestamped.
18004: %%
18005: 
18006: api_opt_sock_timestamp_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
18007:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
18008:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_timestamp_udp4,
18009:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_timestamp() end,
18010:            fun() ->
18011:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
18012:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, timestamp, Value)
18013:                           end,
18014:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
18015:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, timestamp)
18016:                           end,
18017:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
18018:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
18019:                                              iov  => [Data]},
18020:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
18021:                           end,
18022:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
18023:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
18024:                                       {ok, #{addr := Source,
18025:                                              ctrl := CMsgs,
18026:                                              iov  := [Data]}} ->
18027:                                           {ok, {Source, CMsgs, Data}};
18028:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
18029:                                           ERROR
18030:                                   end
18031:                           end,
18032:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
18033:                                  proto  => udp,
18034:                                  send   => Send,
18035:                                  recv   => Recv,
18036:                                  set    => Set,
18037:                                  get    => Get},
18038:                    ok = api_opt_sock_timestamp_udp(InitState)
18039:            end).
18040: 
18041: 
18042: 
18043: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
18044: 
18045: api_opt_sock_timestamp_udp(InitState) ->
18046:     Seq = 
18047:         [
18048:          #{desc => "local address",
18049:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local = Domain} = State) ->
18050:                            LSASrc = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
18051:                            LSADst = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
18052:                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSASrc,
18053:                                        lsa_dst => LSADst}};
18054:                       (#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
18055:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
18056:                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSA,
