20918:          #{desc => "send req (to dst) (w tos = mincost)",
20919:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, send := Send}) ->
20920:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Dst, default)
20921:                    end},
20922:          #{desc => "recv req (from src) - w tos = reliability",
20923:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, recv := Recv}) ->
20924:                            case Recv(Sock) of
20925:                                {ok, {Src, [#{level := ip,
20926:                                              type  := TOS,
20927:                                              value := reliability = TOSData}],
20928:                                      ?BASIC_REQ}} 
20929:                                  when ((TOS =:= tos) orelse (TOS =:= recvtos)) ->
20930:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("got expected TOS (~w) = ~w "
20931:                                                "control message header", 
20932:                                                [TOS, TOSData]),
20933:                                    ok;
20934:                                {ok, {BadSrc, BadCHdrs, BadReq} = UnexpData} ->
20935:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
20936:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
20937:                                                "~n   Recv Source:   ~p"
20938:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
20939:                                                "~n   Recv CHdrs:    ~p"
20940:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
20941:                                                "~n   Recv Msg:      ~p",
20942:                                                [Src, BadSrc,
20943:                                                 [], BadCHdrs,
20944:                                                 ?BASIC_REQ, BadReq]),
20945:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
20946:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
20947:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
20948:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
20949:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
20950:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
20951:                                                "~n   Unexp Data:    ~p",
20952:                                                [Src, [], ?BASIC_REQ, UnexpData]),
20953:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
20954:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
20955:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
20956:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
20957:                                    ERROR
20958:                            end
20959:                    end},
20960: 
20961:          #{desc => "close src socket",
20962:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
20963:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
20964:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_src, State)}
20965:                    end},
20966:          #{desc => "close dst socket",
20967:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
20968:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
20969:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_dst, State)}
20970:                    end},
20971: 
20972:          %% *** We are done ***
20973:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
20974:         ],
20975:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
20976:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
20977: 
20978: 
20979: 
20980: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
20981: 
20982: %% Tests that the ttl control message header is received when
20983: %% setting the socket 'ip' option recvttl is set to true when using
20984: %% sendmsg/recvmsg on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
20985: %% So, this is done on the receiving side: 
20986: %%
20987: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, ip, recvttl, boolean()).
20988: %%
20989: %% For all subsequent *received* messages, the ttl control message
20990: %% header will be with the message.
20991: %%
20992: %% On darwin we don't actually get the TTL we send even after we have
20993: %% enabled TTL. Instead we get the default value (which was 64).
20994: %% Possibly this is because we run the test in the same OS process and
20995: %% even the same erlang process....
20996: %% The same issue on OpenBSD (6.6).
20997: %% Maybe we should send and receive from different VMs, until then
20998: %% skip darwin and OpenBSD.
20999: %%
21000: %% Windows:
21001: %% It seems like its possible to set and get the recvttl option,
21002: %% but not to use the ttl control message header when sending.
21003: %% The following is the list of types (for level ip) which are listed
21004: %% as supported: IP_ORIGINAL_ARRIVAL_IF, IP_PKTINFO and IP_ECN
21005: 
21006: api_opt_ip_recvttl_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
21007:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
21008:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
21009:            fun() ->
21010:                    has_support_ipv4(),
21011: 		   has_support_ip_recvttl(),
21012: 		   is_not_openbsd(),
21013: 		   is_not_darwin()
21014: 	   end,
21015:            fun() ->
21016:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
21017:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, ip, recvttl, Value)
21018:                           end,
21019:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
21020:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, ip, recvttl)
21021:                           end,
21022:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest, default) ->
21023:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
21024:                                           iov  => [Data]},
21025:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg);
21026:                              (Sock, Data, Dest, TTL) ->
21027:                                   CMsg = #{level => ip,
21028:                                            type  => ttl,
21029:                                            value => TTL},
21030:                                   Msg  = #{addr => Dest,
21031:                                            ctrl => [CMsg],
21032:                                            iov  => [Data]},
21033:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
21034:                           end,
21035:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
21036:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
21037:                                       {ok, #{addr := Source,
21038:                                              ctrl := CMsgs,
21039:                                              iov  := [Data]}} ->
21040:                                           {ok, {Source, CMsgs, Data}};
21041:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
21042:                                           ERROR
21043:                                   end
21044:                           end,
21045:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
21046:                                  proto  => udp,
21047:                                  send   => Send,
21048:                                  recv   => Recv,
21049:                                  set    => Set,
21050:                                  get    => Get},
21051:                    ok = api_opt_ip_recvttl_udp(InitState)
21052:            end).
21053: 
21054: 
21055: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
21056: 
21057: api_opt_ip_recvttl_udp(InitState) ->
21058:     Seq = 
21059:         [
21060:          #{desc => "local address",
21061:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local = Domain} = State) ->
21062:                            LSASrc = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
21063:                            LSADst = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
21064:                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSASrc,
21065:                                        lsa_dst => LSADst}};
21066:                       (#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
21067:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
21068:                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSA,
21069:                                        lsa_dst => LSA}}
21070:                    end},
21071: 
21072:          #{desc => "open src socket",
21073:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
21074:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
21075:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, Proto),
21076:                            {ok, State#{sock_src => Sock}}
21077:                    end},
21078:          #{desc => "bind src",
21079:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, lsa_src := LSA}) ->
21080:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
21081:                                ok ->
21082:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound"),
21083:                                    ok;
21084:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21085:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
21086:                                    ERROR
21087:                            end
21088:                    end},
21089:          #{desc => "sockname src socket",
21090:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
21091:                            SASrc = sock_sockname(Sock),
21092:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("src sockaddr: "
21093:                                        "~n   ~p", [SASrc]),
21094:                            {ok, State#{sa_src => SASrc}}
21095:                    end},
21096: 
21097:          #{desc => "open dst socket",
21098:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
21099:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
21100:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, Proto),
21101:                            {ok, State#{sock_dst => Sock}}
21102:                    end},
21103:          #{desc => "bind dst",
21104:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, lsa_dst := LSA}) ->
21105:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
21106:                                ok ->
21107:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound"),
21108:                                    ok;
21109:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21110:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
21111:                                    ERROR
21112:                            end
21113:                    end},
21114:          #{desc => "sockname dst socket",
21115:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
21116:                            SADst = sock_sockname(Sock),
21117:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("dst sockaddr: "
21118:                                        "~n   ~p", [SADst]),
21119:                            {ok, State#{sa_dst => SADst}}
21120:                    end},
21121:          #{desc => "default recvttl for dst socket",
21122:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
21123:                            case Get(Sock) of
21124:                                {ok, false = Value} ->
21125:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("dst recvttl: ~p", [Value]),
21126:                                    ok;
21127:                                {ok, Unexpected} ->
21128:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected src recvttl: ~p",
21129:                                                [Unexpected]),
21130:                                    {error, {unexpected, Unexpected}};
21131:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21132:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) timestamp:"
21133:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21134:                                    ERROR
21135:                            end
21136:                    end},
21137: 
21138:          #{desc => "send req (to dst) (wo explicit ttl)",
21139:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, send := Send}) ->
21140:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Dst, default)
21141:                    end},
21142:          #{desc => "recv req (from src)",
21143:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, recv := Recv}) ->
21144:                            case Recv(Sock) of
21145:                                {ok, {Src, [], ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
21146:                                    ok;
21147:                                {ok, {BadSrc, BadCHdrs, BadReq} = UnexpData} ->
21148:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
21149:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
21150:                                                "~n   Recv Source:   ~p"
21151:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
21152:                                                "~n   Recv CHdrs:    ~p"
21153:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
21154:                                                "~n   Recv Msg:      ~p",
21155:                                                [Src, BadSrc,
21156:                                                 [], BadCHdrs,
21157:                                                 ?BASIC_REQ, BadReq]),
21158:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
21159:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
21160:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
21161:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
21162:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
21163:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
21164:                                                "~n   Unexp Data:    ~p",
21165:                                                [Src, [], ?BASIC_REQ, UnexpData]),
21166:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
21167:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
21168:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
21169:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
21170:                                    ERROR
21171:                            end
21172:                    end},
21173: 
21174:          #{desc => "send req (to dst) (w explicit ttl = 100)",
21175:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := SSock,
21176:                          sock_dst := DSock, sa_dst := Dst,
21177:                          send     := Send}) ->
21178:                            case Send(SSock, ?BASIC_REQ, Dst, 100) of
21179:                                ok ->
21180:                                    ok;
21181:                                {error, einval = Reason} ->
21182:                                    %% IF we can't send it the test will not work
21183:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Cannot send TTL: "
21184:                                                "~p => SKIP", [Reason]),
21185:                                    (catch socket:close(SSock)),
21186:                                    (catch socket:close(DSock)),
21187:                                    {skip,
21188: 				    ?F("Cannot send with TTL: ~p", [Reason])};
21189:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
21190:                                    %% On some platforms this is not
21191:                                    %% accepted (FreeBSD), so skip.
21192:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Expected Failure: "
21193:                                                "~p => SKIP", [Reason]),
21194:                                    (catch socket:close(SSock)),
21195:                                    (catch socket:close(DSock)),
21196:                                    {skip, Reason};
21197: 
21198:                                {error,
21199:                                 {get_overlapped_result,
21200:                                  #{file     := File,
21201:                                    function := Function,
21202:                                    line     := Line,
21203:                                    raw_info := RawInfo,
21204:                                    info     := invalid_parameter = Info}}} ->
21205:                                    %% IF we can't send it the test will not work
21206:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Cannot send TTL: "
21207:                                                "~p => SKIP: "
21208:                                                "~n   File:     ~s"
21209:                                                "~n   Function: ~s"
21210:                                                "~n   Line:     ~p"
21211:                                                "~n   Raw Info: ~p",
21212:                                                [Info,
21213:                                                 File, Function, Line,
21214:                                                 RawInfo]),
21215:                                    (catch socket:close(SSock)),
21216:                                    (catch socket:close(DSock)),
21217:                                    {skip,
21218:                                     ?F("Cannot send with TTL: ~p", [Info])};
21219:                                {error, {get_overlapped_result,
21220:                                         invalid_parameter = Info}} ->
21221:                                    %% IF we can't send it the test will not work
21222:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Cannot send TTL: "
21223:                                                "~p => SKIP", [Info]),
21224:                                    (catch socket:close(SSock)),
21225:                                    (catch socket:close(DSock)),
21226:                                    {skip,
21227:                                     ?F("Cannot send with TTL: ~p", [Info])};
21228: 
21229:                                {error,
21230:                                 {completion_status,
21231:                                  #{file     := File,
21232:                                    function := Function,
21233:                                    line     := Line,
21234:                                    raw_info := RawInfo,
21235:                                    info     := invalid_parameter = Info}}} ->
21236:                                    %% IF we can't send it the test will not work
21237:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Cannot send TTL: "
21238:                                                "~p => SKIP: "
21239:                                                "~n   File:     ~s"
21240:                                                "~n   Function: ~s"
21241:                                                "~n   Line:     ~p"
21242:                                                "~n   Raw Info: ~p",
21243:                                                [Info,
21244:                                                 File, Function, Line,
21245:                                                 RawInfo]),
21246:                                    (catch socket:close(SSock)),
21247:                                    (catch socket:close(DSock)),
21248:                                    {skip,
21249:                                     ?F("Cannot send with TTL: ~p", [Info])};
21250:                                {error, {completion_status,
21251:                                         invalid_parameter = Info}} ->
21252:                                    %% IF we can't send it the test will not work
21253:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Cannot send TTL: "
21254:                                                "~p => SKIP", [Info]),
21255:                                    (catch socket:close(SSock)),
21256:                                    (catch socket:close(DSock)),
21257:                                    {skip,
21258:                                     ?F("Cannot send with TTL: ~p", [Info])};
21259: 
21260:                                {error, _Reason} = ERROR ->
21261:                                    ERROR
21262:                            end
21263:                    end},
21264:          #{desc => "recv req (from src) - wo ttl",
21265:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, recv := Recv}) ->
21266:                            case Recv(Sock) of
21267:                                {ok, {Src, [], ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
21268:                                    ok;
21269:                                {ok, {Src, [#{level := ip,
21270:                                              type  := TTLType,
21271:                                              value := TTL}], ?BASIC_REQ}}
21272:                                when ((TTLType =:= recvttl) andalso
21273:                                      (TTL =:= 255)) ->
21274:                                    %% This is the behaviopur on Solaris (11)
21275:                                    %% and maybe on other platforms...
21276:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Got (default) TTL (~w): ~p",
21277:                                                [TTLType, TTL]),
21278:                                    ok;
21279:                                {ok, {BadSrc, BadCHdrs, BadReq} = UnexpData} ->
21280:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
21281:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
21282:                                                "~n   Recv Source:   ~p"
21283:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
21284:                                                "~n   Recv CHdrs:    ~p"
21285:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
21286:                                                "~n   Recv Msg:      ~p",
21287:                                                [Src, BadSrc,
21288:                                                 [], BadCHdrs,
21289:                                                 ?BASIC_REQ, BadReq]),
21290:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
21291:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
21292:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
21293:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
21294:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
21295:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
21296:                                                "~n   Unexp Data:    ~p",
21297:                                                [Src, [], ?BASIC_REQ, UnexpData]),
21298:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
21299:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
21300:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
21301:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
21302:                                    ERROR
21303:                            end
21304:                    end},
21305: 
21306:          #{desc => "enable recvttl on dst socket",
21307:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
21308:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
21309:                                ok ->
21310:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("dst recvttl enabled"),
21311:                                    ok;
21312:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21313:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed enabling recvttl:"
21314:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21315:                                    ERROR
21316:                            end
21317:                    end},
21318: 
21319:          #{desc => "send req (to dst) (wo explicit ttl)",
21320:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, send := Send}) ->
21321:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Dst, default)
21322:                    end},
21323:          #{desc => "recv req (from src) - w default ttl",
21324:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, recv := Recv}) ->
21325:                            case Recv(Sock) of
21326:                                {ok, {Src, [#{level := ip,
21327:                                              type  := TTLType,
21328:                                              value := TTL}], ?BASIC_REQ}}
21329:                                when ((TTLType =:= ttl) orelse 
21330:                                      (TTLType =:= recvttl)) ->
21331:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Got (default) TTL (~w): ~p",
21332:                                                [TTLType, TTL]),
21333:                                    ok;
21334:                                {ok, {BadSrc, BadCHdrs, BadReq} = UnexpData} ->
21335:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
21336:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
21337:                                                "~n   Recv Source:   ~p"
21338:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
21339:                                                "~n   Recv CHdrs:    ~p"
21340:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
21341:                                                "~n   Recv Msg:      ~p",
21342:                                                [Src, BadSrc,
21343:                                                 [#{level => ip,
21344: 						   type  => ttl,
21345: 						   value => "something"}],
21346: 						BadCHdrs,
21347:                                                 ?BASIC_REQ, BadReq]),
21348:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
21349:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
21350:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
21351:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
21352:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
21353:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
21354:                                                "~n   Unexp Data:    ~p",
21355:                                                [Src, [#{level => ip,
21356: 							type  => ttl,
21357: 							value => "something"}],
21358: 						?BASIC_REQ, UnexpData]),
21359:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
21360:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
21361:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
21362:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
21363:                                    ERROR
21364:                            end
21365:                    end},
21366: 
21367:          #{desc => "send req (to dst) (w explicit ttl = 100)",
21368:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, send := Send}) ->
21369:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Dst, 100)
21370:                    end},
21371:          #{desc => "recv req (from src) - w ttl = 100",
21372:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, recv := Recv}) ->
21373:                            case Recv(Sock) of
21374:                                {ok, {Src, [#{level := ip,
21375:                                              type  := TTLType,
21376:                                              value := 100 = TTL}], ?BASIC_REQ}}
21377:                                when ((TTLType =:= ttl) orelse
21378:                                      (TTLType =:= recvttl)) ->
21379:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Got TTL (~w): ~p",
21380:                                                [TTLType, TTL]),
21381:                                    ok;
21382:                                {ok, {Src, [#{level := ip,
21383:                                              type  := TTLType,
21384:                                              value := BadTTL}], ?BASIC_REQ}}
21385:                                when ((TTLType =:= ttl) orelse
21386:                                      (TTLType =:= recvttl)) ->
21387:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected TTL: "
21388:                                                "~n   Expect TTL: ~p"
21389:                                                "~n   Recv TTL:   ~p",
21390:                                                [100, BadTTL]),
21391:                                    {error, {unexpected_ttl, {100, BadTTL}}};
21392:                                {ok, {BadSrc, BadCHdrs, BadReq} = UnexpData} ->
21393:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
21394:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
21395:                                                "~n   Recv Source:   ~p"
21396:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
21397:                                                "~n   Recv CHdrs:    ~p"
21398:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
21399:                                                "~n   Recv Msg:      ~p",
21400:                                                [Src, BadSrc,
21401:                                                 [#{level => ip,
21402: 						   type  => ttl,
21403: 						   value => 100}], BadCHdrs,
21404:                                                 ?BASIC_REQ, BadReq]),
21405:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
21406:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
21407:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected msg: "
21408:                                                "~n   Expect Source: ~p"
21409:                                                "~n   Expect CHdrs:  ~p"
21410:                                                "~n   Expect Msg:    ~p"
21411:                                                "~n   Unexp Data:    ~p",
21412:                                                [Src, [#{level => ip,
21413: 							type  => ttl,
21414: 							value => 100}],
21415: 						?BASIC_REQ, UnexpData]),
21416:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
21417:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
21418:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
21419:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
21420:                                    ERROR
21421:                            end
21422:                    end},
21423: 
21424:          #{desc => "close src socket",
21425:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
21426:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
21427:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_src, State)}
21428:                    end},
21429:          #{desc => "close dst socket",
21430:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
21431:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
21432:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_dst, State)}
21433:                    end},
21434: 
21435:          %% *** We are done ***
21436:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
21437:         ],
21438:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
21439:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
21440: 
21441: 
21442: 
21443: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
21444: 
21445: %% Tests the ip socket option 'tos' can be set and retrieved from a
21446: %% the socket its set on. It sets the type-of-server field in the IP
21447: %% header for a TCP or UDP socket.
21448: %% There is no way to fetch the value a received IP datagram.
21449: %% Default value is supposed to be '0'.
21450: %% 
21451: 
21452: api_opt_ip_tos_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
21453:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
21454:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
21455:            fun() ->
21456:                    is_not_windows(), % IP_TOS on windows
21457:                    has_support_ipv4(),
21458:                    has_support_ip_tos()
21459:            end,
21460:            fun() ->
21461:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
21462:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, ip, tos, Value)
21463:                           end,
21464:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
21465:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, ip, tos)
21466:                           end,
21467:                    InitState = #{set => Set,
21468:                                  get => Get},
21469:                    ok = api_opt_ip_tos_udp(InitState)
21470:            end).
21471: 
21472: 
21473: 
21474: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
21475: 
21476: api_opt_ip_tos_udp(InitState) ->
21477:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
21478:     %% mincost is not supported on all platforms.
21479:     %% For instance, Solaris 10, does not have that constant.
21480:     %% Instead it has two others with, what appears to be,
21481:     %% completely different meanings...
21482:     %% So, avoid the complication by not using this value...
21483:     %% TOS1 = mincost,     TOS1Str = atom_to_list(TOS1),
21484:     TOS2 = throughput,  TOS2Str = atom_to_list(TOS2),
21485:     TOS3 = reliability, TOS3Str = atom_to_list(TOS3),
21486:     TOS4 = lowdelay,    TOS4Str = atom_to_list(TOS4),
21487:     TOS5 = 42,          TOS5Str = integer_to_list(TOS5),
21488:     Seq =
21489:         [
21490:          #{desc => "local address",
21491:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
21492:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(inet),
21493:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
21494:                    end},
21495: 
21496:          #{desc => "open socket",
21497:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
21498:                            Sock = sock_open(inet, dgram, udp),
21499:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
21500:                    end},
21501:          #{desc => "bind",
21502:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
21503:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
21504:                                ok ->
21505:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket bound"),
21506:                                    ok;
21507:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21508:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
21509:                                    ERROR
21510:                            end
21511:                    end},
21512: 
21513:          #{desc => "get default tos",
21514:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
21515:                            case Get(Sock) of
21516:                                {ok, 0 = Value} ->
21517:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected default tos: ~p", [Value]),
21518:                                    ok;
21519:                                {ok, Value} ->
21520:                                    %% On FreeBSD 14 default value is not 0!
21521:                                    case os:type() of
21522:                                        {unix, freebsd} ->
21523:                                            case os:version() of
21524:                                                {14, _, _}
21525:                                                  when (Value =:= mincost) ->
21526:                                                    ok;
21527:                                                _ ->
21528:                                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected "
21529:                                                                "default "
21530:                                                                "tos: ~p",
21531:                                                                [Value]),
21532:                                                    {error, {unexpected, Value}}
21533:                                            end;
21534:                                        _ ->
21535:                                            ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected "
21536:                                                        "default "
21537:                                                        "tos: ~p",
21538:                                                        [Value]),
21539:                                            {error, {unexpected, Value}}
21540:                                    end;
21541:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21542:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) tos:"
21543:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21544:                                    ERROR
21545:                            end
21546:                    end},
21547: 
21548:          %% #{desc => "set tos " ++ TOS1Str,
21549:          %%   cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
21550:          %%                   socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
21551:          %%                   case Set(Sock, TOS1) of
21552:          %%                       ok ->
21553:          %%                           socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
21554:          %%                           ?SEV_IPRINT("tos set to ~p", [TOS1]),
21555:          %%                           ok;
21556:          %%                       {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21557:          %%                           socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
21558:          %%                           ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed setting tos:"
21559:          %%                                       "   ~p", [Reason]),
21560:          %%                           ERROR
21561:          %%                   end
21562:          %%           end},
21563:          %% #{desc => "get tos (expect " ++ TOS1Str ++ ")",
21564:          %%   cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
21565:          %%                   case Get(Sock) of
21566:          %%                       {ok, TOS1 = Value} ->
21567:          %%                           ?SEV_IPRINT("expected tos (~p)", [Value]),
21568:          %%                           ok;
21569:          %%                       {ok, Unexpected} ->
21570:          %%                           ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected tos: ~p",
21571:          %%                                       [Unexpected]),
21572:          %%                           {error, {unexpected, Unexpected}};
21573:          %%                       {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21574:          %%                           ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) tos:"
21575:          %%                                       "   ~p", [Reason]),
21576:          %%                           ERROR
21577:          %%                   end
21578:          %%           end},
21579: 
21580:          #{desc => "set tos " ++ TOS2Str,
21581:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
21582:                            case Set(Sock, TOS2) of
21583:                                ok ->
21584:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("tos set to ~p", [TOS2]),
21585:                                    ok;
21586:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21587:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed setting tos:"
21588:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21589:                                    ERROR
21590:                            end
21591:                    end},
21592:          #{desc => "get tos (expect " ++ TOS2Str ++ ")",
21593:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
21594:                            case Get(Sock) of
21595:                                {ok, TOS2 = Value} ->
21596:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected tos (~p)", [Value]),
21597:                                    ok;
21598:                                {ok, Unexpected} ->
21599:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected tos: ~p",
21600:                                                [Unexpected]),
21601:                                    {error, {unexpected, Unexpected}};
21602:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21603:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) tos:"
21604:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21605:                                    ERROR
21606:                            end
21607:                    end},
21608: 
21609:          #{desc => "set tos " ++ TOS3Str,
21610:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
21611:                            case Set(Sock, TOS3) of
21612:                                ok ->
21613:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("tos set to ~p", [TOS3]),
21614:                                    ok;
21615:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21616:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed setting tos:"
21617:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21618:                                    ERROR
21619:                            end
21620:                    end},
21621:          #{desc => "get tos (expect " ++ TOS3Str ++ ")",
21622:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
21623:                            case Get(Sock) of
21624:                                {ok, TOS3 = Value} ->
21625:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected tos (~p)", [Value]),
21626:                                    ok;
21627:                                {ok, Unexpected} ->
21628:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected tos: ~p",
21629:                                                [Unexpected]),
21630:                                    {error, {unexpected, Unexpected}};
21631:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21632:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) tos:"
21633:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21634:                                    ERROR
21635:                            end
21636:                    end},
21637: 
21638:          #{desc => "set tos " ++ TOS4Str,
21639:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
21640:                            case Set(Sock, TOS4) of
21641:                                ok ->
21642:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("tos set to ~p", [TOS4]),
21643:                                    ok;
21644:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21645:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed setting tos:"
21646:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21647:                                    ERROR
21648:                            end
21649:                    end},
21650:          #{desc => "get tos (expect " ++ TOS4Str ++ ")",
21651:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
21652:                            case Get(Sock) of
21653:                                {ok, TOS4 = Value} ->
21654:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected tos (~p)", [Value]),
21655:                                    ok;
21656:                                {ok, Unexpected} ->
21657:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected tos: ~p",
21658:                                                [Unexpected]),
21659:                                    {error, {unexpected, Unexpected}};
21660:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21661:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) tos:"
21662:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21663:                                    ERROR
21664:                            end
21665:                    end},
21666: 
21667:          #{desc => "set tos " ++ TOS5Str,
21668:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
21669:                            case Set(Sock, TOS5) of
21670:                                ok ->
21671:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("tos set to ~p", [TOS5]),
21672:                                    ok;
21673:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21674:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed setting tos:"
21675:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21676:                                    ERROR
21677:                            end
21678:                    end},
21679:          #{desc => "get tos (expect " ++ TOS5Str ++ ")",
21680:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
21681:                            case Get(Sock) of
21682:                                {ok, TOS5 = Value} ->
21683:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected tos (~p)", [Value]),
21684:                                    ok;
21685:                                {ok, Unexpected} ->
21686:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected tos: ~p",
21687:                                                [Unexpected]),
21688:                                    {error, {unexpected, Unexpected}};
21689:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21690:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) tos:"
21691:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
21692:                                    ERROR
21693:                            end
21694:                    end},
21695: 
21696:          #{desc => "close socket",
21697:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
21698:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
21699:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
21700:                    end},
21701: 
21702:          %% *** We are done ***
21703:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
21704:         ],
21705:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
21706:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
21707: 
21708: 
21709: 
21710: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
21711: 
21712: %% Tests the ip socket option 'recverr' can be set and that the error
21713: %% queue can be read.
21714: %% 
21715: 
21716: api_opt_ip_recverr_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
21717:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
21718:     tc_try(api_opt_ip_recverr_udp4,
21719:            fun() ->
21720:                    has_support_ipv4(),
21721:                    has_support_ip_recverr()
21722:            end,
21723:            fun() ->
21724:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Key, Value) ->
21725:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, ip, Key, Value)
21726:                           end,
21727:                    Get  = fun(Sock, Key) ->
21728:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, ip, Key)
21729:                           end,
21730:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest, Tmo) ->
21731:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest, [], Tmo)
21732:                           end,
21733:                    Recv = fun(Sock, Tmo) ->
21734:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, [], Tmo)
21735:                           end,
21736:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
21737:                                  proto  => udp,
21738:                                  send   => Send,
21739:                                  recv   => Recv,
21740:                                  set    => Set,
21741:                                  get    => Get},
21742:                    ok = api_opt_recverr_udp(Config, InitState)
21743:            end).
21744: 
21745: 
21746: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
21747: 
21748: %% Tests the ipv6 socket option 'recverr' can be set and that the error
21749: %% queue can be read.
21750: %% 
21751: 
21752: api_opt_ipv6_recverr_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
21753:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
21754:     tc_try(api_opt_ipv6_recverr_udp6,
21755:            fun() ->
21756:                    has_support_ipv6(),
21757:                    has_support_ipv6_recverr()
21758:            end,
21759:            fun() ->
21760:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Key, Value) ->
21761:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, ipv6, Key, Value)
21762:                           end,
21763:                    Get  = fun(Sock, Key) ->
21764:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, ipv6, Key)
21765:                           end,
21766:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest, Tmo) ->
21767:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest, [], Tmo)
21768:                           end,
21769:                    Recv = fun(Sock, Tmo) ->
21770:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, [], Tmo)
21771:                           end,
21772:                    InitState = #{domain => inet6,
21773:                                  proto  => udp,
21774:                                  send   => Send,
21775:                                  recv   => Recv,
21776:                                  set    => Set,
21777:                                  get    => Get},
21778:                    ok = api_opt_recverr_udp(Config, InitState)
21779:            end).
21780: 
21781: 
21782: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
21783: 
21784: api_opt_recverr_udp(Config, InitState) ->
21785:     Seq = 
21786:         [
21787:          #{desc => "create socket",
21788:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
21789:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("test for ip:recvtos"),
21790:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
21791:                                {ok, Sock} ->
21792:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
21793:                                {error, _} = ERROR -> 
21794:                                    ERROR
21795:                            end
21796:                    end},
21797:          #{desc => "bind (to loopback)",
21798:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
21799:                            case socket:bind(Sock, loopback) of
21800:                                ok ->
21801:                                    case socket:sockname(Sock) of
21802:                                        {ok, Addr} ->
21803:                                            ?SEV_IPRINT(
21804:                                               "bound to ~p", [Addr]),
21805:                                            {ok, State#{addr => Addr}};
21806:                                        {error, _} = ERROR_1 ->
21807:                                            ERROR_1
21808:                                    end;
21809:                                {error, _} = ERROR_2 ->
21810:                                    ERROR_2
21811:                            end
21812:                    end},
21813: 
21814:          #{desc => "enable recverr",
21815:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
21816:                            Set(Sock, recverr, true)
21817:                    end},
21818: 
21819:          #{desc => "disable mtu_discover",
21820:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
21821:                            Set(Sock, mtu_discover, dont)
21822:                    end},
21823: 
21824:          #{desc => "try (async) read (=> select)",
21825:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
21826:                          recv := Recv} = State) ->
21827:                            RecvRef = nowait(Config),
21828:                            case Recv(Sock, RecvRef) of
21829:                                {select, SelectInfo} when RecvRef =:= nowait ->
21830:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select nowait: "
21831: 					       "~n   ~p", [SelectInfo]),
21832:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
21833:                                                rselect   => SelectInfo}};
21834:                                {select,
21835:                                 {select_info, _Tag, RecvRef} = SelectInfo}
21836:                                  when is_reference(RecvRef) ->
21837:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select ref: "
21838: 					       "~n   ~p", [SelectInfo]),
21839:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
21840:                                                rselect   => SelectInfo}};
21841: 
21842:                                {completion, CI} when RecvRef =:= nowait ->
21843:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected completion nowait: "
21844: 					       "~n   ~p", [CI]),
21845:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => completion,
21846:                                                rcompletion => CI}};
21847:                                {completion,
21848:                                 {completion_info, _Tag, RecvRef} = CI}
21849:                                  when is_reference(RecvRef) ->
21850:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected completion ref: "
21851: 					       "~n   ~p", [CI]),
21852:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => completion,
21853:                                                rcompletion => CI}};
21854: 
21855:                                {ok, _} ->
21856:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected success"),
21857:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
21858: 
21859:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21860:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected error: ~p", [Reason]),
21861:                                    ERROR
21862:                            end
21863:                    end},
21864: 
21865:          #{desc => "try send to nowhere",
21866:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
21867:                          sock   := Sock,
21868:                          send   := Send} = State) ->
21869:                            SendRef = nowait(Config),
21870:                            Dest = #{family => Domain,
21871:                                     addr   => if
21872:                                                   (Domain =:= inet) ->
21873:                                                       {127,0,0,1};
21874:                                                   (Domain =:= inet6) ->
21875:                                                       {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}
21876:                                               end,
21877:                                     port   => 44444},
21878:                            case Send(Sock, <<"ping">>, Dest, SendRef) of
21879:                                ok ->
21880:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("sent"),
21881:                                    {ok, State#{sent => true}};
21882: 
21883:                                {select, SelectInfo}
21884:                                  when SendRef =:= nowait ->
21885:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select nowait: ~p",
21886: 					       [SelectInfo]),
21887:                                    {ok, State#{sent       => false,
21888:                                                asynch_tag => select,
21889:                                                sselect    => SelectInfo}};
21890:                                {select,
21891:                                 {select_info, _Tag, SendRef} = SelectInfo}
21892:                                  when is_reference(SendRef) ->
21893:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select ref: ~p",
21894: 					       [SelectInfo]),
21895:                                    {ok, State#{sent       => false,
21896:                                                asynch_tag => select,
21897:                                                sselect    => SelectInfo}};
21898: 
21899:                                {completion, CI}
21900:                                  when SendRef =:= nowait ->
21901:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected completion nowait: ~p",
21902: 					       [CI]),
21903:                                    {ok, State#{sent       => false,
21904:                                                asynch_tag  => completion,
21905:                                                scompletion => CI}};
21906:                                {completion,
21907:                                 {completion_info, _Tag, SendRef} = CI}
21908:                                  when is_reference(SendRef) ->
21909:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected completion ref: ~p",
21910: 					       [CI]),
21911:                                    {ok, State#{sent       => false,
21912:                                                asynch_tag  => completion,
21913:                                                scompletion => CI}};
21914: 
21915:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21916:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected error: ~p",
21917: 					       [Reason]),
21918:                                    ERROR
21919:                            end
21920:                    end},
21921: 
21922:          #{desc => "await receive select|completion message",
21923:            cmd  => fun(#{sent       := false,
21924:                          asynch_tag := select,
21925:                          sock       := Sock,
21926:                          rselect    := {select_info, _, Ref}} = _State) ->
21927:                            receive
21928:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
21929:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected (read) "
21930:                                                "select message: "
21931:                                                "~n   ~p", [Ref]),
21932:                                    ok
21933:                            end;
21934:                       (#{sent        := false,
21935:                          asynch_tag  := completion,
21936:                          sock        := Sock,
21937:                          rcompletion := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = _State) ->
21938:                            receive
21939:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
21940:                                 {Ref, {error, econnrefused = Reason}}} ->
21941:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected failure: ~p",
21942:                                                [Reason]),
21943:                                    ok;
21944: 
21945:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
21946:                                 {Ref, {ok, _}}} ->
21947:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected success"),
21948:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
21949:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
21950:                                 {Ref, {error, Reason} = ERROR}} ->
21951:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("unexpected failure: ~p",
21952:                                                [Reason]),
21953:                                    ERROR
21954: 
21955:                            end;
21956:                       (#{sent := true} = _State) ->
21957:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("no action needed"),
21958:                            ok
21959:                    end},
21960: 
21961:          #{desc => "try recv - expect econnrefused",
21962:            cmd  => fun(#{asynch_tag := completion} = _State) ->
21963:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("already processed"),
21964:                            ok;
21965:                       (#{sock := Sock,
21966:                          recv := Recv} = _State) ->
21967:                            case Recv(Sock, infinity) of
21968:                                {error, econnrefused = Reason} ->
21969:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected failure: ~p",
21970:                                                [Reason]),
21971:                                    ok;
21972:                                {ok, _} ->
21973:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected success"),
21974:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
21975:                                {select, SelectInfo} ->
21976:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected select: ~p",
21977:                                                [SelectInfo]),
21978:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
21979:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
21980:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected error: ~p",
21981:                                                [Reason]),
21982:                                    ERROR
21983:                            end
21984:                    end},
21985: 
21986:          #{desc => "send to self",
21987:            cmd  =>
21988:                fun(#{sock := Sock,
21989:                      send := Send,
21990:                      addr := Addr} = _State) ->
21991:                        case Send(Sock, <<"ring">>, Addr, infinity) of
21992:                            ok ->
21993:                                ?SEV_IPRINT("sent to self"),
21994:                                ok;
21995:                            {error, _} = Error ->
21996:                                Error
21997:                        end
21998:                end},
21999: 
22000:          #{desc => "try recv - expect data sent to self",
22001:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
22002:                          addr := Addr,
22003:                          recv := Recv} = _State) ->
22004:                            case Recv(Sock, infinity) of
22005:                                {ok, {Addr, <<"ring">>}} ->
22006:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("receive expected"),
22007:                                    ok;
22008: 
22009:                                {select, SelectInfo} ->
22010:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected select: ~p",
22011:                                                [SelectInfo]),
22012:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
22013: 
22014:                                {completion, CompletionInfo} ->
22015:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected completion: ~p",
22016:                                                [CompletionInfo]),
22017:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
22018: 
22019:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
22020:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("unexpected error: ~p",
22021:                                                [Reason]),
22022:                                    ERROR
22023:                            end
22024:                    end},
22025: 
22026:          #{desc => "try recv error queue",
22027:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, sock := Sock} = State) ->
22028:                            %% Note that not all platforms that support
22029:                            %% recverr, actually supports "encoding" the data
22030:                            %% part, so we need to adjust for that.
22031: 			   Origin = 
22032: 			       if (Domain =:= inet)  -> icmp;
22033: 				  (Domain =:= inet6) -> icmp6
22034: 			       end,
22035: 			   Level =
22036: 			       if (Domain =:= inet)  -> ip;
22037: 				  (Domain =:= inet6) -> ipv6
22038: 			       end,
22039:                            case socket:recvmsg(Sock, [errqueue], 0) of
22040:                                {ok, #{addr  := #{family := Domain,
22041: 						 addr   := Addr},
22042:                                       flags := [errqueue],
22043:                                       iov   := [<<"ping">>],
22044:                                       ctrl  := [#{level := Level,
22045:                                                   type  := recverr,
22046:                                                   value :=
22047:                                                       #{code     := port_unreach,
22048:                                                         data     := 0,
22049:                                                         error    := econnrefused,
22050:                                                         info     := 0,
22051:                                                         offender := #{family := Domain,
22052: 								      addr   := Addr},
22053:                                                         origin   := Origin,
22054:                                                         type     := dest_unreach}
22055:                                                  }]} = Msg} ->
22056:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected error queue (decoded): "
22057:                                                "~n   ~p", [Msg]),
22058:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag => none}};
22059:                                {ok, #{addr  := #{family := Domain,
22060: 						 addr   := _Addr},
22061:                                       flags := [errqueue],
22062:                                       iov   := [<<"ping">>],
22063:                                       value := [#{level := Level,
22064:                                                   type  := recverr}]} = _Msg} ->
22065:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected error queue"),
22066:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag => none}};
22067: 
22068:                                {completion, CI} ->
22069:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion: "
22070:                                                "~n   ~p", [CI]),
22071:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag => completion,
22072:                                                completion => CI}};
22073: 
22074:                                {error, timeout = Reason} = ERROR ->
22075:                                    case os:type() of
22076:                                        {win32, nt} ->
22077:                                            ?SEV_IPRINT("failed reading "
22078:                                                        "error queue: "
22079:                                                        "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
22080:                                            {skip,
22081:                                             "Test case does not "
22082:                                             "work on Windows"};
22083:                                        _ ->
22084:                                            ?SEV_EPRINT("failed reading "
22085:                                                        "error queue: "
22086:                                                        "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
22087:                                            ERROR
22088:                                    end;
22089: 
22090:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
22091:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed reading error queue: "
22092:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
22093:                                    ERROR
22094:                            end
22095:                    end},
22096: 
22097:          #{desc => "await receive select message",
22098:            cmd  => fun(#{asynch_tag := completion,
22099:                          sock       := Sock,
22100:                          completion := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = _State) ->
22101:                            receive
22102:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
22103:                                 {Ref, {ok, Info}}} ->
22104:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("expected success: "
22105:                                                "~n   ~p", [Info]),
22106:                                    ok;
22107: 
22108:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
22109:                                 {Ref, {error, Reason} = ERROR}} ->
22110:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("unexpected failure: ~p",
22111:                                                [Reason]),
22112:                                    ERROR
22113: 
22114:                            end;
22115:                       (#{asynch_tag := none} = _State) ->
22116:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("no action needed"),
22117:                            ok
22118:                    end},
22119: 
22120:          #{desc => "close socket",
22121:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
22122:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
22123:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
22124:                    end},
22125: 
22126:          %% *** We are done ***
22127:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
22128:         ],
22129:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
22130:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
22131: 
22132: 
22133: 
22134: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
22135: 
22136: %% This intended to test "all" of the (currently) supported IPv4
22137: %% options that results in control message header(s).
22138: %% So, this is done on the receiving side:
22139: %%
22140: %%      socket:setopt(Sock, ip, Flag, boolean()).
22141: %%
22142: %% For all subsequent *received* messages, a control message header
22143: %% for each of the enabled options will be received with the message.
22144: %%
22145: %% Only allowed for dgram and raw,
22146: %% although we only test this with dgram.
22147: %%
22148: %% Currently we *try* to use the following opts:
22149: %%
22150: %%      pktinfo         => pktinfo
22151: %%      recvorigdstaddr => origdstaddr
22152: %%      recvtos         => tos
22153: %%      recvttl         => ttl
22154: %%
22155: %%
22156: %% Every time we add a test case for a new option (that results in
22157: %% a control message hedare), we should also add it here.
22158: %%
22159: %% Even though this is a IPv4 test case, we add the 'socket' timestamp
22160: %% option (just to fill up), but in the test to see if we should run
22161: %% the test (since its a IPv4 test case).
22162: %%
22163: 
22164: api_opt_ip_mopts_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
22165:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
22166:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
22167:            fun() ->
22168:                    has_support_ipv4(),
22169:                    Opts =
22170:                        [{ip, pktinfo},
22171:                         {ip, recvorigdstaddr}] ++
22172:                        case os:type() of
22173:                            {win32, nt} ->
22174:                                [];
22175:                            _ ->
22176:                                [{ip, recvtos},
22177:                                 {ip, recvttl}]
22178:                        end,
22179: 		   case is_any_options_supported(Opts) of
22180: 		       true ->
22181: 			   ok;
22182: 		       false ->
22183: 			   skip("None of the needed options are supported")
22184: 		   end
22185:            end,
22186:            fun() ->
22187: 		   %% If we get this far, we *know* that at least one of the
22188: 		   %% options are available.
22189: 
22190: 		   %% This is list of all the options and there resulting
22191: 		   %% control message header type(s):
22192: 		   %%   [{level,
22193: 		   %%     'ipv6 socket option',
22194:                    %%     'control message header type',
22195: 		   %%     default | value()}]
22196: 		   Opts =
22197: 		       case socket:is_supported(options, socket, timestamp) of
22198: 			   true ->
22199: 			       [{socket, timestamp, timestamp, default}];
22200: 			   false ->
22201: 			       []
22202: 		       end ++
22203: 		       case socket:is_supported(options, ip, pktinfo) of
22204: 			   true ->
22205: 			       [{ip, pktinfo, pktinfo, default}];
22206: 			   false ->
22207: 			       []
22208: 		       end ++
22209: 		       case socket:is_supported(options, ip, recvorigdstaddr) of
22210: 			   true ->
22211: 			       [{ip, recvorigdstaddr, origdstaddr, default}];
22212: 			   false ->
22213: 			       []
22214: 		       end ++
22215:                        case os:type() of
22216:                            {win32, nt} ->
22217:                                [];
22218:                            _ ->
22219:                                case socket:is_supported(options, ip, recvtos) of
22220:                                    true ->
22221:                                        %% It seems that sending any of the
22222:                                        %% TOS or TTL values will fail on: 
22223:                                        %%    FreeBSD
22224:                                        %%    Linux when
22225:                                        %%      version =< 3.12.60 (at least)
22226:                                        %%      Don't know when this starts
22227:                                        %%      working, but it works on: 
22228:                                        %%         Ubunto 16.04.6 => 4.15.0-65
22229:                                        %%         SLES 12 SP2 => 4.4.120-92.70
22230:                                        %% so don't!
22231:                                        %%
22232:                                        %% The latest we know it not to work
22233:                                        %% was a SLES 12 (plain) at 3.12.50-52.54
22234:                                        %%
22235:                                        [{ip, recvtos, tos, 
22236:                                          case os:type() of
22237:                                              {unix, freebsd} ->
22238:                                                  default;
22239:                                              {unix, linux} ->
22240:                                                  case os:version() of
22241:                                                      Vsn when Vsn > {3,12,60} ->
22242:                                                          42;
22243:                                                      _ ->
22244:                                                          default
22245:                                                  end;
22246:                                              _ -> 
22247:                                                  42
22248:                                          end}];
22249:                                    false ->
22250:                                        []
22251:                                end
22252: 		       end ++
22253:                        case os:type() of
22254:                            {unix, darwin} ->
22255:                                [];
22256:                            {win32, nt} ->
22257:                                [];
22258:                            _ ->
22259:                                case socket:is_supported(options, ip, recvttl) of
22260:                                    true ->
22261: 				       %% It seems that sending any of the
22262: 				       %% TOS or TTL values will fail on: 
22263: 				       %%    FreeBSD and NetBSD
22264: 				       %%    Linux when
22265: 				       %%      version =< 3.12.60 (at least)
22266: 				       %% so don't!
22267:                                        %% See recvtos above for more info.
22268:                                        [{ip, recvttl, ttl,
22269:                                          case os:type() of
22270:                                              {unix, BSD} 
22271:                                                when (BSD =:= freebsd) orelse
22272:                                                     (BSD =:= netbsd) ->
22273:                                                  default;
22274:                                              {unix, netbsd} ->
22275:                                                  default;
22276: 					     {unix, linux} ->
22277: 						 case os:version() of
22278: 						     Vsn when Vsn > {3,12,60} ->
22279: 							 42;
22280: 						     _ ->
22281: 							 default
22282: 						 end;
22283:                                              _ -> 
22284:                                                  42
22285:                                          end}];
22286:                                    false ->
22287:                                        []
22288:                                end
22289: 		       end,
22290: 
22291:                    Enable = fun(Sock, Level, Opt) ->
22292: 				    ?SEV_IPRINT("try enable [~w] ~p",
22293:                                                 [Level, Opt]),
22294: 				    socket:setopt(Sock, Level, Opt, true)
22295:                             end,
22296:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest, []) ->
22297:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
22298:                                           iov  => [Data]},
22299:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg);
22300: 			     (Sock, Data, Dest, Hdrs) when is_list(Hdrs) ->
22301: 				  CMsgs = [#{level => Level,
22302:                                              type  => Type,
22303:                                              value => Val} ||
22304:                                               {Level, Type, Val} <- Hdrs],
22305:                                   Msg   = #{addr => Dest,
22306:                                             ctrl => CMsgs,
22307:                                             iov  => [Data]},
22308:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
22309:                           end,
22310:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
22311:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
22312:                                       {ok, #{addr := Source,
22313:                                              ctrl := CMsgs,
22314:                                              iov  := [Data]}} ->
22315:                                           {ok, {Source, CMsgs, Data}};
22316:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
22317:                                           ERROR
22318:                                   end
22319:                           end,
22320:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
22321:                                  proto  => udp,
22322: 				 opts   => Opts,
22323:                                  send   => Send,
22324:                                  recv   => Recv,
22325:                                  enable => Enable},
22326:                    ok = api_opt_ip_mopts_udp(InitState)
22327:            end).
22328: 
22329: 
22330: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
22331: 
22332: api_opt_ip_mopts_udp(InitState) ->
22333:     Seq = 
22334:         [
22335:          #{desc => "local address",
22336:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
22337:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
22338:                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSA,
22339:                                        lsa_dst => LSA}}
22340:                    end},
22341: 
22342:          #{desc => "open src socket",
22343:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
