25447:                                    ok;
25448:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
25449:                                    ERROR
25450:                            end
25451:                    end},
25452:          #{desc => "enable cork (=> true)",
25453:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
25454:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
25455:                                ok ->
25456:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("cork enabled"),
25457:                                    ok;
25458:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
25459:                                    ERROR
25460:                            end
25461:                    end},
25462:          #{desc => "get cork (= true)",
25463:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
25464:                            case Get(Sock) of
25465:                                {ok, true = Value} ->
25466:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("cork: ~p", [Value]),
25467:                                    ok;
25468:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
25469:                                    ERROR
25470:                            end
25471:                    end},
25472: 
25473: 
25474:          %% *** Termination ***
25475:          #{desc => "close socket",
25476:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
25477:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
25478:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
25479:                    end},
25480: 
25481:          %% *** We are done ***
25482:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
25483:         ],
25484: 
25485:     i("start tester evaluator"),
25486:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
25487: 
25488:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
25489: 
25490: 
25491: 
25492: 
25493: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
25494: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
25495: %%                                                                     %%
25496: %%                  API OPERATIONS WITH TIMEOUT                        %%
25497: %%                                                                     %%
25498: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
25499: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
25500: 
25501: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
25502: 
25503: %% This test case is intended to test the connect timeout option
25504: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
25505: api_to_connect_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
25506:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
25507:     Cond = fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), api_to_connect_cond() end,
25508:     tc_try(api_to_connect_tcp4,
25509:            Cond,
25510:            fun() ->
25511:                    InitState = #{domain        => inet,
25512:                                  backlog       => 1,
25513:                                  timeout       => 5000,
25514:                                  connect_limit => 3},
25515:                    ok = api_to_connect_tcp(InitState)
25516:            end).
25517: 
25518: api_to_connect_cond() ->
25519:     api_to_connect_cond(os:type(), os:version()).
25520: 
25521: %% I don't know exactly at which version this starts to work.
25522: %% I know it does not work for 4.4.*, but is does for 4.15.
25523: %% So, just to simplify, we require at least 4.15
25524: api_to_connect_cond({unix, linux}, {Maj, Min, _Rev}) ->
25525:     if
25526:         (Maj > 4) ->
25527:             ok;
25528:         ((Maj =:= 4) andalso (Min >= 15)) ->
25529:             ok;
25530:         true ->
25531:             skip("TC does not work")
25532:     end;
25533: %% Only test on one machine, which has version 6.3, and there it does
25534: %% not work, so disable for all.
25535: api_to_connect_cond({unix, openbsd}, _) ->
25536:     skip("TC does not work");
25537: api_to_connect_cond({unix, freebsd}, {Maj, Min, _Rev}) ->
25538:     if
25539:         ((Maj >= 10) andalso (Min >= 4)) ->
25540:             ok;
25541:         true ->
25542:             skip("TC may not work")
25543:     end;
25544: api_to_connect_cond({unix, sunos}, {Maj, Min, _Rev}) ->
25545:     if
25546:         ((Maj >= 5) andalso (Min >= 10)) ->
25547:             ok;
25548:         true ->
25549:             skip("TC may not work")
25550:     end;
25551: api_to_connect_cond(_, _) ->
25552:     skip("TC may not work").
25553: 
25554: 
25555: 
25556: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
25557: 
25558: %% This test case is intended to test the connect timeout option
25559: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
25560: api_to_connect_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
25561:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
25562:     tc_try(api_to_connect_tcp6,
25563:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6(), api_to_connect_cond() end,
25564:            fun() ->
25565:                    InitState = #{domain        => inet6,
25566:                                  backlog       => 1,
25567:                                  timeout       => 5000,
25568:                                  connect_limit => 3},
25569:                    ok = api_to_connect_tcp(InitState)
25570:            end).
25571: 
25572: 
25573: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
25574: %% We use the backlog (listen) argument to test this.
25575: %% Note that the behaviour of the TCP "server side" can vary when 
25576: %% a client connect to a "busy" server (full backlog).
25577: %% For instance, on FreeBSD (11.2) the response when the backlog is full
25578: %% is a econreset.
25579: 
25580: api_to_connect_tcp(InitState) ->
25581:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
25582: 
25583:     ServerSeq = 
25584:         [
25585:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
25586:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
25587:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
25588:                            {Tester, Backlog} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
25589:                            {ok, State#{tester  => Tester,
25590:                                        backlog => Backlog}}
25591:                    end},
25592:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
25593:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
25594:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
25595:                            ok
25596:                    end},
25597: 
25598:          %% *** Init part ***
25599:          #{desc => "which local address",
25600:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
25601:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
25602:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
25603:                    end},
25604:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
25605:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
25606:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
25607:                                {ok, Sock} ->
25608:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
25609:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
25610:                                    ERROR
25611:                            end
25612:                    end},
25613:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
25614:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
25615:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
25616:                                ok ->
25617:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
25618:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
25619:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
25620:                                    ERROR
25621:                            end
25622:                    end},
25623:          #{desc => "make listen socket (with backlog = 1)",
25624:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, backlog := Backlog}) ->
25625:                            socket:listen(LSock, Backlog)
25626:                    end},
25627:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
25628:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
25629:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
25630:                            ok
25631:                    end},
25632: 
25633:          %% Termination
25634:          #{desc => "await terminate",
25635:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
25636:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
25637:                                ok ->
25638:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
25639:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
25640:                                    ERROR
25641:                            end
25642:                    end},
25643:          #{desc => "close socket",
25644:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
25645:                            sock_close(Sock),
25646:                            State1 = maps:remove(lport, State),
25647:                            State2 = maps:remove(sock,  State1),
25648:                            {ok, State2}
25649:                    end},
25650: 
25651:          %% *** We are done ***
25652:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
25653:         ],
25654: 
25655:     ClientSeq =
25656:         [
25657:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
25658:          #{desc => "await start",
25659:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
25660:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
25661:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester,
25662:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
25663:                    end},
25664:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
25665:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
25666:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
25667:                            ok
25668:                    end},
25669: 
25670:          %% *** Init part ***
25671:          #{desc => "which local address",
25672:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
25673:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
25674:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
25675:                    end},
25676:          #{desc => "create node",
25677:            cmd  => fun(#{host := _Host} = State) ->
25678:                            {Peer, Node} = start_node("client"),
25679:                            {ok, State#{node => Node, peer => Peer}}
25680:                    end},
25681:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
25682:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
25683:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
25684:                            ok
25685:                    end},
25686:          #{desc => "start remote client on client node",
25687:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
25688:                            Pid = api_toc_tcp_client_start(Node),
25689:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client ~p started", [Pid]),
25690:                            {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}}
25691:                    end},
25692:          %% #{desc => "monitor remote client",
25693:          %%   cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Pid}) ->
25694:          %%                   _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
25695:          %%                   ok
25696:          %%           end},
25697:          #{desc => "order remote client to start",
25698:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient   := Client,
25699:                          server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
25700:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, ServerSA),
25701:                            ok
25702:                    end},
25703:          #{desc => "await remote client ready",
25704:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
25705:                          rclient := Client} = _State) ->
25706:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, rclient, init,
25707:                                             [{tester, Tester}])
25708:                    end},
25709:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
25710:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
25711:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
25712:                            ok
25713:                    end},
25714: 
25715:          %% The actual test
25716:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
25717:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
25718:                          rclient := Client} = State) ->
25719:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect,
25720:                                                     [{rclient, Client}]) of
25721:                                {ok, {ConTimeout, ConLimit}} ->
25722:                                    {ok, State#{connect_timeout => ConTimeout,
25723:                                                connect_limit   => ConLimit}};
25724:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
25725:                                    ERROR
25726:                            end
25727:                    end},
25728:          #{desc => "order remote client to continue (connect)",
25729:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient         := RClient,
25730:                          connect_timeout := ConTimeout,
25731:                          connect_limit   := ConLimit}) ->
25732:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, connect,
25733:                                                   {ConTimeout, ConLimit}),
25734:                            ok
25735:                    end},
25736:          #{desc => "await remote client ready (connect)",
25737:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
25738:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
25739:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, connect,
25740:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
25741:                                {ok, ok = _Result} ->
25742:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("ok => success"),
25743:                                    {ok, maps:remove(connect_limit, State)};
25744:                                {ok, {error, {connect_limit_reached,R,L}}} ->
25745:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("limit reached - skip: "
25746:                                                "~n   R: ~p"
25747:                                                "~n   L: ~p", [R, L]),
25748:                                    {skip,
25749:                                     ?SLIB:f("Connect limit reached ~w: ~w",
25750:                                            [L, R])};
25751:                                {ok, Result} ->
25752:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("result: "
25753:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
25754:                                    Result;
25755:                                {error, _Reason} = ERROR ->
25756:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("error: "
25757:                                                "~n   ~p", [_Reason]),
25758:                                    ERROR
25759:                            end
25760:                    end},
25761: 
25762:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
25763:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
25764:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
25765:                            ok
25766:                    end},
25767: 
25768:          %% Termination
25769:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
25770:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
25771:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
25772:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
25773:                                                      [{rclient, RClient}]) of
25774:                                ok ->
25775:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
25776:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
25777:                                    ERROR
25778:                            end
25779:                    end},
25780:          #{desc => "kill remote client",
25781:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Client}) ->
25782:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
25783:                            ok
25784:                    end},
25785:          #{desc => "await remote client termination",
25786:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Client} = State) ->
25787:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
25788:                            State1 = maps:remove(rclient, State),
25789:                            {ok, State1}
25790:                    end},
25791:          #{desc => "stop client node",
25792:            cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = State) ->
25793:                            {ok,
25794:                             try peer:stop(Peer) of
25795:                                 ok ->
25796:                                     State#{node_stop => ok};
25797:                                 {error, Reason} ->
25798:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
25799:                                                 "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
25800:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
25801:                             catch
25802:                                 C:E:S ->
25803:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
25804:                                                 "~n   Class: ~p"
25805:                                                 "~n   Error: ~p"
25806:                                                 "~n   Stack: ~p",[C, E, S]),
25807:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
25808:                             end}
25809:                    end},
25810:          #{desc => "await client node termination",
25811:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node, node_stop := ok} = State) ->
25812:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Success node stop - await nodedown"),
25813:                            receive
25814:                                {nodedown, Node} ->
25815:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("nodedown received - cleanup"),
25816:                                    State1 = maps:remove(peer, State),
25817:                                    State2 = maps:remove(node, State1),
25818:                                    {ok, State2}
25819:                            end;
25820:                       (#{node_stop := error} = State) ->
25821:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed node stop - cleanup"),
25822:                            State1 = maps:remove(peer, State),
25823:                            State2 = maps:remove(node, State1),
25824:                            {ok, State2}
25825:                    end},
25826: 
25827:          %% *** We are done ***
25828:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
25829:         ],
25830: 
25831:     TesterSeq =
25832:         [
25833:          %% *** Init part ***
25834:          #{desc => "monitor server",
25835:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
25836:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Server),
25837:                            ok
25838:                    end},
25839:          #{desc => "monitor client",
25840:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
25841:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Client),
25842:                            ok
25843:                    end},
25844:          #{desc => "which local address",
25845:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
25846:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
25847:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
25848:                    end},
25849:          #{desc => "order server start",
25850:            cmd  => fun(#{server  := Server,
25851:                          backlog := Backlog}) ->
25852:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Server, Backlog),
25853:                            ok
25854:                    end},
25855:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
25856:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
25857:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, init),
25858:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
25859:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
25860:                    end},
25861:          #{desc => "order client start",
25862:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Client,
25863:                          server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
25864:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, ServerSA),
25865:                            ok
25866:                    end},
25867:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
25868:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
25869:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, init),
25870:                            ok
25871:                    end},
25872: 
25873:          %% The actual test
25874:          %% The server does nothing (this is the point), no accept,
25875:          %% the client tries to connect.
25876:          #{desc => "order client continue (connect)",
25877:            cmd  => fun(#{client        := Client,
25878:                          timeout       := Timeout,
25879:                          connect_limit := ConLimit} = _State) ->
25880:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect,
25881:                                                   {Timeout, ConLimit}),
25882:                            ok
25883:                    end},
25884:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
25885:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
25886:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
25887:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect,
25888:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
25889:                                ok ->
25890:                                    ok;
25891:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
25892:                                    ERROR
25893:                            end
25894:                    end},
25895: 
25896: 
25897:          %% *** Terminate server ***
25898:          #{desc => "order client terminate",
25899:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
25900:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
25901:                            ok
25902:                    end},
25903:          #{desc => "await client down",
25904:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
25905:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
25906:                            State1 = maps:remove(client,    State),
25907:                            {ok, State1}
25908:                    end},
25909:          #{desc => "order server terminate",
25910:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
25911:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
25912:                            ok
25913:                    end},
25914:          #{desc => "await server down",
25915:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
25916:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
25917:                            State1 = maps:remove(server,    State),
25918:                            State2 = maps:remove(server_sa, State1),
25919:                            {ok, State2}
25920:                    end},
25921: 
25922:          %% *** We are done ***
25923:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
25924:         ],
25925: 
25926:     i("create server evaluator"),
25927:     ServerInitState = #{domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
25928:     Server          = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
25929: 
25930:     i("create client evaluator"),
25931:     ClientInitState = #{host   => local_host(),
25932:                         domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
25933:     Client          = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
25934: 
25935:     i("create tester evaluator"),
25936:     TesterInitState = InitState#{server => Server#ev.pid,
25937:                                  client => Client#ev.pid},
25938:     Tester          = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
25939: 
25940:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
25941:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
25942: 
25943: 
25944: api_toc_tcp_client_start(Node) ->
25945:     api_toc_tcp_client_start(Node, 5000).
25946: api_toc_tcp_client_start(Node, Timeout) ->
25947:     Self = self(),
25948:     Fun  = fun() -> api_toc_tcp_client(Self) end,
25949:     {Pid, MRef} = erlang:spawn_monitor(Node, Fun),
25950:     receive
25951:         {Pid, started} ->
25952:             Pid;
25953:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
25954:             {error, Reason};
25955:         {nodedown, Node} = NODEDOWN ->
25956:             {error, NODEDOWN}
25957:     after Timeout ->
25958:             {error, timeout}
25959:     end.
25960: 
25961: api_toc_tcp_client(Parent) ->
25962:     api_toc_tcp_client_init(Parent),
25963:     ServerSA = api_toc_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
25964:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
25965:     api_toc_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
25966:     {To, ConLimit} = api_toc_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
25967:     Result = api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout(To, ServerSA, Domain, ConLimit),
25968:     ?SEV_IPRINT("(client) connect result: ~p", [Result]),
25969:     api_toc_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect, Result),
25970:     Reason = api_toc_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
25971:     exit(Reason).
25972: 
25973: api_toc_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
25974:     put(sname, "rclient"),
25975:     %% i("api_toc_tcp_client_init -> entry"),
25976:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
25977:     Parent ! {self(), started},
25978:     ok.
25979: 
25980: api_toc_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
25981:     %% i("api_toc_tcp_client_await_start -> entry"),
25982:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
25983: 
25984: api_toc_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
25985:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
25986: api_toc_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Result) ->
25987:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Result).
25988: 
25989: api_toc_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
25990:     %% i("api_toc_tcp_client_await_continue -> entry"),
25991:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
25992:         ok ->
25993:             ok;
25994:         {ok, Extra} ->
25995:             Extra;
25996:         {error, Reason} ->
25997:             exit({await_continue, Slogan, Reason})
25998:     end.
25999: 
26000: api_toc_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
26001:     %% i("api_toc_tcp_client_await_terminate -> entry"),
26002:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
26003:         ok ->
26004:             ok;
26005:         {error, Reason} ->
26006:             Reason
26007:     end.
26008: 
26009: api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout(To, ServerSA, Domain, ConLimit) ->
26010:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
26011:     NewSock = fun() ->
26012:                       S = case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
26013:                               {ok, Sock} ->
26014:                                   Sock;
26015:                               {error, OReason} ->
26016:                                   ?FAIL({open, OReason})
26017:                           end,
26018:                       case socket:bind(S, LSA) of
26019:                           ok ->
26020:                               S;
26021:                           {error, BReason} ->
26022:                               ?FAIL({bind, BReason})
26023:                       end
26024:               end,
26025:     api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout(1, ConLimit, To, ServerSA, NewSock, []).
26026: 
26027: api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout(ID, ConLimit, _To, _ServerSA, _NewSock, Acc)
26028:   when (ID > ConLimit) ->
26029:     api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout3(Acc),
26030:     {error, {connect_limit_reached, ID, ConLimit}};
26031: api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout(ID, ConLimit, To, ServerSA, NewSock, Acc) ->
26032:     case api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout2(ID, To, ServerSA, NewSock) of
26033:         ok ->
26034:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("success when number of socks: ~w", [length(Acc)]),
26035:             api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout3(Acc),
26036:             ok;
26037:         {ok, Sock} ->
26038:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("~w: unexpected success (connect)", [ID]),
26039:             api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout(ID+1, ConLimit,
26040:                                              To, ServerSA, NewSock,
26041:                                              [Sock|Acc]);
26042:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
26043:             ERROR
26044:     end.
26045: 
26046: api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout2(_ID, To, ServerSA, NewSock) ->
26047:     Sock = NewSock(),
26048:     %% ?SEV_IPRINT("~w: try connect", [ID]),
26049:     Start = ?TS(),
26050:     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA, To) of
26051:         {error, timeout} ->
26052:             Stop  = ?TS(),
26053:             TDiff = Stop - Start,
26054:             if
26055:                 (TDiff >= To) ->
26056:                     (catch socket:close(Sock)),
26057:                     ok;
26058:                 true ->
26059:                     (catch socket:close(Sock)),
26060:                     ?FAIL({unexpected_timeout, TDiff, To})
26061:             end;
26062:         {error, econnreset = _Reason} ->
26063:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
26064:             ok;
26065:         {error, Reason} ->
26066:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
26067:             ?FAIL({connect, Reason});
26068:         ok ->
26069:             {ok, Sock}
26070:     end.
26071: 
26072: api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout3([]) ->
26073:     ok;
26074: api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout3([Sock|Socka]) ->
26075:     (catch socket:close(Sock)),
26076:     api_to_connect_tcp_await_timeout3(Socka).
26077: 
26078: 
26079: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26080: 
26081: %% This test case is intended to test the accept timeout option
26082: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
26083: api_to_accept_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26084:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
26085:     tc_try(api_to_accept_tcp4,
26086:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
26087:            fun() ->
26088:                    InitState = #{domain => inet, timeout => 5000},
26089:                    ok = api_to_accept_tcp(InitState)
26090:            end).
26091: 
26092: 
26093: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26094: 
26095: %% This test case is intended to test the accept timeout option
26096: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
26097: api_to_accept_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26098:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
26099:     tc_try(api_to_accept_tcp6,
26100:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
26101:            fun() ->
26102:                    InitState = #{domain => inet6, timeout => 5000},
26103:                    ok = api_to_accept_tcp(InitState)
26104:            end).
26105: 
26106: 
26107: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26108: 
26109: api_to_accept_tcp(InitState) ->
26110:     TesterSeq =
26111:         [
26112:          %% *** Init part ***
26113:          #{desc => "which local address",
26114:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
26115:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
26116:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
26117:                    end},
26118:          #{desc => "create (listen) socket",
26119:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
26120:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
26121:                                {ok, Sock} ->
26122:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
26123:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26124:                                    ERROR
26125:                            end
26126:                    end},
26127:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
26128:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = _State) ->
26129:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
26130:                                ok ->
26131:                                    ok;
26132:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26133:                                    ERROR
26134:                            end
26135:                    end},
26136:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
26137:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
26138:                            socket:listen(LSock)
26139:                    end},
26140: 
26141:          %% *** The actual test part ***
26142:          #{desc => "attempt to accept (without success)",
26143:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, timeout := To} = State) ->
26144:                            Start = ?TS(),
26145:                            case socket:accept(LSock, To) of
26146:                                {error, timeout} ->
26147:                                    {ok, State#{start => Start, stop => ?TS()}};
26148:                                {ok, Sock} ->
26149:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
26150:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
26151:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26152:                                    ERROR
26153:                            end
26154:                    end},
26155:          #{desc => "validate timeout time",
26156:            cmd  => fun(#{start := Start, stop := Stop, timeout := To} = _State) ->
26157:                            TDiff  = Stop - Start,
26158:                            if
26159:                                (TDiff >= To) ->
26160:                                    ok;
26161:                                true ->
26162:                                    {error, {unexpected_timeout, TDiff, To}}
26163:                            end
26164:                    end},
26165: 
26166:          %% *** Close (listen) socket ***
26167:          #{desc => "close (listen) socket",
26168:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
26169:                            sock_close(LSock),
26170:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock3, State)}
26171:                    end},
26172: 
26173:          %% *** We are done ***
26174:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
26175:         ],
26176: 
26177:     i("create tester evaluator"),
26178:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
26179: 
26180:     i("await evaluator"),
26181:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
26182: 
26183: 
26184: 
26185: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26186: 
26187: %% This test case is intended to test the multi accept timeout option
26188: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket with multiple acceptor processes 
26189: %% (three in this case).
26190: api_to_maccept_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26191:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
26192:     tc_try(api_to_maccept_tcp4,
26193:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
26194:            fun() ->
26195:                    InitState = #{domain => inet, timeout => 5000},
26196:                    ok = api_to_maccept_tcp(InitState)
26197:            end).
26198: 
26199: 
26200: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26201: 
26202: %% This test case is intended to test the accept timeout option
26203: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
26204: api_to_maccept_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26205:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
26206:     tc_try(api_to_maccept_tcp6,
26207:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
26208:            fun() ->
26209:                    InitState = #{domain => inet6, timeout => 5000},
26210:                    ok = api_to_maccept_tcp(InitState)
26211:            end).
26212: 
26213: 
26214: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26215: 
26216: api_to_maccept_tcp(InitState) ->
26217:     PrimAcceptorSeq =
26218:         [
26219:          %% *** Init part ***
26220:          #{desc => "await start",
26221:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
26222:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
26223:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
26224:                    end},
26225:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
26226:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Pid} = _State) ->
26227:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
26228:                            ok
26229:                    end},
26230:          #{desc => "which local address",
26231:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
26232:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
26233:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
26234:                    end},
26235:          #{desc => "create (listen) socket",
26236:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
26237:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
26238:                                {ok, Sock} ->
26239:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
26240:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26241:                                    ERROR
26242:                            end
26243:                    end},
26244:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
26245:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = _State) ->
26246:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
26247:                                ok ->
26248:                                    ok;
26249:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26250:                                    ERROR
26251:                            end
26252:                    end},
26253:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
26254:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
26255:                            socket:listen(LSock)
26256:                    end},
26257:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
26258:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, tester := Tester}) ->
26259:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSock),
26260:                            ok
26261:                    end},
26262: 
26263:          %% *** The actual test ***
26264:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
26265:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
26266:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
26267:                    end},
26268:          #{desc => "attempt to accept (without success)",
26269:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, timeout := To} = State) ->
26270:                            Start = ?TS(),
26271:                            case socket:accept(LSock, To) of
26272:                                {error, timeout} ->
26273:                                    {ok, State#{start => Start, stop => ?TS()}};
26274:                                {ok, Sock} ->
26275:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected accept success: "
26276:                                                "~n   ~p", [Sock]),
26277:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
26278:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
26279:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26280:                                    ERROR
26281:                            end
26282:                    end},
26283:          #{desc => "validate timeout time",
26284:            cmd  => fun(#{start := Start, stop := Stop, timeout := To} = _State) ->
26285:                            TDiff  = Stop - Start,
26286:                            if
26287:                                (TDiff >= To) ->
26288:                                    ok;
26289:                                true ->
26290:                                    {error, {unexpected_timeout, TDiff, To}}
26291:                            end
26292:                    end},
26293:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
26294:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
26295:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
26296:                            ok
26297:                    end},
26298: 
26299:          %% *** Terminate ***
26300:          #{desc => "await terminate",
26301:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
26302:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester),
26303:                            ok
26304:                    end},
26305:          %% *** Close (listen) socket ***
26306:          #{desc => "close (listen) socket",
26307:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
26308:                            sock_close(LSock),
26309:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
26310:                    end},
26311: 
26312:          %% *** We are done ***
26313:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
26314:         ],
26315: 
26316: 
26317:     SecAcceptorSeq =
26318:         [
26319:          %% *** Init part ***
26320:          #{desc => "await start",
26321:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
26322:                            {Tester, LSock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
26323:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester,
26324:                                        lsock  => LSock}}
26325:                            
26326:                    end},
26327:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
26328:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Pid} = _State) ->
26329:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
26330:                            ok
26331:                    end},
26332:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
26333:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
26334:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
26335:                            ok
26336:                    end},
26337: 
26338:          %% *** The actual test part ***
26339:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
26340:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
26341:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
26342:                    end},
26343:          #{desc => "attempt to accept (without success)",
26344:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, timeout := To} = State) ->
26345:                            Start = ?TS(),
26346:                            case socket:accept(LSock, To) of
26347:                                {error, timeout} ->
26348:                                    {ok, State#{start => Start, stop => ?TS()}};
26349:                                {ok, Sock} ->
26350:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
26351:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
26352:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26353:                                    ERROR
26354:                            end
26355:                    end},
26356:          #{desc => "validate timeout time",
26357:            cmd  => fun(#{start := Start, stop := Stop, timeout := To} = State) ->
26358:                            TDiff  = Stop - Start,
26359:                            if
26360:                                (TDiff >= To) ->
26361:                                    State1 = maps:remove(start, State),
26362:                                    State2 = maps:remove(stop,  State1),
26363:                                    {ok, State2};
26364:                                true ->
26365:                                    {error, {unexpected_timeout, TDiff, To}}
26366:                            end
26367:                    end},
26368:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
26369:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
26370:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
26371:                            ok
26372:                    end},
26373: 
26374:          %% *** Terminate ***
26375:          #{desc => "await terminate",
26376:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
26377:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
26378:                                ok ->
26379:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
26380:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26381:                                    ERROR
26382:                            end
26383:                    end},
26384: 
26385:          %% *** We are done ***
26386:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
26387:         ],
26388: 
26389: 
26390:     TesterSeq =
26391:         [
26392:          %% Init part
26393:          #{desc => "monitor prim-acceptor",
26394:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
26395:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
26396:                            ok
26397:                    end},
26398:          #{desc => "monitor sec-acceptor 1",
26399:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
26400:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
26401:                            ok
26402:                    end},
26403:          #{desc => "monitor sec-acceptor 2",
26404:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
26405:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
26406:                            ok
26407:                    end},
26408: 
26409: 
26410:          %% Start the prim-acceptor
26411:          #{desc => "start prim-acceptor",
26412:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
26413:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
26414:                            ok
26415:                    end},
26416:          #{desc => "await prim-acceptor ready (init)",
26417:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
26418:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_acceptor, init),
26419:                            {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}}
26420:                    end},
26421: 
26422:          %% Start sec-acceptor-1
26423:          #{desc => "start sec-acceptor 1",
26424:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid, lsock := LSock} = _State) ->
26425:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LSock),
26426:                            ok
26427:                    end},
26428:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 1 ready (init)",
26429:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
26430:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor1, init)
26431:                    end},
26432: 
26433:          %% Start sec-acceptor-2
26434:          #{desc => "start sec-acceptor 2",
26435:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid, lsock := LSock} = _State) ->
26436:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LSock),
26437:                            ok
26438:                    end},
26439:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 2 ready (init)",
26440:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
26441:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor2, init)
26442:                    end},
26443: 
26444:          %% Activate the acceptor(s)
26445:          #{desc => "active prim-acceptor",
26446:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
26447:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
26448:                            ok
26449:                    end},
26450:          #{desc => "active sec-acceptor 1",
26451:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
26452:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
26453:                            ok
26454:                    end},
26455:          #{desc => "active sec-acceptor 2",
26456:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
26457:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
26458:                            ok
26459:                    end},
26460: 
26461:          %% Await acceptor(s) completions
26462:          #{desc => "await prim-acceptor ready (accept)",
26463:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
26464:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_acceptor, accept)
26465:                    end},
26466:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 1 ready (accept)",
26467:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
26468:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor1, accept)
26469:                    end},
26470:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 2 ready (accept)",
26471:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
26472:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor2, accept)
26473:                    end},
26474: 
26475:          %% Terminate
26476:          #{desc => "order prim-acceptor to terminate",
26477:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
26478:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
26479:                            ok
26480:                    end},
26481:          #{desc => "await prim-acceptor termination",
26482:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
26483:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
26484:                                ok ->
26485:                                    State1 = maps:remove(prim_acceptor, State),
26486:                                    {ok, State1};
26487:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26488:                                    ERROR
26489:                            end
26490:                    end},
26491:          #{desc => "order sec-acceptor 1 to terminate",
26492:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
26493:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
26494:                            ok
26495:                    end},
26496:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 1 termination",
26497:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = State) ->
26498:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
26499:                                ok ->
26500:                                    State1 = maps:remove(sec_acceptor1, State),
26501:                                    {ok, State1};
26502:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26503:                                    ERROR
26504:                            end
26505:                    end},
26506:          #{desc => "order sec-acceptor 2 to terminate",
26507:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
26508:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
26509:                            ok
26510:                    end},
26511:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 2 termination",
26512:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = State) ->
26513:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
26514:                                ok ->
26515:                                    State1 = maps:remove(sec_acceptor2, State),
26516:                                    {ok, State1};
26517:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26518:                                    ERROR
26519:                            end
26520:                    end},
26521:          
26522:          %% *** We are done ***
26523:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
26524:         ],
26525: 
26526:     i("create prim-acceptor evaluator"),
26527:     PrimAInitState = InitState,
26528:     PrimAcceptor = ?SEV_START("prim-acceptor", PrimAcceptorSeq, PrimAInitState),
26529: 
26530:     i("create sec-acceptor 1 evaluator"),
26531:     SecAInitState1 = maps:remove(domain, InitState),
26532:     SecAcceptor1 = ?SEV_START("sec-acceptor-1", SecAcceptorSeq, SecAInitState1),
26533:     
26534:     i("create sec-acceptor 2 evaluator"),
26535:     SecAInitState2 = SecAInitState1,
26536:     SecAcceptor2 = ?SEV_START("sec-acceptor-2", SecAcceptorSeq, SecAInitState2),
26537: 
26538:     i("create tester evaluator"),
26539:     TesterInitState = #{prim_acceptor => PrimAcceptor#ev.pid,
26540:                         sec_acceptor1 => SecAcceptor1#ev.pid,
26541:                         sec_acceptor2 => SecAcceptor2#ev.pid},
26542:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
26543: 
26544:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
26545:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([PrimAcceptor, SecAcceptor1, SecAcceptor2, Tester]).
26546: 
26547: 
26548: 
26549: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26550: 
26551: %% This test case is intended to test the send timeout option
26552: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
26553: api_to_send_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26554:     tc_try(api_to_send_tcp4,
26555:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
26556:            fun() ->
26557:                    not_yet_implemented()%% ,
26558:                    %% ok = api_to_send_tcp(inet)
26559:            end).
26560: 
26561: 
26562: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26563: 
26564: %% This test case is intended to test the send timeout option
26565: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
26566: api_to_send_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26567:     tc_try(api_to_send_tcp6,
26568:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
26569:            fun() ->
26570:                    not_yet_implemented()%% ,
26571:                    %% ok = api_to_send_tcp(inet6)
26572:            end).
26573: 
26574: 
26575: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26576: 
26577: %% This test case is intended to test the sendto timeout option
26578: %% on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
26579: api_to_sendto_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26580:     tc_try(api_to_sendto_udp4,
26581:            fun () -> has_support_ipv4() end,
26582:            fun() ->
26583:                    not_yet_implemented()%% ,
26584:                    %% ok = api_to_sendto_to_udp(inet)
26585:            end).
26586: 
26587: 
26588: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26589: 
26590: %% This test case is intended to test the sendto timeout option
26591: %% on an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
26592: api_to_sendto_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26593:     tc_try(api_to_sendto_udp6,
26594:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
26595:            fun() ->
26596:                    not_yet_implemented()%% ,
26597:                    %% ok = api_to_sendto_to_udp(inet6)
26598:            end).
26599: 
26600: 
26601: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26602: 
26603: %% This test case is intended to test the sendmsg timeout option
26604: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
26605: api_to_sendmsg_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26606:     tc_try(api_to_sendmsg_tcp4,
26607:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
26608:            fun() ->
26609:                    not_yet_implemented()%% ,
26610:                    %% ok = api_to_sendmsg_tcp(inet)
26611:            end).
26612: 
26613: 
26614: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26615: 
26616: %% This test case is intended to test the sendmsg timeout option
26617: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
26618: api_to_sendmsg_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26619:     tc_try(api_to_sendmsg_tcp6,
26620:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
26621:            fun() ->
26622:                    not_yet_implemented()%% ,
26623:                    %% ok = api_to_sendmsg_tcp(inet6)
26624:            end).
26625: 
26626: 
26627: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26628: 
26629: %% This test case is intended to test the recv timeout option
26630: %% on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket. To test this we must connect
26631: %% the socket.
26632: api_to_recv_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26633:     tc_try(api_to_recv_udp4,
26634:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
26635:            fun() ->
26636:                    not_yet_implemented()%%,
26637:                    %%ok = api_to_recv_udp(inet)
26638:            end).
26639: 
26640: 
26641: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26642: 
26643: %% This test case is intended to test the recv timeout option
26644: %% on an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket. To test this we must connect
26645: %% the socket.
26646: api_to_recv_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26647:     tc_try(api_to_recv_udp6,
26648:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
26649:            fun() ->
26650:                    not_yet_implemented()%% ,
26651:                    %% ok = api_to_recv_udp(inet6)
26652:            end).
26653: 
26654: 
26655: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26656: 
26657: %% This test case is intended to test the recv timeout option
26658: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
26659: api_to_recv_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26660:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
26661:     tc_try(api_to_recv_tcp4,
26662:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
26663:            fun() ->
26664:                    Recv = fun(Sock, To) -> socket:recv(Sock, 0, To) end,
26665:                    InitState = #{domain  => inet,
26666:                                  recv    => Recv,
26667:                                  timeout => 2000},
26668:                    ok = api_to_receive_tcp(InitState)
26669:            end).
26670: 
26671: 
26672: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26673: 
26674: %% This test case is intended to test the recv timeout option
26675: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
26676: api_to_recv_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
26677:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
26678:     tc_try(api_to_recv_tcp6,
26679:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
26680:            fun() ->
26681:                    case socket:is_supported(ipv6) of
26682:                        true ->
26683:                            Recv = fun(Sock, To) -> 
26684:                                           socket:recv(Sock, 0, To)
26685:                                   end,
26686:                            InitState = #{domain  => inet6,
26687:                                          recv    => Recv,
26688:                                          timeout => 2000},
26689:                            ok = api_to_receive_tcp(InitState);
26690:                        false ->
26691:                            skip("ipv6 not supported")
26692:                    end
26693:            end).
26694: 
26695: 
26696: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
26697: 
26698: api_to_receive_tcp(InitState) ->
26699:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
26700: 
26701:     ServerSeq = 
26702:         [
26703:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
26704:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
26705:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
26706:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
26707:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
26708:                    end},
26709:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
26710:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
26711:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
26712:                            ok
26713:                    end},
26714: 
26715:          %% *** Init part ***
26716:          #{desc => "which local address",
26717:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
26718:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
26719:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
26720:                    end},
26721:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
26722:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
26723:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
26724:                                {ok, Sock} ->
26725:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
26726:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26727:                                    ERROR
26728:                            end
26729:                    end},
26730:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
26731:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
26732:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
26733:                                ok ->
26734:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
26735:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
26736:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26737:                                    ERROR
26738:                            end
26739:                    end},
26740:          #{desc => "make listen socket (with backlog = 1)",
26741:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
26742:                            socket:listen(LSock, 1)
26743:                    end},
26744:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
26745:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
26746:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
26747:                            ok
26748:                    end},
26749: 
26750:          %% *** The actual test ***
26751:          #{desc => "await continue (accept and recv)",
26752:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
26753:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept_recv)
26754:                    end},
26755:          #{desc => "attempt accept",
26756:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
26757:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
26758:                                {ok, Sock} ->
26759:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
26760:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26761:                                    ERROR
26762:                            end
26763:                    end},
26764:          #{desc => "attempt to recv (without success)",
26765:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv, timeout := To} = State) ->
26766:                            Start = ?TS(),
26767:                            case Recv(Sock, To) of
26768:                                {error, timeout} ->
26769:                                    {ok, State#{start => Start, stop => ?TS()}};
26770:                                {ok, _Data} ->
26771:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
26772:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26773:                                    ERROR
26774:                            end
26775:                    end},
26776:          #{desc => "validate timeout time",
26777:            cmd  => fun(#{start := Start, stop := Stop, timeout := To} = State) ->
26778:                            TDiff  = Stop - Start,
26779:                            if
26780:                                (TDiff >= To) ->
26781:                                    State1 = maps:remove(start, State),
26782:                                    State2 = maps:remove(stop,  State1),
26783:                                    {ok, State2};
26784:                                true ->
26785:                                    {error, {unexpected_timeout, TDiff, To}}
26786:                            end
26787:                    end},
26788:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv timeout success)",
26789:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
26790:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept_recv),
26791:                            ok
26792:                    end},
26793: 
26794:          %% *** Termination ***
26795:          #{desc => "await terminate",
26796:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
26797:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
26798:                                ok ->
26799:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
26800:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26801:                                    ERROR
26802:                            end
26803:                    end},
26804:          #{desc => "close (traffic) socket",
26805:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
26806:                            sock_close(Sock),
26807:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
26808:                    end},
26809:          #{desc => "close (listen) socket",
26810:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
26811:                            sock_close(LSock),
26812:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
26813:                    end},
26814: 
26815:          %% *** We are done ***
26816:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
26817:         ],
26818: 
26819:     ClientSeq =
26820:         [
26821:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
26822:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
26823:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
26824:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
26825:                            {ok, State#{tester      => Tester,
26826:                                        server_port => Port}}
26827:                    end},
26828:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
26829:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
26830:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
26831:                            ok
26832:                    end},
26833: 
26834:          %% *** Init part ***
26835:          #{desc => "which local address",
26836:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
26837:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
26838:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
26839:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
26840:                    end},
26841:          #{desc => "create socket",
26842:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
26843:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
26844:                                {ok, Sock} ->
26845:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
26846:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26847:                                    ERROR
26848:                            end
26849:                    end},
26850:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
26851:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
26852:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
26853:                                ok ->
26854:                                    ok;
26855:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26856:                                    ERROR
26857:                            end
26858:                    end},
26859:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
26860:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
26861:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
26862:                            ok
26863:                    end},
26864: 
26865:          %% *** The actual test ***
26866:          #{desc => "await continue (with connect)",
26867:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
26868:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
26869:                    end},
26870:          #{desc => "connect",
26871:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
26872:                            sock_connect(Sock, SSA),
26873:                            ok
26874:                    end},
26875: 
26876:          %% *** Termination ***
26877:          #{desc => "await terminate",
26878:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
26879:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
26880:                                ok ->
26881:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
26882:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26883:                                    ERROR
26884:                            end
26885:                    end},
26886:          #{desc => "close socket",
26887:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
26888:                            sock_close(Sock),
26889:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
26890:                    end},
26891: 
26892:          %% *** We are done ***
26893:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
26894:         ],
26895: 
26896:     TesterSeq =
26897:         [
26898:          %% *** Init part ***
26899:          #{desc => "monitor server",
26900:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
26901:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Server),
26902:                            ok
26903:                    end},
26904:          #{desc => "monitor client",
26905:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
26906:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Client),
26907:                            ok
26908:                    end},
26909: 
26910:          %% *** Activate server ***
26911:          #{desc => "start server",
26912:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
26913:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Server),
26914:                            ok
26915:                    end},
26916:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
26917:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
26918:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, init),
26919:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
26920:                    end},
26921:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
26922:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
26923:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept_recv),
26924:                            ok
26925:                    end},
26926: 
26927:          %% *** Activate client ***
26928:          #{desc => "start client",
26929:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
26930:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, Port),
26931:                            ok
26932:                    end},
26933:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
26934:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
26935:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, init)
26936:                    end},
26937: 
26938:          %% *** The actual test ***
26939:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
26940:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
26941:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
26942:                            ok
26943:                    end},
26944:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept/recv)",
26945:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
26946:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept_recv)
26947:                    end},
26948: 
26949:          %% *** Termination ***
26950:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
26951:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
26952:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
26953:                            ok
26954:                    end},
26955:          #{desc => "await client termination",
26956:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
26957:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client) of
26958:                                ok ->
26959:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
26960:                                    {ok, State1};
26961:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26962:                                    ERROR
26963:                            end
26964:                    end},
26965:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
26966:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
26967:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
26968:                            ok
26969:                    end},
26970:          #{desc => "await server termination",
26971:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
26972:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server) of
26973:                                ok ->
26974:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
26975:                                    State2 = maps:remove(server_port, State1),
26976:                                    {ok, State2};
26977:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
26978:                                    ERROR
26979:                            end
26980:                    end},
26981: 
26982:          %% *** We are done ***
26983:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
26984:         ],
26985: 
26986:     
26987:     i("start server evaluator"),
26988:     ServerInitState = InitState,
26989:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
26990: 
26991:     i("start client evaluator"),
26992:     ClientInitState = InitState,
26993:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
26994: 
26995:     i("start tester evaluator"),
26996:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid, 
26997:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
26998:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
26999: 
27000:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
27001:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
27002: 
27003: 
27004: 
27005: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
27006: 
27007: %% This test case is intended to test the recvfrom timeout option
27008: %% on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
27009: api_to_recvfrom_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
27010:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
27011:     tc_try(api_to_recvfrom_udp4,
27012:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
27013:            fun() ->
27014:                    Recv = fun(Sock, To) -> socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, To) end,
27015:                    InitState = #{domain  => inet,
27016:                                  recv    => Recv,
27017:                                  timeout => 2000},
27018:                    ok = api_to_receive_udp(InitState)
27019:            end).
27020: 
27021: 
27022: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
27023: 
27024: %% This test case is intended to test the recvfrom timeout option
27025: %% on an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
27026: api_to_recvfrom_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
27027:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
27028:     tc_try(api_to_recvfrom_udp6,
27029:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
27030:            fun() ->
27031:                    Recv = fun(Sock, To) -> socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, To) end,
27032:                    InitState = #{domain  => inet6,
27033:                                  recv    => Recv,
27034:                                  timeout => 2000},
27035:                    ok = api_to_receive_udp(InitState)
27036:            end).
27037: 
27038: 
27039: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
27040: 
27041: api_to_receive_udp(InitState) ->
27042:     TesterSeq =
27043:         [
27044:          %% *** Init part ***
27045:          #{desc => "which local address",
27046:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
27047:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
27048:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
27049:                    end},
27050:          #{desc => "create socket",
27051:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
27052:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
27053:                                {ok, Sock} ->
27054:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
27055:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
27056:                                    ERROR
27057:                            end
27058:                    end},
27059:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
27060:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA} = _State) ->
27061:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
27062:                                ok ->
27063:                                    ok;
27064:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
27065:                                    ERROR
27066:                            end
27067:                    end},
27068: 
27069:          %% *** The actual test ***
27070:          #{desc => "attempt to read (without success)",
27071:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv, timeout := To} = State) ->
27072:                            Start = ?TS(),
27073:                            case Recv(Sock, To) of
27074:                                {error, timeout} ->
27075:                                    {ok, State#{start => Start,
27076:                                                stop => ?TS()}};
27077:                                {ok, _} ->
27078:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
27079:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
27080:                                    ERROR
27081:                            end
27082:                    end},
27083:          #{desc => "validate timeout time",
27084:            cmd  => fun(#{start := Start, stop := Stop, timeout := To} = _State) ->
27085:                            TDiff  = Stop - Start,
27086:                            if
27087:                                (TDiff >= To) ->
27088:                                    ok;
27089:                                true ->
27090:                                    {error, {unexpected_timeout, TDiff, To}}
27091:                            end
27092:                    end},
27093:          
27094:          %% *** Termination ***
27095:          #{desc => "close socket",
27096:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
27097:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
27098:                            sock_close(Sock),
27099:                            ok
27100:                    end},
27101: 
27102:          %% *** We are done ***
27103:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
27104:         ],
27105: 
27106:     i("start tester evaluator"),
27107:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
27108:     
27109:     i("await evaluator"),
27110:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
27111: 
27112: 
27113: 
27114: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
27115: 
27116: %% This test case is intended to test the recvmsg timeout option
27117: %% on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
27118: api_to_recvmsg_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
27119:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
27120:     tc_try(api_to_recvmsg_udp4,
27121:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
27122:            fun() ->
27123:                    Recv = fun(Sock, To) -> socket:recvmsg(Sock, To) end,
27124:                    InitState = #{domain  => inet,
27125:                                  recv    => Recv,
27126:                                  timeout => 2000},
27127:                    ok = api_to_receive_udp(InitState)
27128:            end).
27129: 
27130: 
27131: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
27132: 
27133: %% This test case is intended to test the recvmsg timeout option
